88b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur gyis/ rang bdag nyid ni dbang bskur bya// gsol ba btab pa bstan par bya// bdag ni rgyal po dkyil 'khor mchog chos kyi sbyor ba 'di/
88b2(rgyud): yis ni/ ting 'dzin shin tu dran med// sangs rgyas rdorje 'dzin bcas kun// kun gyis nub pa mdzad par 'gyur// ting nge 'dzin las langs nas kyang // bka' ninye bar nor
88b3(rgyud): bya ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag nyid// nam yang ngo ba mi bya'o// skyil grang ba shig sa langs nas no// rang gis 'dren pa'i nabs phyag bya// sangs rgyas rgya mchogs
88b4(rgyud): ba ru/ daphyogs rnams bzhi ni blta bar bya// theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs// rdo rje'i tshig ni brjod par bya// bdag nyid rang nyid rdo rje can// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag
88b5(rgyud): rang nyid// bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che// bdag ni stobs chen rdo rje can// bdag ni rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal// bdag ni phyag na rdo rje mchog/ oM badz+ra satwa hUM/
88b6(rgyud): mi ni gsang sngags 'di// lan cig nyid ni brjod par bya// bdag ni gtso bo rdo rje che// byin gyis brlabs pa ni 'dor ro// sangs rgyas rgya mtshos kun tu gang // 'khor los lnga
88b7(rgyud): par yang dag gnas// bskems bcas rdo rje gsor nas ni// rdo rje bsnyems tshul ldan par bya// slar yang bdag nyid go bgo zhing // bdag nyid dbang ni bskur bar bya// rdo rjeg na/
89a1(rgyud): sbyin phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad gcad par bya// lag nyed pa yi phyag rgya yis/ bgegs rnams thams cad rab tu man// rdo rje btun shing /
89a2(rgyud): nyid kyis ni// bgegs rnams thams cad brdung bar bya// rdo rje ral gri rab rno bas// bgegs rnams thams cad gtud par bya// rdo rje mche ba drag po yis// bgegs rnams
89a3(rgyud): thams cad dbug par bya// rdo rje bzang po'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad gzhom par bya// rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par bya/
89a4(rgyud): rdo rje mche ba rab grags pas/ bgegs rnams thams cad bza' bar bya// rdo rje lcags sgrog phyag rgya yis/ bgegs rnams thams cad bcing bar bya// rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya
89a5(rgyud): yi sa/ dab gegs rnams thams cad dgug par bya// rdo rje nags pa'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad drang bar bya// rdo rje mdung thung phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams/
89a6(rgyud): thams cad dbug par bya// rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bsgyel bar bya/ rgyas pa yis ne ci nus par/ lus rnams thams cad dgug par \u0f7f/
89a7(rgyud): bgegs ni 'ga' yang lo dmin nas// sems ni dag par gyur pa yin/ rang sems bdud ces bya bar bshad/ bgegs nyid kyang ni rang gi sems// rnam par rtog pa thams cad
89b1(rgyud): bsal/ rnam rtog las ni bgegs rnams 'byung // gdul bur dka' ba'i sems gzung zhing / 'dod pa lnga ni spang bar bya/ sngon du rjes dran nas brnams te/ yang na
89b2(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur/ bcom zhing nges par gcang nas ni// yi ge hUM gis bskrad par bya// rdo rje las kyi phyag rgyayis// rdo rjer ba bcing bar bya/ d+hI mdza rdo rje bsdam bya
89b3(rgyud): ning // de ni rdo rje rabs bskor// rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya ches// dkyil 'khor yang dag byin brlabs nas/ ci nus par ni rgyas pa ru/ rab mchog ni bcing bar bya/
89b4(rgyud): tog pa kun la des sbyar nas// sems ni dag par 'gyur ba yin/ dkyil 'khor dag gi mtshan nyid ni// mkhas pa yis ni gzung bar bya// grogs dag dang na thams cad pa/
89b5(rgyud): gsal ba med par bsrung bar bya// gas pa ning legs par bkal ba dang / tshang dang ldan sring mdzes pa dang / dri'i ma dag bya 'dam pa dang / legs par byas shes ma pa dang /
89b6(rgyud): su / sa sa / dugyu nga / rnam kyi dkyi 'tsha g+sa ga / /
89b7(rgyud): sems can 'di rnams gdul bya min/
89b8(rgyud): tshig hU~M/ sangs rgyas ku kyigs // dkyil 'kho kun gyi gas / sangs rgyas bstan pa'i tsha/
90a1(rgyud): bsod nams ye shes rgya mtsho che// tshogs ni kun tu ma bsags pas// bsod nams tshogs dang mi ldan zhing // sangs rgyas 'byung la chags dang bral/
90a2(rgyud): sems can de rnams mos bya'i phyir// dkyil 'khor chen po bstan pa yin// sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang ldan pa// de nas dkyil 'khor 'dzin du 'jug/ yang na bsod nams dag gi tshegs//
90a3(rgyud): de ni rang nyid kyis mthong 'gyur// gang phyir tshogs bcas longs spyod dang // chos kyi sku ni bla na med// rdo rje'i dam chos las byung ba'i// sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'dzin du gzhug
90a4(rgyud): gal te de ni tshogs bsags gyur// sngon du sangs rgyas rjes su mthong // dkyil 'khor sbyor ba la gnas te// sangs rgyas thams cad des mthong 'gyur// tshogs ni bsags pa med pa
90a5(rgyud): dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba med pa ru// des ni thos pa rnyed mi 'gyur// dang por 'dir 'dug smos ci dgos// gang phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// 'di ni gsang ba mtshungs med pa//
90a6(rgyud): 'di ni theg chen snying po ste// chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med// bskal pa grangs med pa ru byung // sa yi pha rol phyin pa mchog/ gang phyir gsang ba mtho ba thob// rab tu dga' ba sgrub par
90a7(rgyud): 'gyur// gal te rnal 'byor pa de brtson// tshe 'di nyid la mya ngan 'das// rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob cing // rdo rje nyid ni the tshom med// yang na mthong ba tsam gyis ni// skye ba bcu
90b1(rgyud): drug mya ngan 'das// rab tu dga' ba thob pa dang / yang na rdo rje nyid kyang ngo // sa la nyi zla ltung byed cing // de ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin 'gyur// so sa'i skye bos sangs rgyas nyid/
90b2(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur te gzhan du min// rnal 'byor mchog ni bla med pa// de phyir rnal 'byor chen po sbyor// gal te sangs rgyas nyid 'dod na// brtson 'grus chen pos bsdad mi bya// tshad
90b3(rgyud): ni ji skad bshad pa ru// de bzhin gzung gi rjes 'brangs nas// phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya// gang phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gnas// zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta bas
90b4(rgyud): bzhis ni mdzes par bya// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// cha mnyam pas ni mdzes par gyur// dar gyi chun pos brgyan gyur cing // rin chen dra bas rnam par brgyan// g.yer ka'i
90b5(rgyud): dra ba yang dag ldan// kha dog lnga pos rab tu mdzes// dril bu'i dra bas shin tu smras// rdza yab sna tshogs kyis mdzes pa// 'phreng ba rnga yab bla re dang // nyi zla dag gis nye bar mdzes//
90b6(rgyud): kun nas phyi rol gnas dag tu// rdo rje kha khyer yang dag rten// kun tu kha khyer dang ldan pa'i// sgo ni kha khyer med pa'o// rtse mo rdo rje sngo rang bzhin// gzhan ni gser gyi mdog can dang //
90b7(rgyud): dmar po pad+ma lta bu dang // gzhan yang shel ltar dkar ba dang // rin chen rang bzhin mchog kun gyi// dkyil 'khor mdzes par bri bar bya// sna tshogs gzugs ni mdzes pa mchog
91a1(rgyud): de ma rnags kyis sa spya da hA/ kha rdzogs dang ug+sa shegs da phyug
91a2(rgyud): bar smras/ 'dang ma pani nga yang dag rdzas// sgo bzhi ba ni mchog tu mangs// mtshanang yangs la sa paste/ de rje yang dag / don na srungs na'akhyen to/
91a3(rgyud): nyid rje ma lcags kyu 'dzin// gtum pa srung byed rnal 'byor pa// shar gyi sgo ru yang dag gnas// skyoru rdo chagags pa ste/ nub tu rje ljags sgrog go// rdo rje zil du skal chen po
91a4(rgyud): byang gi sgo ru yang dag gnas/ 'jug pa dang ni 'byung ba'ang rung // rdo rje shugs ni brjod par bya// ri mo dmanam pardzis byas na// dam tshig de nyid mthong mi 'gyur/ oM badz+ra be g+ha kA paT+Ta/
91a5(rgyud): gang gis dus su thig 'debs pa/ rdo rje'i thig ni brjod par bya// sa yi cha ni ma lus pa/ thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin 'gyur// oM badz+ra sa ma yA sU tra ma ti kra ma hUM/ sngon du tshon rtsi'i bye ma
91a6(rgyud): la/ 'bar ba'i lta bas yang dag blta// badz+ra rA ga zhes brjod na/ thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin 'gyur// oM badz+ra rA ga hUM/ mtshams kyi cha ni thams cad dang // sgo khyud kyi ni
91a7(rgyud): mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras// phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya// logs dang cha ni mnyam pa dang / kun nas cha ni rnam par byed// dkyil 'khor
91b1(rgyud): sa gal// 'am lalam rgyas / de'i na sa yangasu ma sa sa /
91b2(rgyud): pa'i mdu sa/ dkyilal sa rnams sa pa masa' na / 'ab ma kyil sa
91b3(rgyud): tu bri zhing dgod par bya// rdo rje bsnyems tshul gyis bltas nas// rdo rje sems dpa' gzung bar bya// oM badz+ra sa twA rbu/ de la dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ sangs rgyas rgyal po dgod par bya/
91b4(rgyud): gang gis thugs las nges byung ba// gsang ba'i tshogs ni sdug cing brtan// rnam par snang mdzad rnal 'byor che// phyogs rnams kun tu rnam par gsal// thub pa don yod grub pa
91b5(rgyud): dgod// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// las chen po dag yang dag bri// kun nas phyogs ni bzhi dag tu// phyag na rang gi phyag mtshan mtshon// mdun du rdo rje las yin te//
91b6(rgyud): g.yas su rdo rje srung ba'o// g.yon du rdo rje gnod sbyin te// rdo rje khu tshur rgyub tu'o// de nas phyag mtshan bcu drug dang // dbus ma nyi shur rab bshad bya// bcu drug dbus su nyi shu ni/
91b7(rgyud): go rims bzhin du rab bshad bya// ji ltar rigs shing 'tsham pa la// rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa/ rdo rje rin chen rin po che// rdo rje pad+ma chen po dang // rdo rje rnon po dbus ma yin// phyag
92a1(rgyud): nardo nga'i ngo che//
92a2(rgyud): de bzhin gas kyu / nganags pa / de rje 'gas pa dganyis na ga/ /
92a3(rgyud): nyi ma ste/
92a4(rgyud): masan rnalas sgru/ da sa// bzhin pa du khri ba dag/ nga na#

92a6(rgyud): dag ni slob bani// rdo rje sems ma'i dze rje che/ de bzhin rdo rje rin chen nor// pad+ma rdo rje chos ma ste/ ro'i rnon po las ma yin// grwa bzhi dag tu gsang ba y-i/ phyag mtshan de/
92a7(rgyud): rnams dgod par bya// 'khor lo chen po'i phyi rol gyi// grwa bzhi dag ni thams cad du// gsang ba'i chos pa rnam pa bzhi// rdo rje lha mo yang dag bri// rdo rje sgeg ma dzor 'phreng ma/
92a8(rgyud): de bzhin rdo rje glu ma nyid/ bsnyems bcas 'phreng ba pi wang dang // glu gar gsang ba'i lha mo rnams// phyi rol dkyil 'khor mtshams rnams su// mchod pa'i lha mo yang dag zi/
92a9(rgyud): me tog spos dang de bzhin dri// mar me nub byang mtshams su 'ong // mar me la sogs par nyid kyis// phyi yi dkyil 'khor thams cad du/ pa skal pa bzang po'i sem dpa' che
92b1(rgyud): stong ni nges par dgod par bya// mtshan ma ji bzhin ci rigs pas/ byams pa la sogs ma lus pa// ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa yi// sems dpa' chen po dgod par bya/ cho ga'i sbyor
92b2(rgyud): ba 'di yis ni// kun tu bri zhing dgod par bya// rang gi snying pos kun dbab phyir// rang rang gi ni snying po yin// de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// mo badz+ra pA Ni hU~M / badz+ra a~M ku sha
92b3(rgyud): bar drug to/ badz+ra sa d+hus/ dam tshig mchog gi snying po'o// oM badz+ra ra Ni/ oM baN ti 'o a barba ke tud+d+he/ par byas hA/ badz+ra triSh+Tha badz+ra na/ ya @
92b4(rgyud): dbang gi sems dpa' dang / ye shes kyi sems dpa' chen pa'i snying po'o// bang kam / brtag / mas hA/ ba su khyab/ las kyi sems dpa' chen ma ma
92b5(rgyud): ba'o// de na pas ni rab tu gnas pa'i skying ba yin// de nas sangs rgyas kyi sring ba ni/ badzar+tha/ \u0f7f// 5/ lha mo rnams kyi sngang ba shad min te/ sgru
92b6(rgyud): sbyi san// dkyil thams cad dag pa / sa ba da kyi las pa ca da nas nal #

93a1(rgyud): phyi rol dkyil 'khor 'khor lo la// lan bdun du ni bskor bar bya// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par ni/ mkhas pas thams cad blta bar bya/ gal
93a2(rgyud): te chad dam lhag kyang rung // rdo rje shugs kyis dag par bya// 'khor lo chen po dag par byas// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor yang dag gzung // rgyal ba rnams la bdag nyid ni// dbul
93a3(rgyud): ba'i las ni kun tu bya// de nas yo byad thams cad kyis// dkyil 'khor la ni mchod par bya// ci 'byor pas ni bya ba ste// dman par gyur kyang nyes pa med// 'byor pa ji snyed
93a4(rgyud): yod pa kun// go rims bzhin du rab tu dbul// bum pa gang ba 'bum phrag gam// stong ngam yang na brgya yang rung // mar me 'bum phrag stong ngam ni// yang na stong ngam pa/
93a5(rgyud): yang rung // dri dang spos kyi snod 'bum mam// yang na stong ngam brgya yang rung // ga pur a ka ru nyid dang // du ru ka dang tsan dan sogs// mang sbyar dri nim dang ldan pa/ spos
93a6(rgyud): rnams 'di dag bsreg par bya// gser ma dngus gyi sdong dag dang // sa las byas kyang nyes pa med// yo byad ji skad yod ba kun// dkyil 'khor du ni gzhag par bya// de ma kong
93a7(rgyud): stong zag gas// ma me'i sdong bu shin tu 'bar// man mar me stong gcig s+ho// mtshang gyur kyang zhes pa med/ da na byar ba bye bri// kham pa'i thang bas rnam par 'chas

93b6(rgyud): mchong pa dang ni gtor ma nyid// ji bzhin sgrub pa pos dbul// de bzhin dngos grub rdzu 'phrul ni// mthong ba'i chos la thob par 'gyur// sngar ni ji skang bsgrags pa bzhin/
93b7(rgyud): cad chog bzhin du dgad// sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya zhing // mchod pa nyid kyang rab tu bya// de nas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo lo// dbus kyi 'khor lo phyag byas nas// phu ma
93b8(rgyud): btsugs te 'dug nas ni// yang dag par ni dgug par bya// sems dpa' rdo rje lcags kyu bcing // rdo rje lcags kyu brjod par bya// nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa yis// de
94a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs rnams kun tu gshegs// de nas sgo srungs bcings nas ni// yi ge dza ni yongs su brjod// rdo rje can ni thams cad dgug/ the tshom dpar/
94a2(rgyud): gshegs par gyur// rdo rje zhags pa bcings nas ni// cho ga ji bzhin nges par gzhug/ rdo rje lcags sgrog bcings nas ni// dbang du yang ni rtag tu bya// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag
94a3(rgyud): rgyu yis// de dag nyid kyang dbab par bya// rdo rje gnas pa'i phyag rgya yis// gnas rnams kun ni dgod par bya// ci nus par ni rab tu bsgrags// de nas mchod pa rab tu bya//
94a4(rgyud): spos dang me tog la sogs pa'i// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor kun la sbyar// bdag nyid dbul dang mchod pa dang // bshags dang gsol ba btab la sogs// byang chub sems
94a5(rgyud): ni bskyed nas kyang // sdom pa yang dag spyad par bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya ches// bdag nyid la ni dbang bskur bya// se gol dag ni brdab bya zhing // sangs rgyas thams
94a6(rgyud): cad bsdu bar bya// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun// bkug cing rab tu bcug nas ni// rdo rje lcags sgrog yang dag dbab// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya ches// dral nas
94a7(rgyud): de ni yang dag dbab// rdo rje ye shes bla na med// ye shes dag pa skye bar 'gyur// sems dpa'i ye shes dbab par 'gyur// rdo rje dbab pa yang dag brjod// ci ste babs par ma
94b1(rgyud): gyur na/ yi ge a yis dril bu dkrol/ mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang / rdo rje slob dpon 'di lta bu/ ye shes dam pa skye 'gyur zhing / rmad du byung ba'ang 'dis mthong 'gyur/
94b2(rgyud): brgya las rtsa bdun lhag pa nyid// mtshan ma'ang de las lhag 'byung 'gyur// gzhan dag gang yang rung ba nyid// gal te bsod nams skal ba che// des ni sangs rgyas thams cad mthong //
94b3(rgyud): yang na byang chub sems dpa' 'am// yang na rdo rje 'dzin gang nyid// yang na 'od zer 'phros pa mthong // hUM sgrog 'brug gi sgra dang ni// spos dang me tog dag gi bar/ baspu
94b4(rgyud): langs pa la sogs byung // de nas rdo rje slob dpon ni// dkyil 'khor phyi rol byung nas ni// sems ma'i phyag rgya ldan gyur pas/ sor mo gnyis kyis 'phreng bas zung // gar
94b5(rgyud): gyi tshul gyis zhugs nas ni// rdo rje gar ni rab bskor bas// dbus kyi 'khor lo rab zhugs nas// 'phreng ba nyid ni dor bar bya// 'brang ba de ni gar babs pa// de dang de ni skad
94b6(rgyud): cig 'grub// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas// phyag rgya thams cad bcing byas na// dngos grub thams cad nges pa ru// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// gzhan yang
94b7(rgyud): de la rdo rje 'chang // byin gyis rlob pa mdzad par 'gyur// langs nas der ni bcom ldan 'das// yang na rdo rje 'dzin pa'ang rung // 'dar ba dang ni g.yo ba'ang rung // de bzhin yan
95a1(rgyud): lag 'khums pa dang / yang na tshig ni byung ba dang / ci ste hUM ni brjod pa'ang rung / nges par legs so zhes b+ha ba/ cho 'phrul bde ba chen po na/
95a2(rgyud): rmang byung bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ rdo rje slob dpon skal ba ches// mthong 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni// de nas langs te brjod par bya// mgon
95a3(rgyud): po thub pa la btud nas/ ci 'dod pa ni bka' nod bya// rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ sems can kun la phan bya'i phyir/ slob ma rab tu/
95a4(rgyud): gzhug par bgyi// rgyu dang mi rgyu khams gsum gyi// sems can kun gyi bde gang yin// des na rdo rje slob dpon de'i// bcu drug char yang mi phod do// rdo rje slob dpon gyi las
95a5(rgyud): rdzogs so// / de nas slob ma gzhug par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po der ni ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems
95a6(rgyud): can gyi khams thams cad 'jug tu rung ngo // snod dang snod ma yin pa yongs su brtag par mi bya ste/ gzhug pa la mngon par zhen pa yongs su gzung bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems
95a7(rgyud): can thams cad kyis mthong ba tsam gyi mod la phyir mi ldog pa nyid du 'gyur ro// dad pa med pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags pa dang / rgyud yongs su ma smin pa dang mos pa med pa mang du zin
95b1(rgyud): kyang 'on kyang mthong ba tsam gyis so// gang gi phyir gsang ba chen po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gsang bas 'dul ba'i thabs dang 'khor lo'i tshul dang
95b2(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa yin te/ de'i phyir mthong ba tsam gyi mod la ngan song thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// rgyal ba'i sras ni
95b3(rgyud): 'jigs pa med// ngan sang sgoni bcad pa dang // thams cad thar pa la gzhol dang / phyir mi ldog pa nyid du 'gyur// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs song ste/ byang chub sems
95b4(rgyud): ni bskyed du gzhug/ sems can kun gyi don bsams nas/ sdom pa yang ni sbyin par bya/ srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa dang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang
95b5(rgyud): brdzun du smra ba dang / 'bru'i chang dang bcos pa'i chang dang myos par gyur pa dag de nas brtsams te spang bar bya'o// sngon la sdom pa 'di dag ni// ji ltar 'dod cing mos pa ru/
95b6(rgyud): mkhas pa yis ni sbyin bya ste/ rang dbang med par sbyin mi bya// gal te de ni dang gyur na// de la sdom pa sbyin par bya/ sdom pa gsum la bkod nas ni// de nas dkyil 'kho
95b7(rgyud): bstan par bya// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs song ste/ bslab pa lnga la rnam par gnas/ byang chub sems la mchog brtson bya// sems
96a1(rgyud): can shin tu gdul dka' gang // sdom pa 'dzin par mi byed cing // dad dang ldan pa med pa'ang // 'jug pa nyid ni dgag mi bya// ji ltar sangs rgyas thugs rje can//
96a2(rgyud): de dag gi ni sku ru 'gyur// mthong ba tsam gyi mod la ni// sdom pa dag par 'grub par 'gyur// bdag nyid ngan pa'i sems can gang // khro zhing shin tu gshe ba dang // band gang byed cing 'phyar
96a3(rgyud): yang rung // de nyid rgyu ru 'gyur ba yin// gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ru// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// ji ltar 'os shing 'tsham pa ru// rdo rje slob ma gzhug par bya// sbyor ba ba ni
96a4(rgyud): yis phyag bya zhing // rdo rje sngags kyang bsgom par bya// sngar bshad cho ga ji bzhin du// phyag bzhi dag kyang bya ba yin// stod g.yogs gos ni dmar po dang // dmar pos mig kyang dgab
96a5(rgyud): par bya// gos ni dmar po bskon byas te// gang phyir sangs rgyas sku 'dzin pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che// shin tu gsal ba 'ching du gzhug/ snying po lan cig brjod bya zhing //
96a6(rgyud): sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes bya brjod// dga' ning mgu la rangs pa yis// ser mo gnyis kyis 'phreng ba blangs// snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni// slob dpon chen pos gzhug par bya// sa ma ya hUM/
96a7(rgyud): shar gyi sgo yi nang du ni// yi ge dza ni yang dag brjod// lho ru zhags pa'i yi ge hUM// nub tu lcags sgrog baM lhan cig/ byang du dril bu byang chub par// yi ge a ni brjod par bya//
96b1(rgyud): dus phyis rol pa dang bcas par/ bkug ste phyag kyang btsal bar bya// bshags dang gsol ga ba mchod pa dang // yongs su bsngo dang rjes yi rang / bdag nyid dbul bzhid kyang ni/
96b2(rgyud): go rims bzhin du byed du gzhug/ dang bdag ye shes rdo rje ni// the tshom med par bskyed par bya// khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya ste// khyod ni phung bar gyur te re// brjod nas 'phreng ba dong du
96b3(rgyud): gzug dza rje'i 'bring basbyin par bya// 'phreng ba de ni gang du babs// 'grub par 'gyur bar the tshom med// oM badz+ra mA le/ rdo rje'i tshig ni rab brjod cing // de nas gdong g.yogs
96b4(rgyud): dgrol bar bya// nges par yid ches sbyin bya zhing // dkyil 'khor ltos zhes brjod par bya// oM nga ni rdo rje sems rang nyid// sangs rgyas snying po las byung ba// rdo rje mig ni dbye bar bya/
96b5(rgyud): kye rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ltos// dam tshig nyid ni sbyin bya zhing // sems ma'i phyag rgya steng du bcing // 'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig 'joms// rdo rje tshig ni brjod par bya// oM u da ka
96b6(rgyud): rdo rje gsang sngags 'di yis ni// phyag na rdo rjes srung bar byed// dam tshig nyid ni nyams gyur na// 'bras bu 'di ni thob mi 'gyur// 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig 'das na
96b7(rgyud): sreg par byed// dam tshig bsrungs pas 'grub par 'gyur/ 'thungs shig rdo rje bdud rtsi 'thung // rdo rje sems dpa'i mna' yi ni// snying po 'dis ni mnas bskrag go// rdorje
97a1(rgyud): sems dpa' bdag nyid ni// de ring khyod kyi snying la zhugs/ gal te tshul 'di smras na ni// skad cig de la dral nas gshegs/ gang zhig sdom pa mi len cing /
97a2(rgyud): shin tu gdul dka' dang med la// gzhug pa tsam ni sbyin par bya// de la las ni mi bya'o// dkon mchog gsum la dang dang ldan// sdig la 'jigs shing rab tu bsdams// dang dang
97a3(rgyud): dang ba phun sum tshogs// de la dam tshig sbyin par bya// de la dam tshig gang zhe na// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang // gtso bo de dag lhur blang bya// 'tsho ba'i srog gi phyir yang ni//
97a4(rgyud): byang sems nges par dor mi bya// lha rnams la ni smad mi bya// sngags dang phyag rgya nam yang min// rdo rje slob dpon brnyas mi bya// bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs// bzhon pa mtshon
97a5(rgyud): cha phyag mtshan dang // dman ma lus kyi grib ma rnams// gya nom du ni brdzi mi bya// nam yang bza' bar mi bya'o// bdag gis sngon ni ji ltar mthong // sems can gzhan la brjod
97a6(rgyud): mi bya/ sngags dang phyag rgya bslab pa ni// nam yang dor bar mi bya'o// sems can gsad par mi bya zhing // theg pa gzhan la dga' mi bya// sems can don dang 'khor ba las/
97a7(rgyud): nam yang skyo bar mi bya'o// pha rol phyin drug spyod pa ni// nam yang dor bar mi bya'o// bya ba ma yin rtag tu spang // khyod kyi dam tshig sdom pa yin// gal te snod ldan mchog yin na/
97b1(rgyud): 'di 'dra 'damamig bdodag bya/ ci ste na na patang snyoms gsag ni skye 'dodu pa bdebar pa/ sbyor ba 'di dag thams cad kyis/ dkyil 'khor thams cad bslus pa ma/ rdung
97b2(rgyud): rnams gur gyi dam tshig mchog/ thams cad du ni sbyar bar bya// cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// ngo na slob ma gzhug par bya// dri ma chos ni sgrub pa yis// dngos grub mchog kyang sbyin
97b3(rgyud): par bya// gal te rdo rje can rang grub// mkhas pas gzhan la'ang bslab par bya// rang nyid ye shes yang dag skyes// de bzhin gzhan la bskyed par bya// dkyil 'khor mthong zhing chog
97b4(rgyud): shes/ dam tshig dngos grub dang ldan pa'i// dad dang ldan pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur// 'dir ni slob dpon 'gyur ba yin// de yis mchod pa byas nas ni// the tshom med par 'grub par/
97b5(rgyud): 'gyur/ mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang // lan bdun gyis ni 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje mob ma la brjod bya// 'di las 'jig rten gzhan du min// sdug bsngal kun las rnam par
97b6(rgyud): grol/ khyod 'dir rdo rje can du 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod sprul zhing // de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skye// 'khor ba'i gnas kyi btson ra ru// slar yang sdug bsngal
97b7(rgyud): 'gyur ba med// deng khyod skye ba 'bras bur bcas// sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs pa ru// de ring khyod ni gyur pa yin// nga la spyi bos gus pas gtugs// lus ni theg gsum pa
98a1(rgyud): rol phyin/ mi khom par ni skye mi 'gyur/ byang chub spyod pas nyes pa med/ rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob 'gyur/ rdo rje can khyod brtson par gyis/ gzhan tshe
98a2(rgyud): bcu drug gis thob pa// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// rgyal ba'i sras kyis thob kyang / dkyil 'khor gsang ba mthong ma gyur// ji ltar khyod ni de byung ba// de bzhin theg pa
98a3(rgyud): yid ches min// skye dang skye ba thams cad du// rdo rje can ni mngon brtson 'gyur// skye ba bcu drug mthar thug pas// zhi bar sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// rgyal ba'i gnas kyis
98a4(rgyud): thob cing // bskal grangs med gnyis dka' ba spyod// gsang ba'i theg par ma zhugs par// bcu drug gis ni 'gyur ba yin// 'byung po kun gyis mthong mi 'gyur// khams
98a5(rgyud): gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu ba// lha tshogs gdug pa thams cad kyis// rdo rje can ni zil mi non// rims gdon dug dang phyag rgya dang // mkha' 'gro la sogs 'jigs pa'i gdong /
98a6(rgyud): rgyal dang bcas gzhan dag gis// slar yang khyod ni zil non min// de ni bskal pa brgya ru yang // rdo rje'i yon tan nyid brjod 'gyur// gsang ba'i snying po mchog mthong 'gyur//
98a7(rgyud): nam yang 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// sems dpa'i rang bzhin phyag rgya bcings// brtson 'grus chen pos brtan par bya// ji skad du ni brjod par bya// dbab pa bla na med pa ste/ 'di
98b1(rgyud): ni dam tshig don ni/ de rje sems dpa' zhes byung ba gang / ngarje la shes pa med pa/ dashid kyis ni dbab bdag/ bam ma pag su / denas dbab 'a gyur ba nyid mngon pa /
98b2(rgyud): gis ba drug thob cing // ye shes dam bzang cig gis/ sngon byung min pa'i dga' bde dang / dga' ba mgu ba mchog dag dang // rig pa thams cad mngon du 'gyur// rdzu 'phrul
98b3(rgyud): dag ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni/ rdo rjes phyag tu snying bar dkrol/ rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ rtag tu sgring ba zhugs par 'gyur/ mi bam
98b4(rgyud): dri rnam b+ha bag sha ta ma thabu/ rjo ma ma a \u0f7f tiSh+Tha/ sarbam d+ham+ba pra la na tu hAha sa so// de nas snying po 'di yis ni/ 'phreng banyid ni da mar bya// pa / gnas gang du ni/
98b5(rgyud): 'phreng ba babs// de yi lha ni rigs de yi// go rims bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi// gsang ba chen po bstan par bya// dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis kyang / sangs rgyas sa naH
98b6(rgyud): tsom med/ dri dang ldan zhing yid 'ong ba// bum pa'i chu ni blangs nas ni// snying po 'di yis dbang bskur bya/ sdug bsngal rab tu 'khrud pa'i mchog/ oM badz+ra a b+hi
98b7(rgyud): de nas phyag rgya gang rung bas// 'phreng ba byin nas dbang bskur bya// rdo rje'i ming ni dbang bskur la/ ming gi sgra ni rab sbyar bya// oM badza satwa a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi badza nA ma a b+hi Sha)
99a1(rgyud): ta he badza nA mraslob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// / rdo rje ye shes bla na med/ de la ye shes bslab par bya/ bzhi las gang yang rung ba ni//
99a2(rgyud): skal ba ji bzhin dri bar bya// gal te nor gyi dngos grub smra// de ni rnam bzhir bshad par bya// nor gyi ye shes chen po ba ni// dngos grub rnams ni bslang bar bya// gang na gter
99a3(rgyud): ni yod reb// der ni skyil mo krung bcas te// snying khar rdo rje bsgoms nas ni// gter gyi gnas ni rab mthong 'gyur// badz+ra nI nI/ nam mkhar rdo rje bsgom bya zhing // me long la
99a4(rgyud): ni yang dag pa la// gang du lhung bar mthong 'gyur ba// de na gter ni yod par bstan// radza ni ni/ rang gi lce la rdo rje sgom// 'din yod ces rang nying sna/ // rdo rna las ni yang dag
99a5(rgyud): babs/ gang du babs pa dang bstan to// kar ni ni/ gal tI de rje'i dngos grub smra/ rnam pa bzhi ni bslab pa gyu/ chu ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin mthong // shin tu mnyam gnas
99a6(rgyud): drug rgyun thug pa rang ba na yong / tshus med du cag papa gyud/ bamatshul// bdag ny-i dzin dang na pakra/ yang dang yang du /
99a7(rgyud): ga na rnams ri mdang sa/ ba rung / bdag ci las 'dzi pazhi mtshas// rang na med pa cid rnams sa/ ngang bab pa byed/
99b1(rgyud): sa yung snang ba gyum/ ba g+hu/ de gapa'i ma ga banas sa / 'os ni ga / byes
99b2(rgyud): 'gro bar 'gyur// ba'o mahA/ rig pa 'dzin pa 'dod sna ba/ ye shes rnam pani sbyin par bya/ za ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas shing // nam mkha' la ni bdag nyi dganas/
99b3(rgyud): lag na rdo rje dang ldan par// bdag nyid yongs su bsgom par bya// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// gal te chos kyi phyag rgya 'dod// gnas sam yang na gzhan yang rung / bdag
99b4(rgyud): nyid gnas par bsgoms na ni// de ltar gnas shing lag paru// rdo rje pad+ma rab skom zhing // bdag nyid rdo rje chos su ste/ pad+ma rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// badz+ra d+har/ pad+ma d+ha ra
99b5(rgyud): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug ste/ bdag nyid las dang yang dag ldan// nam mkha' la gnas bdag nyid ni// las kyi rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// bdag nyid rdo rje rin chen dang /
99b6(rgyud): de bzhin du ni bdag nyid gnas// lag tu rin chen rnam bsgoms na// rin chen rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// karma d+ha ra/ rat+na d+ha ra/ gal te sangs rgyas dngos grub smra// ye shes
99b7(rgyud): rnam bani brjod par bya// rtag tu nam mkhar bsgoms nas ni// lus ni yang ba nyid 'gyur zhing // rdzu 'phrul gyi ni gnas thob 'gyur// rdo rje'i bdag nyid myur du 'bar// badz+ra d+hi/
100a1(rgyud): gas na sa / ma na / ba sri 'a myi ga ga rdzug
100a2(rgyud): chos gyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dag/ yan lag bzang ba ldan zhing // bdag nyid dag pa ba bsgoms nas// mngon pa shes pa thob 'gyur// sarba pra nas
100a3(rgyud): 'grus dang bcas pas// rdo na sems dpa' nam mkha' yi// dbyings su bzhugs par byasams nani/ rang nyi ngo rje 'dzin par 'gyur// khams gsum 'di dag thams cad ni/
100a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas gzugs su mos byas nas/ brtan par rjes su dran grub na/ sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba yin// satwa satwa/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ gang tshe gsang ba'i lha mor 'gyur// de mi
100a5(rgyud): rigs kyi lha ru 'gyur// ye shes dag pa brjod bya zhing // de la mna' yang bsgag par bya// ji skad gsang mdo dbang gsungs pa// de bzhin b+ha gar gzhug par bya// yid kyis
100a6(rgyud): thams cad bcug nas ni// de yi lus ni mnyam du sngo// mi bskyod thugs ka nas byung ste// rnam par snang mdzad thugs ka nas// de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni/ sangs rgyas kun
100a7(rgyud): ni mnyam du spro// ting 'dzin sbyor ba la gnas te// mnyam par gzhag pas pheg rdob bya// rdo rje thal mo'i pheg brdabs pas// dngos grub thams cad dbang du 'gyur// badz+ra pA sha
100b1(rgyud): sa ma su smra
100b2(rgyud): sa// da ga sa/ #n-i/ kA
100b3(rgyud): ma ma sa // nga rdzug sa dang / ga nga 'a/ rnams pa / 'a ga
100b4(rgyud): banaha/ de bzhin drug gnas nas ni// sangs rjes mA na mamam duH// de l+h+wa mo 'ang bdag nyid/ rnam par snang mdzod thugs ka gnas/ des sgyum cingasanas
100b5(rgyud): badz+ra badz+ral na gnyis brjod// rdo rje bsdams pa nges bkrol no// sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms pa'i mchog/ badz+ra bi ra/ de nas rnam par sdang mdzad sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyu
100b6(rgyud): sngar gyi ting 'dzin ji bzhin du// rdo rje dbyings ni rab tu bya// rnal 'byor lnga la'ang rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas nyid kyang rnyed dka' min// oM tsat+ti pra ti bo d+hi ka ro mi/ ma tha ni tsi/
100b7(rgyud): ut+pA ta lA mi/ oM tiSh+Thabadz+ra/ oM badz+ra At+ma koH/ oM ya thA sarba ta thA ga ta ta thA a haM/ rnal 'byor lnga po 'di yis ni// phyag rgya lnga ni yang dag sgrub// rnam par snang mdzad rang bdag nyid/
101a1(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyag rgya rnams so// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung 'dug ste/
101a2(rgyud): rdo rje gsor la gzung bar bya// sku dang gsung thugs phyag rgya dag/ rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid 'gyur// badz+ra satwa haM/ sgrub pa dag gi mchog chen po// de nas yang dag bshad par bya/
101a3(rgyud): rang nyid rdo rje gsung gis bshad// rdo rje rnal 'byor bsgrub par bya// bsnyems bcas rdo rje gsor nas ni// rdo rje bsnyems tshul yang dag gzung // rdo rje dbab par rang gyur nas/
101a4(rgyud): bdag nyid rdo rje zhes byar sgom// badz+ra satwa haM/ rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan zhing // dkyil 'khor ma lus ston mdzad pa// 'phreng ba'i rnam pa 'od dang ldan// rgyan dang gos
101a5(rgyud): dang kha dog ldan// Da ba ta ni brjod bya zhing // sems dpa' chen po rjes dran bya// ye shes sems dpa' gos pa med// dga' dag ji srid mthong bar du// badz+ra satwa dri \u0f7f
101a6(rgyud): sems dpa' mdun du bltas nas ni/ bdag nyid la ni yang dag dbab// oM badz+ra satwa a/ sdug cing che ba'i sku de ni// rdo rje lcags kyus yang dag dgug/ dzaHhUM baM ho/
101a7(rgyud): yi ni sngags 'di yis/ bdag nyid chen pos blta bar bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs ka ru// slar yang ngo yi snying khar gzhug/ sa ma ya a/ zhes brjod nas ni rnal 'byor pa/
101b1(rgyud): zla ba dang ldan steng du gnas/ ci 'dod pa yi bya ba byed// sangs rgyas nyid kyang bsgrub par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' 'di ji bzhin// de nas sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ rang gi phyag tu
101b2(rgyud): yongs 'dzin pa'i// rdo rje can kun bsgom par bya// gang dang gang la mos gyur pa// de bzhin snying pos bzla bar bya// rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rdo rje can dang mtshungs par
101b3(rgyud): 'gyur/ sangs rgyas rjes dran rab bsgrubs nas// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor bya// rang gi phyag rgya yongs 'dzin pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs grub pas// 'khor lo sgyur ba/
101b4(rgyud): nyid thob 'gyur// rgyal po bya ba sngon 'gro bas// mnyes pa dang ni dbang bskur bya// thun ni yongs su rdzogs pa dang // chos kyi bzhad dang dga' bar gyur// ting 'dzin gzungs
101b5(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo dang // gsang ba'i mdzod ni bla na med// smin pa dang ni grol ba nyid// sangs rgyas byang chub bstan pa'i mchog/ rtog pa gsang chen 'di las ni// phyag rgya grangs med/
101b6(rgyud): yang dag byung // rigs kyi dbye ba yang dag ldan// rgya cher rab tu bsgrags pa yin// go cha ma bgos snod mi 'gyur// le lo khro dang g.yeng bcas pas// nges par 'dzin par/
101b7(rgyud): mi nus te// debs nyung ba rab tu bsgrags// mang lnga'i dbang po gsang rgyal po// de nas phyag rgya rab tu bshad// theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs// rin chen sdong du blta bar bya/
102a1(rgyud): ye shes kyi mngon par rtogs pa rdzogs so/ don 'ang rnams kyi sbyi // gangalas 'kho sa yang dag byung // na 'byamams
102a2(rgyud): kun 'byung ba// mchog tu gsang ba bshad par bya// dbus kyi 'khor lor yang dag bshad// rnal 'phrul zhes ni rab tu bsgrags// byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul te/ 'khor
102a3(rgyud): thabs ni rab ston pa// 'khor lo lnga ru yang dag bshad// thabs ni rnam pa lnga yang yin// gsang ba yi ni dbye ba gnas// 'khor lo yi ni rnam 'phrul ston// dbus ma gang yin byang chub/
102a4(rgyud): sems/ shar gyi bsdu ba rnam pa bzhi// lho yi tshogs su bshad pa ste// bsod nams tshogs dang yang dag ldan// ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs rnams dang // chos su 'dzin pa rnam
102a5(rgyud): spangs pa// nub tu yang dag brjod pa yin// byang ni sems can smin byas te// phyi rol grwa bzhi gang yin pa// tshad med pa ni bzhi dang bcas// byams pa snying rje btang snyoms dang //
102a6(rgyud): dga' ba zhes ni bya bar bshad// gang zhig thig skud yang dag bshad// chos kyi rgyun gyi lam las byung // lta ba thams cad rnam dag 'di// theg pa gzhan ni rnam par spangs// nga
102a7(rgyud): zhig kha khyer zhes bya ba// ting 'dzin chos nyid dag pa ste// rdo rje lha mor yang dag bshad// gzungs kyi sgo zhes bya bar bshad// go ru yang dag bshad pa gang // thar pa'i sgo ni bzhi po yin/
102b1(rgyud): rta babs dang ni dra ba nyid/ chos mdzod rang bzhin grong khyer yin/ dra ba dbyed ma'i ni/ rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs nam 'phrul ba/ chon ci yang dag bgad pa dang / de 'dra ba mi byang chub
102b2(rgyud): tshogs gang zhig mar me yang dag pa shadang // de ni chos kyi snang ba mchog/ dri ru yang dag bshad pa gang // grags pa'i dri ni bla na med// rdzu 'phrul byug pa gang yin pa// tshul khrim
102b3(rgyud): dri yis byugs pa yin/ bza' ba dag ni sna tshogs pa// chos kyi zas ni bla na med// rnam par sna tshogs dga' bar bshad// rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs// grong khyer du ni
102b4(rgyud): bshad pa gang // de ni thar pa'i grong khyer mchog gang zhig dkyil 'khor yang dag bshad// chos kyi snying po rang bzhin grong // nad med ces ni bya bar brjod// de ni dkyil 'khor zhes
102b5(rgyud): bya'o// dbus su rnam snang mdzad ces pa/ chos kun gcig tu bsdus pa yin// sangs rgyas rgyal po gtso ba che// phyogs rnams kun tu rnam par gsal/ rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag
102b6(rgyud): bshad/ byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin mchog/ de bas rgyal po byang chub sems// byang chub sems las yang dag byang // rdo rje rgyal por yang dag byung // sems ni rnam pa ba ni zhes bya//
102b7(rgyud): sgrol dang grol dang dbugs dbyung dang / mya ngan 'da' bar lcags kyu'o// rdo rje chags par yang dag bshad// byang chub spyod pa la sbyor ba// rdo rje legs par yang dag bshad// rab
103a1(rgyud): tu sbyor ba ston pa nyid// rdo rje rin chen yang dag bshad// sems can bsam pa yongs rdzogs shing // rdo rje gzi brjid yang dag bshad// chos kyi sbyor ba 'od byed/
103a2(rgyud): pa/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan yang dag bshad// sems can 'khor ba las grol byed// rdo rje bshad par yang dag bshad// sems can the tshom gcod par byed// rdo rje chos su yang dag pashang /
103a3(rgyud): chos kyi ye shes bla na med// rdo rje rnon por yang dag bshad// nyon mongs gcod cing 'joms byed pa// rdo rje rgyu ru yang dag bshang // 'khor lo rnam 'phrul ston byed pa// rdo rje sba bar
103a4(rgyud): yang dag bshad// rdo rje chos ni ston byed pa// rdo rje las su yang dag bshad// sems can 'dul bar byed pa'i mchog/ rdo rje srung bar yang dag bshad// sems can grol bar byed pa'i
103a5(rgyud): mchog rdo rje gnod sbyin yang dag bshad/ 'khor ba'i zhags papa byed pa// ngo rje khu tshur yang dag bshad// byang chub mchog ni brtan par byed// rdo rje sems mngo rje chos
103a6(rgyud): rin chen las kyi rdo rjem// rdo rje rin chen chos chen po// las kyi gsang ba las byung ba// rdo rje lha mo lhag pa brgyad// pha rol phyin mchog lhag ma brgyad// chos ma shes rab pha rol
103a7(rgyud): byin/ las ma thabs kyi mchog yin no// pha rol phyin bcu dag pa ni// sa bcu dag tu yang dag bshad// dam pa'i chos kyi grong khyer srung // byang chub sems dpa' zhes byar bshad//
103b1(rgyud): e ma'o ye shes e ma'o chos// e ma'o thar pa'i grong khyer mchog/ e ma'o rnam 'phrul 'khor lo ni// thub pa'i dbang phyug dag gis bstan// chos kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ mgon/
103b2(rgyud): pos thar bar dgod pa mdzad// gang du sangs rgyas rgal gyur nas// sems can rnams kyang sgrol bar mdzad// 'di ni chos kyi rang bzhin grub// 'di chos rang bzhin shing rta ste/ chos
103b3(rgyud): kyi rang bzhin snying po 'di/ 'di chos rang bzhin grong khyer yin// de kho na nyid mchog tu gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po gsang ba'i rnal 'byor chen po rdo rje rtse mo las/ de bzhin gshegs pa
103b4(rgyud): thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mdo sde'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i rnam par bshad pa dang mardzogs so// dngos gru thams cad thun med// de nas gsang ba bshad par bya/
103b5(rgyud): rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa ni/ bdag nyid kyis ni sbyar bar bya// cho ga'i lta bu bzhin du// phyag rgya bcing ba bshad par bya// ci rigs par ni bcing bya yi// gzhan du myur du 'grub mi 'gyur/
103b6(rgyud): thal mo mnyam pa bcing bya ste// sngon la thal mo mnyam par bya// de nas rdo rje thal mo bcings// rdo rje bsdams pa bcing bar bya// sor mo rdo rje bsdams bcings nas// snying po brjod/
103b7(rgyud): cing dral bar bya// de nas phyag rgya dbang du 'gyur// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// badz+ra baD+ha trab/ 'di ni sngon du brjod bya zhing // de nas phyag rgya yang dag bcing // gang gi drung
104a1(rgyud): du bcings pa ni// bdag nyid yang dag byin gyis brlabs// sa ma ya satwA haM/ shes rab can gyis dbab pa bsam// bdag la sems dpa' dbab par bya/
104a2(rgyud): dam tshig phyag rgya bcings nas ni// snying po yang ni brjod par bya// a phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni// yan lag kun la yongs su gnas/ snying po brjod par bya ba ste// snying po/
104a3(rgyud): 'di dag nyid yin no// sa ma ya haM/ de nas bdag nyid byin brlabs nas// rang lha yang dag rjes su dran// snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni// snying po brjod par bya ba yin// sa ma yas//
104a4(rgyud): a d+hiSh+Tha swa maM/ phyag rgya sgrub pa lhur len pa// de nas shes rab can gyis sgrub/ dam tshig sems dpa' chen po dag/ rnam pa bzhi ni bsgrub par bya// de la 'di rnams kyi gsang ba'i
104a5(rgyud): snying po ni/ ar+tha sid+d+hi badz+ra sid+d+hi badz+ra bIr+ya/ bud+d+ha sid+hi/ de nas phyag rgya brtan par byed pa ni/ oM badz+ra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badz+ra satwa twe no pa tiSh+Tha dri D+ho me b+ha wa su to Sh+yo ma \u0f7f/
104a6(rgyud): ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba a nu rak+to me b+ha wa/ sarba sid+d+him+bi pra yats+tsha/ sarba kam su tsa me/ tsit+taM shre yaHku ru tru ha ha ha ha ho/ b+ha ga wAM/ sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra mA me muny+tsa badz+rI b+hA wa ma hA sa ma
104a7(rgyud): ya satwa aH/ mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang // rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'drar 'gyur// phyag rgya thams cad 'grub 'gyur zhing // thams cad 'grub par the tsom med// de nas thams
104b1(rgyud): cad dgrol ba ni thun mong yin no// phyag tu thams cad bcings nas ni// tha mar bdag cid dbang bskud ba/ mam tsha'i rtse mos 'phreng ba che/ rnam pa'i yang narnam du gsum/ mong/

104b3(rgyud): ba deng grol te// snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni/ gnas de du ni dkrol ba bya// gzhan du bya ba 'i byung // oM bam su/ mgon pa thal mom zhes bya zhig// rdo rje thal mtsho
104b4(rgyud): snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni/ ngo can kun ma zhes par bya/ @#/ tshig 'di mis dkrol bya// phyag ma dkrol ba mchog ldan no// phyag rtsamams

105a1(rgyud): yi ge hUM ni sbyar bar bya// rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// yi ge hUM ni bsgrub par bya// hUM/ de ltar rnam pa bcu drug ni// phyag mtshan thams cad rab tu sgom/
105a2(rgyud): zla ba'i dbus su rab sbyor bas// bdag nyid thams cad skad cig 'grub// yang na yi ge sbyor bas ni// dbus su sbyor bas bsgrub par bya// tha ba yi ni sbyor ba yis// yi ge la sogs
105a3(rgyud): 'grub mi 'gyur// yi ge ho dang sa dang ni// yi ge oM sogs rab sbyor bas// zla ba la ni oM a traM// yi ge ha ni rab tu sgrub// hrI dang d+hi dang maM bai raM/ ka rka hUM baM bsgrub par bya// do rje/
105a4(rgyud): tshig ni 'di dag gis// rdo rje bzlas pas 'grub par bya// bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' 'am// bcu drug bdag nyid rab sbyor bas// rnal 'byor rgyud du bsgrub bya zhing // zla ba'i dbus su/

105a7(rgyud): bdun du// bskor bdag kyang rab tu bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che// mkhas pa yis ni rnal bar bya// rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya che// 'khor lo'i dbus su steng du bcing /

105b3(rgyud): rol la// de ni rig pa'i btul zhugs te/ lag pa g.yas su rdo rje ste// g.yon du dril bu sbyin par bya// rdo rje'i brtul zhugs gsang chen po// snying po 'di ni sbyin par bya/
105b4(rgyud): de byin snying khar 'dzin du gzhug/ thams cad sgrub pa'i mchog yin no// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcad/
105b5(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje brtul zhugs brtan/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+hi badz+ra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha ste d+ha ra yA mi badz+ra sa twa/ hi hi hi ni dz+dza/ de nas thams cad mtshungs pacu// phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor dmam/

106a3(rgyud): dpa' mchog gi sgrub pa dang // gsang mchog sems dpa'i spyod pa mchog/ rdo rje rnal 'byor yang dag byung // yon tan mchog dran dam tshig rnams kyi mchogayon tan mchog dran dbu rgyan

106b6(rgyud): hi ni rgyu yi 'khor lo che// haM dngar ni mkha' dgyes smra ba'i sbyor ba 'ching byed a ni sna tshogs byed// haM ni srung ba tra ta 'ges byed ta Ta ta Ti sa ni hUM ni za zhing 'cha'// baM ni dga' byed dga' ste tsha ta tsha
106b7(rgyud): tiT ni rab dga' byed/ ho ni rdo rje bstan pa dang bcas bde brtan 'dod chags bcas pa dga' byed do// ho ni mgon po skye ba mchog gi rgyur gyur hri ni dga' ba bdag nyid can// ho na spyod pa
107a1(rgyud): 'god byed dul spong mchog ste dus gsum mgon pos bskor gyur pa// gsang ning gsang ba'i yon tan kun mchog dri me dkon byang chub spyod pa mchog/ mchog gi mchog ste/

108b3(rgyud): grong du 'dod chags dag byed pa// rtog dang rnam par rtog pa bzlog pas dag/ chos la dga' zhing sku mchog 'byung 'gyur ro// bden dang mi bden nam dag nyi shu dang // chos dang
