134a13(rgyud): med cing shi bar gyur// lha chen la sogs gdug pa rnams// gang dag rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams// rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis gdungs nas// g.yo ba med cing 'bar bar gyur// de ni rdo rje gnod/
135a1(rgyud): sbyin che// drag po'i gzugs can rab 'jigs byed// khro gnyer bsnyer ba'i gdong can te// de bzhin gnag dang sngo bar gyur// mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal mnga' ba/
135a2(rgyud): dbu skra gyen brdzes shin tu skrag/ spyan dmar spyan dang ldan pa ste// de bzhin rdo rje bstan pa'i zhal// drag po rdo rje drag tshogs 'dzin// gcig pu 'bar ba rab ldan pa// zhags pa lcags kyu
135a3(rgyud): rdo rje bdag sangs rgyas thams cad 'jigs byed pa// sa rnams ma lus g.yo bar byed// sa 'di yang ni g.yo bar byed// gnod sbyin chen po 'byung po sogs// g.yo ba med cing 'og tu
135a4(rgyud): 'gyel// de ni drag po gnod sbyin che// sangs rgyas thams cad 'jigs par byed// de yi spyan sngar 'dug nas ni// ched du brjod pa yang dag brjod// e ma'o byang chub kyi ni sems// kun tu
135a5(rgyud): bzang po kun dge ba// sems can 'dul ba'i thabs su ni// brtse med khro bo nyid du gyur// sngar ni rdo rje sems dpa' gang // zhi ba'i gzugs su rnam gnas pa// rdo rje gnod sbyin 'dzin
135a6(rgyud): gyur nas// rdo rje drag po zhes byar grags// de ni drag po rdo rje 'dzin// 'jigs rung ba spu langs par byed// yi ge hUM bzhi'i phyag rgya yi// snying po gtum po nyid kyang gsungs// oM sur+b+ban
135a7(rgyud): su~Mm+b+ha ni d+hu/ gr-ih+Na gr-i d+hu/ gr-ipA pa la gr-iswa pa ya dz+raM/ An la ho b+hag tan parda rdulaT/ shin tug tum ning cher grags pa// de bzhin thugs gnas byung ste// zhal bzhid gi phyag brgyad pa
135b1(rgyud): bskal pa 'i nimi snar drag/ rngon dus kyim ltar byung // non mongs rdzogs ni rabasreg byed// smin ma bskyod pas gtsigs pa'i nal// de bzhin rnam par 'jigs pacig dong // 'jig
135b2(rgyud): gsum sreg dam tshig ste// rdo rje can kun sreg par byed// 'bar 'phreng kun tu 'khrigs pa'i sgra// rdo rje bskal pa'i me ltung 'bar// rdo rje tsu ma dzad phyug rgya ni// phyag gnyis kyis ni
135b3(rgyud): yongs su bzung // rdo rje bsdams pa 'dzin rgyal po// lcags kyu dang mi nags pas brgyan// rdo rje yi ni lu gu rgyud// phyag gnyis na bsdams 'jigs rung zhal// sangs rgyas thams
135b4(rgyud): cad sdigs byed pa// rdo rje gtum pos yang dag byung // drag po bka' ni nod par byed// myur ba ru ni bka' stsol cig/ min na sangs rgyas khyed rnams kun// the tshom med par bza' bar bya/
135b5(rgyud): de nas sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs// Tak+ki hUM dza hUM shin tu drag/ rigs dang bcas par lha chen po// stobs chen po yis dgug par gyis// de nas rig pa'i mchog rgyal po// bsnyems
135b6(rgyud): pa'i tshul gyis bshad byed cing // khro bo drag po rnga sgra sgrog/ rdo rje nags pa bskul bar bya// rdo rje zhags pa drag po che// dpung bcas grogs dang bcas pa dang // de bzhin rigs
135b7(rgyud): dang dkyil 'khor bcas/ song la dbang phyug chen po khug/ badz+ra pA sha hUM/ dbang ldan rgyal po chen po ni// sna tshogs rang gi 'khor na gnas// 'jigs byed ma dang lhan cig tu/
136a1(rgyud): 'dod pa can ni mchog tu rol// rdo rje zhags pa der song ste// khro bo'i dgra yis bsdigs par gyur// dbang ldan rgyal po la smras pa/ khyod la ston pa spyan 'dren
136a2(rgyud): mdzad/ skad cing khros nas lha chen pos// 'jigs pa yi tshig brjod pa// nga ni 'jig rten gsum rgyal po// nga la ston pa gzhan yod dam// rdo rje zhags pa khro bo ches// tshig ni lan
136a3(rgyud): gsum brjod par gyur// rdo rje khro brgyal po che// khyod la shin tu spyan 'dren mdzad// lha chen dbang phyug chen po yis// slar yang lan gsum smras pa ni// nga ni khon rgyal po rang /
136a4(rgyud): la spyan 'dren gang zhig yod// de nas zhags pas bka' bzhin byed// khro bo drag po rab 'jigs pas// yan lag thams cad bcings nas ni// dbang phyug chen po bkug par gyur/
136a5(rgyud): 'jigs shing skrag nas lha chen po// shin tu smre sngags 'don cing ngu// skyabs ni gang yang yod ma yin// 'jigs pa chen po kun tu byung // stobs dang de bzhin nga rgyal gyis// stobs
136a6(rgyud): dradang shugs ni bstan nas su// zhags pa bcang nas bros par gyur// rang gi gnas su song gyur nas/ 'jig rten gsum gyi lha rnams bos// lha dang lha min dri zar bcas/ skad
136a7(rgyud): cig gis ni 'dus 'gyur nas// 'khor rnams dag ni ngu bar gyur// ji ltar sngon ma byas pa yi// de lta bu ni yang dag mthong // sems can rab drag 'di su nig rdo rje zhags pas mdun
136b1(rgyud): song ste// rdorje rig pa mchog la nus// dbang phyug chen pos bdag bcang de// drag po tshangs pa rab tu thos// rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po// khro bo gtum po shin tu drag de lta bu
136b2(rgyud): yi tshig gsan nas// thams cad du ni 'bar bar gyur// khro ba rdo rje lu gu rgyud// drag po yis ni bka' bsgo ba// myur du song la lha chen po// rigs chen das bcas pa khrug/ khro ze'i rgyal
136b3(rgyud): po lu gu rgyud// gsan nas dbang phyug che gnas song // yan lag thams cad bcings nas su// lha mo dang bcas kun tu dgug/ skad cig 'jigs pas ngu byed cing // lha rnams thams
136b4(rgyud): cad shin tu 'jigs// 'jigs pas sdug bsngal smre sngags 'don// de ring 'dran lha chen min// stobs dang shugs ni thams cad kyis// rdo rje kun dang 'thab par 'gyur// mthu dang /
136b5(rgyud): stobs dang shugs kyis ni// bcag nas thams cad bros par gyur// lha chen la sogs thams cad ni/ phyogs rnams kun tu bros par gyur// mun pa yis ni kun tu 'khrug phyogs
136b6(rgyud): rnams kun tu 'jigs par gyur// khro bo lu gu rgyud 'ongs nas// rnam pa kun tu smra bar byed// ma lus phyogs rnams thams cad du/ bdag bcag nas ni bris par gyur// khro bo rdo/
136b7(rgyud): rig pa mchog slar yang shin tu khros par gyur/ 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas rab 'bar zhing // rdo rje drag po nyid du gyur/ drag po ha ha zhes bzhad dgod// rang gi yan lag pa bar byed/
137a1(rgyud): rang gi mgo la rdeg byed cing // rdo rje gsor ba bskor bar 'bar// de lta bu yi khyud par dang // bcas pas khro bo yang dag byung // slar yang rang gi bdag nyid dran//
137a2(rgyud): khro ba'i rgyal po brjod par gyur// oM sum+b+ha ni sum+ba ni tsU/ gr-ih+Na gr-iHhUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho b+ha ga bAn badz+ra hUM phaT/ khro ba'i rgyal po bcas nas ni/ yi ge dza ni yongs su
137a3(rgyud): brjod// rdo rje lcags kyur rab tu bsngags// stobs dang ldan pa khug la shog/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la ag+ni sa tri Sha a~M ku sha dza dza/ rdo rje 'bar ba'i lcags kyu ni// song nas phyogs kun bdag nyid/
137a4(rgyud): skad cig gis ni stobs chen rnams// lha rnams thams cad bkug par gyur// rgyal po dbang phyug lnga dang ni// lha rnams thams cad grangs med par// rigs bcas dpung dang bcas pa nyid//
137a5(rgyud): gcig nyid du ni bsdus par gyur// rdo rje lcags sgrog rab tu mngags// chings shig stobs chen dang ldan pa// tshogs dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kun/ bcing ba lnga yis bcings par
137a6(rgyud): gyur/ nang gi 'khor dang bcas pa'i tshigs// lha tshogs gnod sbyin srin po dang // lha min klu dang 'byung po'i tshogs// gzhan yang gdug pa'i tshogs rnams ni// thams cad bcings
137a7(rgyud): par gyur nas ni// rdo rje chags pa rab tu mngags// rdo rje lcags kyu dang bcas par// song la dkyil 'khor dag khug cig/ rdo rje zhags pas mngon chags pas/ yan lag kun
137b1(rgyud): las yongs su spro// rdo rje'i rang bzhin zhags pa ste/ brtan par gyur par the tshom med// bye ba dag ni grangs med bcu// rdo rje lcags kyu rab tu byung // lha la sogs pa'i re re zhing /
137b2(rgyud): spyi bo nas 'gugs yang dag sbyor// lha chen dbang phyug chen po yi// spyi bo'i gtsug tu btab nas ni// rdo rje lcags kyu rgyal po yis// dbang phyug chen po 'gugs par byed// lha
137b3(rgyud): sogs 'khor dang bcas pa kun// phan tshun du ni ngu bar byed// shugs ring kun tu phyung nas ni// phan tshun du ni smra bar byed// kye ma'o sdug bsngal kye ma'o sha/ tshogs ni gang du khyer bar
137b4(rgyud): gyur/ rdo rje 'bar ba chen po des// skad cig de la bsregs gyur nas// ri rab ri yi rtse mo ru// lha la sogs pa thams cad bkug/ gnas de ru ni thams cad dag/ yongs su
137b5(rgyud): ba nas can nas// dpas byed gyi smra// rnanam ming das thams cadags// dadza pa'i kyirol du// rnal sogs pa thams da // phyi ma na/
137b6(rgyud): bsregs rang bzhin rdo rje mtshungs// rdo rje can gyi rdor 'bar mes// nang nas shin tu gdungs par gyur// lha tshogs sems can de dag kyang // 'jigs su rung ba'i 'o dod 'bod// stong
137b7(rgyud): gsum 'di dag thams cad kyang // hUM hUM sgra ni yongs su brjod// 'odod pos nas smra bar byed// ngan song dag ni ci zhig byed// sngon ma mthong ba 'di ci zhig/ 'dir ni rdo rje 'dzin par
138a1(rgyud): 'gyur/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po de/ slar yang thugs rje kun tu skyes/ thams cad bcings pa las bkrol te// rdo rje me yis nye bar mdzes// rdorje
138a2(rgyud): gnod sbyin drag po che// rang gi dkyil 'khor nas phyung ste// lha la sogs pa kun bos te// nga yi tshig 'di rab tu nyon// de nas lha rgyal la sogs pa// khyod ni su yin smra bar byed//
138a3(rgyud): nged kyis khyod ni sngar ma mthong // gnas mchog 'di yang sngar ma mthong // rdo rje gnod sbyin drag po che// ha ha zhes dgod bzhad pa yis// smras pa rdo rje gnod sbyin pa// thams cad pa
138a4(rgyud): byed bzod dka' ba// de nas lha chen gyis smras pa// rdo rje gnod sbyin ngas mi shes// nga yis khyod ni snga ma mthong / bdag nyid kho na rang byung ba// rdo rje drag pos rab smras pa/
138a5(rgyud): nga yi bka' la myur gnas gyis// min na rdo rje 'bar ba 'dris// rang gi rigs ni sreg par byed// lha chen po yis tshig smras pa// bstan pa la ni nga mi gnas// 'jig rten gsum
138a6(rgyud): gyi dbang phyug baM/ su li bstan pa la gnas pa/ 'khor dang bcas pa'i stobs gang yin// de ring nga yis bstan par bya// khyod la stobs ni ci yod pa// stobs chen ldan pa
138a7(rgyud): bstan par gyis// dbang phyug chen po rgyal po che// 'byung po'i tshogs bcas lhan cig tu/ tshig dag smras par gyur pa ni/ drag ma nyid ni bstan par bya// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig
138b1(rgyud): rten 'di// 'od zer 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas khyab// ha ha zhes bya shin tu drug/ dbang phyug chen pos bstan par bya// oM shU la a ti shU la ma hA sa ha sra shUl A yu te/ rtse gsum mngag gzun/
138b2(rgyud): rgyal po ni/ stong phrag gcig ni byung bar gyur// rtse bcas kun tu 'bar ba yis// rdo cha can dang lhan cig 'thab// nA rA ya nas smras pa/ oM ma hA sa ha sa tsakra A yu d+he/ khyab 'jug gis
138b3(rgyud): ni de skad smras// 'khor lo gcig tu rnam pa stong // thams cad 'od zer 'bar bas khyab// rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thab// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ oM ma hA sa ha sra badz+ra A pud+d+he
138b4(rgyud): rdo rje stong ni byung bar gyur// rdo rje 'bar ba tshabs khyab// brgya byin gyis ni smras pa yin// rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thab// gzhon nus smras pa/ oM ma hA sa ha swa shAkya A su d+he/ gnon
138b5(rgyud): nus de skad smras nas ni// mdung ni rtse gsum stong byung gyur// sgra ni drag po sgrog byed cing // rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thab// tshangs pas smras pa/ oM ma hA sa ha sra dar+Na A yu d+he/ tshangs
138b6(rgyud): pas de skad smras nas ni// dbyug to stong ni byung gyur nas/ mtshon cha drag po 'jigs byed pas// rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thab// gzhan yang lhag ma ma lus pa// rnams kyis yang ni
138b7(rgyud): mtshon cha dag/ re re stong phrag gcig gyur nas// rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thab// tha na sprul pa gang yin dang // phyi rol gyi ni dam ldan pa// de rnams nges par stong gyur nas// rdo rje can dang /
139a1(rgyud): lhan cig 'thab// ma yang kun tu 'bar gyur ci// 'jigs par byed pa'i rlung yang byung // 'brug gi sgra dang glog chen pos// khyab par srid gsum gnas par
139a2(rgyud): gyur// ha la ha la'i sgra chen po// nam mkha'i bar snang la ni grags// rdo rje drag po tshogs chen po// lha rnams thams cad 'thab par byed// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// gtum po
139a3(rgyud): drag po 'jigs byed pas// lha yi lan gyi phyag rgya ni// rdo rje yi ni snying po gsungs// oM ma hA sa ha sra ha ra badz+ra tsakr-i/ oM ma hA badz+ra shU le/ oM dI byA dzA la a hA badz+ra/ oM badz+rag
139a4(rgyud): oM ma hA badz+ra ni d+hi/ de lta bu yi rnam pa ru// snying po dag ni stong phrag gcig/ srid gsum zhi bar bya ba'i phyir// rdo rje 'chang ni chen pos byung // gtum po 'ong ber 'bar bas khyab/
139a5(rgyud): rje me dang yang dag ldan// drag po'i snying po las byung gyur// rdo rje 'chang ni dbus na bzhugs// lha tshogs phyag rgya de dag ni// rnam par bshig cing dum bur byas// bcom zhing bsdams
139a6(rgyud): te bsregs nas ni// phyogs rnams kun tu thim par gyur// rdo rje ma yis rab bsdams pas// lha yi rgyal po 'bar bar gyur// 'og nas sa ni rab tu 'bar// stang nas mes ni shin tu
139a7(rgyud): gdungs/ rdo rje khro ba rgyal po ches// dbang phyug chen po la gsungs pa// lus srul po ni drag po che// nga yi bka' ni rab tu nyon// dur khrod gnas la rab tu dga'// lus la thal ba
139b1(rgyud): ngag gis byugs// mi yi sha ni za bar byed// nga yi bka' ni rab tu nyon// khrag rlon gyis ni rab tu bskus/ pags parlon pa gos su gyon// lha rnams thams cad khyod kyi 'khor/
139b2(rgyud): nga yi bka' ni rab tu nyon// gdug pa drag chen mtshan mo rgyu ba srong mo ba// khrag la spangs pa'i pags can lus la thal bas byugs// nga yi bka' nyon drag po'i sems ldan lus srul po/
139b3(rgyud): min na bskal pa'i me yis rtsa bzhin khyod bsreg bya// ro bsregs thal ba'i phung po bzhin du thal bar 'gyur// bskal pa'i me chen dang mtshungs pas ni rab 'jigs 'gyur// rigs bcas dpung
139b4(rgyud): ldan dkyil 'khor dang bcas gnod sbyin dag/ rdo rje drag po yis ni rab gzhom gzhig par bya// dbang phyug chen pos smras pa/ nga ni ma lus dbang phyug chen po'i 'khor los sgyur// 'jig rten
139b5(rgyud): gsum gyi lha tshogs ma lus pa yi 'khor// shin tu drag cing rnam gcig 'jig chen khyod yin yang // khyod kyis nga yi bka' ni myur du mnyan par gyis// gdug dang sangs rgyas mang po'i 'khor
139b6(rgyud): ni sangs rgyas chos kyi 'byung gnas nga yis sprul// zhi zhing nges la rnam 'dul gsang ba dri med nyon mongs med pa'i pha rol phyin// de 'dra'i mgon po dga' ba dus gsum bzhugs pa thams cad
139b7(rgyud): ngas dbang bskur// slar yang nga yis 'byung po'i tshig nyon zhes pa'i tshig ni 'di lta bu// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// 'dul ba'i don la shin tu mkhas// khro bo gdug pa gtum chen po/
140a1(rgyud): rab 'bar khro za'i rgyal po ni// rdo rje'i byin rlabs phyag rgya las// bya ba de 'dra'i ting 'dzin la// snyoms par zhugs nas sems dpa' che// rang rigs khro ba las
140a2(rgyud): byung ba// gdug pa rnams ni 'dul ba'i phyir// khro bo'i chos kyi tshul bzung nas// rkang pa nas brtsams spyi bo'i bar// lus kun las ni rnam par byung // oM badz+ra kro d+ha uSh+NI Sha hUM/ rdo rje'i
140a3(rgyud): gtsug tor khro bo che// 'bar ba'i spyi bo nas byung nas// sa rnams thams cad g.yo byed cing // khro bo'i rgyal po thams cad 'joms// oM badz+ra b+haM ku Ti kro d+ha hUM/ khro ba'i rgyal po khri gnyer can/
140a4(rgyud): mdzod spu nas ni rab tu byung // 'jigs byed drag po yang dag ldan// lus rnams thams cad 'bar 'gyur ba// oM ni sum+b+ha badz+ra hUM/ rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po// kha las rab tu byung bar gyur//
140a5(rgyud): spyi bo nas brtsam gang mthil bar// rdo rje 'bar ba yang dag ldan// Tak+ki bru~M / thugs kyi khro bo rgyal po che// thugs ka nas ni rab tu byung // 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas khyab pa'i sku/
140a6(rgyud): 'jigs su rung ba spu langs byed// oM badz+ra aM ku sha A kaR+Sha ya hUM/ rdo rje lcags kyu khro bo che// phrag pa g.yas nas rab tu byung // rdo rje lcags kyu gsor byed cing // rdo rje 'bar ba yang dag
140a7(rgyud): ldan// oM badz+ra pA sha kro d+ha A kaD+D+h+ya hUM phaT/ rdo rje nags pa khro bo che// phrag pa g.yon nas rab tu byung // rdo rje 'bar ba yang dag ldan// rdo rje 'gas pas bskor bar byed// so ba dza kI li kroH
140b1(rgyud): hUM baT/ khro ma 'argya la lpags kyu thogs// lte ba'i dbus nas rab tu byung // kun nas 'bar ba yang dag ldan// tho mchog rdo rje gnod sbyin mtshungs/ oM brtsam thal gro dru/ khro batshan po/
140b2(rgyud): ska rags ni// rked pa'i rdo rjengs byung // kun nas 'bar bar yang dag ldan// phyag rgya dang ni lhan cig ldan// mo bar kron ba la d+hu/ khro ba'i rgyal pa chen po stobs// dpung pa g.yas nas/
140b3(rgyud): rab tu byung // rdo rje 'bar bas 'bar bar gyur// me yis shin tu nga rgyal gyur// oM badz+ra pA la ya kro d+ha dz+luM/ khro bo'i rgyal po gdu bu ni// dpung pa g.yon las yang dag byung // gsang zhing
140b4(rgyud): rdo rje 'bar bas phyag/ rdo rje khro bo rab tu khengs// oM sa ma ya badz+ra kro d+ha hUM hUM phaT/ dam tshig khro bo'i rgyal po ni// de bzhin khro bo'i gnod byed pa// khu tshur g.yas nas rab tu byung // kun nas
140b5(rgyud): 'bar ba yang dag ldan// oM badz+ra muSh+Ti kro d+hahUM phaT/ khro bo khu tshur drag po che// khu tshur g.yon las rab tu byung // rdo rje 'bar ba dag gis gsal// rdo rje me yis rab tu brgyan// oM ba
140b6(rgyud): ban+d+ha kro d+ha hUM sa ma ya hUM/ oM badz+ra any+dza li ban+d+ha kro d+ha hUM sa ma ya hUM/ rdo rje 'ching ba rgyal po che// de bzhin rdo rje sor mo nyid// khro bo lag pa g.yas g.yon gyi// sor mo dag las yang dag byung /
140b7(rgyud): oM badza na kha dz+dza/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha aM gu li mahA kr-i d+ha hUM/ rdo rje sder mo khro bo che// de bzhin rdo rje sder mo'i gdong // phyag ni g.yon dang g.yas pa yi// sor mo dag las rab tu byung // oM badz+ra ku mA ra
141a1(rgyud): kro d+ha ka ti rAg r+dz+dza/ oM badz+ra ku nA gro d+ha mun naka dru phaT/ khro za'i rgyal po rked pa dang // de bzhin khro ba spyi gtsug dag/ rgyal po 'dra ni g.yon pa dab/ g.yas pad/
141a2(rgyud): las rab tu byung // oM kr-i kha le mahA kro d+ha b+hanaHhU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a sha ban d+ha d+hu/ gnam lcags rdo rje lu gu rgyud// khro bo'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che// rgyal po 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas khyab// pus
141a3(rgyud): mo'i lhang dag las byung // oM badz+ra b+han d+ha kro d+ha ha na hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi a / hUM phaT/ rdo rje dbyig pa khro ba che// rdo rje yi ni yan lag drangs// 'bar ba dang bcas gnod sbyin gnyis// rdeng
141a4(rgyud): dag las rab tu byung // oM b+hur b+hu bkro d+ha hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha mo g+ha be ga A na ya hUM phaT/ de nas dka' thub khro bo che// de bzhin rdo rje don yod nyid// rgyal po shugs chen gnyis po ni// gdong gi mchu/
141a5(rgyud): las rab tu byung // oM badz+ra bar d+hA ha la kr-i d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra pa ta la mA ra ya kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ rkang pa khro bo shugs chen po// de bzhin mthil gyi khro ba nyid// 'bar ba 'phro ba lhur len pa// gnyis/
141a6(rgyud): po nabs kyi mthil las byung // de dag la sogs rgyal po ni// dpag tu med pa rab tu byung // gta'i bye snyed grangs med pa// phra rab rdul gyi khams dag ni// ba spu'i gse pa ni thams cad
141a7(rgyud): dang // lus kyi gse pa ni thams cad nas// rdo rje khro ba rgyal po che// rang gi snying po las byung gyur// rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis// phyogs rnams kun tu yongs spros te// slar yang
141b1(rgyud): gcig tu gyur nas ni// dkyil 'khor du ni yang dag gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan sngar 'dus// ched du brjod pa yang dag brjod// e ma'o sangs rgyas thabs chen po// e ma'o la
141b2(rgyud): shes shin tu bzang // sangs rgyas kun gyi ting 'dzin ni// theg pa chen po zhes byar bshad// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad ni// dpag tu med pa zhes byar gyur// rdo rje'i rigs kyi khro bo 'di/
141b3(rgyud): thams cad rdo rje'i rigs su bshad// sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir// de nyid sangs rgyas rigs chen po// de nas de yi gsang ba'i mtshan// thams cad rdo rje'i rigs su bshad// khro bo che las
141b4(rgyud): yang dag byung // rdo rje khro bo'i dbang phyug bshad// rdo rje gtsug tor rdor 'dzin sku// gnod mdzes bdag cag stobs po che// thugs kyi khro bo rgyal po che// rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba dang /
141b5(rgyud): ljags kyu rdo rje nags// rked pa'i khro za stobs po che// ska rags stobs ldan nyid dang ri// lag gdub de bzhin dam tshig dang // rdo rje khu tshur rdo rje bsdams// rdo rje sor mo shin tu drag/ rdo rje sen
141b6(rgyud): mo rdo rje gdong // de bzhin rked pa khro rgyal po// khro bo spyi gtsug rgyal po dang // rdzu 'phrul chen po lu gu rgyud// rdo rje gnam lcags rdo rje dbyig/ rdo rje khro bo yan lag drag/ rdo rje dka' thub rjord don
141b7(rgyud): yo/ rdo rje zhabs dang de bzhin mthil// dam tshig rdo rje rgyal po 'di// rdo rje yi ni rigs su bshad// de dag la sogs rgyal po ni// rgyal po chen po rdzu 'phrul che// byang chub sems las yang
142a1(rgyud): dag byung // rtag tu gzhan yang grangs med pa// khros pas rang gi sha ba ning // 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas khyab par gnas// bskal pa yi ni me ltar 'bar// rdo rje khro bas
142a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ni// rdo rje'i rigs ni bskyed nas kyang // rab tu grags 'dzin bka' bsgos pas// gdug pa rnams ni 'dul bar gyis// nga yis bka' yang mnyan par gyur// rdo rje can kun rang
142a3(rgyud): nyid kyi// bka' thob nas ni gzung bya ste// lha rnams kun gyi gsung gcig gis// rig pa 'di ni brjod par gyur// oM ni sum+b+ha badz+ra hUM phaT/ rdo rje khro za stobs po che// gtsug tor la sogs/
142a4(rgyud): kun gsungs pa// lha chen la sogs gdug pa rnams// 'og tu kha bltas 'gyel bar gyur// rdo rje khro bo stobs po ches// lha rnams brgyal bar gyur nas ni// rdo rje 'bar ba 'bar zhes pas//
142a5(rgyud): snying po dag ni yang dag brjod// oM badz+ra a na la ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha b+hany+dza ra Na hUM phaT/ khro bo chen po rdo rje'i me// skad cig de las byung nas ni// lha rnams de dag bsregs nas kyang // de bzhin 'og tu/
142a6(rgyud): bskyal bar gyur// rdo rje mas ni rab tu sreg/ rdo rje 'bar bas 'bar bar gyur// tshig cing btsos par gyur nas ni// lha la sogs pa'o dod 'bod// rdo rje khro chen de rnams dang // de bzhin khro
142a7(rgyud): chen la sogs pas// thams cad gsungs gcig byas nas ni// slar yang snying po gsungs par gyur// oM badz+ra A be sha a/ rdo rje dbab pa'i khro bo che// rdo rje can gyi thugs las byung // lha
142b1(rgyud): rnams kun gyi gnas song nas// de bzhin lha chen la sogs pa// lha rnams kun la yang dag babs// rdo rje dbab pas rab sdug bsngal// babs nas rang gi yan lag dag/ gcig la gcig
142b2(rgyud): ni za bar byed// rdo rje can dang bcas pa kun// rdo rje nags pa yang dag brjod// oM badz+ra dz+wa la mag+ni pra tiSh+Tha ma hA badz+ra aM ku sha A kaR+Sha ya hUM/ rdo rje lcags kyu rgyal song nas// skad cig gis ni yang
142b3(rgyud): dag 'gugs// lha rnams thams cad bkug nas ni// spyi bo ru ni ltung bar byed// rdo rje lcags kyu yang dag 'gugs// rdo rje zhags pas drangs par gyur// rdo rje 'bar bas rab bsregs nas//
142b4(rgyud): steng du rkang pa 'og tu mgo/ ha ha zhes ni sgrog byed cing // 'jigs pa'i skad cig sdug bsngal gyur// rdo rje can la gsol ba 'debs// stobs chen gzhom par ma mdzad cig/ de bzhin lha la
142b5(rgyud): sogs pa kun// dkyil 'khor du ni dgug par gyur// rdo rje can dang bcas kun gyis// rdo rje lcags sgrogs yang dag brjod// oM badz+ra s+pho Ta ban d+ha hU~M phaT/ lha tshogs gdug pa de dag ni/
142b6(rgyud): 'ching ba lnga yis bcings par gyur// rdo rje lcags sgrog khro bo ches// 'ching ba brtan par bcings par gyur// khro bo rdo rje rgyal po che// shin tu gtum pa stobs po che// slar yang snying po
142b7(rgyud): yang dag dran// rang gi snying po yang dag 'arjod// hUM/ snying po drag po brjod pa yis// gdug pa de rnams rab tu 'gyel// g.yo med shi ba bzhin du gyur// 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal nye bar thog
143a1(rgyud): de nas rgyal po rnam snang mdzad// chos kun dbang phyug dbang dang ldan// rdo rje khro ba rgyal po che// rdo rje 'chang la bos par gyur// sems dpa' chen po mnyan par
143a2(rgyud): gyis// 'di rnams sems can rab 'jigs byed// 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo 'di// srog ni gzhom par ma bya zhig/ de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje kun bdag dbang ldan pas//
143a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas gsung ni thos nas su// rig pa 'di ni yang dag brjod// oM badz+ra uta tiSh+Tha/ rdo rje slong brdzu 'phrul che// de ni brjod pa tsam gyis ni// lha la sogs pa thams cad ni// sla
143a4(rgyud): yang gson pa nyid du gyur// sdug bsngal kun dang rab tu bral// 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal ni bar gyur// rdo rje spong ba'i byams pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad rab bskul bas// de nas /
143a5(rgyud): la sogs pa kun// sangs rgyas byams pas langs par gyur// thal mo sbyar nas tshig gcig gis// bcom ldan 'das la zhus gyur pa// bcom ldan nyes pa gang gis ni// bdag
143a6(rgyud): cag 'di ltar 'dul bar mdzad// sangs rgyas thugs rje can kun gyis// bdag cag yongs su bskyab tu gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// khyed cag yongs su bskya
143a7(rgyud): pa dang // phan gdags par ni ngas mi nus// 'di ni drag po rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag por bshad// de rnams kyis gsol pa/ khyod kyi bcom ldan 'das kyi don// ngi lta bu/
143b1(rgyud): lags mi 'tshal lo// gang zhig sangs rgyas bdag por gyur// sangs rgyas 'phags pa'i lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub gang // de ni nga//
143b2(rgyud): rje can du gyur// byang chub sems gang de rdo rje// rdo rje gang yin drag po 'dzin// de rnams kyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu zhi// de ni byang chub de dang mtshungs// brtse dang
143b3(rgyud): byang chub sems las byung // de 'dra'i drag po ga las byung // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'di ni thabs kyis 'dul ba ste// gdug pa thams cad rab 'dul byed// dpal lda/
143b4(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa 'di// byang chub sems las yang dag byung // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje khro bo bdag chen pos// lha tshogs kun la bos nas ni// dbang phyug chen po la gsungs pa/

143b6(rgyud): gcig tu ni 'di skad nus// gtso bos ri ltar bka' stsal pa// rgyal po chen po de bzhin bgyi// de nas lha chen gyis smras pa// rdo rje gnod sbyin ngas mi shes// nga ni rang nyid rgyal po ste/

144a1(rgyud): shin tu gtum po stobs chen po// khro bo 'di brjod pa yis// dbang phyug chen po brgyal gyur nas// de bzhin sa la 'gyel bar gyur// g.yo med 'chi ba'i
144a2(rgyud): dbang du gyur// shing 'gyel bzhin du gnas par gyur// 'gul ba med cing g.yo ba med// rdo rje khro bos gdungs par gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rdo rje khrom
144a3(rgyud): thams cad mkhyen// bdag nyid chen po 'di yi ni// srog gi rgyu ni zad pa dang // de nyid nyams pa ci phyir byed// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas thugs rjes bskul ba yin//

144a6(rgyud): mkhyen bcom ldan bka' stsal pa// nga yis brtse bar bya mi nus// 'di ni gdug pa shin tu drag/ de nyid la ni skyabs su song // rdo rje khro bos lha chen po// kun tu bos nas 'di
144a7(rgyud): skad smras// nga yis bstan pa'i bka' dag ni// gdug pa chen po mnyan par gyis// rdo rje gnod sbyin bdag chen la// lha chen po yis slar smras pa// 'chi ba chen po bzod nus kyi/

144b2(rgyud): yis/ dbang phyug chen po slar yang 'gyel// rdo rje khro bo drag po che// rkang par dgug pa yang dag brjod// oM pA ta A karA Na badz+ra hUM/ de nas rdo rje dbang po 'di// brjod pas rdo rje khro bo byung //

144b4(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po u mar bcas// rkang pas 'gugs pa'i rdo rje yis// rdo rje rkang pa dag gis bkug/ rdo rje khro bo de dag dgug/ steng du rkang pa 'og tu mgo/ 'jig rten thams cad dgod
144b5(rgyud): gyur cing // rdo rje gdung bas gdungs par gyur// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// dbang phyug chen po u mar bcas// zhabs kyis mnan nas rdo rje yis// dbang phyug chen po rdeg par byed//

145a7(rgyud): gnas gyur// de nas shi ba'i lus de yis// ched du brjod pa yang dag brjod// sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu yis ni// tshigs bcad gcig ni mngon par brjod// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad/
145b1(rgyud): kyi sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med// bsad nas skad cig dag gis ni// mya ngan 'das pa'i gnas dgod mdzad// rdo rje khro ba rgyal po ches// dbang phyug chen po yang dag byung // khyab 'jug/

145b7(rgyud): dag dam tshig yang dag brjod// nga yi tshig ni mnyan par gyis// min na khyed ni kun tu sreg/ de nas 'jig rten gsum 'khor los// de nas tshig ni blangs nas kyang // byang sems yang dag
146a1(rgyud): bskyed nas ni// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song // rdo rje khro bo rgyal po ches// kun tu phyag rgya byin nas kyang // phyag rgya'i snying po 'di yis ni// rdo rje ti rin ti ri li/

149a1(rgyud): tshig phyag rgya nyams par gyur// 'dod 'bod cing ngu bar 'gyur// gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed// ji skad smra ba bzhin byas te// 'on kyang bden par sgra mi bya/
149a2(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' drag po che// rang bzhin gyis ni sangs rgyas bdag/ stobs chen gsang ba'i dbang po yi// bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs// oM ni sum+b+ha ha na da ha pa tsa gra sta ban/

149a4(rgyud): sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya yan bi ki ra bir+N+NaM sa ya s+pho Ta ya/ b+haM dza ya b+haM dza ya/ sarba duSh+Ta sa ma yang mu dAM ban+d+ha gr-ih+Na/ ha na da ha pa tsa sarba duSh+Ta sa ma yang satwa sa ma ya hUM phaT/ de nas 'di ni brjod tsam gyis// rdo rje khro
149a5(rgyud): bo bdag nyid che// gtum po drag po shin tu 'jigs// rdo rje khro bo rab tu byung // rigs bcas dpung bcas dang ldan pa// dam tshig sdang ba bzung nas ni// shin tu 'jigs pas skrag gyur
149a6(rgyud): cing / rgya mtsho yang ni rab tu skul// phyag rgya rab 'jigs de dag gis// rnam par bcom zhing zil gyis mnan// rdo rje me yis bsregs nas ni// thams cad du ni thal bar byas// byang sems
149a7(rgyud): las byung rdo rje can// ji ltar sems can sreg par byed// 'di ni gzhug pa'i tshig yin te// phan pa'i rigs can rgyal bdag skyes// 'dod chags skyon la sogs lta ba// nyon mongs dri ma gang
149b1(rgyud): shes nas// rdo rje can gyis dri ma 'di// bzung nas ye shes me yis bsregs// sems can shin tu 'jigs te skrag/ byang chub spyod pas byang chub gnas// mi bskyod pa yi gnas skyes shing //
149b2(rgyud): rdo rje can ni mchog tu gyur// phyag na rdo rje sems dpa' che// rdo rje chen po phyag rgya 'gugs// zhes bya de 'dra'i ting 'dzin la// 'jigs pa med par snyoms par zhugs// mkha' 'gro ma ni rjes skyab
149b3(rgyud): phyir/ rgyal ba la ni bka' nod gyur// phyag na rdo rje stobs chen la// de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa// oM ha na ha na badz+ra hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje 'dzin drag pos// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsungs
149b4(rgyud): thos nas// 'jigs pa 'gugs pa'i rdo rje ni// rang nyid kyi ni sngags 'di brjod// oM badz+ra A kaR+Sha yaSh+TaM graM/ sarba duSh+Ta ga na badz+ra d+h+ya sa t+yen hUM dzaH/ de nas brjod pa tsam gyis ni// mkha' 'gro ma
149b5(rgyud): ni mdangs 'phrog pa// rnal 'byor sngags dang phyag rgyar bcas// ri rab tu ni kun tu 'dus// rdo rje lcags kyus bkug nas ni// 'bar ba dang bcas 'bar bar gyur// spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas
149b6(rgyud): tshig/ smras pa rdo rje 'dzin pas skyobs// skal chen rdo rje can gyis gsungs// kye gdug pa'i tshogs chen myur ba ru// gsod pa spongs la bka' nyan gyis// de dag re re zhing smras pa/ bdag cag
149b7(rgyud): 'di rnams sha za ste// gang zhig rtag tu gson gyur pa// bdag cag la ni thabs bstan gsol// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'chang // de yis thabs ni 'di gsungs so// za gcig lon nas shi ba gang // de
150a1(rgyud): ni bza' ba blang bar gyis// byang chub sems la chags bral nas// gsang ba spong ba lhur len pa// khyod dang lhan cig yang dag sbyor// de bza' ba ni gnang bar gyis//
150a2(rgyud): phyag rgya yi ni snying po 'di// rtag tu bcang bar bya ba ste// phyi rol thams cad spangs nas ni// sangs rgyas bstan pa srung bar gyis// oM badz+ra pra ti gr-ih+Na hr-i da ya A kaR+Sha ya/ tsAr+ya ya me sa d+ho d+he na mi ni ya
150a3(rgyud): sa ri d+ha yaM niSh+ka ma du sa ma ya hUM dza/ de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// rang gi sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan// khro bo spyi gtsug rgyal po ni// rnal 'byor pa ni de yis spros// gal te dam tshig las 'das na//
150a4(rgyud): khro bo bdag nyid chen po yis// rtag tu mgo bo 'gas byed cing // rigs dang bcas pa nges par sreg/ bdud rtsi sman gyi rgyal po zhes// bya ba de 'dra'i ting 'dzin la// sems dpa' chen po snyoms
150a5(rgyud): zhugs nas// nad kyi don du 'chol bar gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// oM badz+ra hU~M phaT/ de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// sems can thams cad 'jigs byed pas// nad nams
150a6(rgyud): thams cad bkrug nas ni// 'thugs pa yi ni snying po badzod// oM banas mal ldan las mdu TI g+sa pa d+hu / de nas brjod pa tsam gyis kyang // nang dang gdon gyi tshogs kun dang /
150a7(rgyud): sogs kyi ma'i tha nas// stong dun papa gtu so// 'ab mi nga pa ga sa rmig 'dzegs pa byed/ bdag ca ma nam marnam pa ma ca
150b1(rgyud): cig de rjenapa 'byor chen pos gsungs// nga yi dka' ri rab tu nyon// sems can che bar 'joms pa spongs// mdangs kyang 'phrog par ma byed cig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ kye rgyal po de zungan/
150b2(rgyud): cag gi srog gi srung ba mdzad du gsol// bdag cag kun ni gzi brjid pa// thabs ni cung bad stsal du gsol// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// de nas stobs chen gyis smras pa// nga mi sngaH/
150b3(rgyud): dang phyag rgya dag/ gang zhig bsungs la gnod ma byed// oM badz+ra kar+m+ma bi sho d+ha ya sarba A ba ra Na ni bud d+ha sa tre ma sa ye hUM// de nas phyag rgya chen po kun// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa// mdo/
150b4(rgyud): sngagasang btul po las// yongs su bshad pa thams cad kun// sngags dang phyag rgya gnas gang na// rtag par rab tu spyod byed pas// gnas de du yang rtag par// khyed rnams shin tu gnod
150b5(rgyud): ma byed// de skad gsungs pas gdon kun ni// hi hi zhes ni sgrog par gyur// spyi bo'i rnal 'byor pa la ni// gnod pa byed pa thams cad gtad// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// kun mchog
150b6(rgyud): gnas kyi dbang phyug gis// sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgya che// blo gros chen po snyoms par zhugs// ngan song bcing bar bya ba'i phyir// mgon po dgal bka' nod byed// mgon chen sa
150b7(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyis// kun nas snying po brjod par gyur// yi shag pa la badz+ra swAhA/ rdo rjesems dpa'i thabs chen po// de rjems ni yang dag blang // sems can rnams la brtse ba'i phyir/
151a1(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad bkug par gyur// oM sa pA ya bi sho d+han badz+ra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ de skad brjod nas rnal 'byor ches// skad cig gis ni ngan song bkug/ ri yi rgyal po
151a2(rgyud): nye ba ru// ngu 'bod la sogs snang bar gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' rnal 'byor ches// ngan song sems can la smras pa// dkon mchog gsum dngang bstan la// myur du brtan par skyabs su
151a3(rgyud): song // de dag thams cad kyis smras pa// stobs chen bdag cag sgrub tu gsol// gtso bos ji skad bka' stsal pa// de bzhin du ni bgyi bar 'tshal// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// sdig pa
151a4(rgyud): dral ba nges 'ching ba// sdig pa thams cad rab 'joms pa// mchog tu gsang ba gsungs par gyur// oM badz+ra pA Ni bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba a pA ya ban+d+ha ni pra mo k+Sha ya sarba pri ya ga te b+h+yaHsarba satwa sarba ta/
151a5(rgyud): thA ga ta badz+ra sa ma ya tra tha/ sems can ngan song rgyu can rnams// rig pa 'di yis dbang bskur bas// ngan song 'khor lo dral bar gyur// rgya mtsho ru ni rab tu ltung // de bzhin ngan song shi bos
151a6(rgyud): nasadadade kun rab tu grol bar gyur// sdug bsngal kun las rab tu grol// rdo rje dbang po'i gnas tho ba gyur// de bzhin thub pa nam snang gi/ zhabs drung du ni skyes par gyur// rdo rje sems
151a7(rgyud): dpa'i mthu yis ni// de bzhin mi khom zad par gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'i mthu yis ni// de nas skad cig des ni thob// rmang byung sna tshogs gsang chen po// cho 'phrul dag ni skyes par gyur//
151b1(rgyud): stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di// rdo rje rin chen rang bzhin gnas// rin chen bdun gyis rab tu spras// rdo rje rin chen gyis rab mdzes// de yi rigs kyi ngan song kun// sdug bsngal thams
151b2(rgyud): cad rnam par sbyangs// sems can bde ba skyes par gyur// rdo rje bde ba yang dag ldan// mchog chen po yi zhing 'di ni// dag pa'i zhing du rab tu grags// sems can dag pa kun tu khyab/
151b3(rgyud): bzhin rnal 'byor rdor rang bzhin// slar yang shing gi nags la sogs// rmad byung chen po snang ba med// rin chen sna bdun rang bzhin kun// nags dang rtsa la skyes par gyur// mtho dman dag
151b4(rgyud): dang rnam par bral// lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par snang // ka tsa li ltar reg na bde// stong gsum rab tu gnas par gyur// dmyal ba la sogs sdug bsngal kun// dang por ngan song nye bar
151b5(rgyud): zhing bkres dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal dag/ kun tu 'gags par rnam par gnas// rgya mtsho kun tu thim par gyur// ri bo gzugs kyang kun tu khyab// gzhan 'phrul gyi ni lha rnams dang /
151b6(rgyud): mtshungs pa ru ni mi rnams gyur// slar yang mu khyud 'khor lo mad// ri rab man dar dag med// lha yi 'jig rten gnas kyang med// rgya mtsho med cing lha min med// klu yi gnas gzhi dag kyang med//
151b7(rgyud): mi yi khyim dang khang pa med// grong khyer ljongs dang yul 'khor dang // phug dang bcas par rnam par bral// mi yi gnas kyang med pa nyid// chu bo bug dang lung ba med// mi dag gi ni lus kyang
152a1(rgyud): med na sems can 'ga' yang 'dir mi snang // ngan song 'khor lo dag kyang med// mi khom med cing sdug bsngal med// bud med skyes pa la sogs med// na mo glang po lug/
152a2(rgyud): kyang med// dpag bsam shing dang spos kyi shing // rin chen sna bdun rang bzhin mdzes// spos kyi chu yi rgya mtsho dang // rin chen sna tshogs rnams kyis mdzes// shing ni yid 'ong thams cad las/
152a3(rgyud): rol mo'i sgra ni mngon par phyung // rol mos chos kyi sgra dag kyang // stong gsum du ni yongs su byung // ji ltar rdo rje dbang po'i gnas// ri rab ri yi rtse mo ltar// de bzhin stong gsum gyi ni gnas// nam
152a4(rgyud): par sna tshogs 'od 'bar gyur// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di// gru bzhi rab tu gnas par gyur// kun nas phyi rol gnas rnams ni// kha khyer du yang snang bar gyur// slar yang nyi ma za ba
152a5(rgyud): medad/ skar ma med cing lha yang med// rang gi khang pa'i nang du yang // lha rnams nyid kyang mthong mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas 'od kyis yongs su gsal// 'od zer sna tshogs yid 'phrog pa// gang
152a6(rgyud): gis zhing ni yang dag sbyangs// rdo rje rin chen yid 'ong ldan// rdo rje dbang po'i gnas nyid kyang // slar yang snang bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhan du gzhi ni gcig pa'i gnas// gang du sangs rgyas rnam
152a7(rgyud): 'phrul pa// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di// lha yi pad+ma yongs su gsal// rin chen sna bdun rab tu mdzes// dri yi tshogs ni yid 'ong ldan// bskal pa chen po'i zhing gi dbus// dkyil
152b1(rgyud): 'khor shin tu sdug sted du// dpag tshang srong zag brgyad d+ha yi// rdo rje seng ge'i khri byung gyur// kun nas phyogs rnams thams cad du// dpag tshad stong phrag drug rtsa ldan// rdo rje rin chen
152b2(rgyud): rang bzhin mdzes// seng ge'i khri na pa'i byung gyur// rdo rje'i bla re rnam par bres// dar gyi chun po rnam par 'phyang // dril bu'i nga ba rnam par 'phyang // zhing ni kun tu rab tu sbas// me tog sna tshogs
152b3(rgyud): kun tu bkram// sna tshogs sprin gyis rab tu g.yogs// sna tshogs dri yis kun tu khyab// dpag bsam shing gis nye bar sbas// dpag bsam shing ni yid 'ong ldan// rdo rje'i rol mo mdzes par/
152b4(rgyud): sgra ni mngon par 'byin par byed// 'di nyid dang ni lhan cig zhing // sgrib pa med pa'i rang bzhin du// phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar gyur// slar yang 'jigs par 'gyur ba med// stong gsum gyi
152b5(rgyud): ni 'jig rten 'di// gang+gA'i bye snyed grangs med pa// shin tu phra ba'i rdul snyed kyi// sangs rgyas thams cad yongs su gsal// til gyi gang bu gang ba bzhin// sangs rgyas thams cad yongs su
152b6(rgyud): gsald daphyogs rnams kun nas ma lus par// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dir gshegs gyur// dbus kyi seng ge'i gdan dgal// chos dbyings 'jigs pa med pa la// rnam par snang mdzad
152b7(rgyud): stobs chen po// ston pa bcom ldan bzhugs par gyur// shar du yang ni mi bskyod pa// lho ru rin chen 'byung ldan te// nub tu 'od dpag med pa yin// byang du don yong grub pa ste/ mgon po chen
153a1(rgyud): po phyogs bzhi ru// rdo rje yi ni steng du bzhugs// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams ngag tu ni// mnyam du dmigs nas rnam par gnas// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan par gyur/
153a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad brtan par bzhugs// mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan par mdzad// sangs rgyas grangs med thams cad ni// rdo rje can ni lnga la bzhugs// phyogs
153a3(rgyud): ni re re khyab gyur pa// sangs rgyas gcig gis yang dag bzhugs// mtshams dang steng dang 'og dag gi/ rnam snang mdzad kyis brtan par mdzad// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan gyur pa// dbus kyi
153a4(rgyud): phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bzhugs// de nas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul pa// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs snying po// byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul pa// sangs rgyas thams cad rang nyid kyi// seng
153a5(rgyud): ge'i khri ni lnga la bzhugs// grangs med tshad ni da med pa yi// sangs rgyas chos nyid ma lus pa// ri mo gsal ba dang mtshungs par// stong gsum dag ni ma lus gyur// byang chub sems
153a6(rgyud): dpa'i dga' ba che// pad+ma'i steng du bzhugs par gyur// dbus kyi 'khor lor yang dag ldan// bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga// sangs rgyas rol pa dang ldan par// rdo rje can ni thams cad bzhun/
153a7(rgyud): shar gyi cha la yang dag bzhugs// bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga// rdo rje rnam 'phrul ston byed pa// 'khor lo dang ldan bzhugs par gyur// lho yo phyogs na thams cad gnas// bye ba dag ni gra /
153b1(rgyud): med lnga// rin chen rnam 'phrul yang dag ldan// 'khor lo dang ldan bzhugs par gyur// bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga// nub kyi phyogs na yang dag gnas// pad+ma'i rnam 'phrul ston byed pa/
153b2(rgyud): 'khor lo dang ldan bzhugs par gyur// bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga// byang gi phyogs na rnam par gnas// las kyi rnam 'phrul ston byed pa// 'khor lo dang ldan bzhugs par gyur// gsang
153b3(rgyud): dang mchod pa gang yin dang // lha mo rdo rje lha mo ni// grangs med tshad ni med pa dag/ bcu gnyis kyi ni dkyil 'khor gang // sgo bsrus dag ni grangs med pa// rnal 'byor mchog dang ldan pa /
153b4(rgyud): rgyal po shar dang lho dag tu// nub dang byang ni yang dag gnas// chos kyi sku las yang dag byung // longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur gyur pa// sems dpa' chen po 'di dag kun// chos dang longs
153b5(rgyud): spyod rdzogs las byung // gang zhig phyogs bcu dag gi yang // byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid che// rnal 'byor chen po'i sa thob pa// de dag kun kyang 'dir 'ongs pa// sangs rgyas ning ni gang+gA
153b6(rgyud): yid dbye ma dang mnyam ji snyed pa// yongs su gang bar gyur pa'i tshogs// de dag thams cad yang dag gshegs// sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu yis ni// zhing dag rgya ni chen por gyur// yul
153b7(rgyud): rnams thams cad bya ba yang // gnod pa med cing 'tshe ba'ang med// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten pa'i// ji ltar sngon ni bar med pa'i// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi// bar med pa ni de
154a1(rgyud): bzhin gnas// gang nas sangs rgyas mi snang ba// phyogs ni rdul tsam yod ma yin// byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor che// gang dag sa ni bzhi bcu dang // yang na chos
154a2(rgyud): las byung ba nyid// sangs rgyas sras ni grags pa che// rigs lnga byung ba la sogs pa// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ston pa dang // 'dir gnas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs// mchog rnams phyog/
154a3(rgyud): dang phyogs mtshams mthong // sangs rgyas dag ni grangs med kun// lha rnams yang dag gnas 'di ru// sangs rgyas lnga ni mthong bar gyur// sangs rgyas dgra bcom ma gtogs par// zhing
154a4(rgyud): 'dir 'ga' yang mthong ma gyur// rdo rje rigs kyi 'khor lo min// dkyil 'khor gyi ni tshogs kyang min// dbus dang phyogs ni yang dag bzhugs// sangs rgyas lnga ni mthong bar gyur// dbang
154a5(rgyud): phyug chen po gnod byed pa'i// rdo rje khro bo mthong bar gyur// sangs rgyas lnga dang de bzhin du// khro bo drug bdun rnam par gnas// tshangs sogs lha rnams de dag kyang // ngo mtshar dag ni skyes
154a6(rgyud): par gyur// 'jigs shing skrag nas lha de dag/ gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed// gtso bo ji bzhin mthong 'gyur zhing // shin tu ngo mtshar ci zhig snang // slar yang lha yi 'jig rten dag
154a7(rgyud): srid pa nang du mthong ma gyur// 'gro ba lnga yi sems can min// ri rab dang ni rgya mtsho min// tha ba nyis mthong zhing // ri dang khang pa dag kyang min// ci bdag cag ni rmongs gyur tam// yang //
154b1(rgyud): mig ni long bar gyur// yang na bdag cag sems g.yengs pa// sgyu ma'i nam 'phrul 'di ci zhig/ bdag cag gis na sngar 'jigs mthong // drug cing bkug nas thal bar byas// ri rab ri yi
154b2(rgyud): moru// sdug bsngal chen pos gzir bar gyur// slar yang ri rab yod ma yin// khro bo rdzu 'phrul chen po meng// gzhan dang khro bo chen po gcig/ dbang phyug chen po gnod par byed// gnas ni/

154b4(rgyud): smra bar ni gnas gyur nas// rdo rje can la lta bar byed// gnod sbyin 'byung po sha za sogs// gdug pa kun dang gdon sogs kyis// mun par khyab pa bzhin du ni// stong gsum 'di ni mthong bar
154b5(rgyud): gyur/ dgazhan ni cung zad ma mthong ste// gzhan du phyogs dag mun pas khyab// rdo rje khro bos 'khrul gyur cig/ sgyu ma yis ni rmongs gyur cing // kun tu rmongs pa nyid gyur cing // gcig la
154b6(rgyud): gcig ni rmongs par gyur// ha ha zhes bya'i sgra sgrog cing // bdag cag 'dir ni gang du phyin// tshig ni rab tu rjod byed cing // gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed// 'di ni su zhig bdag cag gang /
154b7(rgyud): 'di ni su yi gam du phyin// bdag cag rang gi gnas na ltung // bdag cag 'jig rten gzhan du phyin// rdo rje khro bos gsang bar gyur// 'o na 'di ni ci zhig yin// lha yi gnas kyang ma mthong zhing /
155a1(rgyud): rdo rje can yang mthong ma grur// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo min// bdag cag rnams ni mun par gyur// rang gi gnas kyang ma mthong zhing // ri rab nyid kyang mthong /
155a2(rgyud): ma gyur// mchod nga rgya mtsho dag kyang min// skar ma za ba nyi ma min// bdag cag thams cad gang nas 'ongs// yul gang zhig tu 'gro bar byed// 'gro ba lnga yang yod ma yin// 'jig rten med
155a3(rgyud): cing ma mo med// mi dang mi ma yin pa dag/ rnam pa kun tu mthong ma gyur// sngon ni ji ltar de bzhin gyis// rmang du byung ba nyid ma gyur// gzhan du sa ni g.yos par gyur// rlung dag gis ni rnam par/
155a4(rgyud): bskyod// 'brug gi sgra dang grog chen po// sdug bsngal thams cad yang dag ldan// bkres skom la sogs sdug bsngal dang // bral min kun tu sdug bsngal gyur// der ni lha chen rdzu 'phrul dag
155a5(rgyud): cung zad kyang ni mthong ma gyur// dmyal ba yi dgas dud 'gro dag/ rnam par nyams shing bshig par gyur// sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgya yis// ngan song gsum ni nye bar zhi// lha gang 'du//
155a6(rgyud): shes med pa dang // gzugs med pa na spyod par gnas// phung po lnga ru rang bdag nyid// ngo mtshar de bzhin mthong gyur nas// rang bdag nyid la'ang rtog par byed// gcig la gcig kyang lta bar
155a7(rgyud): byed// de bzhin thams cad skrag cing 'jigs// ngo mtshar gyur pa 'di ci zhig/ tshad med bskal pa chen po ru// bdag cag dag par gnas par gyur// bdag mchog las ni bdag cag grol// slar
155b1(rgyud): yang bdag tu 'dzin par gyur// sngon gyi bag chags mngon 'dod la// srid gsum gnas ni mthong bar gyur// srid pa gsum yang mthong ma yin// de bzhin 'gro ba lnga yang med// gzhan du shin tu
155b2(rgyud): dag par gcig/ chos dang longs spyod rdzogs par sprul// sangs rgyas lnga nyid mthong bar gyur// srid gsum gnas ni gzhan dag min// tshegs la thams cad mnyes par gyur// gcig la gcig ni
155b3(rgyud): bar byed// 'di ni su zhig bdag cag gang // bdag cag 'jig rten gzhan du phyin// sngon ni bdag gis 'jig rten 'di// 'gro ba lnga bcas de bzhin du// ri rab dang ni rgya mtshor bcas// lha rnams
155b4(rgyud): drug ni 'khor bcas mthong // srid pa gsum gyi lha rnams ni// gang zhig 'di ni mthong ma gyur// gzhal yas khang dang sems can ni// gtso bo ji bzhin mthong bar gyur// de 'dra'i ngo mtshar sna tshogs
155b5(rgyud): la/ gnas chen 'di ru mthong bar gyur// byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyi rol pa yin// gang zhig stong gsum 'di yi ni// rang rgyal bdag nyid mchog gyur pa// de yang
155b6(rgyud): kun tu rmongs gyur nas// rnam par 'phrul pa'ang mthong ma gyur// sangs rgyas nyid kyang mthong ma yin// rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras kyang min// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan ni ba// gnas ni de ru mthong ma
155b7(rgyud): gyur dang gzhan du stong ni gsum po 'di// rnam pa kun tus mthong nyid// sa dang me dang chu khams min// gser gyi dkyil 'khor dag kyang min// 'gro ba lnga yi sems can min// za ba nyi ma dag kyang min//
156a1(rgyud): skar ma gapa' dang rgyu skar min// sems can dag kyang khams gsum min// 'di dag thams cad stong par gyur// gzhan du nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor min// de dag thams cad
156a2(rgyud): 'jigs skrag nas// mya ngan 'das pa nye bar thob// gang yang phyogs rnams bcu po yi// nyan thos 'jigs pa med pa rnams// byang sems can ni chen po yis// de dag kun ni skrag par gyur// rang
156a3(rgyud): rang gi ni zhing dag tu// sangs rgyas nyid kyang mthong ma gyur// 'dus pa chen po dag dang ni// chos rnams ston pa dag kyang min// zhing de yi ni sems can min// lha dang mi rnams dag kyang min/ khang
156a4(rgyud): pa med cing zhing yang med// sa dang me dang rlung yang med// rang gi zhing yang ma mthong zhing // rdo rje sems dpa' 'jigs par gyur// skad cig gis ni mi dgar gyur// thang cig tu ni rmongs par gyur// de
156a5(rgyud): lta bu yi rnam 'phrul du// byang chub sems ni rab tu snang // snod kyi bskal pa chen po la// 'khor lo rnam par 'khrul pa bstan// bcom ldan rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pas// de lta bu ni byin gyis
156a6(rgyud): brlabs// sems can gang dag 'di na gnas// nyin dang mtshan mo mi shes gyur// de nas de nyid gsang ba che// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan pa'i tshogs// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sangs
156a7(rgyud): rgyasad de lta bu yi rnam 'phrul byung // stong gsum yongs su bsdus pa yi// lha yi gnas ni bkod par gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyis gnas gcig pu// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa/
156b1(rgyud): la lang sngon pa sngon po che/ rdo rje sngon pos rab tu mdzes// sa yi phyogs ni rab tu spras// rdo rje sngon pos rab tu brgyan// la lang gser gyi mdog tu snang // kha dog ser pos rnam par brgyan/
156b2(rgyud): sa yi cha yang rab tu spras// rdo rje ser pos rab tu brgyan// la yar kha dog dmar po ni// byu ru lta bus rab tu mdzes// sa yi cha yang rab tu spras// rdo rje dmar pos rab tu brgyan// la la rabatsag
156b3(rgyud): gi mdog can gyi// bai DUR+Ya mtshungs rab tu mdzes// sa yi cha yang rnam par sbas// rdo rje bcod kyis rnam par mdzes// la lar shel gyi mdog can gyi// shin tu snang bas rab tu mdzes// sa yi
156b4(rgyud): cha yang rnam par spras// rdo rje shel gyis rnam par brgyan// shar du sngon po chen po ste// lhor ni ser po yang dag ldan// nub kyi cha ni dmar po ste// byang ni btsod dang yang dag ldan// dbus kyi sa yi cha dag ni/
156b5(rgyud): shel gyi mdog can bla na med// rdo rje chen pos shin tu dag/ tshon rtsi lnga yi rang bzhin bshad// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi yis rab tu mdzes// cha mnyam legs par bgos pa ste//
156b6(rgyud): go rims dang ni yang dag ldan// kun nas phyi rol gnas dag na// rdo rje kha khyer yang dag ldan// kun nas kha khyer dang ldan zhing // sgo yi kha khyer dag gis sbas// ri mo rdo rje sngo rang bzhin// gzhan
156b7(rgyud): yang gser gyi mdog can dang // kha dog dmar po mchog dang ni// gzhan yang shel ni bzang po dag/ rin chen kun gyi rang bzhin mchog/ dkyil 'khor sna tshogs mdzes gyur pa// sna tshogs gzugs ni/
157a1(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i mchog/ rdo rje lha mo tshogs kyis mchod// dra ba dra ba byed pas smras// zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes// g.yer ka'i drabs kun tu khebs// dril bu'i mchog na
157a2(rgyud): kun tu 'byung // sna tshogs shing ni yid 'ong ldan// dpag bsam shing ni yid 'ong ldan// spos dang me tog de bzhin dri// snang ba'i shing mchog yang dag ldan// sna tshogs bkod pa nye bar ldan/
157a3(rgyud): sna tshogs rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu// mtsho mchog chu yis gang bar gyur// rdo rje rgya mtsho rgya chen ldan// me tog sna tshogs kun tu bkram// sna tshogs bdug pa dag gis bdugs// sna tshogs dri yi
157a4(rgyud): yis gtor// sna tshogs dri yis kun tu khyab// drag po chen po sras bcu dag/ de nas nyams dga' ba dag byung // shing dang bang sogs thams cad las// chos rnams 'byung ba thos par gyur/
157a5(rgyud): phyogs rnams kun tu rnam byung nas// dag pa'i zhing du stong nyid bcas// rnam par sgra ni gang zhig grag/ chos kyi bde ba 'byung bar gyur// yid lad shid baM/ oM badz+ra sa twa kro d+ha ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra/
157a6(rgyud): kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha rA gA ya hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra duTi kro d+ha la sa d+hu swa tru hU~M baT/ khro bo rdo rje rin chen mchog/ 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba bkod dga' bas// khro bo rdo rje bla na med// mchog tu gas
157a7(rgyud): ba gsungs par gyur// oM badz+ra b+haM ku Ti kro d+ha ha na hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra sUr+ya ma hA dz+wa la mA la kro d+ha dz+wa la ya sarba hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ke tu ma hA kro d+ha te ni hUM phaT/ oM ana? hA sa pa dz+ra mar+tha hA sa kro d+ha ha ha ha ha hUM baT/ khri ba
157b1(rgyud): chen po rdo rje chos// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas khyab gyur pas// khro bo'i rgyal po rab bzod dka'// mchog tu 'jigs su rung ba smras// oM badz+ra d+ha ma bi sho d+ha ya hUM phaT/ oM tik+Sh+Na kri b+hin+da hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra haM/
157b2(rgyud): tu kro d+ha pra be sha ya maN+Da laM sarba hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra krod+ha b+hA Sha ta pA ta hU~M phaT/ rdo rje las ni rgyal po che// gsang ba thams cad kun bsdus pas// 'bar ba gsal bas khyab pa byung // khro bo rgyal pos
157b3(rgyud): brjod par gyur// oM badza ka ma kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM ba ga btsa kro d+ha rak+Sha ra/ hUM baT/ oM ba dza yaka kro d+ha khAng hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha muSh+Ti sA d+ha la sa ma ya hU~M phaT/ sems dpa' 'di rnams gsang ba che// zhi ba'i
157b4(rgyud): gzugs las rnam par gyur// rdo rje khro bo drag po che// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs gyur// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// khro bo chen po stobs po che// gsang ba 'di rnams yongs su brjod//
157b5(rgyud): mchod pa'i lha mos gsungs par gyur// oM badz+ra lA s+ye rA gA ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsA ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra gI te ga ta ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra nr-i te ba shi ku ru hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra puSh+pa pU dza s+pha ra Na sa ma pa/
157b6(rgyud): hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra gan+d+ha pU dza s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra d+hU pa pU dza s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra A lo ke pU dza s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM phaT/ de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// khro bo drag po shin tu gdug/ rdo rje
157b7(rgyud): khro bo rab gtum pa// sgo srungs dag ni kun tu byung // oM aM ku sha ma hA kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya sarba sa ma ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra pA sha ma hA kro d+ha pra be sha ya sarba sa ma ya hUM hUM/ oM badz+ra s+pho Ta ma hA kro d+ha ban+d+ha ya sarbas
158a1(rgyud): ma ya rU ba~M/ oM badz+ra A be sha ma hA kro d+ha A be sha ya sarba sa ma ya hU~M ho/ 'khor lo yongs su zlum por ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por gyur// khro bo chen po'i tshogs kyis khyab// dkyin/
158a2(rgyud): 'khor chen po yang dag ldan// gnas chen po dang yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor chen po kun bsdus pas// shin tu gsang ba chos chen po// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa// de nyid snying po
158a3(rgyud): gsang ba che// thar pa chen po grong khyer mchog/ dkyil 'khor rgyal po chen po ste// sems can don kun yang dag ldan// chos nyid rdzogs par byang chub pa// 'di 'dra chos dang longs spyod rdzogs//
158a4(rgyud): rigs lnga'i gsang ba gang yin pa// gdon mi za bar byed pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs ni ba// gang phyir dag pa'i tshogs chen po// de bzhin rdo rje'i rigs dag pa// gang phyir lha chen rab 'dul
158a5(rgyud): byed/ lha chen la sogs sprul byed pa// de bzhin pad+ma'i rigs mchog ste// gang phyir gdul bya'i sems can rnams// sprul pa sna tshogs yang dag byung // sprul pa'i 'khor lo zhi ba ste// drag
158a6(rgyud): po'i mchod pa rab bskor ba// sna tshogs rigs can 'khor lo ste// rigs bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs mchog ni// shar gyi 'khor lo yang dag byung // de nas rdo rje'i
158a7(rgyud): rigs drag po// sems can don du yang dag 'jigs// rdo rje'i rigs mchog chen po 'di// dkyil 'khor tshogs ni kun bsdus pa// gsang ba'i dbang phyug rgyal po che/ gang phyir gsang ba'i
158b1(rgyud): bdag por bshad// rdo rje thams cad kun bsdus pa// rang gi rigs mchog bshad nas ni// rdo rje 'dzin ba rgyal po ches// dkyil 'khor chen po kun tu sprul// lha la sogs pa gdug pa kun/
158b2(rgyud): skad cig de la yang dag bkug/ slar ni bcug par byas nas kyang // skad cig gis ni dam tshig phog/ rdo rje mtshan ma'i dbang bskur ba// dam tshig ldan pa byin nas ni// bkug ste rab tu bcug
158b3(rgyud): nas kyang // de bzhin bcings te dbang du byas// dam tshig la ni brtson byas te// dam tshig sdom pa de bzhin no// mi rnams la ni phan pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor mchog ni gsungs par gyur//
158b4(rgyud): 'khor lo chen po grong khyer che// rdo rje rigs mchog chen po ste// khams gsum rnam rgyal zhes bya ba// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// 'jig rten gsum tshogs bam byas nas// lha la sogs
158b5(rgyud): pa rab bcug gyur// de nas khams gsum rnam rgyal gnas// 'khor lo chen po grong khyer che// gang ming bzung ba tsam nyid kyis// sems can rab tu bcom nas ni// gdon la sogs pa
158b6(rgyud): 'bros par byed// rims dang gdon dang dug dag dang // drag po gdug pa dam tshig dang // mtshan bzung ba yi mo nyid la// skrag pa dang ni g.yo bar gyur// sku ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
158b7(rgyud): mchog dmi gang dag ni gdul bya min// de bas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal ni// dkyil 'khor chen po sprul par gyur// rdo rje slob dpon skal ba che// shin tu byang zhing rab tu mkhas// dgongs pa yi ni cho ga
159a1(rgyud): shes// gzhung rnams thos shing don la mkhas// rab tu dang ning blo ldan brtan// rigs dang rigs min rab tu shes// byang chub sems la brtson par gyur// lha gzhan dag/
159a2(rgyud): la 'dod ldan min// gsang ba'i snying po mchog mthong ba// snying rje bdag nyid brtser ldan pa// dag cing des la rnam par dul// rang gi ngang gis rnam par gnas// zhan cing chags la gdug pa min//
159a3(rgyud): rmongs pa med cing le lo med// brtse ldan phan pa'i bsam pa can// rtag tu rnam par dgod la dga'// gzugs sogs 'dod pa'i yon tan la// chags shing lhag par rgyal gyur nas// srid la sam
159a4(rgyud): ni skrag par byed// srid la mngon par chags pa med// theg pa chen po'i tshul la brtson// theg pa gzhan la 'dod ldan min// sems can rnams kyi don la brtson// dkon mchog gsum gyi mchog
159a5(rgyud): byung ba// nyon mongs kun tu chags pa spangs// gnyen po dag ni rab tu sgom// 'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs che// mi sdug pa la sogs pasgom// rigs dang rigs min cho ga shes//
159a6(rgyud): sngags dang phyag rgya shin tu mkhas// dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang // dbang du bya dang gshegs gsol dang // ji skad rdo rje dbyings bshad bzhin// sngon du rig pa'i brtul zhugs bya// kha na
159a7(rgyud): mtho rdul tsam la// kun tu 'dzes par bya ba yin// tshang dang tshon rtsi srang bu dang // yo byad cho ga yang dag ldan// bcing dang phur bus gdab pa nyid// sngar bshad rdo rje dbyings bzhin du// bza' ba dang /
159b1(rgyud): ni mi bza' ba// rdo rje snyems tshul ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje dbyings sogs dkyil 'khor du// sngar ni ji ltar de bzhin bya// de nas yang dag rab bshad bya// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa
159b2(rgyud): rdo rje dbyings dang rab tu mtshungs// dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i mchog/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dar gyi chun pos rnam
159b3(rgyud): par brgyan// rgya cher ji ltar rigs pa ru// ji bzhin rdo rje grong khyer che// rdo rje dbying dang rab tu mtshungs// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i grong khyer bri// 'khor lo lnga dang yang dag ldan// ka ba brgyad dang
159b4(rgyud): yang dag ldan// de dbus rang bzhin 'khor lo yi// dbus su sangs rgyas dgod par bya// rnam par snang mdzad ston pa che// rdo rje sems dpa' 'ong po che// byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po che/
159b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas longs spyod rdzogs dkyil 'khor// sangs rgyas spyan sngar rdo rje ni// 'bar ba'i dbus su dgod par bya// rdo rje me ltar 'bar nyid ni// phyag rgya 'jig rten gsum 'joms pa// g.yas
159b6(rgyud): su rin chen phyag rgya ni// 'bar ba'i dbus su dgod par bya// g.yon du bad+ma'i phyag rgya bri// rgyab tu rdo rje rnon po ni// 'bar ba'i dbus su dgod par bya// phyag rgya yi ni rgyal po bzhi// 'bar ba'im
159b7(rgyud): dang rab tu ldan// rnam par snang mdzad dkyil 'khor che// chos dbyings grong khyer chen po la// 'khor los sgyur ba bzhi pa yi// phyag rgya dag kyang dgod par bya// gang dang gang gis thig gyur pa/
160a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor shes rab can thig gdag/ rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yis// rdo rje'i thig ni yongs su bzung // oM badz+ra sa ma ya sU traM mA ti kra ma hUM/ dkyil 'khor chen po bsdus/
160a2(rgyud): pa yid / rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs bsdus pa// rgyal po bri zhing dgod par bya// oM badz+ra be gA kra ma hUM/ tshon rtsi thams cad yang dag ldan// 'bar ba'i lta ba sa tham/
160a3(rgyud): cad blta// rdo rje tshon rtsi bkye bya zhing // rdo rje sngags ni rab tu bskul// oM badz+ra tsi ta tra sa ma ya hUM/ phyag rgya gang zhig dgod par du// snying po thams cad dgod par bya// sngar ni dgod pa gang
160a4(rgyud): yin pa// rdo rje gzugs ni skor byed pa// rdo rje hUM mdzad dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po// mi bskyod shin tu mnyam gzhag pa// zhal ba zhi
160a5(rgyud): pa la phyag brgyad pa// mche ba dag ni cung zad gtsigs// khro bo'i rgyal po 'bar bas khyab// phyag na phyag rgya dang bcas mtshon// rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgya ni// steng du phyag gnyis yang dag ldan//
160a6(rgyud): de bzhin kho nar phyag gnyis dag/ lcags kyu 'phyar ba yang dag ldan// phyag gcig gis ni zhags pa bsnams// gcig gis rdo rje yang dag bsdams// mda' 'gengs pa yi phyag rgya dang / phyag
160a7(rgyud): gnyis dag ni shin tu ldan// rdo rje hUM mdza phyag rgya ste// dbang phyug chen po kun tu mnan// g.yas pas lha lo u ma li// mu ma'i bar du gnon par byed// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/
160b1(rgyud): rdzardzalnga po dgod par bya// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba'i khyab cing 'bar// khro ba 'jigs par byed pa mchog/ mdun du rdo rjesems dpa' ste/ g.yas su rdo rgyal ba'o// g.yon du do chags pa ste/
160b2(rgyud): rgyab tu rdo rje legs pa'o// ngo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // sgo ru khro ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// khro za 'a rgyal po khro gnyer can// khro zos yongs su bskor ba bri// thams cad 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas byab/
160b3(rgyud): gdong ni khro bcas bzhad ldan pa// rdo rje dbang phyug phyag rgyar ldan// khro gnyer can ni yongs su brjod// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rdo rje khro bo bdag nyid che// sngags dang phyag rgya yongs
160b4(rgyud): su bsdu// rang gi gnas su yang dag bri// mdun du rdo rje rin chen te// g.yas su khro bo gzi brjid do// g.yon du rgyal mtshan drag po ste// rgyab tu khro bo bzhad pa po// rdo rje shugs kyis song
160b5(rgyud): nas kyang // nub kyi phyogs su dkyil 'khor ni// khro bo chen po rdo rje ste/ khro bdag chen po rnams kyis bskor// rdo rje chos ni mdun du ste// rdo rje rnon po g.yas su'o// de bzhin g.yon du rdo
160b6(rgyud): rgyud rgyab tu rdo rje smra ba'o// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // dkyil 'khor dag ni mchog bzhi pa// rdo rje dbab pa las chen po// khro bo chen pos yongs su bskor// rdo rje las ni mdun du
160b7(rgyud): ste/ g.yas su rdo rje srung ba'o// g.yon du rdo rje gnod sbyin te// rgyab tu rdo rje khu tshur ro// dbus kyi 'khor lo'i mtshams bzhi ru// lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri// mtshams su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
161a1(rgyud): la rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs bri// phyi rol dkyil 'khor mtshams rnams su// rdo rje me tog la sogs bri// rdo rje dbyings sogs dkyil 'khor du/ ji skad sngar
161a2(rgyud): bshad cho ga bzhin// sgo bzhi dag ni thams cad du// sgo srungs rnams ni dgod par bya// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang // dril bu dbab pa bla na med// rang gi phyag rgya snying khar
161a3(rgyud): gzhag darang rang gi ni snying po yis// rdo rje dril bu yid 'ong ldan// rnam par snang mdzad rnam par dgod// bdag nyid rdo rje khro bo ni// gtso bo rdo rje rig pa mchog/ rdo rje rgyal po mchog byin rlag
161a4(rgyud): rang nyid rdo rje dkyil 'khor mchog/ de yis dkyil 'khor de bris nas// rdo rje ti rin ti ri 'jug/ yang dag par ni brtag byas la// lan bdun du ni bskor ba bya// chad pa gang yin yongs su dag/
161a5(rgyud): mkhas pas lhag par dbri bar bya// rdo rje dril bu rtogs par bya// grub par 'gyur te nyes pa med// rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs kun// mnyam par bzhag pas las rnams bya// 'khor lo'i
161a6(rgyud): dbus su zhugs nas ni// mkhas pas sgo ni dbye bar bya// yid kyis rdo rje ri mo ni// bteg cing kun tu phye nas kyang // rdo rje sgo ni bzhi po dag/ yid kyis dbye bar bya ba yin// de la snying po
161a7(rgyud): ni 'di yin te// oM badz+ra d+ha ra ud g+ha Ta ya pra be sha ya sa ma ya hUM/ dkyil 'khor phyi rol gnas rnams su// phyi yi rdo rje rigs dag bri// khyab 'jug la sogs lha rnams ni// kha khyer gyi ni byed la
161b1(rgyud): gnas dag 'khor lo dang bcas rigs bcas te/ sems can gdug pa gdon la sogs// rims dang 'byung thog pa dang / mkha' 'gro 'byung pom mo dang / lha momatshon ca dang rngan sus
161b2(rgyud): ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa zi/ phyi rol kha khyer gnas su ni/ rdo rdzal khyer mdzes pa rnams// de nas sngon la slob dpon ches// dkyil 'khor dbus su 'dug nas ni// rdorje skyil mo krung bcas
161b3(rgyud): te/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms 'jug bya// ji ltar rdo rje rigs byung ba// de bzhin bdag nyid rnam par bsam// rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po// bdag nyid yang dag byin gyis brlag/
161b4(rgyud): po rgyal po mchog/ ces bya de 'dra'i ting 'dzin la/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// skal ba chen po snyoms zhugs nas// ji skad gong du grags pa bzhin// shes rab can gyis thams
161b5(rgyud): cad bsam// ji ltar rdo rje rigs 'byung ba/ ji ltar dkyil 'khor rdzogs par ni// rgya chen gsang ba chen po dang / rdo rje slob dpon cho ga mchog rgyud chen gsang ba zhes bya ba/ rtog pang/
161b6(rgyud): las rab tu bshad// de nas dbus su 'dug byas nas// rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches// khro bo'i phyag rgya bcings nas ni// phyag rgya thams cad yongs su bcings// khro bo rdo rje lcags kyu
161b7(rgyud): bcings da sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bya// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni// lan cig du ni brjod par bya// rdo rje me tog sogs mchod pa// 'dren pa thams cad mchod par bya// gsang
162a1(rgyud): pa'i mchod pa gang bya ba/ phyag rgya thams cad yongs su bcing // phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya ldan// de bzhin du ni mchod pa nyid// phyag rgya'i lan la sogs pa kun// chog/
162a2(rgyud): rab tu ldan pa dbul// rdo rje dril bu dkrol bya zhing // gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor ba sdigs par bya// gdug pa'i sems ni gdul bya zhing // nyon mongs mchog tu gsad par bya// dbab cing
162a3(rgyud): brjod pa nyid du bya// rdo rje mchod pas mchod par bya// glu dang mchod pa yang dag ldan// rdo rje gru ni blang bar bya// rdo rje yi ni gru 'di dag/ blang zhing mchog rnams mnyes par bya// btud cing
162a4(rgyud): dbul bar bya ba nyid// rdo rje glu ni blang bar bya// sha ta sha ta ma ta sa ta ti ri/ Ta ta Ta ta bri ta bri ta ha ta/ ma ta sha ta pra ta ka ta/ ku Ta bi Ta bi Ta Ta Ta Ta ba Ta/ i ti ta Ta Ta Ta/ ka ra Ta ra Ta ra ra Ta/ rdo rje
162a5(rgyud): ti rin ti ri yi// phyag rgyas bdag nyid dbang bskur bya// ji ltar 'dod pa bka' mnos nas// rdo rje'i sngags ni rab tu bskul// sngon po'i gos kyis stod g.yogs bya// sngon po yis ni mig/
162a6(rgyud): dag ba bya// rdo rje ti rin ti sI// phyag rgya rdo rje slob ma bcing // oM gr-ih+Na badz+ra sa ma ya hUM baM/ ci rigs par ni bzhug bya zhing // rdo rje'i sngags ni bskul bar bya// rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yis//
162a7(rgyud): rdo rje slob ma gzhug par bya// oM badz+ra sa ma ya pra be sha yA mi/ rdo rje dbyings sogs dkyil 'khor du// rgyas par ji ltar snga ma bzhin// ye shes dbab pa'i las dag ni// mkhas pa dag gis
162b1(rgyud): bya nyid do// mchod pa dang ni gtor ma nyid// rdo rje can gyis sngar gsungs nyid// shes rab can gyis kun bslab cing // bdag nyid dang bas rab tu bya// rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgya yis// shes/
162b2(rgyud): rab can gyis hUM bsgrub bya// lha la sogs pa gdug pa kun// bkug cing de ru gzhug par bya// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bslab bya zhing // bdag nyid kyang ni rab dang bya// bdag nyid dam ni gzhan yang
162b3(rgyud): rung na rdo rje 'phreng bas dbang bskur bya// rdo rje mna' yi phyag rgya yis// sngon la mna' ni bsgag par bya// rdo rje ye shes ye shes che// rdo rje ye shes rab bsgrub bya// lag pas rdo rje mtshan ma
162b4(rgyud): bzung / rdo rje sngags ni rab bsgrub bya// rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yis// rdo rje mtshan ma rab tu sbyin// oM badz+ra pA Ni karma ka rod b+ha ba/ de nas ming gis dbang bskur zhing // rdo rje sngags ni rab tu
162b5(rgyud): bskuld na rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yis// rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur bya// oM badz+ra kro d+ha s+t+waM a b+hi Shiny+tsA maM/ oM badz+ra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta he badz+ra nA maye shes 'byung ba phun sum tshogs// mkhas pa
162b6(rgyud): yis ni bsgom par bya// shes rab mchog gis bslab bya zhing // rdo rje rnal 'byor rab tu sgrub// snying khar rdo rje bris nas ni// sna tshogs las rnams yang dag ldan// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas khyab
162b7(rgyud): cing 'bar// snying khar rdo rje bsgom par bya// rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po// bdag nyid yongs su bsgom par bya// rgyal ba las rnams thams cad 'dzin// bdag nyid yongs su bsgom par bya/
163a1(rgyud): yang na khro bo'i nang nas gcig/ bdag nyid yongs su bsgom par bya// rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug pas// 'gro ba thams cad dbab par bya// hUM satwa badz+ra kro d+ha A be sha a/ khro za/
163a2(rgyud): rin chen ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje rin chen yang dag bris// bdag nyid rdo rje rin chen te// sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du bya// rdo rje pad+ma mgrin bcings nas// lkog ma'i phyogs su yang dag bri/
163a3(rgyud): bdag nyid rdo rje chos bsgoms nas// des ni nyon mongs thams cad 'joms// spyi bor rdo rje bri bya zhing // rdo rje 'bar ba 'dzin pa dgod/ bdag nyid rdo rje las bsgoms nas/ gdug pa thams
163a4(rgyud): cad bsal bar bya// ho badz+ra rat+na kro d+ha ba sha mA nA ya trahrIHbadz+ra d+harma kro d+ha nA sha ya phaT/ hUM karma ba dza kro d+ha rak+Sha/ lha tshogs sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ phyag rgya dang bcas dgug par bya// ye shes
163a5(rgyud): rlab cing de nas gzung // de bzhin kho nar yang dag rlab// lag par rdo rje lcags kyu bris// sdigs mdzub yi ge hUM ldan pa// khro bo yis ni sor mo bskyod// lha rnams 'gugs par byed pa'i
163a6(rgyud): mchog oM badz+ra kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya hUM phaT/ de bzhin 'og tu rkang mthil la// rdo rje lcags kyu yang dag bri// de yi sa lha ni gang zhig mnan// de ni dgug pa'i mchog yin no// oM badz+ra kro d+ha a kra aM
163a7(rgyud): ku sha A kaR+Sha ya hUM phaT/ dpung pa brkyang dang yang dag ldan// rdo rje lcags kyu yang dag bri// lha ni gang dang gang la mnan// de dang de ni dgug pa'i mchog/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha na A ka R+Sha ya hUM phaT/ stan
163b1(rgyud): la rdo rje lcags kyu ni// yang dag bris pas de mnan ning // lha ni gang zhig kun tu mnan// de dang de ni 'gugs pa'i mchog oM badz+ra kro d+ha A sa na A gats+tsha la A ka rA la mi te he ba dza sa ma nu s+phar hUM
163b2(rgyud): baT phyag rgya dbab par yang dag dbab// mkhas pas ye shes bslab par bya// rdo rje sbyor ba thams cad kyi// sgrub pa dag kyang yang dag brtsam// g.yon brkyang ba yis gnas rnams su/
163b3(rgyud): bdag nyid khra bar bsgom par bya// myur du sangs rgyas ye shes ni/ ring po mi thogs yang dag dpaga.oM badz+ra kr-i d+ha kA la A be sha d+hu a/ ngo rje hUM mdzad yang dag sbyor// khro bo bdag nyid
163b4(rgyud): bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub yang dag dgug/ rdo rje sngags ni rab tu bskul// oM badz+ra bid+yo ta ta ma ma hA kro d+ha A na ya ho b+ha ga bAn badz+ra hUM phaT/ bdag nyid khro bo bsgom bya zhing / khro bar/
163b5(rgyud): lta bas blta bar bya// 'khor ba'i btson 'jigs rung bar// sems can thams cad gsang bar bya/ oM draSh+Ta ma hA kro d+ha mA ra ya sarba satwa hUM/ rtag tu rang nyid go bgos par/ yid kyis
163b6(rgyud): bdag nyid bsgom bya zhing // gzhan dag kyang ni bsgom byas nas// 'gro ba 'di kun srung bar 'gyur// oM badz+ra rak+Sha sarba satwa hUM phaT/ gsang ba'i phyag rgya rnal 'byor che// rnam pa bzhi ni
163b7(rgyud): bslab par bya// rdo rje ye shes de nyid che// sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes bsam// rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jugs pas// sems can gang phyir kun tu chags/ yid kyis gzugs ni bsgom
164a1(rgyud): bya zhing // yi ge d+hu ni rab tu brjod// rdo rje sbyor ba 'di dag ni// rdo rje mkha' 'gro phyag rgya yis// sems can gang la yongs su chags// de mi nyon mongs rnam
164a2(rgyud): par rnams/ shi ya sa la te/ al ba~M ya la/ 'don lan cig brjod pas cang // gnanas chen mongs su ni ga so// king / sems can gang gi rtswa pa'aM// rna mnas
164a3(rgyud): bas bltas// rdo rjernal 'byor spyan chen pos// de yi sdug bsngal nyams par gyur/ Ta ga~M d+hu yi ge d+hu ni gyur pa las/ nye ba'i sems can gang yin pa// de mi snying khar rdo rje yang /
164a4(rgyud): shes rab can gyi yid kyis bsam// de nas 'jigs pa thams cad las// phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgya yang // rdo rje rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro dang // rdorje phyag rgyas gdab par bya// rbak+ki
164a5(rgyud): rdo rje rnal 'byor rmad byung che// rdo rje rnal 'byor rdo rje gang // rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro dkyil 'khor ni// shes rab can gyis mchog gsang rlab// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// yan
164a6(rgyud): lag kun la yongs su 'khyud// yi ge hUM ni sbyor byed pa// sdug bsngal rnam par nyams par gyur// rdo rje khro bo rab drag 'dzin// rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya// de yi khro bo'i sku gang yin//
164a7(rgyud): gcig tu mchog tu gsang ba bdag/ sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang rung // bdag nyid dang ni mtshungs pa ru// lus ni yang dag sbyor ba ni// dbang po snyoms 'jug brjod par bya'o//
164b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 'am// rdo rje khro bo 'am/ sems dpa' gzhan de'i lus gang yin pa dang bdag gi lus gang yin pa mtshungs par shes pa nyid 'di ni dbang po gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa
164b2(rgyud): zhes bya'o// yang na rnam par sgom pa yis// ji skad bshad bzhin yan lag 'khyud// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// dpung pa dam por bsdam par bya// yan lag kun la yongs 'khyud pas//
164b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub rab grub 'gyur// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pa// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags brtag mi bya// 'di yis mtshungs par bsgoms pa yis// mtshungs pa nyid ni dbang po
164b4(rgyud): yin/ traM/ hUM gi sbyor ba'i so dag gi/ mchu bzung nas ni 'o bya zhing // sems can gang zhig rnam sgom pa// des ni bde ba don yod thob// hUM dza/ sems can thams cad bde byed pa/
164b5(rgyud): yi ge hUM de rab sbyor zhing // bdag nyid khro bor rnam sbyangs nas// de nas bde ba thob par 'gyur// hUM/ gang gis hUM ni rab sbyor zhing // sems can dag ni gang dag gis// yan lag thams
164b6(rgyud): cad bsdus byas pa// de yi nyon mongs pasrabs par gyur// hUM phaT/ ye shes chen po'i thabs ldan pa// rdo rje'i rigs ni thams cad nyid// de bzhin 'khor lo'i 'khor bcas pas/
164b7(rgyud): mkhas pa yis ni bslab par bya// sangs rgyas sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// rtag tu bdag ni bsgom par bya// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa// sangs rgyas kun ni rnam par sgom// sgom pa'i/
165a1(rgyud): sbyor ba de yis ni// skad cig sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// ad rdo rje'i rig pa mchog rgyal po// bdag nyid yongs su bsgom par bya// hU~M dang rdo rje khro bo khro gnyer can//
165a2(rgyud): mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya// traM/ rdo rje sde ru rang bdag nyid// sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya// hrIH/ rdo rje dbab pa khro bo che// mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya// mad bdag nyid
165a3(rgyud): rdo rje sems la ni// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sgom// hUM badz+ra satwa/ rdo rje rgyal po bdag bsgom bya// dza badza rA dza/ rdo rje chags par bsam par bya// ra badz+ra rA ga/ khro bo legs pa bsgom
165a4(rgyud): par bya// sa sA d+hu/ de nas rdo rje rin chen no// oM badz+ra rat+na/ rdo rje gzi brjid de bzhin no// dz+wa la ya/ bdag nyid rdo rje rgyal mtshan sgom// de nyid rdo rje bzhad pa rnam par sgom// ha sa badz+ra
165a5(rgyud): hA sa da rdo rje chos ni bsgom par bya// sho d+ha ya/ rdo rje rnon po rnam par sgom// ts+tshin pa/ rdo rje rgyu ni 'khor lo tshe// pra be sha ya/ rdo rje smra ba rnam par sgom// b+hA Sha/ rdo rje las ni bsgoms par bya//
165a6(rgyud): kam rdo rje go cha rnam par sgom// rak+Sha/ rdo rje gnod sbyin bsgom par bya// khAd/ rdorje khu tshung rnam par sgom// bad gang dang gang la 'dod pa nyid// rigs kyi lha ni ci 'dra bar// rang
165a7(rgyud): bdag nyid ni bsgom par bya// de ni 'di yis skad cig 'grub// hUMd rdo rje phyag rgyas lan cig bcing // mkhas pas rdo rje bzlas pas brjod// ji skad bzlas pa'i rgyud du bshad// gzhan du khro
165b1(rgyud): bo gzung bar bya// yid kyis kyang ni brjod pa zhing // lus kyi phyag rgya bskul bar bya// dkyil 'khor gsum ni mnyam sbyor bas// skad cig de la mkhas pas sbubs// de nas nyams dga'/
165b2(rgyud): rdo rje'i rigs/ phyag rgya chen po grangs med pa// lus kyi phyag rgya yang dge ldan// gang phyir sems can snod min pa/ de yi phyir na nyung bar gsungs// phyag rgya chen po yongs bsdu ba// theg
165b3(rgyud): pa chen po mngon bsdus las// rgyud chen gsang ba zhes bya ba// rgyud der rab tu bshad pa yin// gsang ba'i cho ga 'di yis ni// rnal 'byor bya ba bsgrub par bya// rdo rje rnal 'byor sbyor ba yis/
165b4(rgyud): skad cig gis ni sangs rgyas 'grub// 'dir ni phan yon mang po dag/ rang gi las la nges par sbyar// gang zhig brtul zhing mngon par sbyor// skad cig gis ni sangs rgyas 'grub// mtshams
165b5(rgyud): med lnga po byed pa yang // zhugs nas mngon par brtson 'gyur zhing // rnal 'byor cho ga sgrub byed na// 'grub par 'gyur bar the tsom med// tshe 'di la ni rnal 'byor pas// rab tu dga' ba'i sa
165b6(rgyud): thob 'gyur// gang gis rdo rje can sbyor bas// gdon mi za bar sa thob 'gyur// bskal pa grangs med dka' ba ni// spyod pa'i bdag nyid med par min// rnal 'byor 'di la mngon par brtson//
165b7(rgyud): de bas sa ni rnyed dka' min// theg chen 'di ni gsang ba ste// sangs rgyas chos kyi tshul bstan pa// sangs rgyas byang chub snying po che// de las sa ni thob dka' min// g.yon brkyang cha lugs
166a1(rgyud): / gnas nas ni// khro ba'i tshig ni rab tu brjod/ khro ba'i ltabs yang dag khros// las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdo sde'i
166a2(rgyud): dbang po gsang ba'i rnal 'byor gsang ba de kho na nyid dam pa mchog tu gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po rdo rje rtse mo las/ khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba rnam par bshad pa gsum pa rdzogs so//
166a3(rgyud): rdo rje'i rigs las le'u dang po'o// de nas gsang ba dag ni kun bsdus mchog/ sems kyi dga' ba kun sbyor yang dag byung // bya ba byas shing mchog tu/
166a4(rgyud): rnam par mdzes// rdo rje dbang phyug thams cad rnam 'phrul tshogs// de nas sangs rgyas kyi ni rigs chen mchog/ rdo rje snying po'i thugs byung ba de ldan pa// shin tu gsang ba'i yon tan mchog bsdus
166a5(rgyud): pa da rdo rje rgyal po bud med gzugs can gyur// e ma'o bud med dga' ba che spyod pa// gsang ba kun tu bsdus pa las byung ba// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu 'jigs mi mnga'// de yis gsungs
166a6(rgyud): nas cang mi gsung bzhugs so// gzungs kyi dam tshig yang dag byung ba mchog/ ting 'dzin gnas nas chos nyid gsang ba ni// spyi bo rkang mthil kun bsdus bstan pa las// de yi rigs kyi dkyil
166a7(rgyud): 'khor tshogs dag byung // hrIH/ de nas dga' ba'i ming can dag kyang phyung // rdo rje bud med thugs las byung ba mchog/ gzugs khams mchog gi lha las shin tu 'das// rdo rje'i mtshams rnams
166b1(rgyud): mo'i tshig dag grag/ dga' bcas 'dzum pa dang ldan spyan mnga' ba// bzhad cing sgeg dang bcas pa'i nal ldan pa// tshangs sogs rigs kyi lha yi lha mo ste// yid 'ong dga' ba chen pos brgyal/
166b2(rgyud): 'gyur ba// lha mo rdo rje rnal 'byor ma de yang // 'khor me'i dbus su gnas nas rtog byed pa// de yi rigs bsdus mdzes shing yid du 'ong // rdo rje chen mo dze'i rmongs byed ma// oM sarba ta thA ga ta
166b3(rgyud): mahA rA ga mo ha na ya hi/ snying po sangs rgyas rmongs par byed pas gsungs// de bzhin gshegs pa mchog kyang rmongs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi dga' ba rmongs byed dga'// sangs rgyas
166b4(rgyud): gzugs dag yongs su bsgyur ba mchog/ rnam snang thub pa'i dbang phyug mchog de ni// bud med gzugs kyi sprul pa nyid du gyur// dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul chen po mchog de ni// 'khor gyi sring mo gang
166b5(rgyud): yin bzhi por gyur// oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ye sI/ de nas gsang ba'i brtan pa'i tshogs ni ba// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs skus kun khyab pa// rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang phyug rmongs byed bdag/ sangs
166b6(rgyud): rgyas btsun mchos nyid la bzhugs pa'i// sa ni rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur// 'od zer sna tshogs phrogs bcu dag tu gas la// lha mo lha dang bcas pa'i lha mo rnams// bil gyis mnan ci
166b7(rgyud): tu rgyas par 'gyu// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dang mtshungs lha mi'i tshogs// de dag rang gi gzhal las khang na gnas// de nas sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ba ni// gsang ba'i dbang phyug 'dzin pa /
167a1(rgyud): rdo rje dga' ba chen po rnam par dgod// gdug pa kun gyi dbang phyug yi ge hrI// snying po las byung chos nyid dag pa ste// rdo rje btsun mo bzhi dang dbus ma lnga// dkyil
167a2(rgyud): 'khor tshogs kyi shar phyogs cha la gnas// mi bskyod pa yi dbang phyug dam pa'i mchog/ de nas rdo rje rigs can las byung ba'i// shar gyi dkyil 'khor khro bcas dkyil 'khor bcas// mi bskyod
167a3(rgyud): dam pa'i bdag nyid can de yis// snying po skul ba'i mchog ni gsungs par gyur// snying po rab mchog 'byung ba gsungs par gyur// oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ye dzi/ oM badz+ra ro Sha e ku sha A na ya sarba da~M/
167a4(rgyud): oM badz+ra ro Shakarma badzan shi ma A na ya de dza~M/ oM badz+ra duSh+pa kro d+ha tiSh+Tha ya sarba dzi/ rin chen 'byung ldan de ni bud med gzugs// rin chen mchog tu yid du 'ong ba des// 'khor gyi snying po dag ni bzhi po gsu/
167a5(rgyud): oM badz+ra b+h+ri ku Ti kro d+ha ha ra ha ra sarba gar+b+ha dzi/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la mA la pra be sha ma hA kro d+ha ag+ni dz+wa la ya sarba ra bi sha dza Shi/ oM badz+ra d+hA dza a grA ke pU re ma hA kro d+ha di hi sarba dzi/ oM badz+ra ar+thaT+TA d+ha si ni hA sa ma ar+than+d+ra ha ra ha ra dzi/
167a6(rgyud): yi ge dzi ni shin tu brtan par gnas// snying po shin tu mchog tu gyur pa gsungs// rin chen dbang phyug dam pa de yis ni// snying po skul bar byed pa'i mchog dag gsungs// snying po mchog mtshungs dang
