167a7(rgyud): byung gsungs par gyur// 'od dpag med de bud med gzugs gyur pa// rdo rje btsun mo dam pa 'byung ba'i mchog/ snying po bzhi po dag ni gsungs par gyur// oM badz+ra shud d+hi ha na duSh+Ti d+hi/ oM tAk+Sha kro
167b1(rgyud): dz+re ts+tshin+da na sa rba ti / bal he sum hAkro d+ha pra be sha ya sarba d+hi/ oM badz+ra'i hA ma hA kro d+ha b+hA Sha ba tsa u ta ga rA ya d+hi// snying po rigs mchog brtan pa gsungs par gyur// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dbang dang ldan pa
167b2(rgyud): mchog/ 'od dpag med pa'i gsang mchog bstan pa ste// snying po bskul ba'i mchog ni gsungs par gyur// Ni dga' ba chen pos mtshan ma dag kyang phyung // don yod grub pa bud med gzugs
167b3(rgyud): gyur pas// las la shin tu bskul ba dang ldan te// 'khor gyi srin mo dag ni bzhi po gsungs// oM sarba mu khe karma badzi Ni ma hA kro d+ha ku ru sarba Ni/ oM badz+ra ka btsa kro ti rak+Sha ma/ oM badz+ra
167b4(rgyud): ma hA yak+Shi Ni badz+ra daMSh+Ta ka rA le bi la ba ga sarba Ni/ oM badz+ra muSh+Ti badz+ra kro d+he ni/ de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dag/ mchog tu gsang ba bsdus pa dga' chen po// dbus kyi gtso ba'i dkyil
167b5(rgyud): 'khor skul byed pa// las kyi btsun mo'i snying po mchog 'di gsungs// hUM dbus kyi gsang ba sna tshogs 'byung 'gyur ba// gtso bo 'di dag rnam par snang mdzad gsungs// oM badz+re shwa rI hUM/ oM raH
167b6(rgyud): shwa rI hU~M/ oM pad+me gA rI hUM/ oM ka me shwa rI hUM/ rdo rje rgyal po dang bcas bskul ba las byung gang yin pa// rdo rje btsun mo rnal 'byor bzhi yi dbus kyi dbang phyug nyid du gnas// rdo rje rin chen chos ldan btsun
167b7(rgyud): mo yan lag mdzes pa dang ldan pa// 'di ni gsang ba'i tshogs las gzhan du rnal 'byor mchog ni 'ga' yang med// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu 'jigs mi mnga'// de ni rang gi 'khor tshogs dbus na
168a1(rgyud): bzhugs dang des ni brtse dang phan pa'i sems kyis ni// rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog gsungs gyur// de nas 'khor lo 'grong khyer bstan byas nas// khams gsum nas/
168a2(rgyud): par rgyal ba'i bdag nyid de// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug btsun mo yi// dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i rnal 'byor yang dag bri// 'khor lo rnam pa gnyis su sbyar bar bya// de bzhin grong khyer 'di ru yang dag
168a3(rgyud): 'ong ba dang // yang na ji ltar 'dod bzhin yang dag bri// de yang phyag rgya dag gi tshogs dang bcas// sgom par 'os pa rdo rje yang dag bri// yang na gsang ba'i chos kyis mchod gyur pa// nga ni gzugs dang
168a4(rgyud): ldan pa yang dag bri// dbus kyi rim par rdo rje sems dpa' bzhugs// zhags pa dang ldan 'khor gyi phyag rgya bcas// rdo rje 'bar ba nor bu pad+ma las// 'bar ba dang bcas me dang ldan par gzhas/
168a5(rgyud): shar gyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo lnga yi bdag nyid che// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gang du mi bskyod gtso// rdo rje'i phyag rgya che dang rol par gyur// dbang phyug chen po rtse gsum ldan non mchog/ de nas phyogs
168a6(rgyud): bzhi'i gnas dag dang // rdo rje lcags kyu mda' dang dga' ba dag/ 'bar ba'i me yi 'od zer yang dag ldan// 'bar ba'i dbus na gnas pa'i phyag rgya lnga// de nas rin chen rigs ni yid 'ong ba
168a7(rgyud): rdo rje'i dbus na rdo rje rin chen bzhugs// de nas phyogs bzhi yi ni gnas dag tu// rin chen gzi brjid rgyal mtshan bzhad phyag rgya// de bzhin pad+ma'i rigs ni yid 'ong la// rdo rje pad+ma'i phyag rgya ste/
168b1(rgyud): de nas phyogs bzhi'i mtshams dag tu// pad+ma ral gri 'khor lo de bzhin smra// de bzhin las kyis byas pa'i rigs de las// rdo rje rnon po me chen dang ldan pa// de yi phyogs bzhi'i mtshams ni brtan pa/
168b2(rgyud): rung las dang gnod sbyin srung ba khu tshur rnams// de las rgya chen gzugs kyi tshogs dag la// rdo rje btsun mo'i mchog drag mkha' 'gro ma// 'bar ba'i mche ba chen po 'jigs rugasas/ dbus na
168b3(rgyud): nyi ma 'bar bar ldan// sa dag srung ba'i tshe gar bcas// rgya cher gzhung mchog rtag tu blta bar bya// sbyang dang dbab pa'i las rnams thams cad ni// yan lag mchog ldan dam pa nas gzung bya//
168b4(rgyud): de nas phyag rgya phyag rgya'i yan lag bslab// mchod pa'i phyag rgyas mchod pa'i phyag rgyar brjod// de nas sgo dang mtshams bcas dkyil 'khor du// btsun mo dag pas gnar ljags gnod sbyin
168b5(rgyud): mchog de nas sgor 'jug pa yi tshogs la ni// badz+ra dzang / dgug pa'i pheg rdob sprin ni rgya che ba// badz+ra d+hu hUM/ de bzhin 'ching ba'i chos ni ster byed pa// brdza za ba/ de nas ye shes chos nyidarna
168b6(rgyud): tshogs pa// badz+ra a a/ de nas gsang ba'i sgeg pa dang bcas mchog/ badz+ra hUM khaM/ de nas yan lag 'phreng ba sna tshogs ldan// badz+ra hUM g+hu/ de nas gru blang ba dang rol ma dag/ ba dza hUM ta/
168b7(rgyud): de bzhin gzhan dag dkyil 'khor dbang phyug mchog/ badz+ra hUM ste/ de nas phyi rol me tog rgya chen po// badz+ra ti te/ de bzhin rol cha stong phrag dag brdungs pa// badz+ra Ta taM/ spos dang dri ldan rim
169a1(rgyud): bdag zis/ bang / danas / @/ rgyags rgya chags kyis dkrug pa// dpa' pas nas byu ngas
169a2(rgyud): ldan oM sid d+hi ya badz+ra/ un la badz+ra/ de nas chags pa'i sa dang 'dod chags pa// rA ga ya 'dza/ a hi badz+ra/ de bzhin nyi ma la lta ba dz+wa la ya badza/ rgyal mtshan gyi ni de hi badz+ra/ band
169a3(rgyud): pa'i ni hA sa badz+ra/ de bzhin rjes su chags pa ni kA ma ya badza/ ral gri gzung bar bya ba ni ts+tshe da ya badz+ra/ bzhan yang bskor ba yi ni b+h+ra ma ya badz+ra/ de nas tshig gi tsho gas dbyung ba bru hi badza/ las kyi
169a4(rgyud): mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i tshogs ni t+yai badz+ra/ de nas go cha'i ni rak+Sha badz+ra/ de bzhin du bza'i ba'i ni khA hi badz+ra/ yid 'ong lus ni brtan par bcing bar bya// ban d+ha ya badz+ra/ de nas ye
169a5(rgyud): shes kyi ni de bzhin brkyang // de nas khros pa'i yid kyis bskul bar bya// so dag gis ni ma mchu bsdam par bya// de bzhin mig dag kyang ni btsum par bya// de nas khro bo'i ting 'dzin sgom//
169a6(rgyud): gsang ba'i phyag rgya dag gis bdud bzhi bcom// de nas rdo rje'i tshig gi snying po brjod// phyag rgya'i tshogs ni rnam pa sna tshogs bslab// lus kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs dag ni// theg pa chen po mngon
169a7(rgyud): bsdus las// rdo rje sems dpa'i bka' bzhin du// rgyas pa ru ni yongs su brjod// gsang ba mchog rdzogs so// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// kun mchog
169b1(rgyud): gnas kyi dbang phyug ni// rdo rje phra mo la bzhugs nas// rdo rje phra mo brjod par gyur// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sUSh+Ta badz+ra kro d+hakra ma hUM phaT/ bdag nyid sangs rgyas gzugs su ni/ ban pa'i don du
169b2(rgyud): rnam bsam bya// rdo rje phra mo 'di yis ni// sems ni zhi ba nyid du gyur// oM sUk+Sha badz+ra kro d+ha kra ma dz+ra/ rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po// bdag nyid yongs su bsgom par bya// rdo rje phra mo 'di yis ni//
169b3(rgyud): rang sems skad cig gis 'dul 'gyur// oM sUk+Sha badz+ra rat+na kro d+ha kra ma d+hu baT/ rdo rje rin chen rang bdag nyid// mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas chos ni gyur thob cing // rin chen kuH
169b4(rgyud): mchog btso bor 'gyur// oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra d+harma kro d+ha kra ma hUM phaT/ bdag nyid dag ni rdo rje chos// gzod nas dag pa rnam par sgom// gsung gi phyag rgya 'di yis ni// rdo rje chos dang mtshungs par
169b5(rgyud): 'gyur/ oM sUk+Sha badz+ra karma kro d+ha kra ma hUM phaT/ bdag nyid rdo rje las su ni// yang dang yang du bsgom bya zhing // rdo rje sngags kyis bskul nas ni// rdo rje las dang mtshungs par 'gyur// dbang
169b6(rgyud): bskur ba yi sems dpa' che// 'khor los sgyur ba bzhi po ru// rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom byas na// dbang bskur ba yang thob par 'gyur// hUM/ oM sUk+Sha wA na kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ rdo rje rgyal po rang
169b7(rgyud): bdag nyid// rnam par bsgoms na rengs par 'gyur// snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni// sangs rgyas thams cad kun tu dgug/ oM sUk+Sha badz+ra a ku sha a kaR+Sha ya ma hA kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ mda' 'geng
170a1(rgyud): pa yi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje chags pa bsgom par bya// snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rjes chags pa// oM sUk+Sha badz+ra kro d+ha ma nu rA ga ya s+thAbaT/
170a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byas shing // bdag nyid kyang ni rnam par sgom// rdo rje dga' ba bdag nyid de// rdo rje dngos grub thob par 'gyur// oM sUk+Sha badz+ra duSh+Ti kro d+ha hUM phaT/ rdo rje rin chen
170a3(rgyud): rgyal po nga// bdag bskur ba ni brtan pa'i mchog/ rdo rje sngags kyis bskul byas nas// rdo rje rin chen mtshungs par 'gyur// oM sUk+Sha badz+ra b+h+r-i ku TI kro d+ha ha ra ha ra hUM phaT/ rdo rje gzi brjid ting
170a4(rgyud): 'dzin gyis// rtag tu bdag nyid 'bar bar bya// phyogs rnams kun tu longs spros nas// rdo rje sngags ni rab tu bskul// oM sUk+Sha dz+wa la maN+Da la kro d+ha sUr+ya dz+wa la hUM phaT/ sbyin pa rin chen rgyal
170a5(rgyud): mtshan du// rtag tu bdag nyid rnam par bsam// sems can thams cad dag bya zhing // rdo rje sngags ni rab bskul zhing // oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra d+h+wa dza kro d+ha sarba AHd+hU me pra yats+tsha hU~M phaT/ chos chen po yi
170a6(rgyud): bzhad pa band// rdo rje bzhad pa bdag brtan pa'i// rdo rje sngags kyis bskul bya zhing // bdag nyid kho na chos kyi gsung // oM sUk+Sha badz+ra hA sa kro d+ha ha ha hUM phaT ha ha/ gzod nas ni bskye ba med/
170a7(rgyud): chos rnams thams cad nam dag pa// bdag nyid rdo rje chos rgyal po// rdo rje tshig gis lan cig brjod// oM sUk+ka badz+ra kro d+ha ya sho d+ha hUM phaT/ shugs can ral gri dag gi tshogs// rdo rje rnon po shin tu
170b1(rgyud): btan// oM swak+ka par rje dkro btsun tsun da tshulan/ chos kyi 'khor la bskor byas nas// de ma la khor mo dang mtshungs 'gyur// oM bar sdug pa 'gyugyur lo d+ha tsag tsa ni pA ta a tha ra/ tha bes/
170b2(rgyud): hr-id la snying rngu baT nga ni rjong byed brjod bya min// bdag ni rdo rje smra ba brtan// chos 'dod pa nyid brtan byas nas// rdo rje sra ba thob par 'gyur// oM sUk+Sha bar d+hu kA ra kro d+ha ha ra pa tsa ya a pu dze/ hUM
170b3(rgyud): paT/ sangs rgyas thams cad mchod bya zhing // rdo rje las ni brtan par brtag/ rdo rje tshig gis chos bshad ni// rdo rje las ni thob par 'gyur// oM sUk+Sha badz+ra karma kro d+ha sarba kAr+ya hr-i da ya hUM phaT/
170b4(rgyud): bdag ni rgyal po byams pa che// rdo rje srung ba brtan pa'i bdag/ rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom byas nas// ngan 'gro thams cad nyams par 'gyur// oM sUk+Sha badza ka ba tsa kro d+ha rak+Sha hUM phaT/ sdig pa
170b5(rgyud): thams cad bza' bya zhing // rdo rje srung bsgom par bya// rdo rje sngags ni bskul byas na// rdo rje nyon mongs thams cad 'joms// oM sUk+Sh+ma ba dza yak+Sha par b+hak+Sha sarba duk+ka badza yak+Sha hU~M phaT/
170b6(rgyud): khu tshur rgyal po bdag/ byang chub sems ni rjes su dran// bgegs rnams thams cad bcing byas na// rdo rje khu tshur dang mtshungs 'gyur// oM sUk+Sha badz+ra muSh+Ti ban d+ha ban d+ha hUM phaT/ sna yi rtse mo'i
170b7(rgyud): sems de ni// brtan par byas nas yang dag brtsam// yi ge hUM nyid sbyor byas na// nyon mongs thams cad rnam nyams 'gyur// hUM dang po snying kha sna rtse ru// brtan par byas nas de rang bzhin/
171a1(rgyud): mtshan ma de ni spo byas nas// nad sogs dgra ni 'jigs par 'gyur// nA sha ya badz+ra n+du/ sems de brtan par byas nas kyang // rnal 'byor 'dzin pas spro bya zhing
171a2(rgyud): shes rab can gyis khro ba dag brtsam// gnas ngan dag ni nges par 'jig/ bi nA sha ya sarba badz+ra hUM/ rnal 'byor rig pas ji srid 'dod// mtshan ma de ni bsdu bya na// ma lus sdig pa thams cad ni/
171a3(rgyud): nyams shing 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// oM sUk+Sha badz+ra pra t+ya shI g+h+ra~M hUM/ gsal bar phyogs rnams ma lus par// sems can kun la byams pa spro// ji srid rdo rje spro byas pa// de srid sems
171a4(rgyud): can bde bar 'gyur// b+hai ra ba badz+ra kro d+ha hUM phaT/ kye ma'o mgon meng sems can ni// 'jigs pa las ni skyob pa dag/ snying rjes sems de spro bar bya// rdo rje ye shes thob par 'gyur// karu
171a5(rgyud): rdza badz+ra kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun snying po// sems can thams cad gzod nas dag/ e ma'o bde ba ema'o chos// phyogs rnams kun tu yongs su spro// hUM kA ra bi shudad+ha
171a6(rgyud): paT/ 'khor ba'i sems can la dmigs nas// bde ba dang bcas btang snyoms bya// btang snyoms sbyor ba 'di yis ni// sems can rnams la yongs su spro// oM bi sho d+ha badz+ra kro d+ha dz+nyA baT/
171a7(rgyud): ngo rje'i gzugs ni yang dag bris// gang gi steng du nges bzhag pa// de nyid kyis ni dri ma'i tshogs// thams cad rnal 'byor pa yis 'joms// hUM badza pra brta/ gang la byang chub sems nyid ni/
171b1(rgyud): rjes su dran pas rab pa pa nas// sems can rnams sangs rgyas kyi// byang chub nyid na thob par 'gyur// rtsu ba d+his za ba ta/ phyagan do na rjes dran nas/ dag pa'i chos cing pab byas nas/
171b2(rgyud): sems can de yis bde ba ni// dam pa thob 'gyur the tsom med// hUM badz+ra d+ha ra pra brta/ rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam par sgom// sangs rgyas chos rnams pab/
171b3(rgyud): byas na// 'jigs pa nges par 'byung mi 'gyur// hUM bud d+ha pra brta/ zla ba rdo rje rang bzhin dngos// bskyed pa bzhin du bsgom byas na// tho bzang zla ba rdo rje mtshungs// myur du mkha' la
171b4(rgyud): bar 'gyur// bud d+ha pra brta ya hUM/ zla ba'i dbus su rang bdag nyid// sgom ning gang la phab byas pa// sems can de rnams mi ldog par// 'gyur ba ru ni the tsom med// satra pra brta ya ts+tsha
171b5(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje rang bdag nyid// mkhas pa yis ni bsgom bya zhing // gang du phab pa'i gnas de ni// dpal dang bde ba 'phel bar 'gyur// myur ba nyid du the tsam med// badz+ra satwa pra brta ya hUM/ sangs/
171b6(rgyud): rgyas gzugs su rang bdag nyid// mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom bya zhing // rdo rje de ni gar bab pa// rdzu 'phrul rgya ni chen por 'gyur// bud d+ha pra brta ya hUM/ rdo rje khro za snyoms 'jug pas// rang /
171b7(rgyud): gi lus ni rab bskor ba// gang gi ming gis byas pa de// the tsom med par byang chub thob// oM badz+ra ba li ta kro d+ha mA ra ya hUM/ dbugs ni 'byung dang rngub pa la// yi ge hUM ni rab sbyor zhing // rdo rje khro ba
172a1(rgyud): sboms 'jug pas// 'dod chags la sogs nyes pa gzhom// oM badz+ra shA pa pi pa ta la hUM ba Ta/ rdo rje lta bas blta bya zhing // rdo rje khro bo rab sbyor bas// sems can gang la ba/
172a2(rgyud): byas na// de ni 'khor ba las grol 'gyur// oM badz+ra dr-ib+hI bi nA sha ya hUM phaT/ lus ngag gi ni bdag nyid gnas// rang sems 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems ni rjes dran na// des kyang sangs
172a3(rgyud): rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// hUM hr-i da ya A ka rA ya badz+ra kro d+ha hUM phaT/ rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal por// mkhas pa yis ni bdag nyid sgom// 'bar ba yis ni khyab pa'i sku// rdo rje sgom pa 'grub par 'gyur//
172a4(rgyud): hUM gsang ba'i bdag po kun gyi snying po'i sngags ni gsungs par gyur// de nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i rnal 'byor dbang po rtog par mdzad// gdul bya min la shin tu 'phrog cing 'dul bya la chags spo/ gas
172a5(rgyud): 'dzin mchog gi dbang po bslab pa rnam par rol pa'i so// sUk+Sha rdzogs so// / gsang ba skar ma nyi zla ste// rdo rje dam tshig brjod par bya// rnam rtog gis brtags mdzes
172a6(rgyud): gyur pa// de nas mchod pa'i cho ga bshad// bdag nyid sangs rgyas gzugs dang ni// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul rab tu sgom// dang po sbyor byung ji skad bshad// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod
172a7(rgyud): par bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra karme shwa ri hUM/ rang gi snying khar byang chub sems// sangs rgyas kun gyi tshogs bsams nas// mchod pa yi ni mchog 'di yis// 'dren pa tham cad mchod par/
172b1(rgyud): dru dbang phyug chen po dang bcas pa// lha rnams thams cad dgug bya zhing / bdag nyid rdo rje khro ba yas// khro bo'i mchod pas rab tu mchod/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza kam sa ma ya bi d+hi bi sA /
172b2(rgyud): trai lo kya bi Sha le shwa ra sarba duthAn ma hA sa ma ya badzi hUM khro gnyer can kun nga bdag nyid// khro bo rin chen gyis bsgom bya/ sangs rgyas thams cad 'jigs bya zhing // rin chen mchod pas rab tu
172b3(rgyud): mchod/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ka pA sha sa ma ba s+pha ra Na ma hA pU dza A ka rA ya bi d+hi bi stA ra sa ma ya hUM/ chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par snang // rdo rje chos ni brtan pa bdag/ chos kyi mchod par rab
172b4(rgyud): mchod pas// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma d+hA tu s+pha ra Na ma hA pU dza bi d+hi bi stA ra sa ma ya hUM/ bdag nyid rdo rje las nyid ni// sangs rgyas rna 'phrul bsgom par bya//
172b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad mchod bya zhing // las kyi mchod pas rab tu mchod// oM sarba ta thA ga ta lo ka d+hA tu dzI bi ta ma hA karma pU dza bi d+hi bistA ra sa ma ya hUM/ phyag na rdo rje bdag rdo rje// de bzhin gshegs
172b6(rgyud): rnams dgug par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' rab mchod pas// mchod pa ru ni bsgom par bya// oM badz+ra satwa sid+d+hi dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM dza/ rdo rje lcags kyu brtan pa'i mchog/ rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom
172b7(rgyud): par bya// sgom pa bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas thams cad dgug par bya// oM badz+ra A kaR+Sha dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM dza/ rdo rje chags pa bdag nyid de// bkug pa rnams ni mnyes par bya// rje
173a1(rgyud): rje chags pas rab mchod pas/ bsgrub par bya zhes yang dag sbyar// oM badz+ra ra ti rA ga sa ma ye hUM / rdo rje legs pa rang bdag nyid/ skom ni nga rgyal ba mnyes par gyu
173a2(rgyud): rdo rje legs pas rab mchod pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad dgug par bya// oM badz+ra swa d+hu ka mnA na sa ma ye hUM dza/ rdo rje rin chen rgyal po che// rang bdag nyid ni bsgom par bya// de bzhin
173a3(rgyud): gshegs rnams dpab bya zhing // rin chen char ni kun tu dbab// oM badz+ra b+ha ku TI ba shI ku ru hUM/ rdo rje nyi mar rang bdag nyid// 'od zer 'phreng ba dang ldan sgom// sangs rgyas rnams ni dbang /
173a4(rgyud): bya zhing // phyogs rnams su ni 'od zer spro// oM badz+ra sUr+ya maN+Dal ba shrI ku ru hUM/ bdag ni rgyal mtshan sbyor ba che// de bzhin gshegs rnams dbang bya zhing // sems can bsam kun rdzogs
173a5(rgyud): par bya// rin chen rgyal mtshan rab tu mchod// oM badz+ra d+hA dzA gra ke yu re ba shI ku ru hUM/ ha ha zhes dgod bzhad bya zhing // rdo rje bzhad pa bdag nyid de// sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du bya/
173a6(rgyud): bzhad pa'i mchod pas rab tu mchod// oM badz+ra ar+tha hA se na pa shi ku ru hUM/ bdag ni pad+ma'i rgyal po nyid// btsun mo brtan pa rang byung ba// bdag gis sangs rgyas rjes chags bya// 'dod la chags
173a7(rgyud): pas rab tu mchod// oM badz+ra pad+ma rA ga ya hUM/ bdag ni rang nyid rnon po ste// shes rab pha rol phyin pa brtan// bdag gis nyon mongs gcad bya zhing // de bzhin gshegs rnams chags par bya//
173b1(rgyud): oM ba ra dIk+Sha rA ga ya d+hu/ lha mo rdo rje sgrol ma dag chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba/ bdag gis rdo rje can gnyis bya// 'dod chags brtan pas rab tu mchod// yo badz+ra maN+Da la rA ge rA ga ban+d+ha
173b2(rgyud): nam mkha'i lha mo chos smra ba/ brjod du med pa'i bdag nyid bstan/ dag pa'i chos la dga' bya zhing // de bzhin gshegs rnams mnyes par bya// oM bA ga rA ge rA ga la hUM/ bdag ni rang nyid /
173b3(rgyud): las yin te// phyogs rnams kun tu rab tu grag sa/ bdag ni nam mkha'i mdzod kyang yin// mchod pa'i char gyis rab tu mchod// oM badz+ra karma sa ma ye pU dza hUM/ bdag ni rang nyid srung ba ste/
173b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas byams pa brtan pa bdag/ bdag gis sangs rgyas mchod par bya// chos kyi mchod pas kun tu mchod// oM badz+ra ka ba tsa ban d+ha rak+Sha hUM bdag gis nyon mongs bza' bar bya/
173b5(rgyud): rdorje gnod sbyin brtan pa bdag bdag gis sangs rgyas mchod par bya// chos kyi mchod pas rab tu mchod// oM badza yak+Sha mA ra ya badz+ra da~MSh+TA hU~M phaT/ nga ni sangs rgyas byang chub yin// rdo rjebu
173b6(rgyud): tshur rang bdag nyid// phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo ste// las kyi mchod pas rab tu mchod// oM badz+ra karma muSh+Ta sing d+ha sid d+h+ya hUM phaT/ 'di 'dra'i sna tshogs mchod pa kun// ye shes gsang ba rab
173b7(rgyud): thob byed/ ma lus lha mas la dpa' kun// rgyal po'i bzhin rang snying hUM// sgeg mo 'phreng ba de bzhin gru// gar ma me tog sogs sbyor bas// sems dpa' la sogs lha mo dag/ shin tu srung
174a1(rgyud): pa'i mchod pa yin// mchod pa'o// / de nas las ni thabs chen po// gang gis myur du rab grub 'gyur// gang gis dga' ba la sbyor ba// sbyin sreg la/
174a2(rgyud): kyi cho ga'o// ji ltar sbyin sreg dngos grub kyis// las ni bla na med pa ltar// de bzhin rig pa'i las rnams kun// de lta bu ni byed pa min// sbyin sreg rnam pa mang ldan pa// mdo ru rngu/
174a3(rgyud): na rnam pa lnga// rgyas par rnal 'byor chen po yi// gsang ba'i mdo las rab tu bshad// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rnam 'phrul pa// ji ltar sbyin sreg rnam pa yis// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub/
174a4(rgyud): 'gyur ba// mdor ba sngas rab tu bshad par bya// sbyin sreg las ni rnam pa lnga// re re zhing yang rnam pa mang // zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa nyid// mngon spyod kyi ni gsum pa ste// dgug pa yang
174a5(rgyud): ni bzhi pa yin// lnga pa dbang dang yang dag ldan// sbyin sreg lnga po de rnams ni// dbang du byed pa mchog yin no// de nas thab khung rab bshad bya// sbyor ba ji bzhin sbyor bar bya// zhi la thab
174a6(rgyud): khung zlum po ste// kun nas yongs su zlum pa yin// rgyas pa la ni gru bzhi ste// mngon spyod la ni gru gsum yin// thab khung rdo rje'i rnam pa can// kun tu dgug par byed pa'i mchog/ de bzhin
174a7(rgyud): thab khung ring por bya// dbang du byed pa'i mchog yin no// de dag rnam pa lnga ru bshad// thab khung las ni bla na med// srod kyi dus su zhi ba bya// snga dro'i dus su rgyas pa'i las// nyi ma phyed nasangon
174b1(rgyud): spyod kyi// drag po'i las ni nges par bya// dgug pa dus rnams thams cad du// mtshan mo dbang du bya ba yin/ sbyor ba lnga po 'di yis ni/ mnyam par bzhag pas las rnams bya// gar du/
174b2(rgyud): kha bltas ni don du// rgyas pa byang du yang dag gnas// lho ru kha bltas gyur pa yis// mngon spyod kyi ni las rnams so// steng du kha bltas de bzhin dgug phyogs rnams kun tu bltas
174b3(rgyud): dbang bya// phyogs mtshams thams cad mnyam sbyor bsam// yang na nub kyi phyogs su bshad// zhi la sangs rgyas phyag rgya ste// rgyas la nor bu'i mtshan mas so// rdo rje khro bo mngon spyod la/
174b4(rgyud): dbang la pad+ma'i rigs kyis so// shin tu dgug pa dang ldan pa// rdo rje lcags kyu dgug pa la// sbyor ba lnga po 'di yis ni// sbyin sreg las ni rab tu sgrub// zhi ba'i shing ni mngar ba ste// rgyas par/
174b5(rgyud): bzhin 'bras bur bcas// tsha ba mngon spyod las dag la// dgug pa la ni tsher ma can// dbang la me tog bcas par bshad// de rnams yam shing go rims bzhin// sngon la yam shing rnam pa lnga//
174b6(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa yis yang dag sbyor// de la 'dam gyis byugs pa yi// shing la zhi ba rab tu bsgrags// gang du sdig pa rnam 'jig cing // kun tu 'khrug par bsregs 'gyur ba// bud shing mngar ba
174b7(rgyud): ngag gi me// mnyam par bzhag pas rab sbar nas// til mar gyis ni sbyin sreg byas// sdig pa thams cad sreg par 'gyur// oM sarba pA paM da ha na badz+rA ya swA hA/ bud shing mngar ba dag gis ni// shin
175a1(rgyud): tu mnyam par bzhag pas sbar// 'bras kyi sbyin sreg byas na ni// bsod nams tshogs ni 'phel bar 'gyur// oM badz+ra puSh+Ta ye swAhA/ bud shing mngar po dag gis ni// @nyam/
175a2(rgyud): par bzhag pas me sbar nas// mar bsnyugs ngur ba'i sbyin sreg gis// rdo rje tshe ni mngon 'phel gyur// oM badz+ra A yuShe swA hA/ yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni// dge ba 'byung bas me sbyar nas// ku
175a3(rgyud): sha'i myu gu til mar gyis// 'jig rten gsum yang srung bar 'gyur// oM a pra ti ha ta badz+rA ya swA hA/ sngon la zhi ba sbyar bar bya// dbus kyi gnyis la rgyas de bzhin// ni ba dang ni rgyas pa yi/
175a4(rgyud): sbyin sreg las ni dang bar 'gyur// shing ni tsha ba'i yam shing gis// mngon spyod kyi ni las ngag la// mngon spyod dang ni bcas pa yi// dgug pa la yang de nyid kyi// rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis//
175a5(rgyud): sngo la tsha ba'i yam shing gis// khros pas me ni rab sbar nas// mkhas pas tsher mas sbyin sreg bya// tsher ma dang bcas shing dag kyang // tsher ma can gyis nges par dgug/ gang dang gang ni 'dod
175a6(rgyud): gyur pa// sangs rgyas rnams ni nges par 'gugs// oM badz+ra A kaR+Sha ya dzaH/ bud shing me tog dmar sogs kyis// rab tu 'bar ba'i me sbar nas// me tog 'bras bu dmar po yang // sbyin
175a7(rgyud): byas na dbang byed mchog/ hUM badz+ra pA sha ya dza/ tsha ba'i yam shing dag bya zhing // rab tu drag pa'i me sbar nas// 'bras bu kha ba bsregs byas na// mngon spyod kyi ni mchog yin no// hUM badz+ra mA ra ya phaT/
175b1(rgyud): gsang ba'i sbyin sreg thams cad ni// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya// sbyin sreg 'khor lo cho ga yi// de nyid du ni'i bzhin gyur// yas shing tsha ba dag gis ni// shin tu drag pas me sbar nas/ 'dzin/
175b2(rgyud): rung ljags kyus sbyin sreg bya// gdug pa thams cad rab 'jigs 'gyur// oM badz+ra ban d+ha ya baT/ me tog dang bcas shing mel// rdo rje khro ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// sngags sogs 'bras bu'i sbyin
175b3(rgyud): sreg ni// dbang du byed pa'i mchog yin no// oM badz+ra ba shaM ka rA ya swA hA/ kha ba dang ni mngar ba nyid// yam shing mngar po sbyar bya zhing // 'dod pa'i me tog 'bras bsogs na// 'dod pa'i gzugs can
175b4(rgyud): mchog tu 'gyur// oM badz+ra kA ma rU pa Ne swA hA/ de nas bud shing de dag nyid kyis ni// rab tu khros pas me sbar nas// smyug ma'i 'bras bu phra mo bsregs// myur du mi snang nyid du 'gyur// oM badz+ra arbi
175b5(rgyud): sha ya swA hA/ shes rab bud shing de nyid kyis// drag po'i me ni rab sbar nas// nam mkha' stobs kyi me tog dag/ bsregs na nam mkhar 'gro bar 'gyur// oM badz+ra khe tsa ri ni swA hA/ de nas
175b6(rgyud): mngag gzhug pa dang g.yog/ bka' bzhin byed pa rab tu bskul// ci nas kyang ni myur 'grub pa'i// go rims bzhin du rab bshad bya// shing ni kha bos bud shing bya// thab khung rdo rje'i dbyibs
175b7(rgyud): su bko// khros pos rdo rje me tog sreg/ yi ge nga ni yongasu brjod// sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rdo rje'i sngags ni rab tu bskul// rdo rje me tog dag bsregs na// bka' byed mchog
176a1(rgyud): ni rnyed par 'gyur// oM badz+ra A dzA kA ra ya dza/ lam shing de dag nyid dang ni// thab khung de nyid brko bya ning // byang chub sems dpa'i dman ma gang // bsregs na bka' bzhin/
176a2(rgyud): byed par 'gyur// oM badz+ra ma ba sha ka ra ya / bung shing de dag nyid kyis me// kun tu thab khung de khon// rdo rje sems dpa'i dman ni// bsregs na bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur// rdub
176a3(rgyud): pA Ni ba sha~M ka rA ya / yang na sangs rgyas dman ma 'am// yang ra bdag dang mtshan ma dag/ sgrub pa'i sbyor bar sbyin sreg bya// sangs rgyas bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur// oM bud d+ha sha ka/
176a4(rgyud): ra ya dzaH/ tshig gi sbyor ba 'di yis ni// sbyin sreg bya zhing myur du 'grub// rdo rje'i sbyor bas dngos grub kun// the tsom med par 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje rigs la sogs kun kyang // de nas
176a5(rgyud): gsang ba phyag rgya che// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rab sgrub phyir// rnal 'byor chen po bsgrub par bya// rig pa gang zhig yid 'ong ba// sring mo'i rigs ni thob bya'i phyir// rig pa'i lha mo dang ldan
176a6(rgyud): par da shin tu rnal 'byor bsgrub par bya// bud med sdug dang lhan cig tu// mkhas pas 'jug pa bsten par bya// mdo sde gsang dbang rgyal po las// de nyid du ni ji skad bshad// kun tu
176a7(rgyud): gur kum phye ma dang // b+ha gar mig sman bcug nas ni// de yi sems dpa' shes par bya// gang phyir dgongs pa rab tu bsgrags// sdug pa de yi rig pa ni// mngon par 'dod pa gang yin 'ong //
176b1(rgyud): rang gi rigs kyi lha mo gang // de ni bud med ces byar grags// rig pa'i sbyor ba de yis ni// rang gi rigs kyi lha dag sgrub// mig sman la sogs gzhug pa ni// pad+ma'i steng du yang dag
176b2(rgyud): dgod/ b+ha ga pad+ma zhes bshad de// gzhug pa dgod par bshad par bya// b+ha ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// mig sman dag ni bsgrub par bya// b+ha gar mig sman gzhug pa ni// pad+ma'i steng du yang
176b3(rgyud): dag dgod// pad+ma dang ni lhan cig dgod// rnam pa bani ni 'grub par 'gyur// oM gu h+ya ra ti badz+ra shaM ka ri sid+d+hi hUM/ dro dang du ba 'bar dang rdul// rnam pa bzhi ni 'grub par 'gyur// oM gu h+ya badz+ra
176b4(rgyud): sid+d+hi hUM/ b+ha gar gi'u wang bzhag nas ni// gsang ba'i phyag rgya gzhag par 'gyur// mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi dag gis// dngos grub rnam pa bzhi ru bshad// oM gu h+ya badz+ra sid+d+hi hUM/ rdo rje sem/
176b5(rgyud): dpa'i phyag rgya yis// b+ha gar gur kum bcug nas ni// dag bcing de ni 'bar 'gyur na// rnam pa bzhi ni 'grub par 'gyur// oM badz+ra d+ha ra gu h+ya sid+d+hi hUM/ rdo rje bya ba'i sbyor ba dang // rdo rje phyag/
176b6(rgyud): rgya bsdus pa dang // rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug dang // rdo rje khu tshur sbyor ba dang // dam tshig mchog ni 'di dag dang // hU~M gi sor mo ra sbyor ba dang // chos kyi phyag rgya de bzhin 'dir// mo la sogs
176b7(rgyud): pa'i yi ge dang // sbyin sreg cho ga 'di yis ni// ye shes phyag rgya rab bsgrub bya// rgyas pa ru ni thams cad dag/ gsang ba'i rgyud du rab tu bshad// cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rdo rje slob dpon/
177a1(rgyud): dka' bru ba ches// tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas ni// mchog nyid sgrub par 'gyur ba yin// rdo rje rigs chen yid 'ong ba// rgyud chen kun las btus pa la// gang zhig mdo//
177a2(rgyud): par brtson 'gyur ba// de ni yod pa'i dngos grub 'gyur// tshogs ni bsags pa med pa dang // sangs rgyas mthong ba med pa ru// gsang ba'i snying po chen po 'di// thos pa tsam du'ang mi 'gyur
177a3(rgyud): ro/ gsang ba'i rnal 'byor gyi cho ga rdzogs so// / de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya bzhi// dkyil 'khor mkhas pas bslab par bya// ye shes de nyid gsang ba yang // yongs
177a4(rgyud): su sgrub pas rab tu bskor// shin tu gsang ba chen po ni// dngos po thams cad khyab la dgod// 'di ni rdo rje drag po bzhi// rang nyid lnga pa dang bcas pa// gsang ba'i brjod du med pa mchog/ ye
177a5(rgyud): shes mchog gi tshul thob byed// bde ba chen po rab grub don// dga' ba chen po shin tu brtan// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra sa ma ye hUM// hUM badz+ra ma Ta/ oM badz+ra pra ta b+h+ri ku TI badz+ra ra ta/ oM pad+ma badz+ra ti ta/
177a6(rgyud): oM badz+ra karma a tri kro d+ha/ shar dang lho yi phyogs cha dang // nub dang byang gi phyogs cha dang // dbus dang phyogs bzhi dag tu ni// sbyor bar phyag rgya dgod par bya// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/
177a7(rgyud): thams cad bri zhing dgod par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// mthong 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// ji skad bshad pa'i rnal 'byor bzhin// rdo rje rnal 'byor rjes sbyor skyes// rnal 'byor dag ni
177b1(rgyud): lhag dag dang / de dag thams cad brtan par bya// shin tu gsang ba de nyid che// mchog tu gsang ba de nyid mchog/ gsang ba chen po gsang ba 'dzin// rdo rje gsang ba brtan pa che// rig pa mngon par//
177b2(rgyud): 'dod 'gyur ba// rang gi lag gis yang dag bri// rgyal mo chen mo brjod byas na// dkyil 'khor du ni skad cig 'grub// oM sarba ta thA ga ta bi shu d+ha d+har ho// rang gis dkyil 'khor che bris nas/
177b3(rgyud): rig pa brjod pa la brtson bya// byams pas dgug pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'khor ba snying rje spyad par bya// oM bi shud d+ha d+heSh+Ta dzaH/ rang gis gsang sngags bris nas ni// bu mo'i mchu la 'o byas te//
177b4(rgyud): 'jig rten dbang phyug btsun mo che// shes rab pha rol phyin lha mo// oM swa b+hA ba bi shud d+ha mu khe hUM/ pha rol phyin drug spyod pa yis// byang chub spyod pa rab rnyed dka'// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor brtan
177b5(rgyud): gyur na// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni 'jug bya zhing // 'dod pa'i yon tan mchog lnga yis// rol cing dga' ba nyid du bya// mdo sde gsang dbang las bshad pa/
177b6(rgyud): gsang ba lnga ni rab sgrub pa// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ru bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ru brjod// 'dod pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// skal ba can gyis
177b7(rgyud): dngos grub thob// gsang ba de nyid chen po ste// rigs lnga dag ni rab sgrub pa// 'dod chags chen po rab sgrub phyir// rol cing rab tu dga' bar bya// bde ba chen po grub don du// spyod pa chen po tshul
178a1(rgyud): chen po// de nyid rnal 'byor kun bsdus pa// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// rdo rje hUM mdzad rnal 'byor gyis// rnal 'byor bya ba bsgrub par bya// ji ltar yi ge hUM
178a2(rgyud): las byung // gsang ba rgyal po chen po byed// rdo rje hUM mdzad sbyar ba yis// rnal 'byor bya ba bsgrub par bya// de ltar min na phyag rgya che// dam tshig ces bya gton mi 'grub// phyag rgya chen po
178a3(rgyud): mdor bsdus nas// rdo rje phyag rgya yongs su gzung // de na su grub pa'i phyag rgya che// grub pa cho ga yang dag gis// myur du rab tu 'grub 'gyur ba// rmang byung chen po rab bshad bya// oM sarba
178a4(rgyud): thA ga ta ba dz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang bar bzhugaso// phyag rgya chen po yongs su gzung // rdo rje sngags kyis bskul bya zhing // sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu sgrub// hUM badz+ra ma ta/ rdo/
178a5(rgyud): dzerje'i rig pa mchog rgyal po// bdag nyid yongs su bsgom bya zhing // sangs rgyas thams cad 'jigs byas na// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// oM b+h+r-i ku TI ba ra ta/ rang bdag nyid ni dbang
178a6(rgyud): bskur ba// rin chen phyag rgya yongs su gzung // rin chen char ni rab phab nas// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// oM pad+ma badz+ra hrI thaH/ shes rab can du rang bdag nyid// rdo rje spyan ni yongasu
178a7(rgyud): gzung // rdo rje sngags kyis bskul bya zhing // pad+ma'i rigs chen bskul bar bya// hUM karma badz+ra kri ti ta/ sna tshogs rdo rje rgyal po che// bya ba sna tshogs bdag nyid che// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod
178b1(rgyud): byas na// dngos grub las ni thob par 'gyur// bud med sdug dang lhan cig tu// dkyil 'khor dag ni yang dag bya// mdo sde gsang dbang rgyal po las// rnam pa bzhi ni rab tu byung // de nas mtshan/
178b2(rgyud): nyid sna tshogs yongs bsdus pa// rab tu spyan yangs dga' ba chen po mchog/ de bzhin tshegs dang rdo rje spyan ldan pa// shes rab spyan gyis btsun mo mchog chen ldan// oM badz+ra ka ma ho// ba
178b3(rgyud): hU~M dzU da ka Ta ma Ta/ ra khaT/ kar NA badz+rI gr-i/ ba ku ru/ badz+ra paT/ kar ra gri/ shud d+hi g+hi/ shud d+hi/ shung d+hakri/ budad+ha/ satwa rAng / rAg/ duSh+Ti/ rat+na/ te pa~M ke tu/ trA sa/ !ma/ tIk+Sh+Na/
178b4(rgyud): g+ho Sha / d+harma/ rak+Sha/ yak+Sha/ san+d+hi sid d+hi/ yo ga/ gu h+ya/ bi sha ka/ tsAr+ya/ tsa ri/ dz+nyA na/ ra tra/ suM b+ha/ taka kruM/ hUM phaT/ hUM baM/ hUM tsa/ hUM ma/ hUM sa/ hUM ha/ hUM hUM/ hUM dza/ hUM ho/ hUM sa/ hUM a
178b5(rgyud): g+huk+Sha/ dz+ha d+ha/ d+huH/ d+hud+hi/ d+hIH/ \u0f7f/ d+ham/ d+hA / d+hukaM/ d+huH/ d+huH/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma d+hi nAM/ oM sarba ta thA gA ta tsi kres/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pa~M shAH/ oM sar+b+ba tathAka tAHkr-i d+hA/ a
178b6(rgyud): pan ne a/ oM a nu ru te A/ oM a na li i/ oM nI li I/ oM rat+ne u/ oM rat+ta U/ oM sa u ra~M/ oM la e r-I/ oM a ta la/ oM a ha ra ra l-I/ oM a sha ne e/ oM b+haM ha g+haM e/ oM sarbA shA ba
178b7(rgyud): pU Ne o/ oM b+ha ra de oM/ oM s+pha ra Ne a/ oM bi shra aH/ oM ma ho tse pr-i ka/ oM tiSh+Tha kha/ oM a mu kha ga/ oM a b+hi She g+ha/ oM dz+nyA ne da/ oM ts+tshe da tsa/ oM bA rA hir+ya tsha/ oM b+ha she dza/ oM b+ha d+he d+ha/
179a1(rgyud): pra sha me nya/ oM kro d+hiT/ oM ha ra NeSha/ oM b+hI g+ha Na/ oM ka be \u0f7f/ oM a NuN/ oM Ta ki le ta/ oM bi su le tha/ oM d+hA ra Nid/ oM pa ta ke d+ha/ oM ba lo ka na/ oM tra te pa/ oM sarba/
179a2(rgyud): ha ra Ni pa/ oM b+hu sha ni ba/ oM b+hi ba sha ni b+ha oM A ri te ma/ oM a li ni ya/ oM tra tra ra/ oM b+hi sha la/ oM bud d+he wA/ oM d+ha ma sha/ oM ya ma b+he Sha/ oM sarbe sa/ o d+ha yi ni ha/ horba/ d+hu dza/ ha sa/
179a3(rgyud): oM a/ baha/ a ro/ ni bi/ ra sha/ trar d+hi/ b+hu ba/ sa ya/ a hi/ kroH/ d+ha ma sha/ b+ha ra ya/ yuk+ti/ dang shan/ rdzas ya/ he ma ny+dzu Ne/ d+ha ra Na/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa bi dzA ma hA mu Ne rA dza ga d+hoH
179a4(rgyud): dA kra ya hi hU~M hUM hUM hUM ha/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'di// mdo sde gsang dbang las gsungs pas// chos dbyings brtan pa'i rang bzhin te/ chos dang longs spyod rdzogs las byung /
179a5(rgyud): bde legs bsgom pa byas dang mtshungs pa med// e ma 'o gsang ba chen po gsang ba kun bsdus pa// rnal 'byor rgya cher bsdus pa'ang mtshungs pa med// bde ba chen po 'di ni brtan zhing brtan
179a6(rgyud): pa'i dngos por 'gyur// dga' ba chen po'i slob dpon dga' chen nyi ma ste// mchod 'os gsang ba'i tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor kun bsdus pa// kun mkhyen gsung las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor
179a7(rgyud): kun bsdus pa// tshogs rgyas rab tu 'phel bar gyur pa gsungs pa yin// rdo rje chen po skal ba ches// gsang ba thams cad rjes su bslab// de nyid chos ni rnal 'byor che// stug po bsdus
179b1(rgyud): par 'jug par bya// brgya dang sum cu rtsa drug lhag/ tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor kun bsdus pa// pri dang rdor tshig yi ge yis// dkyil 'khor gsang ba bslab par bya// rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor
179b2(rgyud): kun bsdus pa// dkyil 'khor gsang ba 'di ru ni// de nyid yi ge rnams dag pa'i// rnal 'byor chen po 'jug par bya// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyad//
179b3(rgyud): thig pa nI dang ni yang dag ldan// dar gyi chun pos rnam par brgyan// rdo rje dbyings sogs sbyor ba yis// stug po gsang ba shin tu brtan// de nyid gsang ba bslab bya'i phyir// shes rab can
179b4(rgyud): gyis dkyil 'khor bslab// e ma'o dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor kun bsdus pa// rdo rje dbyings sogs sbyor ba yis// mkhas pas yang dag bri zhing dgod//
179b5(rgyud): gru ba ni mnyam par rim pa ni// de nyid kyi ni nang du bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus kyi char// sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// ci rigs par ni yang dag bri/
179b6(rgyud): dngos bzhi'i rang bzhin dkyil 'khor la// yi ge sum cu rtsa drug dgod// sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun tu// yi ge bcu drug yang dag bri// yi ge bcu drug rgyal po ni// phyag rgya'i tshogs dang 'od
179b7(rgyud): bcas pa// dkyil 'khor chen po'i logs bzhi ru// yi ge rnams ni yang dag bri// yi ge sum cu sum cu ni// phyogs rnams kun tu dgod par bya// sangs rgyas thugs ka'i dbus su ni// yi
180a1(rgyud): ge hUM ni sbyar bar bya// gang zhig sbyor ba'i ming can gyi// sangs rgyas dbus su dgod par bya// rdo rje yi ge rab sbyor byed// shes rab can gyis yi ge rnams// rdo che'i rig pa
180a2(rgyud): 'dzin pa yis// dbus su rdo rje rdo rje bzhi// shar du yi ge sum cu bri// yi ge sum cu de bzhin lhor// sum cu byang gi phyogs cha ru// nub tu sum cu sbyar bar bya// yi ge bcu drug yang dag sbyor/
180a3(rgyud): dbus su sangs rgyas bzhi ldan bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin rnal 'byor che// rnal 'byor dbang phyug dbang phyug che// dpal ldan 'jig rten rnon po bldan// dbab pa brtan pa'i tshogs gyur pa// smra ba las
180a4(rgyud): byubyang rgyal ba che// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor 'jug par bya// u ro te ko ta ma hAr+ya yo d+har+ya yo d+har+ya bI ra te nA ma ne/ de nas sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rdo rje 'khor lo gzhug par bya// ha ha ho ho ga sang chen po'i//
180a5(rgyud): rtse gsum ral pa gsum 'dzin pa// rgya chen gzi brjid chen po'i don// rdo rje thig gis yongs su bskor// slob dpon chen pos blta byas nas// yi ge rab tu brjod par bya// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor
180a6(rgyud): 'khor lo yis// rdo rje'i 'khor lo kun tu spro// a A'i rnal 'byor yang dag gzung // i I dbang phyug chen po'i 'od // u U rnon po 'chang ba ste// e e sgra dbyangs rab bskul ba// oM ma
180a7(rgyud): skyabs byed rtsigs chen po// oM aHshes rab ston bzang ba// rdo rje lcags kyu 'di yis kyang // rdo rje 'chang ni bkul bar bya// ji ltar 'khor lo ji ltar rigs// ri 'os risar rdo rje'i tshegs/
180b1(rgyud): de bzhin 'khor lo yangs su dgod/ rdo rje slob dpon dga' thub che// skal ba chen po gsang ba 'di/ rdo rje 'khor ma yang dag sbyor// rnam 'phrul de ni rab tu bsgo ba 'khor lo dbab dang gsum/
180b2(rgyud): pa dang // cho ga ji bzhin 'jug par bya// rdo rje dbyings sogs dkyil 'khor du// rgyas par ji ltar snyan pa bzhin// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang // 'khor lo dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa
180b3(rgyud): 'khor lo'i gnas ni dbang du 'gyur// chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag ldan// rdo rje 'gugs dang skal ldan dang // nges byed rin chen gzi brjing dang // rgyal mtshan bzhad pa yang dag ldan// chos dang /
180b4(rgyud): rnon po gtso bo mchog/ rgyu dang gtum po drag po che// las dang srung ba gnod sbyin grub// sna tshogs sbyor ba yang dag ldan// 'khor lo'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'gyur// de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis//
180b5(rgyud): rje 'khor lo kun tu bri// rdo rje 'dzin kun slob dpon gyis// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni gzhug par bya// bu dang slob ma min pa la// gsang ba'i tshogs chen sbyin mi bya// gzhan du skal ba dang ldan pa/
180b6(rgyud): gzhung 'di khyod kyis ci bder byin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po shin tu gsang ba'i rnal 'byor mchog tu gsang ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdo rje rtse mo las
180b7(rgyud): rdo rje rigs kyi de kho na nyid shin tu gsang ba'i bshad pa ste le'u bzhi pa rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bcas pas
181a1(rgyud): slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rdo rje sems dpa' la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab par gyur to// rdo rje hUM mdzad rdo rje mchog/ rdo rje mcho
181a2(rgyud): 'dzin rdo rje'i mda'// rdo rje khro gnyer rdo rje'i lus// rdo rje 'bar ba rgyal mtshan che// rdo rje gad rgyangs rdo rje'i bdag/ rdo rje sde ste chos mchog 'dzin// rdo rje rgyal mtshan shin tu no// rdo rje 'khor lo
181a3(rgyud): bzlas pa che// las kyi rdo rje rdo rje che// rdo rje gnod sbyin 'jigs chen po// rdo rje phrag rgya sgra chen po// rdo rje khu tshur btan pa che// rdo rje 'bar ba rdo rje che// las chen po ste mda' chen po// rdo rje
181a4(rgyud): legs pa dga' ba che// rdo rje rgyan ni 'phrog byed pa// rdo rje 'ong de rgyal mtshan che// rdo rje tshems ni rab dga' ba// rdo rje bad+ma shin tu gcod// rdo rje dkyil 'khor rdo rje rig/ rdo rje lpags te sna tshogs /
181a5(rgyud): sna tshogs mtshon chen skye dgu mda'// go cha chen po rdo rje sku// rdo rje mche ba 'jigs byed pa// rdo rje bsdams pa rdo rje che// rdo rje khro bo gzhu chen po// rdo rje lcags kyu mdzod chen po// nags pa chen /
181a6(rgyud): dbang chen po// rdo rje lcag sgrog 'bebs pa che// rdo rje dbab pa 'jigs byed pa// yi ge dza ste yi ge hUM// yi ge hUM ni dam du 'ching // yi ge ho ste yi ge haH/ rdo rje phyag rgya dregs pa mchog/ rdo rje
181a7(rgyud): sems dpa' khro bo che// lcags kyu bsdigs me rdo rje khro// rdo rje bdud de bdud kyi mchog/ bdud kyi bdud ni rab 'joms pa// rdo rje dga' bzhi pa che// rdo rje dka' thub shis mdzad pa// rdo rje
181b1(rgyud): drag po gan tu gdug / rdo rje dang dbang rdo rje mdzad// rdo rje 'dod ba khro ba che// rdo rje sgra ste sgra chen po// sangs rgyas hUM mdzad yi ge hUM/ yi ge baT sogs dang mnyam pa// yi ge daT ni 'bar ba
181b2(rgyud): bka' yi ge swA hA rang bzhin med// gtso bo gsod dang srong mdzad pa// dri med skrag dang dbus 'byin mdzad// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas khro bo che// khro ba rdo rje de bzhin gshegs// 'dod
181b3(rgyud): chags las byung de bzhin nyid// rdo rje khro bo khyod phyag 'tshal// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di// nyin re bzhin du lan cig ni// gang zhig 'don par byed pa de// dngos grub mchog ni thob
181b4(rgyud): par 'gyur// de dag la ni 'jigs pa med// 'phongs dang bran dag nyid mo 'gyur// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bstan pa// dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// dpa' bo khyod la gsol
181b5(rgyud): ba 'debs// gdug pa rnams ni 'dul ba dang // de bzhin sems can don bya'i phyir// tshul chen bskyed par mdzad du gsol// gsang ba'i rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rdo rje rtse mo zhes bya ba rdzogs
181b6(rgyud): so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje slob dpon chen po karma badz+ri'i zhal snga nas dang / lo tsa ba dge slong gzhon nu tshul khrims kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o// bam po bcu
181b7(rgyud): gnyis pa'o// @rgya gar skad du/ sarba ra ha s+yo nA ma tan+da rA dza/ bod skad du/ thams cad gsang ba zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po// bcom ldan
182a1(rgyud): 'das ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'byung lnga nyid kyis lnga yi bdag nyid can// mi rnams lus la nges par mthong ba dag/ rang sems rab tu bsgoms par/
182a2(rgyud): gyur na ni// dngos der bsgoms pas nges par sangs rgyas 'gyur// rab shes gsang ba dam pa ni// sangs rgyas ye shes bla med de// gnyis med gnyis kyi tshul can te// sangs rgyas rtag pa/
182a3(rgyud): rab tu 'dud// yang dag bdag med las byung zhing // gnyis med ye shes las byung ba// sdug dang mi sdug rnams spangs pa// ci la'ang phyag ni mi 'tshal to// ma skyes pa ni yang dag bskyed//
182a4(rgyud): skyes pa'i 'og tu rtag par ni// sangs rgyas skur ni sgom pa de// rang gi ye shes mchog phyag 'tshal// rnal 'byor pa dang sems can kun// ma skyes pa ni yang dag bskyed// skyes pa'i 'og tu
182a5(rgyud): rtag par ni// nyon mongs bag chags kyis sun 'byin// lus can rnams ni 'khor gyur pa// sdug dang mi sdug rnam 'byed yin// sems gang de nyid sdug bsngal te// sems can rnams kyi lus 'byung
182a6(rgyud): ngo sems de yi ni rgyun nyid kyis// 'gro ba sdug bsngal gnod par 'gyur// rnam par snang mdzad rgyal po mgon// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdus gcig pa// sangs rgyas thams cad rtogs gyur/
182a7(rgyud): padan sangs rgyas 'khor ba sgrol ba po// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// thugs rje'i nyams dang yang dag ldan// rgyu yi de nyid mnyam sbyor bas// 'bras bu'i de nyid rnams kyang ston// 'bras bu'i rici
182b1(rgyud): yang dgazugs// rgyu yi de nyid mi 'dod do// gang du 'dod pa skyes gyur pa// de nyid 'khor ba'i bag chags yin// mkhas pa yi ni cho ga yis// sgom pa ru ni yongs su btags// gang zhig slar la/
182b2(rgyud): gcig gyur pa// rnal 'byor pa yi nal 'byor byung // sangs rgyas rjes dran la dmigs shing // chos ni rjes su dmigs pa yi// tshogs gnyis kyi ni sbyor ba yis// rkang gnyis dam pa nyid du 'gyur//
182b3(rgyud): b+ha gar ling ga rab gzhag ste// sangs rgyas srung ni rnam par sgom// sangs rgyas rjes dran rnal 'byor pa// sangs rgyas sprin ni bsgom par bya// b+ha gar ling ga rab gzhag ste// rdo rje chos ni
182b4(rgyud): rnam par sgom// chos ni rjes dran rnal 'byor pa// chos kyi sprin las char rab 'bebs// mtshan ni ling ga zhes bshad de// phyag rgya'i mtshan ma rnam pa ba ni// 'joms pas b+ha ga zhes bshad de//
182b5(rgyud): nyon mongs 'joms pa'i dam pa yin// sems can kun gyi dngos kun gyi// rang sems chos ni bsdus pa yin// chos bdag med pa'i sbyor ba yis// bsad na rang nyid 'chi bar 'gyur// rang gi
182b6(rgyud): sems nyid rdzogs sangs rgyas// rtogs par bya ba sems nyid yin// rang gi sems nyid gsad bya ba// sems nyid kho na gsad par bya// sbyor ba nyid dang yang dag 'brel// gang yang srid pa
182b7(rgyud): 'byung ma yin// gang tshe sangs rgyas de tshe ni// sbyor lnga sangs rgyas bdag ces sgom// ting 'dzin ye shes las byung ba// sangs rgyas nyid phyir mdor bsdus pa// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor med par ni// /
183a1(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa ni 'tshang mi rgya// phra mo'i dngos po bzhin mthong // sdug pa'i dngos por de bzhin te// dngos dang dngos med khyad par ni// sgom pa kun tu brtags pa yin/
183a2(rgyud): dngos po sgom pa'i dngos ma yin// bsgom par bya ba sgom pa min// dngos po sgom par gyur pa yis// rang gi sems ni yongs su sbyang // sangs rgyas sangs rgyas yul ma yin// sems can yul
183a3(rgyud): du'ang mi 'gyur gyi// rang sems rtogs pas sangs rgyas te// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas rtogs pas min// gnyis med sbyor ba 'di la yang / ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes brtag rgyu yi de nyid ji
183a4(rgyud): mthong dang 'bras bu'i de nyid de nyid yin// rgyu yi de nyid cung zad med// 'bras bu'i de nyid de bzhin no// de nyid de ni de bzhin shes// de nyid rnal 'byor pa kun spyod// rgyu yis rgyun ni dngos por min//
183a5(rgyud): 'bras bu'i dngos por 'bras bus min// rgyu de 'bras bu'i dngos por rung // rang gi sems ni so sor snang // ye shes de ni rgyu dngos te// gsang de 'bras bu'i dngos po yin// gsang ba gnyis med/
183a6(rgyud): spyod pa yis// de yi dngos pos mchog yin no// de nyid de nyid rtogs gyur pa// gsang de gsang ba'i rnal 'byor pa// gsang bde rig shes pa ste// mchog ni mchog gi rnal 'byor pa// sdug
183a7(rgyud): pa'i ngo bor gang bshad pa// mi sdug pa yang de yi dngos// sdug dang mi sdug gzugs gang yin// mi mthong de ni de bzhin gshegs// rnam shes tsam ni med pa ru// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor 'byung
183b1(rgyud): mi 'gyur// ji ltar ye shes mchog dag pa// de ltar dag pa de bzhin gshegs// rnam par shes pa rnam pa bzhi// phyag rgya bzhi yi cho ga yis// gsang ba gnyis med sbyor ba yis// sku gsung
183b2(rgyud): thugs ni yang dag byung // thugs ni phyag rgya chen po ste// dam tshig phyag rgya kun tu 'gro// chos kyi phyag rgya gsung gi ste// las kyi phyag rgya sku yi yin// rgya yis rgyas btab dngos po ni// gsang
183b3(rgyud): bdag gsang ba'i rnal 'byor pa'o// rang rig pa yi ngo bo nyis// ting 'dzin ye shes brtag pa yin// lus ngag sems su rnam brtags pa'i// bya ba rgyud du rnam brtags pa// gsang ba rnam pa gsum du
183b4(rgyud): bshadad/ rdo rje las can sna tshogs bzhin// sangs rgyas lnga yi bdag nyid ni// gsang ba'i ye shes bla med yin// phyag rgya bzhi po gsang ba de// rnal 'byor pa yis las grub byed// 'byung ba chen po/
183b5(rgyud): bzhi po yang // phyag rgya bzhi zhes bshad pa yin// phyag rgya bzhi yis mnyam sbyor ba// lha mo bzhi dang yang dag sbyor// sa ni spyan zhes bshad pa yin// chu ni mA ma kI zhe sa bshad// me dang rlung zhes
183b6(rgyud): grags pa ni// gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma yin// dbang chen sa yi khams yin te// chu yi khams ni chu dkyil 'khor// me ni me yi khams yin te// rlung ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro// dbang chen kha dog/
183b7(rgyud): ser po ste// gru bzhi pa ste rgyas pa yin// chu yi dkyil 'khor zlum po ste// dkar po'i mdog can zhi ba'i yin// me yi dkyil 'khor kha dog dmar// gru gsum dbang gi las rnams la'o// chung
184a1(rgyud): gi dkyil 'khor gzhu yi dbyibs// nag po'i gdug pa'i las rnams la// 'byung ba che'i bdag las grub pa// las kyi dngos grub yon tan ba ni// las kyi dngos grub
184a2(rgyud): dngos grub mchog/ 'khor los sgyur ba rnam pa bzhi// zhi ba la ni spun gyi tshul// rgyas pa pad+ma'i rdo rje can// dbang la rnam par snang mdzad gnas// rdo rje khro bo mngon spyod la'o// zhi ba dgongs ka/
184a3(rgyud): bya ba yin// de bzhin rgyas pa snga dral// gdug pa'i las rnams nyi ma'i gung // dbang gi las ni mtshan phyed bya// zhi la dkar po sbyar bar bya// ser por snang ba rgyas pa la// dbang gi las
184a4(rgyud): dmar po ste// gdug pa nag por rab tu sbyar// ting 'dzin ye shes las byung ba// las kyi sgrub pa dam pa yin// bcom ldan dag pa bsgom bya ste// sangs rgyas kun las mi g.yo gyur// b+ha
184a5(rgyud): ga'i dbus su gsang ba'i bdag/ rdo rje dbyings ni de bzhin gshegs// lnga yi bdag gyur bdag nyid ni// bsgoms na g.yo ba med par 'gyur// snying la gnas pa'i lha mo che// rnal 'byor pa
184a6(rgyud): yi rnal 'byor bskyed// sangs rgyas thams cad skyed mdzad yum// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ste// 'di dag 'jig rten dug gsum yin// sangs
184a7(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan dug mi mnga'// rdo rje dbyings ni de bzhin gshegs// chags dang sdang dang rmongs pa rnams// bsgoms nas khams gsum pa yi bdag/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
184b1(rgyud): gyur te// sangs rgyas bden pas dug bcom mo// rang sems so sor rtogs pa yis// gti mug sems ni de bzhin gshegs// rmongs pa nyid ni 'jig rten gyur// sems can kun la bsna
184b2(rgyud): bar bya// zhe sdang rnams ni de bzhin gshegs// phra mo'i ye shes yang dag bskyed// sdang gyur rdo rje nyid du gyur// sems can thams cad gzhig par bya// 'dod chags sems ni de bzhin gshes
184b3(rgyud): byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed// chags gyur pabang po nyid gyur pa// sangs rgyas thams cad chags par bya// byams pa'i sems ni de bzhin gshegs// nga rgyal yang dag bskyed nas ni//
184b4(rgyud): mdza' bor gyur cing kun nyid gyur// sangs rgyas kun la 'khyud par bya// chags pa'i lta bas byams pa ste// thugs rje'i chos ni smra ba dang // kun la mi 'jigs sbyin pa dang // sangs rgyas
184b5(rgyud): thams cad mnyes bya ba'o// rnal 'byor sbyin las rab dga' ste// tshul khrims ldan las dri med 'gyur// bzod pa las ni 'od byed pa// brtson las 'od 'phro can dang ldan// bsam gtan
184b6(rgyud): las ni sbyang dka' ba// shes rab kyis ni mngon gyur mthong // thabs chen las ni ring du song // stobs dang ldan las mi g.yo 'gyur// smon lam gyis ni legs blo ldan// ye shes ldan las
184b7(rgyud): chos kyi sprin// rgyal ba de bzhin gshegs pa ni// rang rig bdag nyid bcu gcig 'gyur// pha rol phyin pa bcu rnams dang // stobs dang dbang ni rdzogs gyur cing // sa bcu las ni 'das gyur pa//
185a1(rgyud): mtshan ma brtan gyur de las ni// rdo rje chu ni rdzogs sangs rgyas// chos kyi bdud rtsi bcud len yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi mtha' yas pa// gzung dang 'dzin pa spangs/
185a2(rgyud): pa yin// chos kyi bdud rtsi bcud kyis len// rdo rje'i chu ni dag 'thungs pas// rdo rje slob dpon rnal 'byor pa// gdod nas dag par de tshe 'gyur// gdod nas dag par gnas gyur pa// de
185a3(rgyud): nas byang chub sems su 'gyur// byang chub sems kyi bdag can 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// rnam par grol ba'i ras kyis g.yogs// byang chub sems ni bla na med//
185a4(rgyud): yang dag bskyed gyur rnal 'byor pa// rdo rje sems dpa' snying la 'dug/ sems can khams ni mtha' yas pa'i// mar gyur dam tshig 'dzin byed pa// rdo rje dam tshig gis spyad na// rtag tu dam tshig
185a5(rgyud): gnas par gyur// khams gsum lam ni nyams dga' bar// bud med ces bshad ji snyed pa// cho ga bzhin du kun spyod cing // thugs kyi rdo rje smad mi bya// rdo rje gsum gyi sku la gnas// dam chi
185a6(rgyud): phyag rgya ji snyed pa// rdo dam tshig gsum gyis bya// gsung gi rdo rje smad mi bya// rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'o// phyag rgya kun ni bud med bzang // de rnams sten pa'i rnal 'byor pa// phyag
185a7(rgyud): rgya thams cad dbang du 'gyur// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad na// bud med ces bya ji snyed pa// phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba yis// de dag kun la nye bar spyad// gsang ba mchog gi rnal 'byor pa//
185b1(rgyud): ting 'dzin ye shes dam pa yin// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// nga rgyal ma yin hUM ma yin// rig pa ma yin sngags rig min// lag pa'i phyag rgya'ang mi bca' 'o// mchod rten gyi ni las
185b2(rgyud): mi byad daglegs bam dag kyang bklag mi bya// dkyil 'khor dag ni mi bya zhing // rdo rje mchog gsum phyag mi btsal// slob dpon smad par mi bya ste// bla ma sang rgyas kun dang mnyam// khyod kyis srog
185b3(rgyud): chags gsad par bya// brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya// khyod kyis ma byin blang bya zhing // gzhan gyi bud med bsten par bya// sbyin sreg yang na bsam gtan min// lus ngag yid ni mi phyed pa
185b4(rgyud): gzhan min sems kyis bya ba ste// 'di ni gsang pa'i mchog yin no// sngags rnams thams cad rab tu 'grub// rnal 'byor kun kyang rnam kun tu// de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis// sangs
185b5(rgyud): rgyas chos nyid bsgom par bya// ma 'dres chos ni bco brgyad po// sangs rgyas chos zhes bshad pa yin// de rnams rtag tu sgom pa ni// sangs rgyas chos ni sgrub byed yin// bsam gtan pa ni
185b6(rgyud): dang gzugs med ba zhi// rtag tu thob par byas pa dang // 'gog pa'i snyoms 'jug de yis ni// sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu bsgrub// byang chub phyogs ni sum cu bdun// chos su yang dag
185b7(rgyud): bshad pa gang // de rnams bsgoms pas dag pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ban yin// 'gro ba rnams la spro ba'i sems// brtan zhing snying po rab bsgoms pa// stong pa'i de nyid las
186a1(rgyud): byung ba// rdo rje ye shes zhes bya ba shad// chos bdag med las yang dag byung // gnyis med ye shes dam pa ste// chos nyid mchog gi ye shes ni// chos kyi dbyings zhes
186a2(rgyud): yang dag bshad// 'di ni chos dbyings ye shes te// rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin skyes// rdo rje ye shes rang bzhin sems// rdo rje dbyings zhes bya bar bshad// sems kyi spro ba'i sbyor ba yis//
186a3(rgyud): phra mo'i ye shes sogs sbyor ba// de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes ni// rnam par snang mdzad ces byar bshad// byams pa spro bar sbyor ba yis// sbyor ba spyod par byed pa'i mchog/ zag med
186a4(rgyud): brtan par gyur pa yis// thugs ni mi bskyod pa zhes bshad// thugs rje spro ba'i tshul gyis ni// sems can phan 'dogs mdzad pa po// thugs ni 'gro don yang dag ldan// rin chen 'byung ldan
186a5(rgyud): zhes ba shad do// dga' bas spro ba'i sbyor ba yis// theg chen mchog ni dri ma med // thugs ni 'od gsal dag pa ni// 'od dpag med ces de bshad do// btang snyoms spro bar mdzad pa'i shugs//
186a6(rgyud): sems can thams cad rtogs mdzad pa// don yod bla med bya ba ni// don yod grub par de bshad do// byang chub rang bzhin ye shes mchog/ de 'dir rdo rje zhes bzhad de// rdo rje ye shes las byung ba//
186a7(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' de bshad do// sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pa// rdo rje lcags kyu zhes bshad de// rdo rje'i rigs rnams kun gyi rgyal// rdo rje rgyal por de bshad do// sangs rgyas thams cad
186b1(rgyud): chags byed pas// mnyes par byed pa zhes bshad do// bdud kyi sbyor ba chags pa che// rdo rje chags par de bshad do// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed cing // legs so zhes pa rab sogs pa/
186b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' dga' byed pas// rdo rje legs par de bshad do// byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa gang // mkha' mnyam rdo rje las byung ba// don yod rin chen chen po de// rdo rje rin chen de
186b3(rgyud): bshad do// ma rig bral ba'i ye shes ni// tshogs dag las ni nges par byung // thar pa'i snang ba ga bi brjid che// rdo rje nyi mar de bshad do// rnam pa kun gyi dngos ye shes// thar pa'i lam 'a
186b4(rgyud): thob mdzad gang // chos kyi rgyal mtshan tog chen po// rdo rje dpal du de bshad do// rdo rje bzhad pa rnal 'byor che// sangs rgyas kun 'byung rmad byung ba// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' che// rdorje
186b5(rgyud): bzhad par de bshad do// sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che// sangs rgyas chos ni rtogs mdzad pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dag pa// rdo rje chos su de bshad do// shes rab rnon po theg
186b6(rgyud): pa ched na nyon mongs thams cad nges gcod mdzad// shes bya'i sgrib pa gcod pa po// rdo rje rnon por de bshad do// sangs rgyas rol mo'i 'khor lo ni// chos kyi 'khor lo rab skor bas// sems
186b7(rgyud): dpa' chen po theg pa che// rdo rje rgyu zhes de bshad de// shes rab ye shes rang bzhin dag/ gsung gi sgra ni rnam par spangs// 'jam pa'i gsung gi bdag nyid gyur// rdo rje smra bar de bshad do//
187a1(rgyud): pha rol phyin pa kun gyi nabs// chos rnams thams cad rtogs mdzad pa// sems can kun don sprul pa po// rdo rje las zhes bya bar bshad// sangs rgyas rjes dran/
187a2(rgyud): yang dag grub// theg pa dman pa rnam spangs shing // byang chub sems la rab zhugs pa// rdo rje srung bar de bshad do// sdig pa thams cad zad byed cing // de bzhin nyon mongs rnams sreg la/
187a3(rgyud): nyon mongs zad pa nyer len pas// rdo rje'i gnod sbyin de bshad do// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams// bcing ba ru ni yang dag gyur// de nyid de nyid ye shes te// rdo rje khu tshur zhes bshad do// dam
187a4(rgyud): tshig phyag rgya thams cad ni// rdo rje bsdams las yang dag byung // rdo rje khu tshur gnyis gyur pa// las kyi phyag rgya zhes bshad do// nga rgyal med cing snang ba med// mtshan ma med cing zhen pa med//
187a5(rgyud): bdag med mnyam nyid ye shes ni// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar bshad// gsang ba'i mnyam par 'byor pa 'dir// ye shes pha rol phyin dge ba// rnam pa bcu gnyis yang dag byung // rdo rje pa
187a6(rgyud): rol phyin pa'i 'od// byang chub sems ni rab bsgoms pas// pha rol sangs rgyas nyid son pa'i// pha rol phyin thob ye shes ni// rdo rje sems mar bshad pa yin// bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi rnams ni//
187a7(rgyud): shes rab pha rol phyin rdo rje// chos bzhi gcig tu gyur pa ni// rdo rje rin chen mer bshad do// gsang ba'i ye shes ye shes che// de nyid pha rol byin dge ba// pha rol phyin pa che las byung // rdo rje chos mar
187b1(rgyud): shes par bya// pha rol phyin pa'i dge ba ni// sbyor ba'i thabs su rab bstan pa// rdo rje las mar shes par bya// gang phyir de ni rol pa dge/ sgeg mo sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin// tshul khrims pha rol phyin
187b2(rgyud): dge bas// brgyan pa'i yan lag yid 'ong yin// glu ma bzod pa'i pha rol phyin// ched du brjod pa'i chos brjod pa'o// gar ma brtson 'grus pha rol phyin// myur du sangs rgyas nyid ster ba'o//
187b3(rgyud): bdug pa shes rab pha rol phyin// kun tu khyab par spros phyir ro// me tog bsam gtan pha rol phyin// 'dod pa'i 'dam gyis ma gos pa'o// mar me smon lam pha rol phyin// phyogs kun snang bar
187b4(rgyud): byed pa yin// dri ni thabs kyi pha rol phyin// dri ngan thur sel dge ba yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs chen po// dbye ba rnam pa bzhi yis gnas// thams cad 'dod pa'i thabs chen po// rdo rje
187b5(rgyud): lcags kyu zhes bshad do// byang chub spyad pa spyod byed pa// rdo rje zhags pa zhes bshad do// theg pa 'di la brten gyur gang // rdo rje lcags sgrog ces bshad do// chos rnams thams cad ma skyes
187b6(rgyud): shing / gdod nas ni ba mkha' dang mnyam// de lta'i tshig ni rab 'jug pas// rdo rje dril bu zhes bshad do// tshogs gnyis kyi ni sbyor ba yis// sems can kun gyi don ston pa'i// sems ni rang
187b7(rgyud): bzhin gyis 'od gsal// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yin par bshad// yang dag rdo rje rtogs pa ste// 'dzin pa'i sbyor nying lcags kyu yin// phra bar 'bigs pa mda' zhes bya// dgyes pa'i legs so//
188a1(rgyud): zhes bya ba// spros pas rin po che ru bshad// gzi brjid ces bya nyi ma yin// sgreng bas tog tu bshad pa ste// rnam par 'byed pas bzhad par bshad// 'dod chags dag/
188a2(rgyud): pa pad+ma yin// nyon mongs dgra bcom ral gri ste// dkyil 'khor sbyor bas 'khor lo yin// gang gis brjod pas smra bar bshad// kun nyid sna tshogs rdo rje yin// gzhig dka'i sbyor ba go cha yin//
188a3(rgyud): 'jigs pa'i spyod pas mche ba ste// phyag rgya'i sbyor nyid bcing ba yin// dkyil 'khor du ni gang bshad pa// yid kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa yin// gzhal yas khang ni ye shes te// sems kyi brtsegs
188a4(rgyud): pa sgreng ba yin// phyi yi gru bzhi pa gang yin// tshad kyis mnyam pa nyid gyur pa// byams pa la sogs sems gang yin// thig bzhi zhes ni bshad pa yin// chos kyi sbyor ba rjes dran nyid// gang de do//
188a5(rgyud): je thig tu bshad// lta ba kun las rnam grol ba// ye shes thig tu bshad pa yin// tshul khrims tshegs kyi dam pa ni// gang zhig rgyan du bshad pa yin// dang dbang la sogs sems gang yin// 8
188a6(rgyud): ba lngar ni yang dag byung // rnam par thar pa bzhi po ni// sgo rnams su ni yang dag bshad// yang dag spong ba bzhi po ni// rta babs rnams dang ka bar byung // dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi po ni// khyams
188a7(rgyud): rnams bzhi por shes par bya// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi po ni// de ni sgo khyud rnam bzhi yin// byang chub yan lag bdun po ni// 'phreng ba me tog chun brgyan pa// 'phags lam yan lag brgyad po ni//
188b1(rgyud): ka ba brgyad ces bya bar bshad// sgrib pa gnyis las rnam grol zhing // ting 'dzin ye shes kyis brtags pa// lam gyi ye shes khyad par rnams// rnga yab ces ni yang dag bshad// nyon mongs
188b2(rgyud): thams cad nges gcod cing // nyon mongs 'phrog pas dra ba ste// yang dag gcod cing spong ba nyid// sel ba'i spong ba la gnas pa// tshogs gnyis kyi ni skyo ba nyid// nyon mongs pa yi phyed 'phrog pa/
188b3(rgyud): dra ba byed ces bya bar bshad// rang bzhin 'od gsal gang yin de// byang chub sems ni bla med yin// sems ni don kun skyed byed pa// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yin par bshad// shes rab ye shes rang
188b4(rgyud): bzhin dag/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin skyes// thar pa'i snang ba gzi brjid che// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yin par bshad// tshon rtsi lngar ni yang dag ces// lta ba lnga yi me tog yin// ye shes lnga yi nges
188b5(rgyud): sbyor nyid// sangs rgyas lnga zhes yang dag bshad// nam mkha' bzhin du bdag med pa'i// rnam shes ye shes dam pa yin// ye shes de yi rgyan bshad pa// chags pa'i sems zhes bya bar bshad/
188b6(rgyud): chags bral las ni byang chub 'byung // chags pa'i sems las gzhan yin// de bas chags dang chags bral ba// byang chub sems zhes yang dag bshad// 'jig rten chags dang bral bas 'dul
188b7(rgyud): phyag rgya'i dngos grub chags las byung // der ni thabs kyi sgom pa dag/ dngos grub thams cad ster ba yin// ji ltar 'jig rten 'dul 'gyur ba// de ltar rnal 'byor pa yis spyad// ji ltar gdul
189a1(rgyud): bya dag gyur pa// zhen pa kun tu mchog par 'gyur// mtshan nyid gang zhig yang dag bshad// mtshan nyid des ni mtshon par 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya yis/
189a2(rgyud): rgyas btab ye shes yin par bshad// phyag rgya bsgoms pas rnal 'byor pa// rtag tu phyag rgya'i bdag can 'gyur// rgyas btab dngos po shes nas ni// bsgoms na phyag rgyas btab par 'gyur//
189a3(rgyud): mtshan dang mtshan nyid 'brel ba ni// shes nas rnal 'byor yang dag spyod// ji ltar mtshan nyid yang dag grub// de bzhin dag pa myur du 'grub// g.yas pa'i cha yi mtshan ma ni// shes rab can ni
189a4(rgyud): rab tu bstan// g.yon gyi mtshan ma ji ltar mthong // de yis thugs rje mtshon pa yin// phyag ni gnyis ka'i mnyam sbyor las// ting 'dzin gnyis su bshad pa yin// zhabs gnyis kyi ni mtshan ma
189a5(rgyud): yi sa tshogs gnyis dag ni bstan pa yin// sor mo lnga yi mnyam sbyor las// dkyil 'khor lnga yis brgyan pa yin// sangs rgyas lnga yi mngon byang chub// rim pa bzhin du bstan bya ste// gang
189a6(rgyud): zhig gung mo ston pa ni// nam mkha' las ni byung ba mtshon// gang zhig mdzub mo ston pa ni// des ni dbang chen dkyil 'khor yin// srin lag tu ni yang dag bshad// chu yi dkyil 'khor zhes
189a7(rgyud): bshad do// gang zhig mthe bong ston pa ni// de yis me ni mtshon pa yin// gang zhig mthe'u chung ston pa ni// rlung gi dkyil 'khor nyid du 'gyur// gang zhig lte ba ston pa ni// rdo rje dbyings kyi
189b1(rgyud): dbang phyug bshad// gang zhig snying la ston pa ni// rdo rje sems par rjes su dpag/ gang zhig smin mtshams ston pa ni// rdo rje rin chen ma zhes bya// gang zhig lkog ma ston pa ni// rdo rje chos ma shes
189b2(rgyud): par bya// gang zhig spyi bo ston pa ni// rdo rje las mar shes par bya// byang chub lngar mngon byang chub pa'am// yang ni ye shes lnga rnams sam// sangs rgyas lnga dang yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor
189b3(rgyud): byang chub yin par bstan// sngon gyi sgrar ni ji skad bshad// mdun du de ni rab tu bstan// rgyab kyi sgrar ni ji ltar bshad// phyi mar de ni yang dag bstan// gang du thog ma'i sgrar gyur pa// de ni rgyu yi
189b4(rgyud): sgra ru bstan// gang zhig tha ma'i sgrar gyur pa// 'dir ni 'bras bur yang dag bstan// sangs rgyas bcom ldan gnyis mi mnga'// rgyu dang 'bras bur ldan 'gyur min// gang phyir thog ma tha ma med// de phyir//
189b5(rgyud): rtag pa zhes bshad do// rang sems rtogs pas sangs rgyas te// rtogs par bya ba'ang sems nyid yin// sangs rgyas zhing zhes bshad pa dang // byang chub sems su shes par bya// rang bzhin dag
189b6(rgyud): pa'i sems can ni// kun tu rig par yang dag bshad// sems can rang bzhin dag pa ni// byang chub sems su shes par bya// dang por gyur pa snying khar rdebs// brtan pa nyid du'ang rang nyid 'gyur//
189b7(rgyud): sgra 'dzin pa ni ral pa'i dbus// 'od dpag med du mnyam gzhag yin// tsum+ba nar ni rjes bshad pa// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje gsung // dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba// rnam par snang mdzad
190a1(rgyud): ces bshad do// bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis par// skyes mchog thub pas gang gsungs pa// pha rol phyin pa bcu gnyis su// gsungs kyi gzhan du mi brtag go// bu mo lo/
190a2(rgyud): grangs bcu drug par// de bzhin gshegs pas gang gsungs pa// rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' yi// sgom pa'i don gyi sgra yin no// lha mo lo grangs nyi shu par// 'khor los sgyur bas ji/
190a3(rgyud): skad gsungs// mchod pa nyi shu'i bdag nyid can// nyi shu po dang rim bzhin no// rang gi chung ma rang gi las// byung ba'i rang rig yin par bshad// gzhan gyi chung mar gang bstan pa// gzhan sdug
190a4(rgyud): gzhan gyi rig pa yin// gci dang rdo rje zhes bshad pa// rdo rje ye shes bla med yin// bshad dang pad+ma zhes bshad pa// chos kyi ye shes rnyog med yin// yongs su gsal bar rnam shes pa// dkyil
190a5(rgyud): 'khor thugs kyi dam pa yin// sku gsung thugs kyi spyod pa yis// 'bad pa yis ni mchod byed pa// rang gi rdo rje pad+mar ldan// dbang po gnyis las byung ba yi// rang gi khu ba thig le yis// rdo rje/
190a6(rgyud): sems dpa' mchod par bya// tshogs gnyis kyi ni sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa// gnyis med gnyis nyid la brten pa// thugs rje nyams dang yang dag ldan// dbang
190a7(rgyud): po gnyis kyi mnyam sbyor bas// rang gi khu ba mkhas pa yis// rnal 'byor chen po byung nas ni// dkyil 'khor yang dag byin gyis brlab// dgod dam rab tu smra ba 'am// sangs rgyas rol mo gar
190b1(rgyud): byed pa// lha mo bzhi yi mnyam sbyor bas// rgyu dang mi rgyu rnams kyi sa rol// gsar zhing legs par bsgril ba dang // tshad dang ldan zhing mdzes pa yis// shes rab can gyis thig gdab pa// sku
190b2(rgyud): gsung thugs ni bsgoms pas so// zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes byas la// thig bzhid ni yang dag ldan// dar dang me tog 'phreng bas brgyan// grwa yi mtshams ni thams
190b3(rgyud): cad dang // sgro khyud kyi ni nang rnams su// rdo rje rin chen spras pas ni// phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bo// rdo rje'i thig gis yongs bskor cing // ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes// ka ba brgyad kyi
190b4(rgyud): nang gnas pa'i// dkyil 'khor brgyad par bstan pa dang // grwa yi dkyil 'khor dor bar ni// rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod// 'khor lo lnga dang yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor lnga yis rnam par brgyan
190b5(rgyud): dra ba dra phyed kyis brgyan cing // rnga yab kyis ni nyer spras pa// khru ni bcu gnyis bya ba'am// khru bcu drug tu rab tu brtags// yang na khru ni nyi shu tsam// nyi shu lnga dang ldan pa yis// khru ni nyi shu lnga pa yis//
190b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor yang dag byin gyis brlab// sgo rnams kyi ni dbus ma'i cha// cha dgu ru ni rnam dbye ba// dkyil 'khor sgo ru bsams nas ni// sgo khyud dang ni bya ba yin// sgo khyud dkyil 'khor rnam pa ni// snying
190b7(rgyud): po'i dkyil 'khor dang mnyam par// dgu cha ru ni nam bgos te// grwa yi dkyil 'khor dor bar bya// tha mar khyams dang ldan pa yi// dkyil 'khor lngas ni brgyan pa dang // kha dog lnga dang yang dag lngan/
191a1(rgyud): gru bzhi par ni brtag par bya// lta ba lnga po bgrod dka' che// kha dog lnga yi de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas lnga dang mnyam sbyor bas// sa ni tshon gyis rab tu bsgyur/
191a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor lnga yi dbus su ni// sangs rgyas ldan dgod par bya// kha dog lnga dang ting 'dzin gyis// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis khyab// shel dang zla ba'i 'od 'dra zhing // sangs rgyas thams cad/
191a3(rgyud): gcig bsdus pa// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam snang mdzad// dpa' bo'i lta ba de bzhin gshegs// in+d+ra nI la'i 'od 'dra zhing // rdo rje thams cad gcig bsdus pa// mi bskyod ye shes las
191a4(rgyud): byung ba// rdo rje'i lta ba de bzhin gshegs// 'dzam bu'i gser gyi 'od 'dra zhing // sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa// sems can kun gyi don du byung // 'bar ba'i lta ba de bzhin gshegs/
191a5(rgyud): dpa' bo chen po pad+ma 'dra// pad+ma rA ga'i nor bu'i 'od// chos kyi ye shes las byung ba// chags pa'i lta ba de bzhin gshegs// ma rgad kyi ni 'od 'dra zhing // sangs rgyas thams cad gcig/
191a6(rgyud): bsdus pa// sangs rgyas kun gcig las byung ba// byams pa'i lta ba de bzhin gshegs// dbus ma'i sa yi gzhi dag pa// nor bu chu shel mdog 'dra ba// shar phyogs nyid du sngon po che//
191a7(rgyud): lho ru ser po yang dag ldan// nub phyogs der ni dmar po ste// byang du ldang dang yang dag ldan// kun tu khyams dang ldan pa la// sgor ni khyams dang bral ba'o// gang zhig dbu sa mas yang dag
191b1(rgyud): bshad/ sangs rgyas ye shes bla med yin// gzhan dag don kun yang dag ldan// ting 'dzin ye shes dam pa yin// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// phra ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa//
191b2(rgyud): bsam// sangs rgyas sku ni rnam bsgoms la// spyan ni dbus su bsam par bya// bzhin bzang spyan ni yangs pa dang // nor bu chu shel mdog 'dra la// mtshan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs//
191b3(rgyud): bud med sgyu ma'i mchog 'dzin pa// phyag tu 'khor lo bsgom bya ste// khams gsum pa ni dbang byed pa// dngos kun grub byed ye shes ni// 'khor lo yid bzhin nor bu'i mdog/ nam mkha'i rdo rje dbu
191b4(rgyud): chud par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas sku ni rnam bsgoms la// nam mkha'i rdo rje mchog sgom mo// zhal mdzes spyan ni yangs pa dang // ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ma'i mdog/
191b5(rgyud): mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs// nam mkha'i sgyu ma'i mchog bsam mo// phyag tu ut+pal sngon dmar te// khams gsum pas ni phyag byas pa// sangs rgyas byang chub byed pa'i mchog/ gas
191b6(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub rdo rje can// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus chung bar// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas sku ni rnams bsgoms la// rdo rje chos mar rnam par bsam// mdzes pa'i zhal la spyan
191b7(rgyud): yangs pa// pad+ma rA ga lta bu'i mdog/ sku mdog dmar po yang dag byung // chags pa'i pad+ma 'dzin sdug pa// mtshon rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// phyag
192a1(rgyud): tu ut+pal dmar po ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rab bsgoms pa'o// chos kyi ye shes byed pa mchog/ gsang ba dam tshig rdo rje can// mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus chud par// zla/
192a2(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgoms la// sgrol ma mchog ni bsam par bya// zhal mdzes spyan ni yangs pa dang // sna tshogs rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan// kha dog ser
192a3(rgyud): po nyid bsam zhing // bud med sgyu ma'i dregs bde ba// phyag tu ut+pal dam pa ni// ser po snang ba bsgom par bya// rdo rje nyid 'dzin las byung ba// sems can kun gyis phyag byas pa'o// oM ru
192a4(rgyud): s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ne sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA/ oM shaM ka re shAn+ti ka re g+hun+sa Ti ni g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya g+hu Ta Ti ni swA hA/ oM ka Te bi ka Te ni ka Te ka TaM ka Te swA hA/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ rig pa'i lha mo bzhi
192a5(rgyud): sku ni lus kyi ngo bo yis// thugs ni sems kyi rnam pa nyid// gsung ni ngag gi rnam pa yis// mchod na mchod pa'i bdag nyid 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba ni// mkhas pa yis ni
192a6(rgyud): bsrung bya ste// bsrungs na mchog tu gsang ba ni// rtag par kun tu 'byung bar 'gyur// dngos po yongs su dag pa ni// med pas kun tu brtag mi 'byung // rnal 'byor pa yis rnal 'byor thob//
192a7(rgyud): tshogs med yang dag mi mthong ngo // de bas gsang ba'i ye shes 'byung // rnal 'byor kun tu 'byung bar 'gyur// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i thabs// ting 'dzin ye shes brtags pa yin// chos rnam
192b1(rgyud): thams cad rnam dag pa// dag pa nyid du gyur pa ni// ji ltar lha yi nor bu ni// rang gi 'od kyis rtag tu snang // srid pa yongs su dag pa yang // rnal 'byor rnal 'byor thob byed yin// rdo rje dbyings ni gsapa/
192b2(rgyud): chen du// gang zhig dbang bskur mkhas pa la// thugs kyi gsang ba'i rnal 'byor mchog/ mkhas pas de la bshad par bya// thams cad gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so//
192b3(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+ma kA ra ba rma dang // zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing nus te gtan la phab pa'o// @/ rgya gar
192b4(rgyud): skad du/ trai lo kya bi dzA ya ma hA kalpa rA dza/ bod skad du/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
192b5(rgyud): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri rab ri'i rtse mo na rdo rje dang nor bu rin po che'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag du ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang /
192b6(rgyud): 'byung po dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / ma mo rnams dang / bltar rung ba dang / bltar mi rung ba du ma sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa rnams dang thabs cig tu zhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
192b7(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i dkyil nas babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas// bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'di
193a1(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// yang bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lha chen po la sogs pa sems can ma rungs pa de dag la dam tshig 'dzin du stsal bar 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du
193a2(rgyud): bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshig bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pas gsan nas/ phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces
193a3(rgyud): gsungs so// gnod sbyin khyod shin tu khengs pa/ shin tu khro ba/ shin tu 'thur ba/ de'i ltar khyod kyis sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir 'di lta bu'i sngags kyi tshig smra/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ phyag na rdo rje
193a4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// de'i phyir na bcom ldan 'das bdag sems can ma lus pa 'dul bar bgyid do// gang gi phyir na bdag gis 'dod pa'i bde ba can rnams dbang du bgyi
193a5(rgyud): ba la sogs pa'i btul nas bla na med pa'i bde ba la 'god par 'tshal lo// sems can ma rungs pa rnams gsad pa la sogs pas sbyangs te/ zhi ba la dgod par 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ phyag na
193a6(rgyud): rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ phyag na rdo rje legs so legs so// 'jig rten thams cad kyi don gyi phyir dang // phan pa'i phyir dang / bde ba'i phyir snying po 'di spros shig/ de nas phyag
193a7(rgyud): na rdo rje byang chub sems dpas lha thams cad nas/ mi rnams thams cad kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa de rnams la bka' stsal pa// grogs po dag sangs rgyas la skyabs su dengs shig/ pa'i
193b1(rgyud): bka' yang rjes su myongs shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs gnyis la phyag na do rjes phyag 'tshal nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i ming po 'di gsungam so// mos stani sum+b+ha dzA bri b+hag/
193b2(rgyud): hUM/ grah+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho b+ha ga bAn badz+ra d+hu phaT/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum thams cad g.yos// rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so// 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/
193b3(rgyud): kun tu rab tu 'gul lo// 'phar/ rab tu 'phar/ kun tu rab tu 'phar ro// de nas lha thams cad la sogs pa sems can thams cad 'dar yiyad yod nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te/ khor khor
193b4(rgyud): yug dang kho ra khor yug chen po'i ri la sogs pa tshun chad kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad kyis gang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten
193b5(rgyud): gyi khams su tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po la gzigs nas 'di skad gsungs so// grogs po rnams sangs rgyas la sogs pa la skyabs su 'gro bar khas long zhig/ nga'i bka' yang rjes su skyongs shig
193b6(rgyud): de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor chen po thams cad bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes skrag ste 'dar yang yod nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la// lha chen
193b7(rgyud): po'i lha dang // mthu bo che dang / tshangs pa rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i sems can 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar byin che zhing bdag cag 'chos pa 'di su lags
194a1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di bstan pa'i phyi tshigs su bcang pa 'di grangs te gsungs so// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs// kun
194a2(rgyud): tu bzang po kun gyi bdag/ sangs rgyas thams cad nyid bskyed 'di// phyag na rdo rje gnod sbyin che// ma rungs 'chol la dbang ba ste// gang ming brjod pa de yis ni// sangs rgyangs yang thob par 'gyur/
194a3(rgyud): de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen pos yang gsungs pa/ kye kye lha dag sangs rgyas la skyabs su deng la nga'i bka' bzhin du'ang gyis shig/ rdo rje 'bar ba gcig tu 'bar bar gyur pa 'dis khyod thams
194a4(rgyud): cad gtan bsregs par gyur ta re/ de nas lha chen po la sogs pa rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so// khyod ni gnod sbyin/ ngeng ni lha bas na nged kyis gnod sbyin gyi bka' rjes su skyong bar mi nus so// de nas phya/
194a5(rgyud): na rdo rjes 'di thos nas khros te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul bar dbang bskur te bskos so// de bas na sal
194a6(rgyud): te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bka' stsal na lha chen po 'di 'dul bar 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha chen po la 'di skad ces gsungs so// sems can chen po khas long zhig/ 'dis
194a7(rgyud): khyod gas dang re// de nas bcom ldan 'das la// lha chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum thams cad kyi dbang po rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin ma rungs pa 'di'i
194b1(rgyud): bka' bzhin byed pa bdag cag ma lags so// de nas lha chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das phyagan rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// kye gnod sbyin pa ni
194b2(rgyud): thams cad kyi dbang po chen po/ byed pa po/ 'joms pa po/ skye dgu'i bdag po tshangs pa'o// gtogs 'dod do// dbang phyug chen po'o// des phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen po khros nas
194b3(rgyud): 'di skad gsungs so// khyod ni lus srul po/ mi sha za ba/ ma rungs pa/ drag shul gyi las byed pas na gtum po ste/ sha ba'i lus bsrel ba na ji ltar tshangs pa dang / gtogs 'dod dang / dbang phyug
194b4(rgyud): chen po yin/ tshangs pa zhes bya ba ni mi 'gyur ba'o// gtogs 'dod ces bya ba ni thar pa'o// dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang po ste/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po dang yin pas/
194b5(rgyud): 'dul nus so// de nas dbang phyug chen po lha chen po khros nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ 'jigs su rungs pa chen po'i gzugs khros pa chen po'i gad mos bgad nas/ 'jigs
194b6(rgyud): ba chen por byed pa/ 'bar ba chen po gtong ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mtha' med par gzugs sna tshogs su byas/ 'bar ba chen po'i grub pa/ mi mtshungs pa/ rdo rje dang / mdung rtse
194b7(rgyud): gsum pa dang / 'khor lo dang / sha ka ti dang / be con dang / mi mtshungs pa'i mtshon cha 'debs shing gtong ba rnams kyi tshogs dang / 'byung po'i tshogs dang bcas par kun bstan to// bdud dang bges
