195a1(rgyud): byed pa dang / mtha' dang mu med pa'i gzugs sna tshogs su sprul/ khro bo rab tu mi bzang ba ma rungs pa'i tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu rab tu 'thab cing shin tu 'gyed pa/ gling bzhi pa'i 'dzi//
195a2(rgyud): rten gyi khams mtshan mo'i mun nag tu byas/ 'bar ba chen po'i phung pos glongs te rab tu snang bar byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje 'chang ba chen po cung zad du mche ba'i thog ma gtsigs pa/
195a3(rgyud): smin ma'i mtshams kyi khro gnyer gyi rlabs bskyod pa/ mig g.yon pa cher bgrang de/ rdo rje'i lta ba khro ba dang bcas pas zab mo'i tshig gis shigs pa/ snying po mchog 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal
195a4(rgyud): pa'i dpal zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// hUM/ de nas hUM zhes bya ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun sgra des gang nas/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so// 'khrol
195a5(rgyud): rab tu 'khrol/ kun tu rab tu 'khrol lo// de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha'i tshogs thams cad bcom ldan 'das la skyab tu gsol// bde bar gshegs pa skyab tu gsol zhes nas/ bcom
195a6(rgyud): ldan 'das la skyabs su dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsungs so// gang 'di lta bu'i sngags kyi tshig smra ba ni khyod rab tu mi bgrungs so// de nas phyag na rdo rjes
195a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas/ yang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba 'di gsungs so// oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na grah+Na hUM/ grah+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho b+ha ga
195b1(rgyud): bAn badz+ra hUM phaT/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis lnga chen po la sogs palha'i bdag po thams cad 'khor dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gang na ba der mgo rkang bathog ste/ ri rab ri'i rtse mo
195b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen por btsud nas brlams par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs g.yon pas mnan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
195b3(rgyud): chen po la legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ phyag na rdo rje khyod kyis 'di 'dra bar sems can 'dul bar byed pa legs so legs so// de bas na thul la dbus phyung zhig/ de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub
195b4(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de dag gi don gyi phyir rdo rjes bcings pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba rak+Sha sar+b+ba na swA hA/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis lha chen po la sogs
195b5(rgyud): pa lha de dag dran pa rnyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de dag la 'di skad gsungs so// grogs po dag sems can chen po 'di'i bka' bzhin byed par khas long zhig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
195b6(rgyud): la de dag thams cad mgrin gcig tu bdag cag mchid kyis mtshal lo zhes gsol to// de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yang rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so// hUM
195b7(rgyud): Tak+ki ho/ de nas 'di brjod pa tsam gyis lha la sogs pa thams cad dbang du byas te/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas mchi ma blags te nga ro bton nas skyabs su dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das
196a1(rgyud): la sgrub tu gsol// dbadag cag khyod kyi bka' nyan naji ltar bgyi bsngal du gsol zhes so// de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de rnams la
196a2(rgyud): gsungs pa/ grogs po dag byang chub kyi sems dang / sdom pa gzung bar khas long zhig/ de dag gis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen
196a3(rgyud): bkur bgyid cing byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'tshal lo// de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yang de rnams ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor du btsud nas sdom pa gzung du bcug/
196a4(rgyud): ste byang chub kyi sems brtan par byas pa/ sems can thams cad bde ba stsol// phyan rdo rje bdag che dang // 'dod pa smad par mi bya'o// 'di ni gsang ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag sdom
196a5(rgyud): pa 'dzin du bcug nas dam tshig sbyin pa ni/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsA bi rA ga ya sar+b+ba kA ma na hUM phaT/ de nas de dag gis smras pa/ 'di ni bdud kyis smras pa sa na bdag cag mi nyan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
196a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pas de dag la khyod cag gis 'di la ma brnyas shig ces gsungs pa dang / de dag gis gsol pa/ ji ltar 'dod chags dang bral ba ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bo zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis
196a7(rgyud): bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye grogs po dag pa ni ji ltar 'dul bzhin byed pa ste/ de nyid kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sun 'byin te/ ji ltar bde ba la mi chags pa dang /
196b1(rgyud): sdug bsngal 'dod chags pa ji lta bus 'jig rten 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i chos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'chang bar mdzad de/ de dag sbyang ba'i phyir 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun tu bzang po
196b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpas ci nas kyang 'dod chags dang bral bar ma byed cig ces bka' stsal to// de nas phyag na rdo rjes yang gsungs pa/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsA ma bI rA ga ya sar+b+ba kA mAM hUM phaT/ de nas de
196b3(rgyud): ngag gis ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin no zhes gsol to// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes lag tu rdo rje byin te// rdo rje dbang bskur ba 'di byin no// oM badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+ha baH/
196b4(rgyud): d+ha rod te badz+ra pA Ni hrIHha ha ha ha/ de nas rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba byin pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ dbang phyug chen po ni rdo rje rig sngags mchog go// mthu bo che ni rdo rje sgyu ma'o// tshangs pa ni rdo rje mi smra ba'o// sgra
196b5(rgyud): gzhon nu ni rdo rje dril bu'o// dbang po ni rdo rje 'thab cha ste/ de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi dbang po thams cad rig pa'i blon po chen por dbang bskur ro// de nas bar snang la rgyu ba rnams rdo rje ming gis dbang
196b6(rgyud): bskur ba byin pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ni rdo rje 'khyil ba'o// zla ba ni rdo rje 'ong ngo // be tson rtse mo ni rdo rje be con no// skya spang ni rdo rje skya slong ste/ de rnams ni rdo rje khro bor dbang bskur ro// de nas nam
196b7(rgyud): mkha' la rgyu ba'i lha rnams rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba byin pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ chang gis myos pa ni rdo rje srin po'o// chang byed ni rdo rje 'phreng ba'o// rgyal ba ni rdo rje dbang ngo // rgyal ba skyed pa ni rdo rje rnam par rgyal
197a1(rgyud): bsted de dag la sogs pa ni tshogs kyi bdag por dbang bskur ro// de nas sa pa rnams rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba byin pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ mdzod skyong ni rdo rje gru shing ngo // rlung ni rdo rje rlung
197a2(rgyud): ngo// me ni rdo rje me'o// ku ba ra ni rdo rje 'jigs pa ste/ de dag la sogs pa ni rdo rje pho nyar dbang bskur ro// de nas sa 'og na gnas pa'i lha'i dbang po thams cad rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba byin pa ni// 'di
197a3(rgyud): lta ste dpag ni rdo rje kyo ba'o// gshin rje ni rdo rje nag po'o// sa'i spyi bo ni rdo rje rnam 'dren no// ba ru Na ni rdo rje klu ste/ de dag la sogs pa ni rdo rje bran du dbang bskur ro// de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po
197a4(rgyud): rnams kyis lha mo thams cad kyi lag tu rdo rje byin te rdo rjes dbang bskur nas/ rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba byin pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa ni rdo rje khro ba ma'o// nor can ni rdo rje gser ma'o// tshangs ma ni
197a5(rgyud): rdo rje zhi ba'o// dug mo ni rdo rje gzhon nu ma'o// dbang mo ni rdo rje khu tshur te/ de dag la sogs pa ni rigs kyi blon mo chen mor dbang bskur ro// de nas bar snang la rgyu ba'i ma rnams dbang bskur ba byin pa ni/ 'di
197a6(rgyud): lta ste/ bdud rtsi ma ni rdo rje bdud rtsi ma'o// 'khrungs ma ni rdo rje sdug gu ma'o// be con 'chang ma ni rdo rje be con rtse mo'o// skye 'phrog ma ni rdo rje ked 'chings ma ste/ de dag la sogs pa ni rdo rje khro mor dbang bkrur
197a7(rgyud): ro// de nas nam mkha' la rgyu ba'i ma rnams dbang bskur ba byin pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ gsod ma ni rdo rje gsod ma'o// za ba mo ni rdo rje za ba mo'o// gos ni rdo rje bgo ba mo'o// dga' mo ni rdo rje dbang mo ste/ de
197b1(rgyud): ngag la sogs pa ni rdo rje tshogs ma mong dbang bskur ro// de nas sa la rgyu ba'i ma rnams dbang bskur ba byin pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ zhim ni rdo rje po nya mo'o// rlung ma ni rdo rje bgyogs ma'o// me ni rdo rje 'bar mo'o//
197b2(rgyud): gu be ra ni rdo rje thag gum ste/ de dag la sogs pa ni rdo rje ponya mor dbang bskur ro// de nas sa 'og na gnas pa'i ma rnams dbang bskur ba byin pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ phag mon rdo rje gdong ngo // mgo lpags man
197b3(rgyud): rdo che nag mo'o// sna chang ma ni rdo rje myags ma'o// klu mo ni ngo rje chu srin ma ste/ de dag la sogs pa ni bran mor dbang bskur ro// de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen pos btsud pa de dag thams
197b4(rgyud): kyis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bskyed nas rdo rje'i dam tshig byin pa'o// oM ba li tong ba li tong badz+ra A kaR+Sha ya hUM dza/ lha rnams dgug pa'o// oM badz+ra a gri pi TA ya sa ma ya hUM / bar snang la rgyu ba rnams kyi'o//
197b5(rgyud): oM badz+ra mA lA gral/ 'phreng ba 'chang ba rnams kyi'o// oM badz+ra ban d+ha haM/ sa la rgyu ba rnams kyi'o// oM badz+ra pA tA la b+hAny+dza b+hany+dza hUM phaT/ sa 'og na gnas pa rnams kyi'o// oM he ru ka badz+ra sa ma ya sarba
197b6(rgyud): duSh+TaM sa ma ya mu pra b+hany+dza tsakra hU~M phaT/ ma rnams thams cad kyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag na rdo rjes phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems
197b7(rgyud): can thams cad 'dul ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ma rungs pa'i sems can gyi dkyil 'khor de dag la ji ltar bgyi ba bka' stsal cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ gang gis sems can de
198a1(rgyud): rnams sems can thams cad la phan pa byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur pa'i dam tshig 'gron la tshud cig/ de nas/
198a2(rgyud): yang phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa 'di dag la nan tan ji ltar bgyi/ rims la sogs pa ji ltar bgyi/ dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song gi 'gro ba rnams ji ltar bgyi//
198a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ dam tshig de nyid la nan tan byed du tshud cig/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mi 'di rnams ji ltar nan tan bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
198a4(rgyud): pa de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen por btsud nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du tshud cig/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du btsud nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du tshud cig/ dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du
198a5(rgyud): btsud nas las kyi dkyil 'khor du tshud cig/ de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen po/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// sems can kun la phan
198a6(rgyud): pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs te// grub pa thams cad byed pa'i mchog/ dkyil 'khor chen po bshad par bya'o// de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/
198a7(rgyud): chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul 'dra bar// dkyil 'khor thams cad thig gdab bo// de la srad bu bre ba'i cho ga ni// 'di lta ste/ gsar zhing legs par byas pa dang // tshad ma bzang po'i srad bu yis// shes
198b1(rgyud): rab can gyis srang ze ba// 'jig rten gsum rgyal dran zhing ngo // de yi dbus sug dab pa ni// seng ldeng ngur ba brtan par ro// de las srang bu ze gsungs pa// sradang bu nyis bsab kyis bya ste/ bcu drug
198b2(rgyud): cha ru bgo bar bya// thams cad du ni rim gsum mchog/ kho ra khor yug rigs dag kyang // phur bu yis ni de bzhin no// de yi nang du bya ba ni// srad bu rim bdun ldan par te// tshon ser bri zhim ldan pa
198b3(rgyud): yis// thig rnams kyang ni gdag par bya// de yi dbus su gzhag pa ni// shin tu bkrabs pa'i nas phul bzhi'o// de yi steng du mgon po ste/ sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan gzhag par bya// sangs
198b4(rgyud): rgyas thang 'khor thams cad du// byang chub brgyad ni rim bzhin par// bri 'am yang dag gzhag par bya// tshon sna lnga mchog rnams kyis so// sangs rgyas spyan snga de ru ni// phyag na rdo rje de bzhin no//
198b5(rgyud): bri'am gzhag par bya ba ni// rdo rje hUM zhes par 'dul ba'o// de yin pas ni g.yon pa yis// dbang phyug chen po mnan par bya'o// g.yas pa'i rlabs kyis btsir ba ni// nyon mongs ma yin lha mo'o//
198b6(rgyud): 'dod drug spyod pa'i lha rnams kyang // srad bu rim bdun par dag tu// bri'am yang na gzhag par bya// rdo rje shugs kyis 'gongs nas su// phyi rol byung nas de du yang // gling rnams bzhi yang bri b.ram/
198b7(rgyud): dbyibs dang cho ga ji bzhin du// grwa yi ri mo legs par dgod// gling rnams kyi dbus thams cad du// 'jig rten ji bzhin sogs par bya// tshangs pa la sogs de bzhin rnams// de ru 'jig rten dbang
199a1(rgyud): po dgod// khor khor yug pa'i ri dang // gling rnams kyi yang bar dag tu// pI yi rdo rje rigs rnams kyi// dkyil 'khor yang dag bri bar bya// sgo srungs bri bar bya ba yang /
199a2(rgyud): rje sgo bzhi de dag tu// rdo rje kyo bzhags pa dang // sgrog dang dril bu de bzhin no// kho ra khor yug ri yi ni// phyi rol dmyal ba brgyad rnams so// gnam dal dang ni nad dag dang // mkha' 'gro ma dang
199a3(rgyud): gdon drag rnams// gzhag gam yang na bri bar bya// chos min can ni gzhig phyir ro// de yi phyi rol du dgod pa// gtor ma sna tshogs mchog rnams so// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga 'byung /
199a4(rgyud): de la thog ma nyid du slob dpon gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas 'jug pa ni gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la/ se ral thag gu dmar po thogs nas rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcing
199a5(rgyud): la/ de'i steng du dri zhim po'i me tog gzhag nas snying po 'di brjod la zhugs shig/ oM badz+ra pra tIts+tsha maM ha ha ha ha hi/ de nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sal btsugs nas du ru ka'i bdug pa'am ci bdog
199a6(rgyud): pas gsol to// rdo rje 'dzin ma mdzub mo gnyis kyo btang du byas la snying po 'di brjod do// oM u ru gra bi ri Ni bi ri Ni badz+ra ma ya hi b+hi da ye swA hA/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na de las mtshan ma 'byung ba ni ba
199a7(rgyud): spu g.yo ba la sogs pa dang / sa g.yo ba'am/ dri zhim po'am/ 'od zer mthong ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje'i spyi bor me tog gtor cig/ de nas slob ma gzhug ste/ de thog ma nyid du bkrus nas
199b1(rgyud): slob ma gos gtsang ma bskon te/ gsum la skyabs su btang ba dang / bslab pa'i sdom pa la so sor gnas par byas nas/ de nas byang chub kyi sems sbed cig/ de nas gdong ras kyis g.yogs nas
199b2(rgyud): mgo gtsug tor du byas te/ rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings la chug cig/ bcug nas me tog gtor te/ de nas gang la babs pa de ni de'i lha'o// de nas gdong bcings pa bkrol nas rang gi rig pa'i
199b3(rgyud): lha ston la/ de la mchod cing slob dpon la'ang ci 'dod pa'i yon phul nas// de rang gi rig pa 'am sngags bzlas te phyag rgya'ang bcing ngo // 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba chen po'i rgyal po las
199b4(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'o// de nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ rdo rje 'phreng ba mnyam ldan pas// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor brtag par bya/
199b5(rgyud): 'jug par bya ba de bzhin te// las kyang de dang 'dra bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor de ru zhugs nas ni// de bzhin rdo rje gsor bar bya// 'jig rten gsum rgyal rab bslabs nas// rdo rje mchog ni bsgrub
199b6(rgyud): bar bya// de la rdo rje sgrub pa'i cho ga ni lag pa gnyis rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'dzin pas rdo rje bzung nas ji srid du 'gul ba de srid bzlas so// de phyin chad rdo rje nges la thams cad byed do// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor//
199b7(rgyud): de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor chen po kun bris nas// mtshan ma thams cad bstan par bya// 'jug pa rdo rje dril bu dang // rdo rje 'dzin mchog phyag rgyas so// de la rdo rje dril bu'i
200a1(rgyud): phyag rgya ni 'di yin no// rdo rje 'dzin ma kun byas nas// rdo rje kun tu brtag bya ba// g.yas par bzhag nas g.yon pa yis// dril bu gsil nas 'jug par bya// btsud nas su ni/
200a2(rgyud): dril bu de// mnyam par bzhag pas gsil bar bya// slob dpon gyur cig dam tshig kyang // rtag tu srungs shes brjod par bya// ji ltar dril bu'i sgra 'di ni// de yi mi rtag pa ru gsungs// de ltar khyod la
200a3(rgyud): byin na ni// rdo rje chen po zhes bya 'dis// nges par sreg par 'gyur ba ni// de ste rdo rje 'dzin dang dang // skyabs gsum brtul zhugs de bzhin te// ji ltar byang chub sems 'dod rnams// khyod kyis de tshe
200a4(rgyud): spangs gyur na'o// de la 'di ni dam tshig gi sngags so// oM ha na sa ma ya hUM phaT/ de nas de bzhin du 'dug la/ de nas rdo rje'i chu 'di blud do// de nas gdong bcings pa bkrol nas cho ga bzhin du bya'o// dam/
200a5(rgyud): tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor bris nas su// cha lugs mang po gzhag par bya// btsud nas las rnams thams cad kyang // slob dpon gyis ni de/
200a6(rgyud): bzhin bslab// de nas las kyi rab tu sbyar ba 'di'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thab gru bzhir byas la/ mngar po'i yam shing la me bus la/ mngar po'i me tog dang 'bras bu rnams sbrang rtsi dang mar la
200a7(rgyud): sbags te/ bla gos g.yas su gzar la ku sha'i bam po la 'dug ste/ rdo rje'i tshig tu bzlas shing / zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang du bya ba la sogs pa zhi ba'i las rnams la lag pa g.yon pas bdag gi phyag
200b1(rgyud): rgyu bcings la/ g.yas pas bsregs na de dag 'grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyab tu thab zung gsum dul po'i tsheng ma non pa'i yam shing dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / yal ga dang / 6/
200b2(rgyud): mo dang / sdong bu dang / 'bras bu'ang de dang 'dra bar rang gi khrag gis bskus nas stan mkhrang po la 'dug ste/ bla gos g.yon du gzar la khros pa'i tshig gis bzlas shing g.yon pas bsregs na dgug pa dang /
200b3(rgyud): gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / gzhom pa dang / btsing ba dang / bskal ba dang / myos par bya ba dang / gtan 'pho ba la sogs pa las drag po rnams rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ro//
200b4(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dam tshig gis bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba la sogs pa grub pa thams cad kyi las ni bcom ldan 'das kyi gas
200b5(rgyud): su rtswa 'jam po bting ba la 'dug nas/ stod g.yogs sbyar ma ltar bgos te/ ting nge 'dzin gyis bzlas shing 'khor lo lta bu'i thab tu ngu ba med pa'i mngag ma la til dang 'bras la sogs pa nas 'bras
200b6(rgyud): g.yas g.yon gyis sreg go// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon du rdo rje lta bu'i thab byas la stod g.yogs kyis yan lag thams cad bcings la rmod stan 'jam po la 'dug nas/ yam shing thams cad 'bar
200b7(rgyud): ba'i 'breng ba 'dzings pa'i me la lag pa g.yas pa rdo rje dang bcas pa rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcings nas/ lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur 'dzin pas gzar bu bzung nas 'dzum zhing dga' bar byas te/
201a1(rgyud): rdo rje tshig gis thos shing ro thams cad bsregs na/ rdo rje 'dzin pa dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dung / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba la sogs pa dam pa 'grub pa'i sbyin/
201a2(rgyud): sreg gi cho ga'o// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi cho ga'o// / de nas yo byad bshad par bya'o zhes nas/
201a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga thams cad mthong nas sgrub bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs sam// dam tshig spangs par gyur pa ni// phyag na do /
201a4(rgyud): mi 'grub pa// gsang ba yang dag mi shes pas// bcom ldan sems dpa' 'dod pa'o// chags dang rdo rje de nyid de// de la chags par ma gyur na// phyag na rdo rje mi 'grub bo// de bas yang dag ma
201a5(rgyud): mthong bas// dkyil 'khor du ni grub ma gsungs// yang dag ma mthong grub pa ni// the tshom can gyis mi 'grub bo// bar du 'jigs pa rnyeng nas su// nad kyis kyang ni 'jigs par byed// gdon
201a6(rgyud): yang de la brtson par 'gyur// sho nas dra 'bong du lgang ngo // de ltar dkyil 'khor thams cad du chug la nang dang gdon la sogs pa ston cig/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi kha ngos
201a7(rgyud): ras la bri bar bya ste/ de'i thang 'khor kun tu byang chub sems dpa' brgyad bri ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ g.yas phyogs su ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po dang / 'jam dpal dang / sems bskyed/
201b1(rgyud): ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o// g.yon phyogs su ni rdo rje khu tshur dang / byams pa dang / nam mkha'i mdzod ngo // steng du na ma mkha'i snying po'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi 'og tu ni phyag na rdo rje ste
201b2(rgyud): rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i phyag na rdo rje dang bcas pa lag pa gnyis kyis bcing ngo // lag pa gnyis po gzhan la/ g.yas pa ni rdo rje gsor/ g.yon pas ni me tog gi gzhu dang mnga' lnga bsnams pa/ sku mangs
201b3(rgyud): ni ut+pal sngon po lta bu/ yid tsam 'dzum la mche ba chung zad gtsigs pa/ khro ba dang bcas pas bzhad pa'i zhal/ phyir brkyang bskum du gnas pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs g.yon
201b4(rgyud): bas lha chen po'i 'gram pa g.yon par mnan/ zhabs g.yas pa bskums pas u ma'i nu mar btsir te/ stod g.yogs khra bos yan lag g.yogs pa ko rlon gyi smad g.yogs can kade bzhin
201b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad dbu rgyan du thogs pa'o// de nas tshes zhag gcig nas mgo brtsams te tshes bco lngar ram/ zla bar ram/ le'i bar du nyin re bzhin brgya stong bzlas te/ gos dkar po gtsang
201b6(rgyud): ma bgo sa la/ bdag gi khyim du gnas shing zas gtsang ma yid bzhin du zos te bzlas na/ de nas zla ba gcig lon pa dang / zla ba dang pos ni hUM zhes bya bas phyi rol gyi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro//
201b7(rgyud): gnyis kyis ni las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// gsum gyis ni bcom ldan 'das rmi lam du ston cing 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa thams cad ston to// bzhis ni sems can thams cad dgug pa dang
202a1(rgyud): dbang du byar nus so// zla ba lngas ni yid bzhin du snang ba dang mi snang bar 'gyur ro// zla ba drug gis ni ci 'dod pa thams cad kyi gzugs su 'gyur ro// zla ba bdun gyis ni bdag/
202a2(rgyud): gi lus sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / phyag na rdo rje ston cing cho 'phrul thams cad kyang ston to// zla ba brgyad kyis ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha la sogs pa dgug
202a3(rgyud): pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byed cing las su bsgo'o// zla ba dgus ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byed do//
202a4(rgyud): ba bcus ni sa bcu thob par 'gyur ro// zla ba bcu gcig gis ni bcu gcig pa sangs rgyas kyi sa thob bo// zla ba bcu gnyis pas ni rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de nas sgrub pa bstan te/ ra sa la rdo rje hUM
202a5(rgyud): zhes pa de bzhin du bris la/ de'i thad 'khor thams cad du mthu chen po la sogs pa nas/ kru ba ru Na'i mtha'i bar du bcom ldan 'das la sgong ning pus mo gtsugs pa bris la/ de nas de bzhin du bzlas pa ni/
202a6(rgyud): rdo rje hUM zhes pa ni phyag rgya grangs med par bzlas te/ zla ba'i mtha'i bar du tshes nyi shu dgu'i mtshan thal byung bzlas na nang par thams cad 'ong ngo // 'ongs nas kyang dbang du 'gyur te thams cad bsgo ba bzhin du byed do//
202a7(rgyud): de nas sgrub pa gzhan 'byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bris nas gser gyi mdangs kyi lha mo la sogs pa thams cad rang rang gi phyag rgya sgreng nas gar byed ci'i mi sdug pa 'jigs pa'i gzugs su bri'o// de/
202b1(rgyud): nas de bzhin du zla ba gcig gi mtshan thal byung du thos shig/ de nas nang par kun lhags te/ de bzhin du gang dag gis grub pa po la mchod do// 'di ni rtog pa 'dir bris pa bzhin no snyam du bsams nas des mi
202b2(rgyud): 'jigs par bya'o// de nas dbang du 'byung ste/ rtag tu las thams cad byed pa'i g.yog mor 'gyur ro// de nas cho ga gzhan te/ ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bris la/ de nas de bzhin du brgyang stong
202b3(rgyud): du ba bras na nub tha ma la rdo rje 'dzin pa thob ste/ ci 'dod pa grub pa'i mchog kyang thob bo// gzhan yang sgrub pa phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar 'bum zlos shig/ de nas dgos pa kun bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad /
202b4(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar ci 'dod par yam shing thams cad kyi sbyin sreg gis lo gcig gi bar du bsregs na thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas rdo rje hUM zhes pa bris pa de'i spyan sngar lo gcig gi bar du grangs
202b5(rgyud): med par zlos shig/ de nas tha mar bcom ldan 'das rang gis ci 'dod pa'i mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar rdo rje hUM zhes pa'i phyag rgya bcings la de bzhin gshegs
202b6(rgyud): pa 'gul gyi bar du zlos shig/ de nas phyag rgya 'grub par 'gyur ro// grub pa des na dgug pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / gzhug pa dang / drang ba dang / ltung ba dang / dbab pa dang / stan 'pho ba la sogs
202b7(rgyud): ba las bran tshogs kyi bcings pas rdzu nas pa ma'angango // de nas cho ga gzhan te/ rig pas dbang bskur bar bya bar 'dod na dri'am/ 'ji ba las phyag na je rje'i cha lugs byas la phyag gnyis brkyang ste ngo
203a1(rgyud): 'dzin to// de zla ba yar gyi tshes gcig nas brtsams te/ tshes bco lnga'i bar du mar ba ni bre brgyad kyis khrus shig/ de nas tha mar mtshan thal byung ba zlas so// de nas nang par gzus/
203a2(rgyud): de bzhad de/ de nas rig pa thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro// de nas sgrub pa gzhan 'byung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi cha lugs dri 'am/ 'ji ba la de bzhin du phyag brkyang ba rdo rje 'dzin par byas la/
203a3(rgyud): de'i zhabs kyi bar du spos chus bkrus nas/ de phyin chad yid bzhin du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas sgrub pa gzhan te/ ras la bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje phyag bzhi par byas la/ de'i phyag g.yas par
203a4(rgyud): pad+mo/ g.yon par rdo rje/ g.yas par rdo rje hUM zhes pa/ g.yon par mda' dang gzhu/ de nas de'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas pa'i mjug tu zhag gsum smyung ba byas te mtshan thal byung bzlas na/ de'i nang
203a5(rgyud): par de dang 'dra ba'i gzugasasu 'gyur te/ bskal par gnas shing mi dga' ba dang / sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba dang / thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas dkyil 'khor sgrub pa 'byung ste/
203a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor mthong bas lci ba gsum gyis khrus byas/ dus gsum du gos brjes la/ rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings nas brgyad stong dus gsum du nyin bdun bzlas na/ de nas phyag na rdo rje slob dpon gyi/
203a7(rgyud): gzugs su byas nas rmi lam du thams cad smra'o// de nas dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i cho ga gzhan 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor chen po mthong bas zla ba gcig gi bar du de bzhin du dus gsum du khrus byas nas dus
203b1(rgyud): gsum du brjes/ dus gsum du ba lang gi sgribs dkyil 'khor byas te/ rno lcags kyi mtshon chas der rdo rje bris la/ de la lha zhing rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/ brgyang brgya bzlas ma tha ba gcig gi
203b2(rgyud): mthar bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo // de nas rdo rje sgrub pa 'byung ste/ rdo rje ras sam/ rtsig pa 'am/ shing leb la bris nas/ de la mchod pa byas te rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung la/ lo gcig tshun chad rdo rje nam
203b3(rgyud): 'bar gyi bar du zlos shig/ 'bar ba des na nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / lo bcu drug lon pa'i lus phyag na rdo rje dang mtshungs pa'i gzugs dang / stobs dang / mdog tu gyur te/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams
203b4(rgyud): cad dang ldan pa/ bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// tshe'ang lo stong phrag brgyar 'gyur ro// de nas ral gri sgrub pa 'byung ste/ rdo rje khu tshur gyis ral gri bzung la lo gcig gi bar du bzlas na rig
203b5(rgyud): 'dzin thams cad kyi bdag po rig 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de nas 'khor lo sgrub pa 'byung ste/ 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bris la lcags kyi 'khor lo thogs nas/ nam rdo rjer gyur cing slar yang 'khor lor gyur gyi pha
203b6(rgyud): du bzlas so// de nas de thogs pas na rig 'dzin thams cad kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro// de nas kyo ba tang sgrub par 'dod pas phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar gser gyi kyo btang byas te lag pa g.yon pa'i ngo
203b7(rgyud): khu tshur gyis bzung la/ grub pa rnam gsum du gyur kyi bar du bzlas la dros pa tsam gyis thams cad kun 'gugs nus par 'gyur ro// dud pa byung ba tsam gyis thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur ro// 'bar bas/
204a1(rgyud): ni thams cad 'gugs nus pa dang / dbang du bya nus shing rig 'dzin gyi rgyal por 'gyur ro// de nas lha la sogs pa 'gugs pa 'byung ste/ lha chen po la sogs pa lha rnams gang yang /
204a2(rgyud): rung ba'i cha lugs rkang pa g.yon pas mnan la rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings te/ bsdigs shing zla ba gcig gi mtha'i bar bzla sa na lha thams cad lhags te/ las thams cad byed pa'i g.yog tu 'gyur
204a3(rgyud): ro// daklu dbang du bya bar 'dod na klu'i mtshor lte ba man chad chu'i nang du bcug la lo gcig tshun chad klu thams cad rang gi gzugs su ston cing las thams cad byed pa'i g.yog tu gyur kyi bar du bzlas so//
204a4(rgyud): gnod sbyin dbang du bya bar 'dod pas gnod sbyin gang la gnas pa'i gnas der rdo rje hUM zhes pa'i phyag rgya bcings la gnod sbyin de dag lhags te bka' ci stsal ces smra ba'i bar bzlas so// de phyin chad bka'
204a5(rgyud): thams cad byed pa'i g.yog tu 'gyur ro// de nas ma rnams thams cad dbang du bya bar 'dod pas ma'i gnas su song nas khro mo'i snying khar rdog pas mnan la zla ba gcig lon gyi bar du bzlas tshes nyi shu dgu la
204a6(rgyud): 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra chen po 'byin par byed do// de nas dbang du gyur nas bka' bzhin byed pa'i g.yog mor 'gyur te/ phrag pa la khyer nas mtho ris su 'khrid do// slar yang khrid de 'ongs nas tshogs kyi
204a7(rgyud): bdag por bcug cing de dag gis mchod de/ sngon ma byung ba'i don thams cad dang / 'dod pa thams cad dang / na chung thams cad 'gug go// 'di lta bu'i rnal 'byor yang ster te/ rnal 'byor gang gis khro
204b1(rgyud): bo 'jig rten du'ang 'gro zhing phyir yang 'ong ngo // de la sus kyang cung zad kyang byed mi nus so// de nas dpal chen mo sgrub par 'dod pa des phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar bzlas pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i sku las lha mo'i lus
204b2(rgyud): mthong gi bar du ste/ de las ma 'gul ces bsgo'o// de phyin chad don thams cad ster bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas pa'ang ster ba'i bar du'o// de nas mchod byangs ma dbang du bya bar 'dod na/ de nas phyagan
204b3(rgyud): rdo rje'i spyan sngar yi ge 'phreng bar byas la/ 'phreng ba'i yi ge bkod cing mthar phyin pa'i bar du bklags te/ nyin re zhing dus gsum du las byas la/ de nas brgyad stong bzlas na bla ba gcig lon pa dang mchod
204b4(rgyud): dbyangs ma mthong ngo // de phyin chad thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gtsug lag thams cad dang pa shes gnyen can du bya ba thams cad
204b5(rgyud): dang / ba zo thams cad kyang ma bsrabs par nges rab tu shes so// de nas lig bu mig dang / gur kum dang / ldong ros dang / ba bla rnams la sgrub pa 'byung ste/ lig bu mig blangs la/ 'jom pa'i
204b6(rgyud): steng du gzhag nas lag pas mnan te grub pa rnam gsum byung gi bar du bzlas so// gcig gis ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro// gnyis pas ni gzugs mang por 'gyur ro// gsum pas ni gnas gong mar
204b7(rgyud): 'dzag pa nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gur kum la sogs pa bzung ste/ 'jom pa'i bu gar gtsug la rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas mnan nas 'dod pa thams cad kyi bdag po dang / rig 'dzin dang /
205a1(rgyud): thams cad du 'gro ba dang / tshe lo stong du thub par 'gyur ro// de nas sA la b+hany+dzi ka sgrub pa 'byung ste/ gnas gang na sA la b+hany+tsi ka ri mor bris pa 'am/ gzugs su byas pa de'i
205a2(rgyud): 'jom pa la sor mo bzhag ste/ tha ba gcig gi bar du thos shig/ de nas tha ba gcig mthar mtshan thog thag thos shig/ de nas nang par rang gi gzugs su bstan nas 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa'i chung
205a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin ma sgrub par 'dod pas gnod sbyin ma gang na 'dug pa'i gnas der 'dug la/ rang gi gzugs su 'ongs kyi bar du bzlas na de la 'dod pa thams cad ster ba'i bran mor 'gyur ro// de/
205a4(rgyud): nas sha za mo sgrub par 'dod pas phyag dar phung po mes btang ste/ lag pa g.yon pas rang gi mtshan ma de bzung la g.yas pas gzegs ma bsregs pa ni phyag dar gyi phung po de las ji tsam du sha za mo gdong mangs
205a5(rgyud): gzugs mi sdug pa 'ongs te rang gi gzugs su gnas so// de'ang de bzhin du bran mor 'gyur ro// de nas ci bgyi sgrub par 'dod pas nyin zhag gcig smyung ba byas la/ tshes nyi shu dgu la brgyad stong bzlas te/
205a6(rgyud): de nas zla ba gcig slong mo la za zhing grangs med par bzlas te/ zla ba gcig lon pa dang nub gsum smyung nas mtshan thag thag bzlas so// de nas nang par ci bgyi 'ongs nas des mi 'jigs par byas te/ de nas
205a7(rgyud): de rangs nas 'grub bo// de phyin cang 'dod pa thams cad 'bul ba'i g.yog tu 'gyur te/ mtho ris kyi lha mo'ang 'grub cing 'bul lo// de yang skyel zhing slar yang 'gug go// 'das pa dang / ma 'o
205b1(rgyud): pa dang / da ltar gyi thams cad kyang sgra'o// gzhan gyi nor thams cad kyang thogs nas 'phrul lo// de nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs bya bar 'dod pas dngos grub med pa gang yin pa des tha ba drug gi zung /
205b2(rgyud): nyin zhag bcu bcu zhing spyad pa snga ma rjes la slong mo'i kha mas la sogs pa nas rlung bza' ba'i bar du'o// de nas mjug tu mtshan thal byung bzlas na nang bar sangs rgyas pa'ang sbyin par 'gyur ro// de nas
205b3(rgyud): nyin re zhing bco brgyad kyi bar du sngon gyi spyad pa rnams byas la/ de'i mjug tu mtshan thal byung ba zlas na nang par las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba ni hUM zhes thang cig brjod pas kyang ngo // de nas ro
205b4(rgyud): langs sgrub pa 'byung ste/ ma smas ma nyams pa'i mi ro blangs la legs par bkrus nas byug pas legs par byugs te/ me tog gi 'phreng bas btags nas rkang pa g.yon pas mnan la dbugs
205b5(rgyud): byung gi bar du bzlas na de ldang ste langs pa dang / de zhon na thams cad du 'gro zhing tshe'ang lo stong phrag brgyar 'gyur ro// de nas ro langs kyi grub pa mchog sgrub pa 'byung ste/ ma smras nyams pa'i miro
205b6(rgyud): blangs nas de bzhin du rab tu brgyan bzhon te langs shing yang 'gyel ba'i bar du bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur 'gyur ro// de phrag pa la khyer na de bzhin gshegapa mams cad bsrel ba'i rig 'dzin
205b7(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang / tshe'ang bskal par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// de nas ma bsgrubs kyang dkyil 'khor mthong
206a1(rgyud): pa nyid kyis las su 'gyur ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ thang cig brjod pas ni bdag dang / gzhan dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / rgyal po la sogs bsrung bar 'gyur ro// mtsham
206a2(rgyud): bcad pa la sogs pa ni brtan par blta bas mtshams bcad pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mi 'da' na gzhan lta ci smos/ sa'i dkyil 'khor dang / nam mkha' dang / phyogs bcings pa'ang lta ba
206a3(rgyud): des so// dbab pa ni reg pa dang ma reg pas ral gri dang / me long dang / snod dang / mthe bong dang / shing ljon pa dang / bris pa dang / cha lugs dang / gzhu dang / mda' dang / rdo rje la
206a4(rgyud): sogs pa dbab pa'i phyag rgya gos kyis g.yogs la bcings te/ gu gul gyi bdug pas dbab bo// gdon zhi bar bya ba ni hUM zhes pas so// hUM zhes pa'i phyag rgyas ni sems can thams cad 'bungadra
206a5(rgyud): par byed do// rdo rje lcags sgrog gi phyag rgyas ni byad ma'i gdon las thar par 'gyur ro// he ru ka rdo rje'i phyag rgya bstan pas ni byad mas bsad pa las slar gso bar bya'o// rdo rje'i phyag rgya bzung bas sgra
206a6(rgyud): las bzung ste bslangs pas ni dug mnan pa dang / dug bslang ba dang / dug zhi bar bya ba dang / dug spo ba dang / dug gzhig par bya ba dang / dug gis shi ba las gso bar bya'o// rdo rje hUM zhes pa
206a7(rgyud): gcig gis so// gter dbyung ba ni zangs kyi ril ba chus bkang la/ rdo rje hUM zhes pa'i mdzub mo dang gu gul gyi sa bdug pa byas te bzlas na gal te gter yod na ni chu de ldud do// de ste med na ni 'khyil lo//
206b1(rgyud): de nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i hUM zhes pa bzlas te blang ngo // snang ba dgug pa ni dong ka'i ljon pa'i yam shing gi sa me bus te/ zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis ra dza ko ga te ka'i me
206b2(rgyud): tog la bskus nas stong brgya ba sregs na snang ba thob bo// 'og gi gnas su rdo rje 'og gi phyag rgyas 'khrul 'khor thams cad bcom nas rdo rje hUM zhes pa bzlas te zhugs na de la sus kyang gtse bar mi
206b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// gtogs 'dod kyi 'khor los kyang ci'ang byed par mi 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar rdo rje 'am/ nor bu ma ra ga ti'am / pad+ma rA ga 'am/ mu tig gam/ gser ram/ dbyig gam/
206b4(rgyud): gzhan ci'ang rung ba 'am/ skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs la lo gcig gi bar du dus gsum du brgya brgyar bzla sa nas/ de nas lo gcig lon na brgya 'gyur du 'gyur ro//
206b5(rgyud): de snyed du brgyar ba bla sa na de snyed kyi brgyar 'gyur ro// de nas stong du bzlas na'ang stong du 'gyur ro// longs spyod dgug pa ni stong phrag brgyar bzlas so// dgug pa ni rdo rje kyo ba tang gi phyag rgyas
206b6(rgyud): zla ba bzhes khugs so// dbang du bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas so// sems can thams cad gtan 'pho ba ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa'i phyag rgya bcings te stong phrag brgyar bzla sa na/ sems
206b7(rgyud): can thams cad yid kyis dmigs pa bzhin gtan 'pho'o// chu mnan pa ni rdo rje phyag rgya bcings la chu'i steng du 'gror rung ba'i bar du bzlas so// me mnan pa ni thang cig bzlas pas so// lo tog srung
207a1(rgyud): ba ni rdo rje blta bas te/ de la srog chags rnams gang gis kyang gnod par mi 'gyur zhing / byi ba la sogs pa'ang 'da' bar mi byed do// rdeg pa spong ba ni khro bo'i lta bas te/
207a2(rgyud): gang du bltas pa der 'pho'o// bza' ba dang btung ba thams cad spong ba ni 'bar ba'i lta bas rang gi snod du 'bo'o// sdig pa dang sbrul thams cad med par bya ba ni thang cig brjod pas so// gcan gzan
207a3(rgyud): thams cad la thang cig bzlas pas med par 'gyur ro// kun po thams cad pham pa ni rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pas so// dmag las sgrol ba ni rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas so// gzhu dang / mda' dang /
207a4(rgyud): mdung dang / rgyal mtshan mnan nas 'gul gyi bar du bzlas te/ de thogs na dmag thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// zhal che la ni thams cad gcig brjod pas rtsod pa'i lan thebs par 'gyur ro//
207a5(rgyud): zhi ba thams cad ni til gyi sbyin sreg gis so// rgyas pa thams cad ni yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg gis so// gtan 'pho ba thams cad ni tsher ma'i sbyin sreg gis so// 'tshe ba dang / ga na ma dal dang /
207a6(rgyud): mi lam ngan pa thams cad gzhil ba ni til dang 'bras kyi sbyin sreg gis so// gzhom pa thams cad ni hUM zhes pas so// dgod du gzhug pa dang / myos par bya ba thams cad la phaT ces bya bas so//
207a7(rgyud): thams cad gnyid log tu gzhug pa ni bsku ma la mig btsums te brgya bzlas pas thams cad gnyid log par bya ba yin no// sems can thams cad rgyas gdab pa ni rdo rje khro bo'i lta ba sa na rgyas btab
207b1(rgyud): par 'gyur te/ nyin bdun las lhag par mi gson no// ngag dbrog pa ni rang gi lce sos bzung nas hUM zhes bya ba'i bar du sbyar ba'o// snying drang ba ni rdo rje sor mo'i phyag rgya dpung pa bsnol te
207b2(rgyud): rang gi mtshan khung du grong zhing snying po bzlas na nub bdun tshun chad 'pho bar 'gyur ro// snying gcad pa ni rdo rje blangs te gcad par bya'o// snying dbye ba ni rdo rje lcags bur gyis btab ste/ ming nas
207b3(rgyud): smos shing gzugs so// snying spo ba ni lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje blangs te/ mtshan bdun du rab tu sbyor ba byas pas 'pho bar 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya 'di rnams las thar bar bya ba bshad do//
207b4(rgyud): des rgyas 'debs pa la ni khu tshur dam pas so// ngag dbrog pa la ni rdo rje ngag gi bzlas pas so// snying 'dren pa la ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya snying khar dgrol lo// bcad pa la ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa bzlas nas
207b5(rgyud): 'o mas khrus shig/ phye ba la phur bu phyung nas rdo rje dris skus shig/ snying spros pa la ni rdo rje snying por thar par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byad ma'i phyag rgya'ang spo bar 'gyur ro// snying sgrub par 'dod na bud
207b6(rgyud): med kyi snying khar bzlas na de'i snying kha nas sgra thos par 'gyur ro// skyes pa'i snying khar yang de bzhin du bya ste/ snying kha thams cad du'ang de ltar ro// de nas pha rol gyi sems shes pa sgrub par 'dod pas
207b7(rgyud): ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa brgyar bzlas na pha rol gyi sems shes so// sngon gyi gnas shes par bya ba ni rdo rje hUM zhes bzlas pas so// rmi la ma mthong bar 'dod pas ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas
208a1(rgyud): shing 'dug pa sa ka pi tsas bdugs te gnyid log na/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi shes pa ston to// tshig sgrub par 'dod pas na no//
208a2(rgyud): rje tshig gi stong phrag brgya bzlas na rdo rje tshig gis rang gi lces smras pa thams cad bden par 'gyur te ci bslangs pa de stsol to// cho 'phrul ston pa ni rdo rje bzlas pa tshig gis brgyad brgya bzlas na rang gi lus pa/
208a3(rgyud): cho 'phrul du gyur pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rdo rje 'dzin dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin la sogs pa sems can thams cad gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du ston to//
208a4(rgyud): rang gi gzugs ci dga' bar bsgyur bar 'dod pas rdo rje tshig gis rdo rje bzlas pas stong phrag brgya bzlas na gzugs gang dang gang 'dod pa de dang / bdag sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su'ang byed par 'gyur ro//
208a5(rgyud): mi snang bar 'dod pas rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje bzung la/ rdo rje bzung bas mi snang bar 'gyur ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas so// btang bas ni 'grol lo// khri'u la 'dug nas rdo rje lag tu blangs te nam 'phar
208a6(rgyud): gyi bar du bzlas so// gdon gyis 'dzin du 'jug na rdo rje hUM zhes pas so// gdon gar byed du 'jug pa ni hi zhes pas so// gdon bskyod pa ni hag ces pas so// gdon gzhom pa ni phaT ces pas so//
208a7(rgyud): gcer bar bya ba ni mi'i sgra'i skud pas rang gi dpung pa bcings na gcer bar 'gyur te gos brje bar 'gyur ro// sdang bar bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgral bas so// bskrad pa ni rdo rje khu tshur gyis
208b1(rgyud): 'phang ngo // dgos pa bskyed pa ni mtshan thog thag sha chen rang gi khrag gis bskus te sreg go// gzhan gyi bud med dgug pa ni rdo rje bzung nas snying po bzlas shing dgug gam/ yang na thams cad du khyab pa hUM/
208b2(rgyud): zhes pa thams cad bya'o// bud med thams cad dga' bar spyod pa ni rang gi rtags rdo rje 'acings pas bzung la nyin bdun dus gsum du langs kyi bar du slob bo// de nas mjug tu nam byed bar du bslabs na
208b3(rgyud): rtag tu ldang la mi snyoms shing bcud mang la rtags shugs drag por 'gyur ro// bu mo spyad pa ni rdo rje bzung nas thams cad du khyab pa hUM zhes bya ba byas nas spyad do// bud med thams cad dbang du bya ba ni rngo
208b4(rgyud): rje hUM zhes pa'i phyag rgya bcings la stong phrag brgya bzlas na bud med thams cad mgu bar 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la stong phrag brgya bzlas
208b5(rgyud): na bud med thams cad mgu bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad dbang du bya bar 'dod na rdo rje khu tshur gyi bcings pas rdo rje bzung la nam 'gul gyi bar du bzlas so// snang ba la dbang du bya bar 'dod na/
208b6(rgyud): blangs te rang gi spyi bor bzhag la spyi bor rdo rje brtan par gyur kyi bar du bzlas so// de nas snang ba'i mdun du 'dug na des snang bar rang gi dbang bskur ba yang stsal to// nor dgug pa ni rin po che'i gtse za'
208b7(rgyud): phye mas sbyin sreg bya bas so// char dbab pa ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa stong bzlas pas so// char gcad pa ni hUM zhes pa'o// ser pa gcad pa ni rdo rje gsor ba'i phyag rgyas so// gdon dgag pa yang phyag rgya de nyid
209a1(rgyud): kyis so// sprin dgag pa ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa brgyar bzlas pas so// rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag nas me tog dang bdug pas mchod de/ rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas mnan la rdo rje
209a2(rgyud): langs kyi bar du bzlas so// de thogs nas sa bskor na ci 'dod pa bzhin du rgyu'i las rnams ston te/ rdo rjes bskor bas dus ma yin par shing la 'bras bu dang me tog mthong ngo // nam mkha' la me tog gi/
209a3(rgyud): 'phreng ba chags par bya ba ni dbugs bsdams la rdo rje khu tshur bcings te gtor na 'chags so// cha lugs bzhad par bya ba ni rdo rje'i phyag rgyas so// gar byed par bya ba ni rdo rje 'dzin mas so// smra bar bya
209a4(rgyud): ba ni hUM zhes pas so// rgyug par bya na rdo rje dgug pa'i phyag rgyas so// smin ma 'gul bar bya na rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'dzin pas rdo rje thogs la rang gi smin mtshams su bskul bas so// sa g.yo bar bya na rkang pa
209a5(rgyud): g.yon pa brdabs pas so// khyim bskul ba ni rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgyas so// khang pa dgug pa ni rdo rje khros pa'i kyo ba btang gi phyag rgya bcings pas so// sprin med par char dbab pa ni rdo rje hUM zhes baH
209a6(rgyud): pas so// skad cig tu sprin 'du zhing ston pa ni rdo rje bskor bas so// zla ba dang nyi ma dbab cing brtan pa ni rdo rje 'dra bas pas so// nyi ma dang zla ba mang por bstan na rdo rje bzhi nam mkha' la gtor bas so//
209a7(rgyud): dmag nam bzhi bstan na rdo rje bskor bas so// mtshan mo nyin par du bya na rdo rje 'bar ba bskor bas so// nyin par mtshan mor bya na mig btsums la rdo rje bskor bas so// thams cad nas rdo rje bstan na@
209b1(rgyud): bzlas te rdo rje bskor bas so// thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa' bstan na stong bzlas te rdo rje bskor bas so// phyag na rdo rje thams cad la bstan na stong phrag brgya bzlas te bskor bas so// thams cang /
209b2(rgyud): nas sangs rgyas bstan na rdo rje la bye ba bzlas so// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las// rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i rtog pa chen po rdzogs so// de nas
209b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsungs so// ngas kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir gang 'jig rten
209b4(rgyud): gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir brtson par 'gyur ba la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'di sbyin no// de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas cog tsog pur
209b5(rgyud): 'dug ste mnos pa/ oM badz+ra bid swA hA/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu g.yos/ sems can thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos nas phyag 'tshal zhing
209b6(rgyud): dbang du gyur to// de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas rdo rje rig pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// dkyil 'khor chen
209b7(rgyud): po'i tshul du dkyil 'khor thams cad brtags te/ de'i dbus su nas phul bzhi la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te/ de'i spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje yid kyis kyang cog cog pur gzhag go// de nas de bzhin du
210a1(rgyud): gzhug go// zhugs nas 'di skad du khyod deng nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid do// de ste dang na de bshad do zhes sgos shig/ des smras pa/ gsungs shig ces pa dang / de nas/
210a2(rgyud): khyod dang phan chad de bzhin gshegs par gyur to zhes smros shig/ des smras pa/ ci'i phyir/ dkyil 'khor mthong ba'i phyir zhes des smos shig/ gang dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa de de bzhin gshegs
210a3(rgyud): pa nyid du blta ste/ des sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang tshe 'di nyid dam pha rol la thob par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas phyag rgya slobs shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas phyag na rdo rjes
210a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bshad do// dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris nas bcug la rdo rje'i sgrub pa sgrub bo// lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje bzung la rang gi phyag rgya rlom
210a5(rgyud): modade rdo rje zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/ snying po sgom pa ste/ rdo rje tshig gis bzlas na des de bzhin gshegs pa'ang tshe 'di'am gzhan la thob par 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro// thams cad dam chi/
210a6(rgyud): chen po'i tshul du byas la 'di smros shig/ dang brtan phyag na rdo rje la// de bzhin gshegs rigs de bzhin no// sems can thams cad mgu ba ru// khyod kyis de ltar brtag par bya// deng nas khyod kyi
210a7(rgyud): de ltar ma byas na sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// yang dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris la bcug nas las rnam bzhi yang bslab bo// lus thams cad kyis gdug
210b1(rgyud): te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas/ de nas langs te yan lag lngas phyag byas te sdig pa thams cad bshags so// de nas langs nas thal mo sbyar te pus mo gnyis sa la gtugs nas
210b2(rgyud): bsod nams thams cad kyi rjes su yi rang ngo // de nas langs te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs la/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo
210b3(rgyud): rje'i tshig gi badz+ra bi dzod cig/ des ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / phyag na rdo rje la phyag bya ba dang / bkur sti dang / mchod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa
210b4(rgyud): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mchod pa'i cho ga'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje'i rig pa sgrub pa 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor mthong nas ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pabris pa/
210b5(rgyud): dede'i g.yas su spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po// g.yon du rdo rje khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bya'o// de nas gso sbyin can dus gsum du khrus byed pa/ dus gsum du bkrus pa'i gos gyon la stong /
210b6(rgyud): phrag brgyar bzlas so// de'i mjug tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur bcings nas mtshan thal byung bzlas na nad par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gshegs te zhal ston to// mchog ci
210b7(rgyud): 'dod pa stsol te/ sangs rgyas pa'i bar du'ang stsol to// de nas yang cho ga bzhin te/ ras la de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i steng du bzhugs par byas la/ de'i spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje thal mo sbyar te tsog/
211a1(rgyud): tsog pur 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la blta bar bya/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs su phyag na rdo rje ya gcig gis rdo rje gsor g.yon pa na 'dra'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi/
211a2(rgyud): g.yon phyogs su rdo rje khu tshur te khu tshur gnyis kyis rdo rje bsnams par byas la/ de nas tshes gcig nas brtsams te zla ba gcig de bzhin du bzlas la zla ba tshang nas mtshan thal byung ba zla sa na de ltar
211a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa byon nas mchog ci 'dod pa stsol to// yang cho ga gzhan ni ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bris la de'i spyan sngar zla ba drug de bzhin du bzlas te/ mjug la nyin mtshan
211a4(rgyud): gsum du sbyangs te phyag na rdo rje byon nas phyag na rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid byin gyi bar du bzlas so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du stong phrag brgya bzlas na 'jug tu de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo //
211a5(rgyud): nam mkha' la bltas te stong phrag brgya bzlas na nam mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ngo // des de la phun sum tshogs pa thams cad nyin gcig bzhin stsol to// sa nges rgyas kyi spyan sngar stong
211a6(rgyud): phrag brgya bzlas na mchog 'thob bo// phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas na phyag na rdo rjes 'dod pa thams cad stsol to// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas//
211a7(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po sa la ga nas bzung ste/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten du khrid cing slar yang khrid de 'ong ngo // 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ de bzhin
211b1(rgyud): gshegs pa'i rtog pa tshogs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpas yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'jig
211b2(rgyud): rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir snying po gang brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje'i ri ltar mi g.yo ba'ang bskyod cing 'dren na sems can gzhan lta ci smos kyi
211b3(rgyud): dgos gang dran pa tsam gyis kyang 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par dgrol bar 'gyur ro// gang brjod pa tsam gyis kyang mtshams med pa thams cad lhag ma ma lus par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / thams
211b4(rgyud): cad la srung bar 'gyur ba dang / phyag na rdo rjes kyang 'dod pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ba dang / mchog stsol ba dang / don thams cad sgrub pa dang / dgos pa thams cad byed cing rtag par phyi bzhin 'brang bar
211b5(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / gang bslabs pa tsam gyis grub pa thams cad mngon par 'gyur bar stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la 'di skad ces
211b6(rgyud): bka' stsal to// phyag na rdo rje khyod kyis legs par smros shig/ ngas kyang gzung ngo // de nas phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje snyems pa dang bcas pas rdo rje gsor te/ rang gi snying khar bstod pa'i tshul gyis bzung nas rang
211b7(rgyud): gi snying po 'di gsungs so// Tak+ki hUM dza/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu g.yos so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ 'bar/ rab
212a1(rgyud): 'phar/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bskyod/ rab tu bskyod par gyur to// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang ma rung bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying por
212a2(rgyud): gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis brtan par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i grub pa'ang sra bar gyur to// bdud dang mi bsrungs pa'i phyogs thams cad kyang
212a3(rgyud): brlag par byas so// gdon thams cad bcos bsang bcom ste 'angar pad pad nas/ bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag skyobs/ bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag skyob
212a4(rgyud): shig pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de dag la bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje 'di nyid la skyabs su deng zhig dang / 'di nyid kyis khyed la skyob par byed do// phyag na rdo rje'i snying kha nas kun tu 'bar
212a5(rgyud): ba sa bskor bas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phreng ba la sogs pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'dzum zhing khro ba/ phyag gnyis kyis me tog gi gnu 'gengs pa/ phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje hUM zhes
212a6(rgyud): pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dod pa'i khro bo phyung nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can kun 'dod pa'i khro bos sbyangs nas phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar 'dug ste bka' nong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis
212a7(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ nga ji lta ba de bzhin du khyod kyis kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyis shig ces so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsungs so// lag na rdo rje de bas na khyod
212b1(rgyud): snying po gang gis sems can 'di dag thams cad brgyal ba dang / bcos pa dang / bcom pa kun 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang / gzhan dag kyang rdo rje'i lus thob par 'gyur ba de smros shig/ o rje jo go cha'i byad/
212b2(rgyud): rgya 'dis bdag nyid go bgos na/ rdo rje'i lus dang rdo rje'i tshe thob cing srung bar yang 'gyur te/ nam 'tsho'i bar du thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpas rdoH
212b3(rgyud): 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor che// gru bzhi pa de sgo bzhi pa'o// rta babs bzhi dang bcas pa ste/ bcu drug
212b4(rgyud): cha dang ldan par ro// rdo rje'i ra bas mdzes pa ste// grwa dang sgo yi zung dag dang // de bzhin ta babs mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen ldan par bya// ba dan 'phreng ba dril gyis brgyan// dang po ra/
212b5(rgyud): phyi yi dkyil 'khor 'di// snying po bzlas shing bri bar bya// de yi nang gi 'khor lo yang // rdo rje srang bu mnyam ldan pa'o// rdo rje'i ka ba brgyad ldan zhing // rdo rje'i ka ba mdun gnas su// dkyil 'khor
212b6(rgyud): brgyad kyi tshul du ste// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bzhag pa'o// de yi dbus su sems dpa' che// phyag na rdo rje bzhugs par bya// sangs rgyas rin chen thams cad dag/ dbu rgyun du ni rgyan thogs pa// cung zad
212b7(rgyud): tsam du bzhad pa'i zhal// rdo rje snyems par mdzad pa ste// me tog mda' gzhu 'chang ba'o// de las gzhan pa phyag bzhi pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs nyid de// khro gnyer band pa'i zhal po can/ gaganyis
213a1(rgyud): kyis me tog gzhu 'gengs shing // gnyis kyis rdo rje hUM mdzad pa'o// rdo rje car gyi g.yas phyogs su// rdo rje dga' ba bri bar bya// snying khar rdo rje bstan 'dzin cing // 'khyud pa
213a2(rgyud): lta bu'i sbyor bas so// phyagan rdo rje'i rgyab tu ni// chu srin rgyal mtshan 'chang ba ste/ sems dpa' rdo rje dpal can te// rin chen char pa rab tu 'bebs// rdo rje can gyi g.yon bris pa// rdo rje snyems pa
213a3(rgyud): dmar po ste// gnyis kyis rdo rje snyems pa 'dzin// sgeg pas mchod cing 'dud pa'o// dkyil 'khor grwa yi gnas rnams su// mchod pa'i lha mo bri bar bya// dpyid kyi rdo rje rdo rje'i sprin// ston ka'i
213a4(rgyud): rdo rje kha ba mo// phyi yi dkyil 'khor grwa dag tu// 'dod pa'i gzugs la sogs pa bri// sgo yi dpung rnams thams cad du// rdo rje 'dod pa'i kyo ba sogs// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po dar/
213a5(rgyud): rdorje slob dpon nyid rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya bcings la zhugs la 'di skad du spros shig/ sems can kun gyi yid khyab cing // sems can kun la bde ba stsol// sems can kun gyi bar gyur pa'i// rdo rje
213a6(rgyud): sems dpa' bdag deng 'grub// Ta ki hUM dzA kade nas de skad smras pa dang 'bab par 'gyur te/ de ltar babs pa tsam gyis phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das mthong bar bstan pas grub
213a7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyang stsol te/ la la ni rdo rje 'dzini la la ni 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas slob ma gzhug ste snying po'i phyag rgya bcings la/ des 'phreng ba bzung nas gos dmar pos yan lag bcings la
213b1(rgyud): ras dmang pos mig gnyis bkab ste bcu ga nas 'di skad ces smos shig/ khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba'i mi mkhas pa su la'ang gsang ba 'di dag mi bskyang bar byos shig/ 'byung po'i gdon/
213b2(rgyud): dang 'phra men ma la sogs pa'i gdon gyis bsad par gyur ta re ka shi nas kyang dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes bsgo nas gdong khrol cig/ de nas 'dig ce smos shig/ gang dpung na ba 'di ni bcom
213b3(rgyud): ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje ste/ 'di ni dang po'i sems dpa' 'dod pa'i bdag po 'dod pa'i dbang po kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems dpa' 'o// gang mdun na pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'di'i thugs yin te 'dod pa'i
213b4(rgyud): khro bo'o// gang g.yas na ba 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi reg pa'i bde ba ste/ rdo rje dga' ba zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'o// gang rgyaban pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid che ba'i rgyal
213b5(rgyud): mtshan te/ sems dpa' thams cad kyi byams pa slong ba dang nor sbyin pa'o// gang g.yon phyogs na pa 'di ni bdag nyid che ba'i bdud de/ sems can thams cad chags par byed pa'o// gang grwa'i bzhi
213b6(rgyud): po 'di rnams ni dus kyi mchod pa me tog dang bdug pa dang / mar me dang / dri'i lha'o// gang phyi'i grwa'i gnas na ba de dag ni gzugs la sogs pa 'dod pa'i yon tan no// gang sgo srungs de dag ni mig
213b7(rgyud): dang 'dod chags pa dang / mdza' ba dang mi mdza' ba ste/ kyo ba tang dang / zhags pa dang / sgrog dang / 'bebs pa dag ni rgol bar mi 'gyur ro// khyod kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa thams
214a1(rgyud): cad kyi bdag po la spong bar ma byed cig/ gang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la sems can thams cad rnam par bya ba'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba 'chad de// de ci'i phyir zhen pa mu stegs
214a2(rgyud): can gyi rnams 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nges thar pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chags pa rnams ni sems can thams cad la chags pas na thar pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
214a3(rgyud): rnams bdag gi chung mas kyang sems can sdud par byed de/ 'dod chags ni byang chub tu bstan pa'o zhes so// de nas snying po byon cig/ Taka hUM dza / 'di bsgrubs na bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i
214a4(rgyud): mchog 'grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das grub pas na 'dod pa'i khro bo grub par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ snying po 'di bdag nyid che ba ste / Tak+ka zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'o// hUM zhes pa ni khro bo'o//
214a5(rgyud): de nyid dgug pa'i phyir dza zhes bya ba ni 'di khyod kyis bsgrub par bya'o// de nas phyag rgya chen po shes par slobs shig/ de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje'i thugs bslabs nas lag pa/
214a6(rgyud): gnyis su rdo rje sbyin pa'i snying po ni 'di'o// oM badz+ra d+ha ra badz+ra pra tang d+hA ra ya sid d+hiT k+ki hUM dza/ de nas 'phreng ba phyag na rdo rje la phul bas de'i mgo la bskon no// de nas rdo rje ming gi dbang sbyin pa sbyi
214a7(rgyud): po 'dis so// oM badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa sar+b+ba karme shwa rad tre i daM badz+ra nA ma na ma a d+hiSh+Thi te dr-i D+ho s+ya b+ha ba oM Tak+ki hUM dza/ de nas der 'dug ste/ phyag rgya chen po bcings nas rdo rje tshig gis brgyad stong bzla sa na/
214b1(rgyud): de nas sa g.yo ste grub pa thams cad lan cig bzlas pas 'grub bo// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la brgya ba zlas na de'i thugs dbang du 'gyur ro// de phyin chad sems can thams cad kyi snying shes pa/
214b2(rgyud): dang sems can thams cad kyi sgying la dbang byed do// thams cad kyi snying du sdug par 'gyur ro// thams cad kyi brtan par chags so// snying thams cad las tshig thos par 'gyur ro// gyur pa
214b3(rgyud): dang 'gyur ba dang / da ltar gyi tshig bden par 'gyur ro// bdag gi snying las kyang cho 'phrul rnam pa ba ni mthong zhing gzhan la'ang ston to// de'i snying las rdo rje 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de na sems
214b4(rgyud): can thams cad kyis mi song ba dang / mi tshugs pa dang / mi gcod pa dang sha mi phyed pa'i ji rje'i lus su 'gyur ro zhes/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa bya ste/
214b5(rgyud): rdo rje'i thugs pastod pa'i glus bstong ngo do// de phyin chad grub pa thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur te/ 'dod pa thams cad dang gsang ba'i mchod pa thams cad myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas mchod pa/
214b6(rgyud): thams cad kyis 'dra bar mchod nas/ ji snyed pa'i zas dang / ro dang / spyad pa thams cad kyis tshim par byas nas 'byung ngo // rdo rje 'khor lo chen po'i tshig rgyas pa'o// / de nas rdo
214b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du rdo rje 'dod pa khro bo la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i lha ba bzhin bris te zhugs nas/ mchod pa'i lha rnams kyis gar gyi mchod pas snyim pa ma stongs par byas te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po
215a1(rgyud): bcings la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rdo rje'i glu'i rdo rje'i bzlas pas 'bum bzlas so// de nas rdo rje de lci bar 'gyur ro// de nas slar yang bar 'gyur ro// de nas de
215a2(rgyud): ltar mtshan gcig thal byung du bzlas na nang bar rdo rje 'dzin tam/ rdo rje khro bo stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bdag po lha'i gzugs dang / mdog dang / rgyan dang /
215a3(rgyud): spyan gsum pa la phyag bzhi pa 'dod pa'i mdangs dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ rdo rje 'dzin gyi tsher 'gyur ro// rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa'o// / de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor te/
215a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po'i srad bus thig btab ste/ de nas lha mo rnams bris la/ de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba bzhin du gzhag nas 'di skad smos shig/ ho badz+ra satwa su ra ta s+t+waM/ de'i spyan
215a5(rgyud): sngar rdo rje gzhu 'gengs pa'i gzhu bris te/ de'i phyag rgya ni 'di'o// badz+ra a shwe hUM/ g.yas su rdo rje dga' mgu 'khyud par bya'o// de'i phyag rgya ni 'di'o// badz+ra ke li hUM/ rgyab tu chu srin rgyal mtshan
215a6(rgyud): 'chang ba byams ma'i rdo rje bri/ de'i phyag rgya ni 'di'o// badz+ra a gri ho/ g.yon du rdo rje snyems ma bris te/ rdo rje g.yon du sbyor bar bya/ de'i phyag rgya ni 'di'o// badz+ra gar+b+he hi na/ de nas grwa dang sgor ya
215a7(rgyud): rang gi lha mo bri/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon nyid shin tu chas la rdo rje lag tu thogs bud med kyang brgyan te/ lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcings la/ dpung pa gnyis kyis 'khyud de zhugs la 'di skad
215b1(rgyud): brjod do// sa ma ya s+t+waM a haM/ su ra ta ho Tak+ki hUM dza/ de nas brjod pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das ston par mdzad de/ phyag rgya thams cad 'grub pa dang / dam tshig thams cad 'grub pa'ang stsol/
215b2(rgyud): to// de nas slob ma'ang de bzhin du snying po'i rdo rje de nyid kyis btsud nas 'di zhes smros shig/ khyod kyis dam tshig 'di las ma 'da' zhig/ ma bde ba ma spangs par myur du shi zhing ngu 'bod chen por skyes par
215b3(rgyud): gyur ta re// de nas dam tshig brjod do// bdag che kun gyi phyag rgya ni// 'dod pa bsam las yang dag 'byung // de bas khyod kyis sdig med pa'i// 'dod dang bsam pa ma gtang zhig/ 'di ni dam tshig
215b4(rgyud): srung ba'i sngags so// oM Tak+ki hUM phaT/ 'dis rdo rje'i chu blung ngo // gang dngos po gzhan thams cad kyi phyir yang mnas bsgag ste/ de dag la'ang rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'dzin pas blung ngo // gang gis 'di las
215b5(rgyud): 'das na zla ba phyed kyis snying 'gas so zhes/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dam tshig chen pos gsungs so// de nas phyag rgya bcing ba bslab bo// de nas de bzhin du 'byung ngo // shin tu dga' ba'i rdo rje
215b6(rgyud): zhes bya ba gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris nas nyid kyi sku 'am mtshan ma gzhag go// der btsud nas las rnam bzhi bslab par bya'o// de la dang po nyid du 'dod pa
215b7(rgyud): thams cad stsol bar gyur te/ phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen po bcings nas rdo rje 'dzin phyag bzhi pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phreng ba la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i skur bdag nyid mthong ba de
216a1(rgyud): srid kyi bar du bzlas so// de phyin chad 'dod pa thams cad nus par 'gyur ro// de nas khro ba'i las bslab ste/ rdo \u0f7f hUM zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings la bzlas na de bzhin gshegs/
216a2(rgyud): pa thams cad thang cig bzlas te/ hUM zhes pas bsdigs na de bzhin gshegs pa'ang 'gyel bar 'gyur ro// de phyin chad 'gro ba gnas pa thams cad kyang 'gyel nus par 'gyur ro// de nas phyag na rdo rje'i/
216a3(rgyud): las 'byung ste/ sems can thams cad 'dod pa dang / khro bo gnyis kyis 'dul bar 'dod na/ rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas me tog la sogs pas mchod pa byas te/ rdo rje thugs kyi phyag rgya bdag gi snying khar ba
216a4(rgyud): la da phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar rdo rje 'dzin thob pa de srid du bzlas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las byed par 'dod pas/ phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar byang chub tu sems bskyed la sbyin pa sbyin/ tshul
216a5(rgyud): khrims bsrung / bzod pa bsgom/ brtson 'grus brtsam/ bsam gtan la snyoms par gzhag/ shes rab yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ ci 'dod ci nus kyis bya zhing rtag tu bzlas pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i sku
216a6(rgyud): 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur mthong gi bar du bya'o// de nas sa bcu po 'thob ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i las byed pa'i byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro// las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o//
216a7(rgyud): de nas bsgrub pa 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs par// dam tshig shes pa ma yin dang // slob ma ma yin gzhan rnams la// mi zad snying po 'di mi sbyin// dkyil 'khor mthong bas sgrub pa ni/
216b1(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas na sar bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas ras la bris te/ ras kyi dbus su ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bri/ de'i g.yas su phyag na rdo rje phyag ba ni
216b2(rgyud): pa'i thugs ka nas thugs 'byung ba de bzhin du bri/ g.yon du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po phyag bzhi pa ste/ gnyis na ni pad+mo'i ting nge 'dzin 'chang / gnyis kyis ni me tog gi gzhu 'gengs pa kha dog dmar po
216b3(rgyud): bri spyan sngar de bzhin du rdo rje 'dod pa'i khro bo bri'o// steng du nam mkha'i snying po bri/ grwar mchod pa'i lha rang gi mchod pas bkram pa dang mgo bor ro// de nas ras la bris pa'i spyan sngar zla ba bzhir dus bzhir
216b4(rgyud): stong bzlas shing bsgrubs na/ de nas zla ba tshang ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa'ang stsol bar 'gyur ro// ras la bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bris la/ sems dpa' chen po dang lha mo'ang de bzhin du
216b5(rgyud): bya'o/ de'i spyan sngar zla ba gcig tu grangs med par bzlas shing 'dod pa thams cad zos la bsgrubs te/ de nas zla ba gcig lon pa dang / phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la/ mtshan thal byung bzlas na nang
216b6(rgyud): par rdo rje 'dzin 'thob bo// ra sa la bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje bzhin du bri sa la/ de'i spyan sngar zla ba phyed kyi bar du rtag par bzlas pa mi nyal mi mnal bar bzlas te/ de nas zla ba phyed lon pa dang mtshan mo/
216b7(rgyud): thal byung du bzlas na nang par phyag na rdo rje dang mtshungs pa dang / 'dod pa'i longs spyod chen po dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad kyang 'thob cing thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ras la bcom ldan/
217a1(rgyud): 'das khro bo de bzhin du bris la/ de'i spyan sngar rdo rje shugs kyi phyag rgya bcings te/ stong phrag brgya bzlas na nges 'grub par 'gyur te/ bsgo ba bzhin las thams cad byed do//
217a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du'ang khyer zhing slar yang khyer te 'ong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i bde ba thams cad khyer te 'ongs nas de la sbyin no// des kyang longs spyod par nus na lha'i bu/
217a3(rgyud): mo thams cad lta ci smos/ brgya byin yang stsol to// phyag na rdo rje 'dzin pa nas sangs rgyas kyi bar du bsgo bas stsol bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams
217a4(rgyud): cad bkug ste dbang du byed do// phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar rdo rje thugs kyi phyag rgya bcings nas stong phrag brgya bzlas na/ de nas phyag na rdo rje nyid kyi dpal gyi lha mo khrid de byon nas sgrub pa po'i mdun du 'dor ro//
217a5(rgyud): de nas sgrub pa pos bcom ldan 'das khyod nyid bdag gis grub par 'tshal gyi/ 'di ci 'tshal zhes smros shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes te ci 'dod pa'i mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// grub pa
217a6(rgyud): thams cad kyang 'grub bo// spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na spyan ras gzigs dbang pos mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'bum brdzas na dbang stsal
217a7(rgyud): bar 'gyur te/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad ngo // rdo rje gzhag ste de'i mdun du 'bum bzlas na de nas las thams cad yid bzhin du grub par byed do// phyag rgya chen po bcings nas
217b1(rgyud): 'bum bzlas na phyag na rdo rje 'dzin gyis mchog stsol to// dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na rdo rje 'dzin mngon du mthong ning phyag rgya'i las kun grub pa'ang stsol bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje lag tu tho/
217b2(rgyud): nas 'bum bzlas na rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje bzung ba tsam gyis mi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'khor lo thogs te 'bum bzlas na 'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// kyo ba btang thogs te 'bum bzlas na kyo btang
217b3(rgyud): des thams cad 'gugs nus par 'gyur ro// zhags pa thogs te 'bum bzlas na zhags pa des thams cad drang nus par 'gyur ro// lag pa gnyis rdo rjes bcings pa bsdams te 'bum bzlas na sems
217b4(rgyud): can thams cad bcing nus par 'gyur ro// rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na gnas pa dang 'gro ba thams cad dbab nus par 'gyur ro// rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum
217b5(rgyud): bzlas na hUM zhes bya ba gcig gis gnas pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad skad cig gis ltung bar byed nus par 'gyur ro// lha chen po rkang pa g.yon pas mnan la 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya
217b6(rgyud): bcings nas 'bum bzlas na/ tha ba gcig tshun chad kyis der 'ongs te dbang du 'gyur ro// mthu bo che rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te 'bum bzlas na 'khor lo thob ste/ 'khor lo de thogs na 'grub par 'gyur/
217b7(rgyud): rodadatshangs pa mnan te 'bum bzlas na tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ro// brgya byin rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te 'bum bzlas na rdo rje sbyin par 'gyur te/ rdo rje bskor bas char gcad pa dang / dbab pa dang / zang
218a1(rgyud): cig gis ni gnam lcags dang ser ba 'bebs so// sa nad gzhon nu mnan te 'bum bzlas na gzhon nu ma thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro// las thams cad kyang byed par 'gyur
218a2(rgyud): ro/ nyi ma la bltas te 'bum bzlas na bdud rtsi rna cha sbyin par 'gyur te/ des na lha'i lo stong 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// zla ba la 'bar ba'i lta bas mgu bar bltas te stong phrag brgya bzlas na zla ba gnyis su mthong ste
218a3(rgyud): de phyin chad zla ba dang mtshungs pa'i 'od dang mdangs su 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyi mig tu mdzes shing / sems can thams cad kyi snying du sdug par 'gyur ro// gza' chen po'i gzugs la bltas te/
218a4(rgyud): 'bum bzlas na de nas be con thob ste/ be con des ni 'thabs na dgra las rgyal te nor thams cad 'thob bo// skya slong gi gnas su song ste 'bum bzlas na skya slong las kun byed do// rgun gyis myos pa
218a5(rgyud): mnan te 'bum bzlas na chang gi snod thams cad nam 'tsho'i bar du mi zad par 'gyur ro// ma d+hu ka ra la bltas te stong phrag brgya bzlas na dbang bskur ba thob par 'gyur ro// rgyal ba la bltas te 'bum
218a6(rgyud): bzlas na 'thab mo dang rtsod pa'i g.yul thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// rgyal ba thob pa mnan te 'bum bzlas na thams cad rgyal bar 'gyur ro// mdzod skyong rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te 'bum bzlas
218a7(rgyud): na bza' ba dang btung ba mi mi bad par 'gyur ro// 'gro ba thams cad kyang 'di la zad par mi nus so// rlung mngon du byas te stong phrag brgya bzlas na rlung gis de dang mthun par 'dod pa thams cad byed par
218b1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// me la bltas te 'bum bzlas na me'i dbus su 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang / 'gro na'ang mi 'tshig ste/ me'i gzir gyur cing nyin gcig kyang gser srang re re sbyin no// ngal bso bo mnan//
218b2(rgyud): 'bum bzlas na gnod sbyin thams cad kyi bdag por gyur nas nor thams cad kyang sbyin par 'gyur ro// phag mo mngon du byas te stong phrag brgya bzlas nas la 'dug pa'i gter 'byin no// gshin rje mnan te
218b3(rgyud): 'bum bzlas na mi 'chi bar 'gyur ro// gnam 'dren pa'i cha lugs la bltas te stong phrag brgya bzlas na de las thams cad pa'i g.yog tu 'gyur ro// klu ba ru Na mnan te 'bum badz+ra sa na klu thams cad las
218b4(rgyud): kun byed pa'i g.yog tu 'gyur ro// ma'i gnas su song nas stong phrag brgya bzlas na ma thams cad g.yog byed cing don thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// sa la 'dug ste 'bum bzlas na sa'i dbang por
218b5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// nam mkha' la bltas te 'bum bzlas na nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i sems can thams cad bsgyel ba dang / dbang byed par 'gyur zhing nam mkha' 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sa'i 'og mngon du byas te/
218b6(rgyud): stong phrag brgya bzlas na sa'i 'og na 'khor pa kun la dbang du 'gyur ro// rin po che thogs te 'bum bzlas na stong phrag brgyar 'phel bar 'gyur ro// gser gyi dong tshe la sogs pa'ang de bzhin no// skyes pa/
218b7(rgyud): bzung ste 'bum bzlas na stong phrag brgyar 'phel bar 'gyur ro// bud med bzung ste stong phrag brgya bzlas na stong phrag brgyar 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rta la zhon te 'bum bzlas na 'bum du 'phel bar 'gyur ro//
219a1(rgyud): glang po che la zhon te 'bum bzlas na 'bum du 'phel bar 'gyur ro// ba lang la sogs pa phyugs kyi rwa gnyis bzung ste 'bum bzlas na stong phrag brgyar 'phel bar 'gyur ro//
219a2(rgyud): gos dang rgyan gyi chas la stong phrag brgyar bzlas na stong phrag brgyar 'phel bar 'gyur ro// dpal mo la bltas te 'bum pa zlas na dbang du 'gyur ro// mtsho dbyangs ma la bltas te 'bum bzlas na tshig rnam
219a3(rgyud): par dag par 'gyur ro// de nas bslangs na ci bslangs pa de kun ster bar 'gyur ro// gtsug lag thams cad dang rnam par shes pa thams cad shes par 'gyur ro// grub byed ma bzung nas 'bum bzlas
219a4(rgyud): na 'das pa dang / da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa kun kyang ston cing ched du ma bslangs par nor sbyin par 'gyur ro// sA la ban tsi ka mnan nas 'bum bzlas na nyin re bzhin yang gser gyi dong tshe brgyad brgyad ste
219a5(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// gos kyi sgrog ma la mnan te 'bum bzlas na mi zad par 'gyur ro// gong dang gang gi snod mnan te 'bum bzlas na de dang de mi zad par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin gyi cha lugs mnan
219a6(rgyud): 'bum bzlas na gnod sbyin gyis ci dang ci 'dod pa kun sbyin par 'gyur ro// srin po mnan te 'bub bzlas na de de'i g.yog tu 'gyur ro// 'byung po mnan te 'bum bzlas na 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag po
219a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// sha za'i cha lugs bris pa mnan te 'bum bzlas na de de'i g.yog byed par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gnod sbyin pa la sogs pa'ang sgrub bo// ri la 'dzegs te 'bum pazlas na ni ri thams cad
219b1(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur ro// phyugs kyi lhas su 'dug ste 'bum bzlas na phyugs thams cad la dbang du 'gyur ro// shing sngon gyi drung du 'bum bzlas na shin ljon pa'i lha rnams mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro// zhing la
219b2(rgyud): 'dug ste 'bum bzlas na bza' ba 'bum dang ldan par 'gyur ro// tshong pa dang bcas pa'i grong du 'bum bzlas na nor thams cad ma bslangs par thob par 'gyur ro// gnas byin can du 'bum pa zlas na
219b3(rgyud): thams cad la dbang du 'gyur ro// grong du 'bum bzlas na zla ba gcig tshun chad kyis grong de thob bo// gtsug lag khang du 'bum bzlas na gtsug lag khang na gnas pas nor thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro// lha'i
219b4(rgyud): rten du 'bum bzlas na lhas nor thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro// khang pa stong par 'bum bzlas na sha za thams cad de'i g.yog tu 'gyur te/ dgos pa thams cad sbyor bar 'gyur ro// snang ba'i gnas su
219b5(rgyud): 'bum bzlas na snang ba dbang du 'gyur ro// skyed mos tshal du 'bum bzlas na skyed mos tshal gyi me tog dang 'bras bu thams cad rtag tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mtshor 'bum bzlas na mtsho de'i lha la dbang
219b6(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// gter gyi gnas su 'bum bzlas na gter rang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dgod cing 'bum bzlas na rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur te/ bgad pa tsam gyi sa las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro//
219b7(rgyud): khros pas 'bum bzlas na thams cad gtan 'pho bar nus par 'gyur ro// cang mi zer bar 'bum bzlas na sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// lkugs pa'i brtul bzhugs kyis 'bum bzlasan
220a1(rgyud): tshig thams cad kyi dbang du 'gyur ro// bud med kyi 'jom par rtags btsugs te/ 'bum ba zlas na 'dod pa thams cad kyi bdag po dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'grub par 'gyur ro//
220a2(rgyud): 'jom pa la mdzub mo btsugs te 'bum bzlas na de byas pas gnas pa dang / 'gro ba dang / thams cad 'dren cing 'gugs pa dang / gtong ba dang / 'gyel ba dang / slong bar 'gyur ro// 'jom pa
220a3(rgyud): lta zhing 'bum bzlas na bud med thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// 'jom par lig bu mig bcug ste 'bum pa bla sa na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'dzem par gur kum bskus te 'bum bzlas na des bskus pas
220a4(rgyud): 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur ro// 'jom par ba bla bcug ste 'bum bzlas na nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'jom par ldong ros bcug ste 'bum bzlas na rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro// ral gri
220a5(rgyud): thogs te 'bum bzlas na ral gri can gyi rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro// 'khor lo thogs te 'bum bzlas na 'khor lo can gyi rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro// kyo ba btang thogs te 'bum bzlas na kyo ba btang des thams/
220a6(rgyud): cad 'gugs nus par 'gyur ro// rdo rje gsor nas stong phrag brgya bzlas na rdo rje rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro// phyag ni rdo rje lag gis bzung nas 'bum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo rje 'dzin pa'i
220a7(rgyud): rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa la lag gis bzung ste 'bum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byed pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas rjes su dran
220b1(rgyud): zhing 'bum bzlas na sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bas 'grub par 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal zhing 'bum bzlas na phyag na rdo rjes kyang de mchod na gzhan gyis l+h+waci spos/ spyan ras gzigs dbang /
220b2(rgyud): phyug gi zhabs las bzung ste 'bum bzlas na ting nge 'dzin thob bo// rdo rje snying po bzung nas 'bum bzlas na nor thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro// rdo rje khu tshur bcangs la rdo rje khu tshur gyi spyan sngar 'bum bzlas
220b3(rgyud): na khu tshur bsdams pa tsam gyis las kun byed nus par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzhon nu la blta zhing 'bum pa zlas na nam mkha' la yi ge snang ste thams cad smra ba dang spobs pa thogs pa med par thob par
220b4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la bskor cing 'bum bzlas na dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i mdzod la bltas te 'bum
220b5(rgyud): bzlas na nam mkha' la rgyu ba thams cad dang / don thams cad dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa thams cad kyi bar du ston to// byams pa'i zhabs la bzung ste 'bum pa zlas na
220b6(rgyud): mtho ris kyi 'dod pa'i bde ba thams cad nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor bris nas 'bum bzlas na dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi bdag po slob dpon dang / yid kyis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro//
220b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen por brtags te zhugs nas 'bum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje 'dzin dang bcas par 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar phyag rgya chen po bcings la dkyil 'khor chen por
221a1(rgyud): 'dug ste/ rdo rje'i bzlas pas stong phrag brgya rdo rje tshig gis bzlas na dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / bshes gnyen thams cad dang / las thams
221a2(rgyud): cad kyang nus par 'gyur ro// 'dod pa'i bdag po dang / dbang phyug dang / byed pa po dang / 'byin pa dang / mi zad mi nyams pa dang / 'dod pa thams cad nyams su myong zhing bde ba dang yid bde ba thams
221a3(rgyud): cad rnyed cing 'thob ste/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba 'grub pa'i sbyin par 'gyur ba dang / de rang shig nyen dang / bshes gnyen dang / grogs thams cad kyis kyang mthong ngo // de dag
221a4(rgyud): la'ang 'grub par byed do// bsams pa tsam gyis sgyu ma thams cad ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi cho 'phrul yang ston to// de
221a5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'ang ston to// skad cig gis gzugs sna tshogs su ston par 'gyur te/ rdo rje 'dzin gyi tshe dang / stobs dang / gzugs dang / na tshed dang / shes pa ji tsam
221a6(rgyud): pa dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro zhes/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// dkyil 'khor chen por 'dug ste dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas khro bo'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing don gyis 'bum/
221a7(rgyud): bzlas na des rdo rje khro bo lta bur bdag gi lus 'gyur ro// hUM zhes pas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang 'dzin pa dang / khams gsum gyi dbang po dang / spyan gsum pa'i khro bo chen por 'gyur nas ma/
221b1(rgyud): lus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing mchod pa dang / sems can thams cad grub pa gsol te/ de ltar mi zad mi nyams par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so//
