221b2(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ phyag na rdo rje'i rtog pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po byang chub sems
221b3(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying dri stsal to// gang brjod pa tsam gyi
221b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon du grub pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / gnam dal dang / 'tshe ba dang / nad thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
221b5(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ legs so legs so// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po khyod kyis smros shig/ de nas 'phags pa spyan ras/
221b6(rgyud): gabigs kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so// A ro li ka/ de nas 'di brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lhan cig tu 'dus te/ ri/
221b7(rgyud): rab ri'i rtse mor bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i dkyil 'khor du gyur te zhugs so// de nas
222a1(rgyud): / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang gi snying ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas yang dag par bgad pa// dkyis
222a2(rgyud): 'khor chen po dam pa ste// 'jig rten gsum rgyal tshul bzhin du// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de dbus srad bu mnyam pa ru// grwa bzhi par ni gdab pa ru// gnyis pa'i grwa ni sgor bstan te/
222a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor mchog ni bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor brgyad kyi tshul du ste// dbus su thig ni bzhi yang bri// tshon rtsi dmar po dag gis ni// pad+mo 'dab brgyad bri bar bya// de yi snying po'i dbus su ni// 'di/
222a4(rgyud): rten mgon po bzhugs par bya// 'dab ma kun gyi steng rnams su// sangs rgyas cha lugs bri bar bya// pad+ma che mchog phyag rgya yis// der ni slob dpon zhugs nas kyang // dkyil 'khor gnas su
222a5(rgyud): 'dug nas ni// rnal 'byor snyoms par 'jug par bya// ji ltar pad+mo chu rnams dang // nyes pa'i bag chags mang po yis// chags par mi 'gyur de bzhin 'dir// 'gro ba chags pas dag par gyur pa
222a6(rgyud): yin/ da'adi lan cig brjod nas sgom ste/ de nas mdzub mo gnyis kyi kyo ba btang gis kun drangs la pad+mo chen po de spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i spyan sngar grol lo// de la pad+mo chen po'i kyo ba btang ni 'di'o//
222a7(rgyud): oM ma hA pad+ma hUM dza hriH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ra sa gzigs dbang po nyid byon te/ slob dpon la zhal ston par mdzad nas yang na 'od zer yang 'gyed do// de nas phyag rgya de nyid kyis slob ma
222b1(rgyud): gtsug go/ dkar pos g.yogs la gos dkar bzags la/ zong dkur pos lagol gtsug tor byas nas bcug ste/ tshigs su bcang pa 'di brjod nas don yang bstan par bya'o// de nas lag pa
222b2(rgyud): g.yon par brjo byin/ g.yas par sngags kyi nor bu bskur la 'di skad smos shig/ sangs rgyas thams cad pad+mo che// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// rtag pa ru ni brtag par bya// khyod ni deng nas spyan ras
222b3(rgyud): gzigs dang de nas phyag rgya chen po bcing ba dang // ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa bslab bo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po pad+mo zhes bya'o// de nas pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/
222b4(rgyud): pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris la/ dbus kyi snying po la 'dug nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la pad+ma 'dab mkha' byed pa'i tshul gyis lta zhing stong phrag brgya bzlas na 'phags pa kun
222b5(rgyud): tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po thob bo// pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor de bzhin du byas la de'i dbus su pad+mo stong bzhag ste/ de nas pad+mo re re zhing bzang
222b6(rgyud): po thang res bcom ldan 'das la pad+mo stong 'bul lo// de nas slob ma bcug ste dam tshig brjod do// slob min bu min ma yin te// dam tshig can la dam tshig bstan// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad ni/
222b7(rgyud): dag pa nyid ni pad+ma bzhin// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhin bris la mchod pa rnam pa bzhis mchod do// sangs rgyas thams cad yid kyis te// phyag na rdo rje'i tshig
223a1(rgyud): gis so// lus kyis 'jig rten mgon po ste// nam mkha'i snying po las kyis so// las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang pos sgrub/
223a2(rgyud): pa'i cho ga 'di gsungs so// ras la bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang po ri rab ri'i rtse mo na rang gi ting nge 'dzin du zhugs shing / de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad mtha' kun tu bzhugs par bri/ de nas
223a3(rgyud): zla ba yar gyi tshes nag gcig nas brtsams nas rtag tu thams cad dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rgyun du bzlas te nam spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i zhal nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku byung nas sgrub pa
223a4(rgyud): po'i pad+mo'i dbus su bzhugs te/ yang de las gzhan pa'i sku byung nas sgrub pa po'i dbang bskur bas gnas su brtan par 'gyur gyi bar du bzlas so// de nas spyan ras gzigs kyi skur kun gyur te/
223a5(rgyud): skad cig gcig gis bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro zhing ldog go/ sems can thams cad kyang mthong ste/ tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// de nas sgrub pa 'byung ste/ 'bum bzlas na
223a6(rgyud): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// nyis 'bum bzlas na mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa thams cad ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur ro// sum 'bum bzlas na bsod nams thams cad
223a7(rgyud): mngon du 'gyur ro// de nas dngos grub thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / bshes gnyen thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya chen/
223b1(rgyud): po bcings te stong phrag brgya bzlas pa'i mjug tu mtshan thal byung ba zlas na/ de'i nang par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byon nas de'i snying khar zhugs te/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thob bo// yang /
223b2(rgyud): na khar zhugs na spyan ras gzigs dbang po thob bo// de nas ma bsgrubs kyang las su 'gyur ba ni dang po brjod pas bdag srung ngo // gnyis brjod pas ni gzhan dang / grong dang / grong khyer srung ngo // gsum
223b3(rgyud): pa brjod pas ni las thams cad byed do// dbab pa ni tsan dan gyi bdug pas so// gdon thams cad zhi bar bya ba ni hrIHzhes bya bas so// sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba ni rdo rje me tog bzlas te byin
223b4(rgyud): nod de sems can thams cad mnan pa ni sa ser pos so// bud med dbang du bya ba ni su ma na'i me tog la bsngags pas so// chom rkun mnan pa ni yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg gis so// ri dgas dang bya
223b5(rgyud): mnan pa ni yungs kar gtor bas so// sgyu ma mnan pa ni rma bya'i chang bus so// rmi lam mthong bar bya ba ni dus gsum du bzlas pas so// rmi lam ngan pa gzhil ba ni til gyi sbyin sreg gis so// sems
223b6(rgyud): can thams cad dbang du bya ba ni khyim bya'i sgro'i sbyin sreg gis so// bu mo thor bu dbang du bya ba ni bu mo'i skra'i sbyin sreg gis so// yugs sa mo dbang du bya ba ni bud med kyi me tog gi sbyin sreg gis so//
223b7(rgyud): bud med thams cad dbang du bya ba ni bud med kyi dbang po'i sbyin sreg gis so// 'dod pa thams cad dbang du bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang po la mchod pa byas nas nub gsum rangs
224a1(rgyud): par bzlas na/ de nas 'dod pa thams cad rtag tu thob par 'gyur ro// spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i spyan sngar nyin re zhing dus gsum du lan gsum bzlas na/ de nas bcom ldan
224a2(rgyud): 'das kyis zla ba gsum gyis re ba ci 'dod pa'i mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar zla ba gsum gyi bar du nyin tshan gsum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pas mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// 'jig
224a3(rgyud): rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rtog pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sem/
224a4(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal por rang gi snying po 'bul gyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
224a5(rgyud): bzhes su gsol// 'dis sems can thams cad dbang bskur ba thob pa la sogs pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po
224a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' la/ skyes bu chen po smos shig ces bka' stsal te/ de nas 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so// traM hA
224a7(rgyud): bA Ta Ta ha ha/ de nas 'di brjod pas nam mkha' la dbang bskur ba thams cad la sogs pa rin po che'i rgyan thams cad dang / gos dang / gser dang / nor bu rin po che'i dbyig la sogs pa thams cad kyi char
224b1(rgyud): bab bo// bcom ldan 'das kyi sku kun tu rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te bzhugs so// de nas nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpas dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor tshun/
224b2(rgyud): bzhin te// rdo rje rin chen mnyam ldan zhing // grwa brgyad shin tu mnyam par bya// rin chen kun dang ldan par bya// der slob dpon zhugs te rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya dbang bskur ba'i gnas su gzhag la zhug
224b3(rgyud): nas 'di zhes brjod do// re ba thams cad grub pa yi// nam mkha' grub pa mchog yin te// grub cig grub cig sems chen po// bcom ldan thams cad grub par ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das
224b4(rgyud): nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' byin gyis rlob par mdzad do// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su nam mkha'i snying po'i cha lugs gzhag la/ de'i thang 'khor kun tu phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa
224b5(rgyud): skyes bu dam pa brgyad gzhag par bya'o// de nas slob ma rdo rje khu tshur gyis gzhug go// bcug nas 'di skad ces brjod do// sems can kun la phan phyir dang // bsam pa thams cad rdzogs bya'i
224b6(rgyud): phyir dad don zhes bstan pa gang yin de// byang chub sems ni bstan pa yin// de nas sbyin pa rnam pa bzhi bsrab bo// de la dbang bskur ba sbyin pa dang / nor sbyin pa dang / zas sbyin pa dang / chos sbyin
224b7(rgyud): pa'o// de la dbang bskur ba sbyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la'o// nor sbyin pa ni sems can thams cad la'o// zas sbyin pa ni byol song thams cad la'o// chos sbyin pa ni sems can mi sna
225a1(rgyud): pa thams cad la'o// de nas snying po byin la rin po che thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur te 'di zhes brjod do// oM badz+ra rat+na b+ha kI les b+hi Shiny+tsa
225a2(rgyud): sarba d+hU pi t+ye hUM bA bA Ta Ta ha ha/ de nas rdorje nor bu'i khu tshur gyis phyag rgya bsla ba ste/ sngags ni 'di'o// hUM bA ta ha / de nas rdo rje rin po che phyag rgya bcings te/ sngags ni 'di'o// oM bA bA ta mu baM
225a3(rgyud): nas mchod pa rnam bzhi bya ste 'byung ngo // dbang thams cad bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas rdo rje rin po che'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ rdo rje rin po che dbus su bris la/ lag tu nor bu thogs nas rdo rje rin
225a4(rgyud): po che langs kyi bar du bzlas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa byon te dbang bskur bar mdzad do// dbang bskur ba des na thams cad kyi dbang por 'gyur ro// rin po che'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas ngam
225a5(rgyud): tshig gi dkyil 'khor te/ nam mkha'i snying po'i cha lugs bri sa la/ spyan sngar nor dang / gser dang / mu tig dang nor bu rin po che la sogs pa gang yang rung ba bzhag la/ de nas de btsud de thams cad
225a6(rgyud): bstan nas dam tshig 'di sbyin no// sangs rgyas la sogs sems dpa' dag/ gal te nyin re mchod stongs na/ khyod kyis nor dang don bsags pa// tshe rabs kun tu 'jig par 'gyur// de la 'di ni
225a7(rgyud): mna'i snying po'o// oM bA pA Ta Ta ya swA hA/ de nas chus dbang bskur ro// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// las kyi dkyil 'khor bris la de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya ste// de'i
225b1(rgyud): dbus su banag nas der btsud de/ de nas las rnam pa lnga bslab pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ dbang sbyin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa bya'o// de nas nor sbyin pa ni dge sbyong dang bram ze la sogs pa la/
225b2(rgyud): ci nus kyis sbyin no// de nas zas sbyin pa ni byol song rnams la sbyin no// de nas mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa ni gyong khring thams cad la sbyin no// de nas chos sbyin pa ni mi snang ba'i sems can rnams la sbyin no//
225b3(rgyud): las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas sgrub pa 'byung ste/ ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba bris te/ de'i g.yas
225b4(rgyud): phyogs su 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po bcom ldan 'das la dbang bskur ba'i 'phreng bas dbang bskur ba'o// g.yon phyogs su bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o//
225b5(rgyud): nas ra sa la bris pa de'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas pa'i mjug tu nyi ma shar ba nas brtsams te/ phyi de nyin gyi nyi ma shar gyi bar du bzlas na/ de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po ras la bris pa de las
225b6(rgyud): byung nas sgrub pa po de la rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro// dbang bskur ba de nas de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// de nas ma bsgrubs par yang las su 'gyur ba ni 'bum bzlas na don
225b7(rgyud): thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na gter chen po rnyed do// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na spyan ras gzigs dbang pos phun sum tshogs
226a1(rgyud): pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'bum pa zlas na rgyal srid thob bo// rdo rje khu tshur gyi spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na nam mkha' la khu tshur bcings pas gser gyi/
226a2(rgyud): dongong tshe 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal gzhon nu la bltas te 'bum bzlas na chos kyi nor dang gzungs thob bo// des nor yang skye bar byed do// rdo rje 'khor lo srin lag gi sor mos mnan te 'bum bzlas na 'khor lo ska
226a3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i mdzod kun nas 'khyud de 'bum bzlas pas nam mkha' las nor thams cad dang zas thams cad kyi yo byad zad mi shes par 'gyur ro// byams pa la bltas te 'bum bzlas na bcom
226a4(rgyud): ldan 'das byams pa byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan rnams kyi dbang mchog byin nas slar yang 'ong ngo // de phyin chad 'dod pa thams cad kyi nor gyi bdag por 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal
226a5(rgyud): pabapa rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ nam mkha'i snying po'i rtog pa'o// / de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'dus pa'i 'khor thams cad bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
226a6(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po dbul bar bgyi ste/ bdag gis bskal pa stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la rdo/
226a7(rgyud): rje'i ri rab de bzhin gshegs pa las blangs te/ nges 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi sems can rnams grub pa thams cad grub par byas te/ de'i bskyed pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa
226b1(rgyud): rdzogs kyi bar du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis / rdo rje khu tshur byang chub sems dpa' chen po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ legs so legs so// rdo rje khu tshur khyod kyis spros shig/ de nas /
226b2(rgyud): rje khu tshur gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu g.yos par byas nas rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so// oM ru Tu ru Tu hUM ma thag de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs
226b3(rgyud): pa thams cad dang / rdo rje 'dzin dang / 'khor thams cad dang bcas nas ri rab ri'i rtse mor bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te/ lag pa gnyis kyis rang gi khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcings nas/ de bzhin gshegs
226b4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi byang chub la dmigs shing / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor chen por gyur nas bkod do// de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyag rgyas btab nas dkyil
226b5(rgyud): 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'dra ba ni// rdo rje khu tshur zhes gsungs so// de yi dbus su sems chen po/
226b6(rgyud): rje khu tshur gzhag par bya// rdo rje'i khu tshur rdo rjer bcas// lag pa gnyis ni btsir bar bya// de yi ngos ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas gzugs rnams gzhag par bya// de dag gi ni gla kun tu// byang
226b7(rgyud): chub sems dpa' kun bri'o// de nas rdo rjekhu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir rdo rje slob dpon gyis rdo rje dang bcas pa'i khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te zhugs la 'di 'od cig/ hUM Thi Ni s+pha ra Na phaT/ de nas
227a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur slob dpon la grub par gyur te/ de la phyag rgya'ang brtan par 'gyur shing sus kyang dbye bar mi nus so// de nas snying po 'dis bdag gi snying khang dgrol lo//
227a2(rgyud): oM badz+ra muSh+Ti muH/ de nas slob ma gzhug pa ste/ rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rdo rje dang bcas pa/ 'phreng ba dang bcas par bya ste/ de bzhin du ras dmar pos mig gnyis bkab ste/ de nas 'di zhes pajo/
227a3(rgyud): dod/ deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgyas btab pa ni chos kyi phyag rgya dang / rdo rje 'dzin gyi rdo rje'i phyag rgyas kyang btab bo// khyod chos dang rdo rje las gang 'dod/ des smras pa// gnyis ka'o
227a4(rgyud): zhe na na de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i cha lugs blangs nas 'phreng ba de'i mgo la bzhag ste/ dgrol ba'i snying po de nyid kyis phyag rgya snying khar dgrol lo// de nas lag tu sbyin pa ni/
227a5(rgyud): lag pa g.yon par rdo rje'o// g.yas par de bzhin gshegs pa'o// de ste de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes zer na/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid sbyin no// de ste rdo rje'o zhes zer na/ de'i lag pa g.yon par
227a6(rgyud): rdo rje byin la 'di skad sgo zhig/ 'di gnyis ni khyod kyi grub par dmigs la rtag tu mchod bgyis shig/ de nas gdong g.yogs pa bkrol la dkyil 'khor sngon la 'di spros shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
227a7(rgyud): cad kyi// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje rnams// bsdus pa khu tshur zhes bya ste// bcings na rdo rje khu tshur bshad// de nas snying po byin la phyag rgya bcing ba slobs shig/ dam tshig gi khu tshur zhes bya ba'i dkyil
227b1(rgyud): 'khor ro// de nas phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul bzhin du// dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag bri// de yi dbus su ci rigs par// sangs rgyas sku lus gzhag par bya/
227b2(rgyud): thams cad rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi// rdo rje khu tshur kun 'dzin pa'o// de yi ngos ni thams cad du// phyag rgya bzhi ni bri bar bya// rma ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus rnams su// rdo rje rin chen yang de bzhin// de bzhin/
227b3(rgyud): rdorje pad+mo'i dbus// rdo rje rgya gram bri bar bya// grwa yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// mchod pa rnam pa ni bri bar bya// de nas btsud nas phyag rgya kun// bcing ba yang ni bslab par bya// sgrub pa gsang ba dag
227b4(rgyud): dang ni// bskul ba gsang ba bslab par bya// 'di rnams thams cad kun bris nas// sgrubs shig ces ni brjod par bya// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/
227b5(rgyud): bzhin du mtshan ma bzhag nas 'di zhes brjod do// ci ste dkyil 'khor ma mthong na// phyag rgya shes pa bstan pa ni// rdo rje rin chen rgyal ba dang // sna tshogs pas khyod gsod par 'gyur// dam tshig gi dkyil
227b6(rgyud): 'khor ro// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris la/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi spyan sngar phyag rgya'i las bslab bo// de la phyag rgya bcings pa ni 'di'o// rdo rje bcing
227b7(rgyud): pa kun byas la// sor mo thams cad dgug bya ste// rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya dang // rdo rje khu tshur phyag rgya bcing // de nas lag pa'i phyag rgya bcing ngo // de lta bur mi ldan na 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog
228a1(rgyud): sgrub pas ni dam tshig chen po yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi snying po thang cing bzlas pas phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar bya ste/ thams cad kyi ni ma yin no// las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas/
228a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi sgrub pa 'byung ste/ 'o ma 'thung ning rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na sngar bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas ras la bri bar bya ste/ ras la/
228a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa rdo rje khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bris la/ phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i dar gyis bcings la/ de'i thad 'khor
228a4(rgyud): thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang phyag gnyis ka de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khu tshur du bcing bar bya'o// byang chub sem
228a5(rgyud): dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin du snyoms par zhugs par bya'o// de nas de'i spyan sngar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur bcings la/ stong phrag brgya bzlas pa'i mjug tu zhag bdun sbyangs
228a6(rgyud): nas bdag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur bsgoms la mtshan thal byung du bzlas so// de nas nam phyed nas 'dod kyi las sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'di rjod cig/ oM badz+ra maSh+Ti hi na ha na
228a7(rgyud): sarba mA ra Na phaT/ de nas nang par gyi dus na bcom ldan 'das thams cad byon te lus kun tu 'jug go// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// yang
228b1(rgyud): ras kyi cho ga 'byung ste/ ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa bris te/ de'i g.yas phyogs su bcom ldan 'das ngo rje khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/
228b2(rgyud): mdog sngo bsangs ut+pal sngon po lta bu/ rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje bsdams pa// g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa ste/ de'i g.yas su bcom ldan 'das mngo rje'i dam tshig gi khu tshur
228b3(rgyud): can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gzhon nu ma dam tshig gi khu tshur gyis rdo rje dam du 'chir ba mdog dmar por bya'o// de'i thad du rdo rje'i gsal phur ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ spyan gsum pa/ lag
228b4(rgyud): pa gnyis kyis rdo rje gsal phur thogs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs su spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po thor tsugs kyi dbu rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ pad+mo dang mchod sbyin gyi phyag tu byas la/
228b5(rgyud): de'i g.yon du pad+mo chen po'i rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i sde zhes bya ba'o// de'i g.yon du rdo rje'i dpal mo dang / rdo rje pho nya mo'o// rdo rje dpal mo ni gser gyi sku mdog go// dpal gyi gzugs 'chang ba
228b6(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje pho nya mo ni mdog sngon mo la rdo rje khar pa 'chang ba'o// de nas zla ba yar gyi ngo ches gcig nas brtsams te/ rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas stong phrag brgya bzlas
228b7(rgyud): na/ gzugs kyi ras de las paTaces bya ba thos na/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje 'grub par 'gyur te/ de phyin chad nam mkha'i dkyil na spyod cing 'dod pa'i ma snang bar yang 'gyur/ dpag tshad stong du
229a1(rgyud): par yang 'gro zhing gyen du'ang 'gro'o// ci 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur ro// kun tu 'khyil bas 'khyil ba'i sgra can lo bcu drug lon pa'i lus su gyur nas 'dod pa'i longs s+hoH/
229a2(rgyud): thams cad la ci 'dod pa bzhin longs spyod par 'gyur ro// rdo rje khu tshur bcings pas sems can thams cad cad la phan gdags pa dang / chad pas gcad pa la sogs pa thams cad nus par 'gyur ro// gzug
229a3(rgyud): bzang po bskal par gnas shing / rga ba dang shi bar yang mi 'gyur ro// yang cho ga gzhan te/ ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bris la/ de'i g.yas phyogs su phyag na rdo rje rgyan thams cad
229a4(rgyud): kyis brgyan pa/ sku mdog ut+pal sngon po'i kha dog phyag na rdo rje dang bcas pas rdo rje khu tshur bcings te sbyar la bcom ldan 'das la 'dud par bya/ de'i g.yon phyogs su bcom ldan 'das ma dam tshig
229a5(rgyud): gi khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan pa yid tsam 'dud pa/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal ba/ lag pa g.yas pa na a mra'i 'bras bu 'bul ba/ g.yon pa na rdo rje khur tshur gyis rdo rje 'dzin to// de nas/
229a6(rgyud): ras la bris pa'i spyan sngar zhag gsum sbyangs la/ gu gul gyi ril bu sran ma tsam du ru ka'i 'bru mar la bsgugs pa brgyad stong du ba med pa'i mdag ma la sreg go// de nas gzugs de 'gul te bcom ldan
229a7(rgyud): 'das kyi zhal nas 'od zer 'byung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyis mchog stsol ba ni/ rgyal po 'am/ 'khor lo bskor ba 'am/ lha ma yin pa dbang ba 'am/ sa brjod pa 'am/ sa'i 'og
229b1(rgyud): brjod pa 'am/ khams brjod pa'am/ 'dod pa'i khams mi snang ba'am/ nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// yang sgrub pa gzhan gyi cho ga ste/ ras la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyis/
229b2(rgyud): brgyan babris la/ de bzhin rdo rje dang bcas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa ut+pal sngon po'i mdog tu byas la/ de'i spyan sngang dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur bcings te/ stong phrag brgya bzlas
229b3(rgyud): pa'i mjug nyin mtshan gsum thal byung ba zlas na nam byed nas bcom ldan 'das nyid byon te mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// ras sam/ shing leb bam/ rtsig ngos la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur de bzhin
229b4(rgyud): du rdo rje dang a mra'i 'bras bu thogs par byas te/ de'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas na phyag rgya thams cad bcings pa tsam gyi sa las thams cad gdon mi za bar byed par 'gyur ro// de nas ma bsgrubs pa'i
229b5(rgyud): las rnams 'byung ste/ rdo rje dam tshig gi khu tshur bcings nas 'bum bzlas na khu tshur bcings pas nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// lag pa g.yon pas rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur bcings na phyag
229b6(rgyud): na rdo rje la sogs pa'i gzugs 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni 'bum bzlas pas so// lag pa g.yon pas rdo rje khu tshur bcings te stong phrag brgya babras na khu tshur bcing ba des mi snang bar 'gyur ro// phral na snang
229b7(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje bcing ba'i khu tshur byas la 'bum pa zlas na khu tshur bcangs pas bcing ba dang / rengs par bya ba dang / gnyid log par bya ba thams cad rus par 'gyur ro// nam mkha' la jo/
230a1(rgyud): rdze khu tshur bcangs te 'bum bzlas na rdo rje khu tshur byas pa tsam gyis nam mkha' la nor dang / gser dang / mu tig dang / rgyan dang / rin po che dang / gos dang / bza' ba dang /
230a2(rgyud): btung ba dang / ye dang / chu dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / myu gu dang / yi ge dang / 'thab cha dang / ston skyobs dang / mtshon cha dang / glegs bam dang / rtog pa dang / mdo sde dang / sangs rgyas/
230a3(rgyud): kyi tshul sogs pa dngos po gnas pa dang / 'gro ba ci 'dod pa dgug par byed do// g.yas pa rdo rje khu tshur bcangs la 'bum bzlas na rdo rje khu tshur bstan pas gnas pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad dgug pa
230a4(rgyud): dang / 'dren pa dang / 'gyel bar nus par 'gyur ro// khu tshur bsgyur bas thams cad gtan 'pho nus par 'gyur ro// g.yas pas rdo rje khu tshur bcangs la stong phrag brgya bzlas na rdo rje khu tshur bya bas pas
230a5(rgyud): thams cad las nor dang / gser dang / rgyan dang / gos dang / mtshan cha dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu la sog pa dngos po thams cad 'gug go// gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg
230a6(rgyud): bya las dam pa thams cad kyang 'gug go// bud med kyi nu ma dang / mngal phyogs dang / mig dang / sna dang / mchu dang / rna ba dang / mgo dang / badz+ra dang / ska rags dang / gsang spu la sogs pa
230a7(rgyud): dngos po thams cad kyang 'gug go// bkrol na thar bar 'gyur ro// nyin zhag gcig smyung la lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcangs te/ stong phrag brgya bzlas na de phyin chad khu tshur bcangs pas las thams cad/
230b1(rgyud): byed do// de la las rnams ni dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / rengs par bya ba dang / rmugs par bya ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / gnyid log pa dang / bslang ba dang /
230b2(rgyud): drang ba dang / bsgyel ba dang / brdabs pa dang / bskrad pa dang / dbye ba dang / go bzlog pa dang / gtan 'pho ba dang / gso ba dang / sgyu ma thams cad bstan pa dang / dus tshigs bsgyur ba dang ga sa la
230b3(rgyud): sogs pa g.yo ba dang / thams cad la dbab pa dang / dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang / gar byed pa dang / glu len pa dang / sngon ma byung ba'i sbyor ba dang / so sor lung ston pa dang / 'khrul 'khor thams
230b4(rgyud): cad gzhom pa dang / sgo thams cad dbye ba dang / gdon thams cad 'jug pa dang / dug thams cad bslang ba dang // ma rungs par bya ba dang / thams cad spo ba dang / thams cad kyi phyag rgya gzhom pa dang / tham
230b5(rgyud): cang 'gebs pa dang / gas pa sbyar ba dang / sbrul bskrad pa dang / gzung ba dang / gtang ba dang / ser ba dang // char dbab pa dang / glog dbyung ba dang / thams cad slar gcad pa dang / sngan chad med pa'i
230b6(rgyud): gos dang / rgyan dang / rin po che dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / bya dang / ri dgas dgug pa dang / gtong ba dang / gzugs mang po ston pa dang / mi snang ba dang / nam
230b7(rgyud): mkha' la 'gro ba bstan pa la sogs pa 'dod pa bzhin las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ rdo rje khu tshur gyi rtog pa'o// /
231a1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rang gi snying po 'jig rten gsum las/
231a2(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa 'dir stsal bar bgyi ste/ gang brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzod brjod par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
231a3(rgyud): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis smos shig ces gsungs so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa/ ar ba tsan/ de nas 'di brjod ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid
231a4(rgyud): las yi ge mnyam pa nyid sems can thams cad kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i grub pa thob par 'gyur ba bshad do// de nas dkyil 'khor 'byung ba ste/ 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor yar gyi ngo ches bcu bzhi 'am pa/
231a5(rgyud): lnga la bris te/ de'i dbus kyi lte bar 'jam dpal bzhugs par bya'o// rdo rje ral gri dang glegs bam thogs par byas la/ de'i thad 'khor thams cad du yi ge a ra pa tsam la sogs pa'i 'phreng ba bri bar bya'o//
231a6(rgyud): de nas slob dpon gyis rdo rje ral gri dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la zhugs te/ ni rdza pany+tsa ga/ zhes pa'i yi ge 'di lnga brjod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis slob dpon la thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa'ang stsol
231a7(rgyud): de phyin chad bcom ldan 'das kyis nam mkha' la yi ger bris te thams cad gsung ngo // de bzhin du slong ma bcug ste 'di zhes smos shig/ deng khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos thob par 'gyur gyis/
231b1(rgyud): snying po 'di khyod kyis su la'ang ma smra zhig/ de la gsang ba'i yi ge 'di rnams so// a ra pa tsa na zhes bya ba ste/ 'dod pa thams cad thob bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ a zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'o// ra zhes bya ba ni
231b2(rgyud): chags pa'o// pa zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'o// tsa zhes bya ba ni spyod pa'o// na zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin med pa'o// de ltar 'dod pa dang / chags pa dang / don dam pa dang / spyod pa dang / rang bzhin med
231b3(rgyud): pa nyid kyi snying po 'di bsgoms te bsgrubs na 'dod pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dod pa thams cad kyi snod yin te/ de bas na snying po 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin kyang
231b4(rgyud): myur du thob par 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya bcing ba bslab bo// spros pa med pa'i mchog ces bya'o// de nas ral gri'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ de bzhin du rdo rje dkyil 'khor bris la/ de'i dbus su ral gri
231b5(rgyud): bzhag ste/ mdun du snying po 'di bsgrubs na/ des 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bsgrubs par 'gyur ro// rdo rje ral gri'i dkyil 'khor ro// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ni dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul bzhin
231b6(rgyud): du bris la zhugs nas 'di zhes brjod do// a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM/ A d+ya nung pan na~M tA ta/ a nes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste thog ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir ro// zhes nang bar langs nas nyin re lan/
231b7(rgyud): re brjod na mtshams med pa thams cad kyis mi gos so// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag nas mchod pa
232a1(rgyud): rnam pa bzhis mchod pa ni 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / sgom pas so// las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas sgrub 'dod pas dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ras la/
232a2(rgyud): bris nas ka yi ge 'phreng ba thams cad brjod de 'di skad du/ chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyi sgrub pa'o zhes kyang brjod nas/ yi ge 'di 'bum pazlas na spobs po mi zad par 'jam dpal dang mtshungs pa dang
232a3(rgyud): nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas ma bsgrubs kyang las su 'gyur ba ni lan cig bzlas pas sdug bsngal thams cad las grol lo// gnyis bzlas pas mtshams med pa thams cad lhag ma ma lus par
232a4(rgyud): zad par 'gyur ro// gsum bzlas pas ting nge 'dzin mngon du 'gyur ro// bzhi bzlas pas dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// lnga bzlas pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang
232a5(rgyud): rgya'o// sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la yi ge 'phreng ba g.yas phyogs nas a zhes bya ba'i drung du na zhes bya ba phyin gyi bar du bri'o// de nas bskor zhing yi ge 'bum bzlas te/ yi ge re re 'bum rdzogs na
232a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 'jam dpal dang / phyag na rdo rje cig car 'grub ste/ nyin re zhing mthong bar bstan nas chos bshad de slar gshegs so// tshe 'di nyid las sangs rgyas pa man
232a7(rgyud): chad kyang stsol to// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i rtog pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rdo rje 'khor lo byang chub
232b1(rgyud): sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das padag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir snying po 'di stsal bar bgyi ste/ gang brjod pa tsam gyis dkyil/
232b2(rgyud): 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rdo rje 'khor lo byang chub sems dpa' la bskul lo// de nas rdo rje 'khor lo byang chub sems dpas bcom ldan 'das la rang gi snying po
232b3(rgyud): phul ba/ oM badz+ra tsakra hUM/ de nas 'di brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor de nyid du zhugs so// de nas rdo rje 'khor lo byang chub
232b4(rgyud): sems dpas dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// rdo rje 'khor lo bzhin bris la// rdo rje 'khor lo bdag che ba// rang gi lag na phyag rgya thogs// de yi dbus su gzhag par bya// de yi thad 'khor thams cad du/
232b5(rgyud): rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshogs rnams bri// de yang sems can chen po rnams// de dag nyid ni legs par bri// de nas blo ldan thog ma ru// rdo rje 'khor los 'jug par bya// zhugs nas snying po 'di bzlas
232b6(rgyud): so/ dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes brjod na// des bcom ldan 'das dgyes te grub pa thams cad du stsol to// de bzhin du slob ma bcug nas de nyid du bsgrub par bya'o// rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum
232b7(rgyud): bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ rdo rje 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// rdo rje 'khor lo zhes bya ba'o// rdo rje 'khor lo'i dbus su rdo rje bri ste/ de bzhin du bzlas na rdo rje 'dzin du 'gyur ro// rdo rje dkyil 'khor ro//
233a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris nas mtshan ma bzhag ste 'di zhes brjod do// rdo rje 'khor lo 'jug pa yis// mthong dang de bzhin bsgrubs na ni// rtog pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur
233a2(rgyud): de bas brtags te bsgrub par bya// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor bris pa de nyid do// phyag rgya shes pa sgrub pa'i phyir// brtson 'grus brtan pas thams cad kyi// bla na med pas bslab par bya/
233a3(rgyud): las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa tsam gyis pa bsgrubs par las thams cad byed de/ ji ltar dga' ba'i cho ga'am rtog pa las bshang ba sgrubs shig/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i
233a4(rgyud): rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ rdo rje 'khor lo'i rtog pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ nam mkha'i mdzod byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis
233a5(rgyud): kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po stsol bar bgyi ste/ snying po gang brjod pa tsam gyis mchod pa thams cad kyi gnas su 'gyur ba'o// bcom ldan 'das
233a6(rgyud): kyis spros shig ces gsungs so// de nas nam mkha' mdzod kyis gsungs pa/ oM ga ga nas b+ha ba badz+ra bA tsa ho/ de nas de'i dus bcom ldan 'das kyis dkyil 'khor thams cad la nam mkha' las mchod
233a7(rgyud): kun 'byung bar byas so// de nas dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ rdo rje 'khor lo bzhin du bri// de yi dbus su nor chen te// nam mkha' dang por bzhugs par bya// rgyal ba kun gyis bskor ba bya'o// dang por slob
233b1(rgyud): dpon 'jug pa ni/ mchod pa kun mchog phyag rgyas so// dkyil 'khor de du zhugs nas ni/ rdo rje thams cad brjod par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'grub ste// de bzhin du so ba ma'ang bcug nas ngo
233b2(rgyud): thams cad kyi dam tshig gi snying po 'di brjod la phyag rgya'ang slobs shig/ mchod pa thams cad ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor te/ yid kyis dkyil 'khor bris la der zhugs shig/
233b3(rgyud): zhugs nas 'di skad rjod cig/ 'di dag thams cad ni nam mkha' nyid de/ bden pa gang gis nam mkha' gzugs med pa las gzugs 'byung ba des na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang /
233b4(rgyud): yid la 'dod pa'i grub pa thams cad nam mkha' las 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas nas 'dug ste ga rdo rje kun gyi phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na/ de nas nam mkha' las mchod pa'i rnam pa thams cad dang /
233b5(rgyud): don thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor bris nas btsud de 'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig go zhes rjod cig/ 'byung ba kun las nam
233b6(rgyud): mkha' ni// 'byung ba chen po lnga pa'o// nam mkha' la ni 'dod pa 'byung // 'dod pa'i mchod pa grub gyur cig/ ces smras nas/ 'dis khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cig ces sgo zhig
233b7(rgyud): dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// slob ma nam mkha' la yid kyis dkyil 'khor 'drir bcug la/ der slob ma yid kyis mchod pa'ang spobs shig/ yid kyis 'di skad rjod cig/ nam mkha'i mchod pas de
234a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod do zhes nyin de ning byas na 'grub bo// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ nam mkha' mdzod kyi rtog pa/
234a2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'phags pa byams pa byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog
234a3(rgyud): pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po stsol bar bgyi ste/ gang brjod pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu smos shig ces gsungs
234a4(rgyud): so// de nas bcom ldan 'das byams pa byang chub sems dpas rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so// oM me tri dra d+ha tsi ta tiSh+Tha ho/ de nas 'di brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byams pa'i ting nge
234a5(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te bzhugs so// de nas dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bris pa der byams pa gzhag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi dang / byang chub sems dpa' ba ni/
234a6(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' bzhi bya ste/ cho ga bstan pa'i phyag rgyas zhugs la 'di zhes brjod do// badz+ra dza D+ha tiSh+Tha/ de nas byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas slob ma de bzhin du dkyil
234a7(rgyud): 'khor chen po thams cad du 'jug pa'i tshul gyis btsud do// btsud nas byams pa chen po'i phyag rgya bslab ste/ de nas go chas bskon no// bstan pa chen po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas byams pa'i
234b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ byams pas zhugs la byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgrubs shig/ byams pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor du bcug la 'di zhes brjod do// rangs sam yang na khros kyang rub/
234b2(rgyud): mdza' dang sdang ba de bzhin te// 'gro las gal te rgyal 'dod na// byams pa chen po sgom par gyis// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor du btsud la 'di bslab bo// sangs rgyas thams cad
234b3(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can thams cad dge bar gyur cig/ 'byung po thams cad la byams pa dang / byol song thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin no// las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// byams pa bsgoms
234b4(rgyud): pas grub pa thams cad ci 'dod pa'i sgrub pas sgrub bo// las rnams kyang yid kyis ci dad pa'i cho ga dang byams pas sgrubs shig/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las
234b5(rgyud): byams pa'i rtog pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la rdo rje rig pa'i dam tshig la sogs pas mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal pa
234b6(rgyud): 'dir rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM dri/ oM b+hin+da badz+ra shU la/ oM ts+tshin+d+ra hUM tsakra phaT/ oM b+hur b+hu ba swa swA hA/ oM ha na b+hin+da badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM la la la la a b+hi shi g+haN+Da Ta na/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/
234b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor zlum po'i dkyil 'khor gyi grwa'i srang bu'i dbus su dbang phyug chen po bri/ der gzhan dag kyang rim gyis thams cad bri ba 'am/ gzhag pa 'am/ mthar ni tshon gyi thig le'ang gzhag go// de nas thog ma
235a1(rgyud): slob dpon gyis gsal phur gsum pa'i rtags kyi phyag rgya bcings la 'dug go// g.yon logs nas rdo rje'i slob ma'ang badrug ste/ de nas phyag rgya'ang bsrab bo// de phyin chad thams
235a2(rgyud): cad 'grub cing 'jig rten thams cad kyi rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ rig pa'i blon po chen po'i rtog pa'o// / de nas rdo rje 'khyil
235a3(rgyud): ba la sogs pa rdo rje khro bos 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po phul ba oM a mr-i ta kudz+wa li kha kha kha kha kro d+ha dz+wa lA ma la hUM phaT/ oM ma hA pra ba s+pho Ta ya hUM phaT/ oM
235a4(rgyud): la daN+Da ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM kA la pA shA gra A kaD+D+h+ya hUM phaT/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bris la/ de'i dbus su rdo rje gzhag go// phyogs bzhir ni khro bo rnams de bzhin du bar/
235a5(rgyud): chad du byas la dgod do// de nas slob dpon bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag rgyar zhugs nas phyag rgya bcing ba bslab bo// de nas thams cad dgug pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / gtan 'pho ba dang / srung ba 'grub bo//
235a6(rgyud): rdo rje khro bo'i rtog pa'o// / de nas rdo rje srin po la sogs pa tshegs kyi gtso bos snying po 'di rnams phul lo// oM ma hA bA lA ka ma hUM ga Na de bi ba pi ba ru hrIHran sarba duSh+TA na nA phaT ka.oM mA lA d+ha raH
235a7(rgyud): ya tsa la ya hUM/ oM d+ha nu ru d+ha ra ba shI ku ru sarba satwa na swA hA/ oM dza ya bi dza ya hUM phaT/ de nas dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ gzhu lta bur dkyil 'khor bris la rer rdo rje gzhag go// g.yas su'ang gnyis/ g.yon
235b1(rgyud): du'ang gnyis so// de nas rdon srin pa'i phyag rgyas btsud do// de nas phyag rgyabs pas nas chog bslab pa ni/ gang dge ba dang drin gzo dang // lha yi 'khor mthong ma gtogs par/ gzhan rnams de dag sa mas/
235b2(rgyud): cad kun// mi dge ba rnams gtan 'bor bya// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen pa'i rgyal po las/ tshogs kyi gtsom na rtog pa'o// de nas rdo rjegatun shing la sogs
235b3(rgyud): pa'i po nyas rang gi snying po smras pa/ oM lAng ga lA~M hU~M/ oM ma hA ba ta hU~M/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la ya swA hA/ oM bi ka rba b+hai ra ba de hi me sar ban+d+ha rU phaT/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba ni shing rta dang 'dra ba'i dkyil
235b4(rgyud): 'khor bris te/ dbus su rdo rje bzhag nas rdo rje gtun shing gi phyag rgyas bcug la las 'di bslab bo// mi dge ba'i sems can thams cad 'thungs shig/ phrogs shig/ sregs shig/ zo zhig/ de nas
235b5(rgyud): phyag rgya bcing bslab bo// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las pho nya'i tshogs kyi rtog pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rdo rje kyo btang la sogs
235b6(rgyud): pa bran rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po yul lo// oM bA ra hA de tro ka Ta ba ga tod+ha/
235b7(rgyud): sarba na kha na kha na hUM phaT/ oM sarba mA ra da ra hUM phaT/ oM bi ka ti ka raSh+Ti b+hin+da hUM phaT/ oM ma hA ma Ni ha ra ha ra hUM phaT/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor 'di'o// gru gsum par bris la/ mngon sum par phyag rgyas
236a1(rgyud): zhugs nas gar gyi phyag rgya bcing ba bslab ste/ gar gyi mchod pas ni dbus kyi rdo rje la mchod ngo // 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ bran gyi
236a2(rgyud): rtog pa'o// / de nas ma thams cad kyis ku tsa'i sgra bton te/ gar gyi mchod pa chen pos bcom ldan 'das la mchod nas rang rang gi snying po phul lo// de nas rdo rje'i blon po chen mo dag gis
236a3(rgyud): smras pa/ oM badza kro d+ha ra li hUM phaT/ oM badza tsag tshin+da hUM phaT/ mai shAts+tshi hUM/ oM badz+ra muSh+Ti ha na shin ha ha na hUM phaT/ oM su mA ra ha bi sha g+ha Na ti ke ra Na tin tsA lA ya sarba duthAn hU~M paT/ de nas de dag gi dkyil
236a4(rgyud): 'khor gru bzhi pa de'i sgor 'khor la sogs bzi'o// de'i dbus su rngo ma gro ma'i ma lagan rdorje'i gsal pur can gzhag go// dam tshig gi cho ga ni de bzhin no// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa che
236a5(rgyud): po'i rgyal po las/ rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo rnams kyi rtog pa'o// / de nas rdo rje khro mo rnams kyis rang gi snying po smras pa/ oM a mr-i te hUM phaT/ oM so mya kro d+he hU~M phaT/ oM daN+Da d+ha ri Na han hUM pha
236a6(rgyud): oM bi ga le hUM phaT/ dkyil 'khor zur brgyad pa bris te/ de'i dbus su rdo rje gzhag go// cha bzhir bgos pa rnams la bzhi po rim gyis gzhag go// 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga ni de nyid do// 'di ni khro ma
236a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ro// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ jo mo zo mo rnams kyi rtog pa'o// de nas tshogs ma mo rnams kyis smras pa/ oM khamamachi/
236b1(rgyud): hUM da oM a sha si ba d+he hir ma ho/ oM pA sha sa ma ye hUM/ oM sarba ma Ni ra ti pri ye ho/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor ni zlum zo ste/ sgo bzhi pa dbus su se ral srang bu byas te/ thig pa ni btab la rim pa nir
236b2(rgyud): bri'o// gzhan yang phyi'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin du zlum por thig bzhi rim du btab la/ de'i dbus su gnod sbyin gyi gdong bri'o// ngos bzhir ni rim gyis te/ shar phyogs nas bri ba 'am gzhag par bya'o// sgo
236b3(rgyud): bzhir rdo rje'i mngag gzhug ma bri ba 'am gzhag par bya'o// de'i snying po ni 'di'o// b+hi tsi ri Ti b+h+ye b+h+yo/ de ltar rig pa'i blon mo chen mo la sogs pa thams cad du gyis shig/ 'di thang cig bzlas pas thams
236b4(rgyud): cad khugs so// de nas gdong g.yogs nas lag pa gnyis kyis rkang pa'i mthe bong gzung ste phyag 'tshal nas skyil mo krung gis gar byed cing zhugs la dbab bo// bcangs nas dam tshig byin cig/ sarba
236b5(rgyud): mA ra kha da bi ba de hi ba ra sa ma ya ho// de bzhin du dam tshig sbyin no// glu gar dang / sil snyan dang / zas dang / skom gyis thams cad tshim par byas la dril bus phab pa ste/ de nas dngos grub thams cad
236b6(rgyud): dang / bde ba thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rnyed nas/ rnal 'byor dang nam mkha' la 'gro ba la sogs pa'ang thob po zhes smos shig/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa
236b7(rgyud): chen po'i rgyal po las/ rdo rje'i tshogs ma mo'i rtog pa'o// / de nas rdo rje pho nya mo rnams kyis smras pa/ oM b+h+yoHoM ka li ma ri Ni/ badz+ra rak+Sha si ha na sarba na nI ma/ oM pU tha Ne tha/ oM ma ha ka
237a1(rgyud): ra bA ka tre hUM phaT/ dkyil 'khor grwa lnga par bris te/ rdo rje'i grwa'i dbus su gzhag go// bzhi ni rdo rje'i pho nya mo banag ste/ de cho ga de bzhin du bya'o// 'jig rten gsum las rnam
237a2(rgyud): par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ jorje po nya mo'i rtog pa'o// de nas rdo rje bran mo rnams kyis smras pa/ oM bA ra hi badza mu khi dz+ri ti ta rA pa ta la sa ma ya ma nu sA ra A big hUM phaT/ oM kA
237a3(rgyud): li kA pa li mA la d+ha ri Ni ka Ta ka Ta ma Ta ma rba bi mA ra ya sarba mA ra Ni hUM phaT/ oM pu ta ni u tsu s+pha ru drA khA da sarbA na sho Sha ya swA hA/ oM ma ka ra mu khi ha ra ha ra hUM/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi la sgo bzhir bris nas/ de'i dbus su/
237a4(rgyud): rdorje bris te/ de bzhin gar gyis mchod do// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ bran mo'i rtog pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
237a5(rgyud): pas/ phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba 'dzin pa khyod yin no// de bas na rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir don yod cing myur du grub par bya ba'i phyir gang gis
237a6(rgyud): sems can thams cad dngos grub dam pa bde blag tu thob par 'gyur ba'i phyi ma'i rgyud shong cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can 'di rnams ni brtson 'grus kyis 'dul te/ dad pa dang mi ldan pa/ sdig pa byed pa/
237a7(rgyud): brdzun smra ba/ le lo can/ dka' ba spyad pa mi bzod pa/ 'dod chags dang bral bas 'dul ba/ rtag tu chags pa de dag gi don gyi phyir gang gis sems can de dag bya ba thams cad byed bzhin pa dang
237b1(rgyud): brtson 'grus med pa dang / dka' ba spyad pa'ang med par bde blag tu tshe 'di nyid la myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba de de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlab kyi shod cig/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi 'di dag ni yul la
237b2(rgyud): mngon par dga' zhing / bdag gi grogs po dang / pa dang / ma dang / bu dang / chung ma rnams mthong 'dod cing / de'ang sred pas 'khol ba ste/ phyogs nas phyogs su'ang 'gro mi nus na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang /
237b3(rgyud): rig 'dzin gyi gnas su lta ci smos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs gnyis la phyag na rdo rjes phyag 'tshal te phyi ma'i rgyud bshad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa ga la byung // phyag na
237b4(rgyud): rdo rje ga las skyes// rdo rje yang ni ga las byung // phyag rgya snying po'i rig pa dang // sngags rnams khyad par ci zhig yod// gsang ba sgrub pa ji lta bu// phyag rgya bcing ba ji lta bu// de rnams kyi ni de nyid
237b5(rgyud): gang / byin gyis bslabs sogs ji lta bu// sgrub pa rnams kyang ji ltar mthong // dngos grub 'dod pa ji lta bu// ras la ri mo ji ltar bri// sku gzugs tshad ni ji tsam zhig/ ji ltar bzlas pa bya ba
237b6(rgyud): gsungs// ci 'dra bar ni mchod par bgyi// bsod nams med pas ji ltar 'grub// ji ltar grub pa myur bar 'gyur// slob dpon du yang ji ltar 'gyur// las rnams bsgrub pa ji ltar bya// de dag gi ni//
237b7(rgyud): de nyid gang // thams cad bdag la bshad pa'i rigs// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba bstan te/ sems dpa' thog ma tha ma med// nam mkha' skye ba'i mtshan nyid do// kun tu bzang po thams
238a1(rgyud): cad bdag/ 'dod pa 'gro ba bdag po yin// sems can kun sems gang yin pa// brtan pas sems dpa' zhes pa'o// mnyam par gzhag pas ting nge 'dzin// nges par/
238a2(rgyud): rdo rje nyid du 'gyur// de la smras pa/ sems gzugs med pa la ji ltar na sra ba'i rdo rjer 'gyur/ smras pa/ ji ltar rnam par shes pa la sems can skye ba na sha dang rus pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba bzhin te/ sdug pa/
238a3(rgyud): dang nachags pa dang / bde ba dang / rnam par shes pa gzugs med pa rnams 'dus pa las sems can skye ba dang / ji ltar klu rnams khros pas sems kyi ting nge 'dzin des nam mkha' la gnam lcags
238a4(rgyud): 'byung ba 'am/ glog dang bcas pa 'byung ba de bzhin du nges pa chags pa dag las rdo rje nyid du 'gyur te/ sems dpa' byin rlabs sbyor ba yis// rdo rje sems dpar yang 'gyur ro// bcom ldan rdo rje de
238a5(rgyud): nyid ni// bsgoms pas sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// de la sems dpar byin gyis rlob pa'i sbyor ba gang zhe na/ sems dpa' kun gyi bdag che ba// bdag nyid la yang gnas so zhes/ byin gyis
238a6(rgyud): brlabs nas sems dpa' bdag/ yin zhes nga rgyal bsgom par bya// de nyid bcom ldan sems dpa' ste// rdo rje sems dpa' 'am rgyal ba yin// rang sems so sor brtags pa ni// sangs
238a7(rgyud): rgyas byang chub de nyid yin// de nyid phyag na rdo rje ste// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis so// 'jig rten dbang po nam mkha' snying // de ltar gzhan yang de nyid do// sangs rgyas rigs kyang de nyid de// de ni rdo/
238b1(rgyud): rje 'chang ba'i rigs// de nyid spyan ras gzigs kyi rigs// de nyid nor bu'i rigs yin te/ khams gsum de nyid yin zhes gsungs// 'jig rten gsum po'ang de nyid do// de nyid byed dang 'byin pa/
238b2(rgyud): bo dang sems can kun gyi mes pa ste// de nyid sems can gnas yin te// 'byung ba che rnams de nyid do// de nyid 'gro ba'i mgon po ste// gnas pa dang ni 'gro ba yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das
238b3(rgyud): thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// de kho na chen po zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa dang po'o// / de nas snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / rig pa'i khyang
238b4(rgyud): par gyi rab tu bya ba ste/ snying po'i khyad par ni gsang ba dang ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// de la sems can gyi don gyi phyir gsang ba brjod pa dang smra ba ni snying po brjod de/ snying po brjod pas ni snying gis bsam pa'i
238b5(rgyud): grub pa thob ces bya ba ni snying po'i khyad par ro// de nas phyag rgya'i khyad par ni// rdo rje'i sku gsung thugs rnams kyi// gzugs brnyan sbyor ba 'di dag ni// phyag rgya kun gyi khyad par te// 'byung ba yang ni
238b6(rgyud): de yis bstan// ji ltar jo bo'i rgya mthong na// bran rnams 'gal bar mi byed pa// de bzhin rgyal ba nyid rnams kyang // phyag rgya 'da' bar yong mi mdzad// rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs// ji ltar
238b7(rgyud): gnas dang mthun byas la// mtshan ma'i phyag rgyar ldan pa yi// sems dpa' chen por bdag nyid bsgyur// de ni phyag rgya chen po'o// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// sor bsnol bstan pa dam tshig ste//
239a1(rgyud): sems kyi shes rab ldan pa la// gnyis phye las kyi phyag rgya yin// de dag dam tshig rtsa ba ste// rtsa byung bcing brgyu yi mchog/ gang gis thams cad lus brtan 'gyur// de phyir/
239a2(rgyud): phyag rgya brjod pa yin// gang gis thams cad rgyas btab pa// chung mi ba zhing rab sbas te// mnga' bdag gzugs brnyan 'chang bas na// sgrub pa po rnams myur du 'grub// gang dag mthong na sangs rgyas dang //
239a3(rgyud): sems dpa' la sogs mthong bar 'gyur// dam tshig nyams pas gzir bas na// 'da' bar mi 'gyur grub par 'gyur// phyag rgya'i khyad par de yin te// don dam pa'i de kho na nyid kyang phyag rgya chen po zhes bya
239a4(rgyud): de la sngags kyi khyad par ni 'di yin te/ ngag tsam smos pa med pa ste// sangs rgyas bka' yis grub pa nyid// chos kyi tshig gis bskul ba ste// de dag sngags zhes bya ba yin// de la rig pa'i khyad par ni/
239a5(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa ni med par byed// rig pa de bzhin chud par byed// don rnams rtogs par gyur pas na// rig pa zhes ni de phyir bya// snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / rig pa'i rab tu bya ba/
239a6(rgyud): gnyis pa'o// de nas phyag rgya bcing ba'i rab tu bya ba bshad do zhes bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa'i phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la phyag rgya chen po de ni de nyid/
239a7(rgyud): bskul ba'i snying pos bcing ngo // dam tshig dang las kyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje bcing ba dang gdab pa la sogs pa byas nas bcing ngo // dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid bskul ba'i snying pos phyag rgya chen po la sogs
239b1(rgyud): pa phyag rgya thams cad bcing ngo // de'ang ma chags pa dang / slob ma ma yin pa dang / sdod ma yin pa dang / dad pa med pa la mi sbyin no// yun du sbyangs na de dag kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// de la de kho na nyid
239b2(rgyud): bskul ba'i snying po 'di'o// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de la dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid bskul ba'i snying po ni 'di yin no// sa ma ya ho su ra ta s+thA/ rdo rje khro bos phyag rgya thams cad rang gis bcing ngam/ gzhan la bcing
239b3(rgyud): du gzhug na ni hUM zhes bya ba thang cig tsam gyis so// de nas rdo rje bcing ba la sogs pa bcing ba 'byung ste/ badz+ra ban+d+ha/ zhes brjod la rdo rje bcing ba snying khar chings shig/ de nas snying po 'dis sor mo thams
239b4(rgyud): cad brdab par bya'o// oM badz+ra ban+d+ha tA Ta/ 'dis ni phyag rgya thams cad dgug cing dbang du byed do// de nas rdo rje ye shes dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ngo // badz+ra A be sha/ zhes brjod la snying po/
239b5(rgyud): 'dis rdo rje dbab par bskyed par bya'o// aH/ thams cad dbab pa'i snying po 'di ni gdon mi za ba'o// de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag bcing ba ni/ badz+ra muSh+Ti/ zhes brjod la bcing ngo // de ste de
239b6(rgyud): ltar ma byas na yang / sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes brjod la phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi phyag rgya thams
239b7(rgyud): cad kyi snying po don yod pa 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa ste/ stong bzlas pas phyag rgya bcing ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya lan cig bzlas na grub pa thams cad la gces par 'gyur ro//
240a1(rgyud): de nas phyag rngu bcing ba 'byung ste// thal mo sbyar la so mo phan tshun bsngol ba ni rdo rje'i thal ma'o// de nyid sang pa'i bar rnams su shin tu bsdams pa ni rdo rje bcing ba'o// de nyid las
240a2(rgyud): mthe bong gnyis nang du bcug ste/ mthe'u chung dang srin lag gi bar du rab tu btsugs la btsum pa 'di ni rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mthe bong gnyis gzhibs la nang du gzhug la/ de bzhin
240a3(rgyud): du mthe'u rlung dang srin lag gi bar du btsugs te/ mdzub mo shin tu bkug pa ni ngo rje khu tshur dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las gnyis su byas pa ni las kyi phyag rgya gzhan du 'gyur te/ dam tshig chen po de lon ma/
240a4(rgyud): lan cig brjod la snyi pa'am/ nam mkha' las sor bcing ngo // ngag gi phyag rgya yang / badz+ra ritra/ zhes bachod la phyag rgya bcing ngo // lta ba'i phyag rgyan snying po'i don gyis bcing ngo // sa'i phyag rgya dang /
240a5(rgyud): mchu'i phyag rgya dang / mig bskul ba'i phyag rgya dang / snying dang / lus g.yo ba'i phyag rgya ni/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes brjod na bcing ba grub par 'gyur ro// de nas rdo rje hUM zhes pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba 'byung ste//
240a6(rgyud): rje khro bo'i mdzub mo ni rdo rje khu tshur du byas la sgo brkyang na rdo rje khro bo zhes bya ba yin no// rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub mo gnyis// lag ngar bsnol te bcings nas kyang // mthe'u chung lcags kyu spel byas la// d+hU nas
240a7(rgyud): ni bsdigs par byed// de nyid g.yas pakyo ba tang du byas pa ni rdo rje khro bo'i kyo btang ngo // de la 'di ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// lag mthil dag tu rdo rje bcing // mthe bong gshibs pas bkab pa yis/
240b1(rgyud): khu tshur byas pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya rje khro ba ste// ti rin ti'i zhes bya'o// hUM ni ngag gi phyag rgya'o// ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni thams cad gsong pa'i khro ba'o// rdo rje'i sa gzhi bcing ba ni rdo rje bcing bas la can
240b2(rgyud): ste bzhag pa 'dis rdo rje'i sa gzhir 'gyur te/ de la sus kyang glags mi rnyed do// de la 'di ni rdo rje 'dod pa'i khro bo'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bcing ba bcings la mdzub mo rdo rje ltar byas pa ni thams cad la dbang byed pa'i phyag
240b3(rgyud): rgya'o// rdo rje'i dam tshig rdo rje bcings la mdzub mo gnyis mnyam par gshibs pas snying khar gtugs shig/ gal te de las 'da' bar byas na snying gas te 'chi'o// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings la// mdzub
240b4(rgyud): mo kyo ba tang du bcings la// dkri zhing phyir dkri byas pa ni// lha rnams dgug pa'i mchog yin no// rdo rje bcings pa brtan byas la// mdzub mo bkug pa shin tu btsir// mthe bong gnyis ka gshibs pa yis/
240b5(rgyud): dbus su btsir ba bar snang gi/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcangs la// mthe'u chung gnyis ka spel nas su// mdzub mo yi ni rgyab sbyar te// bzlog pa nam mkhar rgyu rnams kyi'o// rdo rje bcing ba brtan byas nas/
240b6(rgyud): khu tshur gyis ni sa mnan pa// 'di ni sa pa'i dam tshig ste// thams cad byed pa 'da' bar dka'// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te// g.yon pa'i mdzub mos mdzub mo bcing // mthe'u chung sor mo mnyam
240b7(rgyud): brdab pa// 'di ni 'og ma rnams dgug pa'o// mdzub mo gnyis ka brtan po ru// rdo rje bcings pa sbrel bar bya// gung mo mthe bong rdo rjer bya// rgyan rnams thams cad 'joms pa'o// rdo rje dkri ba dang /
241a1(rgyud): rdo rje btsir ba dang / rdo rje 'phreng ba dang / rdo rje sa dang / rdo rje sa'i 'og dang / rdo rje he ru ka'o// de la rdo rje shugs kyi phyag rgya ni 'di'o// dkyil 'khor dag ni byed pa na// srad bu'am yang
241a2(rgyud): na ri mo la// 'jug pa dang ni 'byung ba ni// sgrub pas yid kyis bteg nas so// de la ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i snying po ni 'di'o// oM badz+ra be ga hUM/ 'dis ni dam tshig ma nyams par 'gyur ro// gzhan du
241a3(rgyud): dam tshig nyams pa grub pa med par 'gyur ro// de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di'o// dpung pa gnyis rdo rje bcings te rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis su byas la/ pus mo btsugs
241a4(rgyud): te mgo bo sa la btsugs te phyag bya'o// phyag na rdorje la ni de nyid kyis ngang pa'i stabs kyis gnas par byas la/ 'dzum ning bskyong ba dang / smin ma 'gyed pa dang bcas pa'i mig gis phyag btsal lo// @
241a5(rgyud): rnams la ni pus mo btsugs pa'o// de la rdo rje 'dzin ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba ni 'di yin te/ lag pa gnyis kyi rgyab sbyar nas// mthe bong mthe'u chung sbrel bar bya'o// rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya 'di/
241a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du byed// pra tits+tsha badz+ra/ snying po 'dis me tog gtor ro// rdo rje kyo ba tang gi phyag rgya ni rdo rje 'dzin ma'i mdzub mo gnyis kyo ba tang gi tshul du bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/
241a7(rgyud): la sogs pa dang / sems can thams cad dgug pa'i dam tshig 'da' bar mi bya ba ste/ dam tshig lcags kyu yin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba 'byung ste/ rdo rje'i khu
241b1(rgyud): tshur gnyis bcings nas// g.yas pas bsdam par bya ba ni// rngomaza ba'i mdzub mo g.yon// sangs rgyas byang chub mchog bsam pa'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dmatshig gi phyag rgyan/
241b2(rgyud): 'di'o// mthe bong gnyis ka'i skyil mo krung // mdzub mo gnyis ka dgug par bya// rdo rje thal mo 'od dkyil 'khor// gung mo gnyis ka kha 'byed pa// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i
241b3(rgyud): phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dbang du bya ba las 'da' bar mi 'gyur zhing / 'di mthong bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mthong bar 'gyur ro/
241b4(rgyud): de nas badz+ra bid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/ sems ni rnam dag shes bya ba// brtan pas sems dpa' zhes bya'o// mnyam par gzhag pas ting nge 'dzin// nges pas rdo rje nyid du 'gyur// sangs rgyas
241b5(rgyud): ngo bo'i bdag nyid de// sems nyid sangs rgyas nyid yin no// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pas// nges par sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur// phyag rgya chen po bcings nas de sgom mo// de nas de bzhin
241b6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyis rang gi sems so sor brtags pa la sogs pas sangs rgyas su yongs su sbyar ba byas nas/ ji ltar tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas pa thob par 'gyur te/ de ltar byin gyis rlob pa
241b7(rgyud): mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur ni las kyi phyag rgya'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen po ni 'di yin no// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis// phyag na rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur//
242a1(rgyud): rdo rje 'gying ba rab 'byed cing // 'gying dang bcas pas rdo rje gsor// 'di yis kun 'gro skad cig gis// 'od dang gyen du 'gro bar 'gyur// 'dod pa kun dbang thams cad pa/
242a2(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bcing ba bcings nas kyang // gung mo nang bcug snying khar gzhag/ mthe bong mthe'u chung kha phye mnyam// rdo rje chen po de ltar bcing /
242a3(rgyud): sems dpa' kun gyi ting 'dzin gyis// 'di ni snying khar bcings pa yis// phyag rgya kun gyi dngos grub pa// dam pa dag kyang thob par 'gyur// de la ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni 'di'o// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
242a4(rgyud): dbus su ni// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis// phyag na rdo rje bdag gi lus// bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis byas la// 'gying bcas rdo rje gsor byas na// 'gying zhing /
242a5(rgyud): gyen du bstan tshul gyis// snying khar gzung na 'grub par 'gyur// de la bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni 'di yin no// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la// g.yon pa gzhu 'dren sbyor ba dang /
242a6(rgyud): mda' 'phen pa yi tshul gyis su// kun la bsnun na chags par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang bskur ba'i 'phreng ba'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phyag rgya gtsug tor du gzhag go/
242a7(rgyud): de nas phab ste gung mo rdo rjer byas te/ de las bskur te gung mo nor bur byas la g.yas phyogs su gzhag go// lhag par gung mo'i rdo rje'i pad+mo gzhag go// de las bskor te gung mo dang mthe'u chung gyes par byas
242b1(rgyud): la g.yon du gzhag go// de nas mdzub mo gnyis mdud pa byas te/ 'phreng ba bcing ba'i tshul du lhag par mdud pa byas la/ sor mo thams cad mthe'u chung nas mthar gyis 'jig pa'i tshul gyis dgrol ba ni cong
242b2(rgyud): pan gyi tshul bzhin dgrol lo// phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i sems dpa' sgrub par 'dod pas lha mo'i dkyil 'khor byas te/ de nas nyin gcig cang bdag
242b3(rgyud): nyid byin gyis brlabs nas/ ji lta bu'i dus su ci nus pas ci 'dod pa bde bar byas la/ phyag rgya chen po'i tshul gyis klu dbyangs kyis rdo rje'i tshig tu rdo rje sems dpa' bzlas te/ de nas snying po 'di ci 'dod
242b4(rgyud): pas bzlas so// oM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa dzaHhUM baM ho su ra tas+t+wa~M/ de ltar zla ba gcig bzlas te sgrub bo// zla ba gcig lon pa'i mjug tu tshes bco lnga la ngal na phyag rgya bkrol la/ rdo rje'i thal mo brkyang nas
242b5(rgyud): lus thams cad kyis phyag bya'o// cung zad gnas nas ji ltar ngal bar mi 'gyur bar byas te/ de ltar mtshan rangs par bzlas na de'i nang par bcom ldan 'das zla ba'i kha dog zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang
242b6(rgyud): mtshungs pa'i 'od can byon te/ sgrub pa po 'khyud nas de'i lus kun tu zhugs so// de nas sgrub pa po'ang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'i 'od can dang / zla ba'i 'od can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
242b7(rgyud): 'phreng ba la sogs pa dang / lha'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje 'dzin gyi lus dang / ngag dang // sems rdo rje thams cad dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// bdag gi rigs dang / gnyen dang / grogs pa/
243a1(rgyud): dang / gnyen pa shes la sogs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis gzugs bzang po mthong na'ang 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro// lta bar byed do// mchod par byed do// bstan par/
243a2(rgyud): byed do// don thams cad byed do// de'ang rang gi khyim de nyid na gnas bzhin du lha'i cho 'phrul byed do// de bzhin gshegs par yang gyur nas rdzu 'phrul thams cad byed do// rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzugs
243a3(rgyud): kyis kyang 'dul bar byed do// sems can de dag gis kyang mthong ngo // ma btul ba rnams kyang 'dul lo// ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur ba dang / thams cad du 'gro ba dang / phyir 'ong ba dang / gyen
243a4(rgyud): du 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten khams thams cad du de bzhin gsheg pa thams cad la mchod pa byas nas phyir 'ong ba'i bar du'o// don thams cad la longs spyod pa dang / 'dod pa thams cad la dbang ba dang /
243a5(rgyud): 'dod pa thams cad spyod pa'i tshe nam mkha' dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro zhes/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nas rdo rje 'dod pa khro bo'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis bcangs pa las
243a6(rgyud): mda' 'phen pa'i tshul gyis me tog gi gzhu 'dren pa ni thams cad dga' bar byed pa yin no// rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis kyis snying khar rdo rje hUM zhes pa ste/ g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis 'phen pas rdo rje 'phangs pas
243a7(rgyud): ni thams cad gtan 'pho'o// de nas 'di ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te// de ltar kyo ba mthe'u chung mdzub// mdud nas mthe bong gshibs pa yis// bsdams te snying khar
243b1(rgyud): gzhag par bya// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa nges par dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / 'dren par byed pa'o// rdo rje khu tshur gyis 'khyud pa ni rdo
243b2(rgyud): dga' ba'i phyag rgya'o// dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'byung ste/ rdo rje bcing ba bsdams byas nas// g.yon pa'i mdzub mtheb mo mtshan du// mthe bo'i rtags ni btsud nas su// de bskyong bar du bsdam par bya// 'dis
243b3(rgyud): ni bud med thams cad dga' bar byed do// ngo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'i tshul du bya'o// rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan no// dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'byung ste/ rdo rje bcing ba bsdam byas nas// mdzub ma
243b4(rgyud): gnyis ni dgug par bya// srin lag gshibs la mthe'u chung bkyeng // de ltar mthe bong gnyis kyang bkyed// 'di bstan pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang byams pa bstan par mdzad na/ gzhan
243b5(rgyud): wA ci spos/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis snyems par byed pa ni rdo rje snyems pa'o// dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'byung ste// rdo rje bcing ba kun byas nas// rtsib logs gnyis su bskor nas su// 'dzin pas bskyod pas/
243b6(rgyud): 'dud pa ste// khro bo thams cad mgu bar byed// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog bcas dang // rdo rje gar gyi rab sbyor bas// mdor na me tog la sogs pa'i// gsang ba'i mchod pa myur du 'grub// rtog pa
243b7(rgyud): gzhan gyi gsang ba'i mchod pa dang yang sbyar ro// de nas rdo rje gar 'byung ste// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcangs nas// 'dzum pas mtha' nas brtsams te dgrol// grog bzhin bsgyur te bskor zhing dgrol/
244a1(rgyud): 'gram pa dang ni gtsug tor gnag/ rdo rjeg pa zhes bya ba ste// bdag che'i mchod pa thams cad do// mchod pa 'di ni gsol bas na// dngos med nyi kyang myur du 'grub// de nas rdo
244a2(rgyud): gzugs la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni rdo rje bcing ba brkyang la mthil du blta'o// rdo rje bcings pas g.yon pa'i mdzub mo ni pi wang gi shing ngo // g.yas pa bkug pas ni len te/ brkyang ba'i lag mthil gyis
244a3(rgyud): rang gi snying khar byug go// me tog gi thal mo'i tshul gyis rdo rje ro btung bar bya'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcangs te/ g.yon pa'i mthe'u chung ni g.yas pa'i kyo btang gis gzung ngo // kyo ba tang de g.yas pas sems
244a4(rgyud): dpa'i dam tshig thams cad dang sems can thams cad kyang dgug go// rdo rje bcings la mthe bong 'dud pa ni zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mdzub mo spel ba ni thams cad bcing ngo // rdo rje 'bebs pa'i
244a5(rgyud): phyag rgyas ni thams cad 'bebs par byed do// de nas go cha'i phyag rgya 'byung ste/ khu tshur bcing ba gnyis snying khar 'dud pa'i tshul du bya'o// spos nas yang lhag par yang de bzhin no// spos nas snying khar yang de
244a6(rgyud): bzhin no// yang bar du'ang 'dud do// yang spos nas snying kha dang lhag par yang de bzhin no// mgo la'ang de bzhin du dbang bskur ba'i gnas su'o// 'phreng ba bcing ba'i 'dud pa'i tshul gyis mthe'u chung la sogs
244a7(rgyud): pa'i sor mo thams cad dgrol ba'i cod pan gyi tshul du bya'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni/ pad+mo zum pa'i thal mo sbyar/ pad+mo chen por grags pa ste// mthe'u chung mthe bong
244b1(rgyud): gnyis 'gyed pa// sdig pa rnams ni sel ba'o// de nyid mdzub me kyo ba tang du byas pa ni thams cad 'gugs pa'o// de nas pad+mo 'byung ste/ rdo rje bcings pa'i mdzub mo gnyis bkug la mthe bong mnyam pa'i steng du phungs
244b2(rgyud): gnyis gzhag go// de gnyis su byas nas g.yon pa la g.yas pas pad+mo 'byed par bya'o// de nas pad+mo dag gi phyag rgya ni hI/ ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni pad+mo 'byed pas 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dri ma sbyong bar gsungs pa
244b3(rgyud): nyid do// de nas nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni nor bu'i khu tshur gnyis kas dbang bskur ba'i 'phreng ba bcing ngo // de nas rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya ni/ rdo rje bcing ba kun byas nas// mdzub mo mnyam nas
244b4(rgyud): mthe ba dang sbyar// de dag ngos su spang ba ste// dbang bskur gnas su dbang sbyin no// de nyid kha yang bstan la snying khar gzhag pa ni nor bu'i khu tshur zhes bshad de/ don thams cad 'phrog pa'o// de nyid las mthe
244b5(rgyud): bo'i rdo rjes mdzub mo mnyam pa mnan te/ rgyab bskum pa ni rdo rje'i nor bu'o// hr-id chos kyi phyag rgya'o// ye shes kyi phyag rgya thams cad nam mkhar sgom pa'o// de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcing ba ni de ltar sngar bsha
244b6(rgyud): pa nyid do// bAM/ ngag gi phyag rgya'o// byams pa'i bcing ba ni bcing ba'i nang na mchog ste/ ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o// mdun du ni rdo rje chen po'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas su ni rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya bstan pa nyid do//
244b7(rgyud): rgyab tu ni rdo rje bcing ba snying par bkan nas mthe bong sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis dgug par bya'o// rdo rje ba sgo mchog gi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bcing ba'i mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis snying khar brkyang ba ni rdo rje ste/ rdo
245a1(rgyud): thams cad do// rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste/ grub pa thams cad stsol ba phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du bri'o// de nas 'jam dpal gyi phyag rgya bcing ba ni rdo rje khu tshur mdzum
245a2(rgyud): mo'i rtse mo bkug pa 'di ni ral gri'o// gnyis pa ni glegs bam mo// dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa'i glegs bam bcangs pa'i mthe'u chung ni g.yas pa'i ral gri 'dzin pas gzung ngo // AHchos kyi phyag
245a3(rgyud): rgya 'od chos thams cad la yi ge med ces bya ba ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o// de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni / rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis bcangs te// mthe'u chung mdzub mo'i rdorje bcing // rdo che 'khor lo zhes
245a4(rgyud): bshad de// dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub pa po// 'di mthong bas dkyil 'khor thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du dbus su kha bzhag ste bzlas na dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur zhing de /
245a5(rgyud): du sgrub par 'gyur ro// hUM/ chos kyi phyag rgya'o// de nas nam mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgya bcing ba ni rdo rje nor bu'i phyag rgya las mthe'u chung dang srin lag mnyam pa'i rgyal mtshan sgreng ba'i tshul du bya'o// chos kyi phyag rgya ni/
245a6(rgyud): traM 'phags pa byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya'o// ngag gi phyag rgya ni/ oM/ de nas rtogs pa thams cad spyi'i phyag rgya shes pa 'byung ste/ de la lus kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur/
245a7(rgyud): ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ 'greng yang rung / 'dug kyang rung / kang pa bsnyams te brkyang ba dang / lag pa sgreng ba ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// mchog bsgrub pa la rdo rje dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro// langs nas g.yon pas ngo
245b1(rgyud): khu tshur bcangs nas g.yas pa bkug pas drangs pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ste/ thams cad 'dren pa'i phyag rgya yin no// langs la pus mo bkyed de bkug nas lag pa gnyis bsdams te gyen du brkyang ba ni/
245b2(rgyud): thams cad gtan 'pho ba'i ral gri'o// dpung pa gnyis kyis rang gi snying khar 'khyud pa ni go cha ste mi phyed pa'o// de nas rang gi phyag rgya bcing ba ni/ a ho ha hUM/ dbab pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / bsrung ba dang
245b3(rgyud): gtan 'pho ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nas lta ba'i phyag rgya 'byung ba ni/ myur 'gyur rdo rje'i lta ba ste// bgrang de btsums pa 'dren pa yin// khro bo'i lta ba khro gnyer te// brtan par lta ba mi g.yo ba'o// de nas 'di dag gi
245b4(rgyud): las 'byung ba ni rdo rje'i lta bas skye 'gro thams cad mgu bar bya'o// bgrang ba'i lta bas ni thams cad dgud pa dang / rims dang / gdon dang / dug dang / byang ma la sogs pa dang / nang thams cad sel to//
245b5(rgyud): khro bo'i lte bas ni thams cad gtan 'pho'o// brtan par lta bas ni thams cad srung ngo // de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// badz+ra dr-iSh+Ti ma Ta/ dIp+ta dr-iSh+Ta ang+ku sha dza/ oM kro d+ha dr-iSh+Ti phaT/ driH dr-iSh+Tha haM/ so'i phyag
245b6(rgyud): rgya 'byung ste/ so bca' bas ni gtan 'pho'o// mur bas ni dbang du byed do// snying po bzlas shing khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin bzlas te phyag rgya'i las byed do// g.yas nas gcu pa ni 'gugs pa'o// g.yon pas gcu
245b7(rgyud): ba ni dbang du byed pa'o// ma mchu sos mnan pas ni gtan 'pho'o// mchu gnyis ka bsdams pas ni srung ngo // sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa rjes su dran pa dang / rdo rje khro bo rjes su dran pa dang /
246a1(rgyud): rdo rje rjes su dran pa ni thams cad sgrub pa ste/ mchu'i phyag rgya'o// mig g.yas pa bskyod pas dbang du byed do// mig g.yon pa bskyod pas rjes su chags so// gnyis ka btsum pas/
246a2(rgyud): ni gtan 'pho'o// gnyis ka bgrang bas ni srung ngo // thams cad kyi snying po 'azlas te gyen du bltas nanam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// thur du bltas na sa'i dbang por 'gyur ro// g.yas nas bskor ba na/
246a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod do// g.yon nas bskor ba ni phyag na rdo rje la mchod de/ thams cad kyi snying po stong bzlas nas sgrub bo// de nas phyi rol gyi rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba 'byung ste/ de la
246a4(rgyud): 'jig rten pa'i phyag rgya rnams ni 'jig rten pa'i khu tshur las 'byung ste/ rdo rje khu tshur ni rdo rje bcing ba las g.yon pa'i mthe bong nang du bcug nas mthe'u chung dang srin lag gi bar du btsir la bsdam par bya ste/ de nyid
246a5(rgyud): la phyag rgya'i snying po 'di 'bum bzlas te sgrub bo// oM badz+ra mu drA hU/ rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis su byas te/ g.yas pas mtshan ma li ltar byas pa bzhin du bzung ngo // ma rnams thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcing ba ni 'di
246a6(rgyud): bzhin du rdo rje'i khu tshur las g.yon pa jo mo khro ba'i mdzub mo sgreng ba ste/ dur khrod dam tshogs kyi gnas su rdo rje zla bo'i mdzub mos mi khrag thigs pa gsum khar blangs te myangs nas// mi rom sbas shing mnyams
246a7(rgyud): pa rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te brgya bzlas na nam mkhar 'gro ba dang / mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / byang ma thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// tshogs de dag thams cad kyi dbang por 'gyur ro// zag 'jug pa dang phan
246b1(rgyud): 'dod nus par 'gyur ro// mkha' 'gro ma'i bde ba'i mchog thams cad dang / rtog pa thams cad dang / las thams cad dang / phyag rgya thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas khro bo'i khu tshur sgrub pa'i snying po ni 'di/
246b2(rgyud): yin no// oM badz+ra A ra li/ phyag rgya bcing ba'i bar du'o// de nas de'i rjes la phyag rgya thams cad kyi gsang ba'i bsgrub pa'i skabs bshad par bya ste/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya gsang ba sgrub pa ni dkyil
246b3(rgyud): 'khor bri ste/ der 'di skad brjod do// bcom ldan phyag rgya btsun mo 'di// rtag tu bdag la stsal bar stsol// sems can kun gyi don grub phyir// grub pa mchog ni bsgrub par bgyi// phyag na rdo rje dkyil
246b4(rgyud): 'khor nas 'di zhes brjod do// su ra te sa ma ya s+t+waM ho/ badz+ra satwa Ad+ya sid d+ha nan/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya sgrub pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che/
246b5(rgyud): rtag tu bdag la grub pa stsol// de nas phyi rol gyi rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba bsgrub pa ni phyag na rdo rje khro bo ni thams cad byed pa yin no zhes de skad brjod la bsgrub par bya'o// ma rnams kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya sgrub pa
246b6(rgyud): ni dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas b+h+yo b+h+yo zhes rjod cig/ gsang ba bsgrub pa'i rab tu bya ba'o// / de nas phyag rgya'i de kho na 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya'i de kho na ni sems las sangs
246b7(rgyud): rgyas kyi chos 'byung ngo // yang dag par na 'di dag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo'i thugs la gnas pa yin no// bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yin pas bdag gi chung ma yin no zhes sngar bsgoms la
247a1(rgyud): phyag rgya sgrub bo// phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i de kho na ni/ rab dga' bcing ba kun gyi mchog/ de bas phyag rgya rnams su byas// 'dod pa rdo rje sems dpa' yis// grub brtan myur
247a2(rgyud): du stsol bar mdzad// de nas gzhan dag ni/ bcom ldan rtag pa 'dod pa ste// de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'o// de las thams cad bdag nyid gzugs// bdag kyang pa rgya grub par shog/ de nas phyi
247a3(rgyud): rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs kyi phyag rgya yis// de kho na ni phyag na rdo rje lha thams cad dbang du byas nas rdo rjer byas te/ de dag gi phyag rgya'ang rdo rje'i phyag rgya nyid do// de nas ma rnams kyi phyag rgya'i de kho na nyid ni/ ma rung thams
247a4(rgyud): cad za ba'i phyir// lha rnams kun gyis byas pa ste// phyag rgya 'bebs pas de yi phyir// bsgoms nas kyang ni bsgrub par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de kho na rab tu sbyor bas thog mar bsgoms nas sprus/
247a5(rgyud): bod daphyag rgya'i de kho na'i rab tu bya ba'o// / de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i las bshad do zhes nas/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa/ nyin de dang
247a6(rgyud): bo dus bzhin du// rdo rje che mchog phyag rgya yis// snying kha sman mtshams lkog ma gtsug/ bdag nyid byin gyis brlab par bya// de la byin gyis brlab pa'i snying po ni 'di yin no// badz+ra sa twa/ @/
247a7(rgyud): rat+na/ badz+ra d+ham/ badz+ra kam/ de la 'di ni rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i snying po yin no// oM sarba ta thA ga a b+hi She ka ta ya d+hi Shiny+tsa/ sring po 'dis rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya smin mtshams su gnas/
247b1(rgyud): ste/ mdzub mo gnyis kyis 'breng ba'i tshul du bcings la/ lhag par mdud pa'i tshul du byas nas bskor ro// mthe'u chung nas brtsams te bkrol bas sor mo thams cad bkrol te dang sbyangs pa ltar bya'o//
247b2(rgyud): de nas ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes bskyod pa na rdo rje bcing ba bkan te phang par bzhag nas sgom pa'i snying po 'dis rang gi snying khar rdo rje bsam mo// oM badz+ra At+ma ka/ rdo rje'i bzlas pas ci 'dod pa bzlas so//
247b3(rgyud): de nas rdo rje mchod pa'i rab tu bya ba ni/ rdo rje'i khur gnyis bcangs nas// rdo rje 'gying ba legs par bya// rdo rje 'phreng ba de bzhin gru// rdo rje gar yang spyi bo nas// der bstod pa'i rdo rje'i glu blang zhing
247b4(rgyud): mchod par bya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa'o// rdo rje rin chen bla med de// rdo rje chos ni glur blangs pas// rdo rje las ni mdzad par gsol// dga' ba dang / dbang bskur ba dang / glu dang /
247b5(rgyud): mchod pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyang rnyed par mi dka' na grub pa gzhan lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar sems dpa'i bde ba 'di dang mtshungs pa med do// de nas phyag rgya rdo rje sa'i byin
