247b6(rgyud): gyis brlab pa la sogs pa 'byung ste/ nyin re dang por dus bzhin du// rdo rje'i byin gyis brlab tshul gyis// bdag gis bdag nyid byin brlabs nas// sems dpar byin brlabs rnal 'byor
247b7(rgyud): ldan rdo rje dang bcas rdo rje bcing // rdo rje 'bebs la sogs tshul gyis// rdo rje khu tshur rdo rje bcas// gnyis byas phyag rgya'i mchog gis su// bdag nyid byin gyis brlab par bya// 'dod pa
248a1(rgyud): bdag nyid ces kyang sgom// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' mi// gsang ba'i snying po bzlas par bya'o// de la gsang ba'i snying po 'di rdo rje'i glus ci 'dod pa bzlas so// bkri dza ho// de nas
248a2(rgyud): sgrub pa gzhan yang rdo rje bcing bas rtags bzung ste 'bum bzlas na 'dod pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug dang / 'dod pa'i gzugs dang / 'dod pa'i tshe dang / 'dod pa'i bdag po dang / kun tu 'gro ba thams cad
248a3(rgyud): grub par 'gyur ro// de nas phyag na rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i rab tu bya ba 'byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba ji lta ba bzhin du snying po 'dis sbyin no// oM sarba ta thA ga taratra
248a4(rgyud): a b+hi She ka a/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes bskyed pa ting nge 'dzin la dmigs pa ni/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad nyid yin pa ni de bzhin du/ bdag kyang thams cad/
248a5(rgyud): nyid do zhes nas snying po 'dis thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas te sgom mo// de la snying po ni 'di'o// oM satwa dzaHdzu ba hoH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gsang pa'i
248a6(rgyud): mchod pa byu ngan byin gyis brdab pal sogs pa thams cad byed de/ dem bu tshur gnyis bcangs ma// rdo rje gar dang sbyar nas su// me tag la sogs dbul ba ni// gsang ba'i mchod pa phrag rgya dbul// sacu
248a7(rgyud): 'dren pa yi tshul gyis su// rdo rje mda' ni 'phen par bya// kun nas 'khyud dang rgyal mtshan bsgreng // gnyis snyems 'dzin pas 'dud pa'o// rdo rje'i bstod pa 'dis rdo rje'i gru brang zhing mchod// gzugs la
248b1(rgyud): sogs pa 'dod pa dag gi bde ba dang / shin tu yid bde bcom ldan rab dag 'a khyod la 'dud// khyod kyis bdag la deng du dga' ba de kun mchod la// mchog gi bdag cid grub pa'ang myur du tshul bzhin stsol/
248b2(rgyud): bstod pa'i snying po 'dis thams cad grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes nyin ya pas stong na bcom ldan 'das las thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// slob dpon de rang gi lce las kyang 'das pa dang /
248b3(rgyud): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi thams cad dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' dang / rtog pa thams cad dang / tshig gi rgyud thams cad kyang smra bar 'gyur ro// lha'i glu sngon ma byung ba len to// rdo rje'i grus
248b4(rgyud): 'bum bzlas na rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de ltar lan cig byin gyis brlabs la/ de nas phyis sgrubs shig/ de nas nyin gcig bzhin byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa nyin rer lan rer byas na grub pa thams
248b5(rgyud): cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / dbang bskur ba la sogs pa dang / shes pa thams cad dang / las thams cad 'grub bo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa dang / sems
248b6(rgyud): dpa' rnams der lhags nas phra mo la sogs pa ston te tshig sla'o// byams par byed/ mchod do// de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang // rim gro thams cad kyis mchod do// sems can
248b7(rgyud): thams cad la tshar gtsang ba dang / phan 'dogs nus par 'gyur ro// 'jig pa med pa dang / zad pa med pa dang / 'god pa med pa dang / 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa
249a1(rgyud): thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / sdug bsngal thams cad kyang sel te/ cho 'phrul thams cad ston to// bdag nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa sems
249a2(rgyud): dpa'i gzugs man chad dang / bdag gi lus thams cad dang / nam mkha' dang / sa dang / shing dang / ri dang / chu rnams las kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa'i gzugs thams cad
249a3(rgyud): ston par byed do// 'od zer ston pa la sogs pa'i tshe 'phrul thams cad ston to// rang yang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la sogs pa dang / thams cad kyi gzugs su 'gyur ro// mig gis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs
249a4(rgyud): pa dang / da ltar gyi shes pa thams cad yi ge rnams las mthong ngo // thams cad las thos shing rang gi lces smra'o// sngon ma byung ba'i rtog pa dang mdo sde thams cad 'chad do// ston skyob thams cad dang / sil
249a5(rgyud): snyan dang / 'phong dang / mtshon 'debs pa dang / bshes gnyen dang / bzo dang / sgyu rtsal thams cad lhun gyis grub par shes par 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin du gzugs chen po dang / mdog dang
249a6(rgyud): stobs dang / dpa' ba dang / tshe dang / nang med pa dang / dngos grub thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa dang / skra skad dang / tshig shes shing mthong ngo /
249a7(rgyud): nyin gcig bzhin thams cad mngon par shes par 'gyur ro// mdor na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa dngos grub thams cad ma bsgrubs par tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur ro// byin/
249b1(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs la sogs pa'i rab tu bya ba'o// / de la bsgrub pa'i rab tu bya ba 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa sgrub pa ni mdun du bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi sku rjes su dran pa sgom ning /
249b2(rgyud): snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / rig pa rnams sgrub bo// phyag na rdo rje sgrub pa ni sems dpar byin gyis brlab pa'i rnal 'byor ram/ 'dod par sgom pa'am/ rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran pa
249b3(rgyud): 'am/ bdag gi snying khar rdo rje sgom pa 'am/ bdag gi mdun du sangs rgyas rjes su dran par byed bzhin du snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / rig pa rnams sgrub bo// sems dpa' chen po thams
249b4(rgyud): cad ni bdag nyid kyis rang gi sems dpa' rjes su dran pa 'am/ snying khar rdo rje chen po sgom zhing snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / rig pa rnams bsgrub par bya'o// phyi'i rdo rje'i rigs sgrub pa ni/
249b5(rgyud): khro bo'i tshul gyis snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / rig pa rnams sgrub bo// rdo rje ma rnams sgrub pa ni sems can thams cad za ba'i rjes su dran pa'am/ bdag nyid rdo rje srin por gyur te/ de'i
249b6(rgyud): phyir bdag nyid kyang sems can thams cad bza' 'o zhes khros te snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / rig pa rnams bsgrub par bya'o// bsgrub pa'i rab tu bya ba'o// / de nas
249b7(rgyud): sgrub pa'i thabs kyi rab tu bya ba 'byung ste/ ji ltar 'jig rten 'dul 'gyur ba// de ltar sgrub par gsungs pa ste// grub pa thams cad byed pa'i mchog/ sgrub pa'i thabs kyis rab tu bya ba'o//
250a1(rgyud): de nas ras kyi rab tu bya ba 'byung ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ras ni sgra med par byas la dkyil 'khor zlum por thig gdab bo// phyag na rdo rje'i ras ni ngos thams cad par
250a2(rgyud): gru bzhi po dar ram ras la bri'o// sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ni ji lta bur 'dus pa'i 'khor bzhin du'o// phyi'i rdo rje'i rigs rnams kyis ma bsdus pa la 'dus pa'i 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du dgod do
250a3(rgyud): rdo rjem rnams kyi mnyams pa la kha tshar ma bcad pa ste/ ri mo mkhan gso sbyin can gyis sprin med pa'i tshon rtsi snong gsang bar bzhag pas bri/ ras kyi rab tu bya ba'o// de la cha lugs kyi
250a4(rgyud): tshad rab tu bya ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtho gang tsam du bya ba'o// phyag na rdo rje'i ni mtha' med pa'i phyir ji ltar 'dod pa'i tshad du bya ba'o// de la rdo rje'i tshad ni ji tsam du/
250a5(rgyud): 'gyur zhe na/ rang gi mthe bo'i tshigs kyi sor mo bcu drug tu bya'o// de la rdo rje'i dbyibs ci 'dra bar bya zhe na/ zur bzhi la rtse lnga pa 'od zer gyi 'phreng ba can sum char bya'o// sems dpa' chen po thams/
250a6(rgyud): cad ni mthe bo'i tshigs kyi sor bcu drug gi tshad du bya ste/ thams cad kyang pad+mol bzhugs par bya'o// de bzhin du sku gzugs kyi tshad las dkyil 'khor gyi tshad kyang de dang 'dra bar bya'o// de la 'di
250a7(rgyud): ni bzlas pa'i rab tu bya ba ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ni dgongs pa'i gsung ting nge 'dzin gyi tshig ste/ rdo rje rnams kyi'ang de bzhin no// de la rtog pa thams cad kyi spyir ni rdo rje'i tshig gis
250b1(rgyud): bapra sa te sgrub bo// phyag na rdo rje'i ni rdo rje tshig gi gru dang sbyar te bzlas so// rdo rje hUM zhes pa la sogs pa rdo rje'i khro bo rnams ni rdo rje'i khro bo'i tshig gis bzlas so// phyi'i rdo rje'i rigs rnams ni chos kyi tshig
250b2(rgyud): gis khro bo'i sgra chen po gsal bar byas te khro bo dang bcas pas bzlas so// rdo rje'i ma rnams ni rdo rje'i tshig phra mos bzlas so// de la ting 'dzin gyi ngag ni yid kyis bzlas so// de la rdo rje'i ngag ni
250b3(rgyud): lce thog rab tu mi g.yo bar// so mchu gnyis ka sbyar ba ste// rtog pa kun la rig pa ni// rdo rje'i ngag ni sgra spangs pa'o// de la rdo rje'i gru'i tshig ni// khaT pa la sogs pa'i gru// grong dga' ba rnams
250b4(rgyud): blangs pa yis// rdo rje'i tshig bzlas rtog pa ru// rdo rje'i glu zhes grags pa'o// de la rdo rje khro bo'i tshig ni 'di'o// hUM zhes pa yi 'brug sgra 'dra// de bzhin phra zhing sgra dang ldan// khro bo gsal bajo/
250b5(rgyud): rje che'o// khro bo'i tshig ces grags pa'o// tshig gi rab tu bya ba'o// de la 'di ni bzlas pa'i cho ga rab tu bya ba yin te/ rtog pa dag ni kun la yang // sems dpa' gang dang gang dag gi/
250b6(rgyud): snying po phyag rgya sngags sgrub pas// de yi bdag nyid spyan drang sgrub// gnas dang srog chags thams cad ni// rang gi tshul gyi cho ga thams cad sgrub po// rdo rje bzlas pa ni rtog pa thams cad sgrub pa'o//
250b7(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i bzlas pa 'byung ste/ phyag na rdo rje'i snying po dang / phyag rgya sngags rig de bzhin te// bzlas pa'i don gyis mgon po bzlas// rtog pa kun la'ang bsgrub par bya// phyi mi
251a1(rgyud): rje rigs rnams kyi// khro bo'i mnyam par 'jog pa'o// rdo rje ma rnams thams cad kyi// yid kyis su ni snying yang gzung // bzlas pa'i don zhes bya ba la// phyag na rdo rje'i 'dod pa
251a2(rgyud): sgom zhing bzlas pa ste/ 'di ltar oM zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa ste bde ba chen po'o// 'dod pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya'o// 'dod pa ni thams cad dgug pa dang / gtsug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byed pani
251a3(rgyud): phyir ro// dzaHd+hu ba hoH/ 'dod pa ni shin tu dga' ba'o// 'dod pa ni bzlas pa'i don to// gsang ba'i bzlas pa 'di bzlas na bsod nams chung ngu'ang 'grub par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
251a4(rgyud): kyis kyang bslu bar mi nus so// thal mo khong stong du sbyar la mchod pa bya ste/ de la me tog gi mchod pa ni me tog gi thal mo gyen du bye bas so// bdug pa'i mchod pa ni thur du brkyang bas so// mar me'i mchod
251a5(rgyud): pa ni mthe bong bsnyams pas g.yogs pa'o// dri'i mchod pa ni rab tu brkyang ste stong pa 'am gang bas so// phyag rgya 'di rnams kyis yang dag pa nyid du mchod par 'gyur ba ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang /
251a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / dam tshig sems dpa' thams cad dang / snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / rig pa dang / lha rnams thams cad la'ang ngo // mchod pa'i rab tu bya'o//
251a7(rgyud): de la bsod nams med pa'i sems can gyi bsgrub pa'i rab tu bya ba 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor gang yang rung ba zhig nyin re zhing ji tsam 'dod pa'i tshad du nyi ma bzhir bris nas/ ji lta ba bzhin du der zhugs la
251b1(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po bcings nas rang gi lhag pa'i lha lar brgya bzas so// bsod nams med pa'i sems can gyi bsgrub pa'i rab tu bya ba'o// de la myang du 'grub par 'gyur ba'i rab tu bya ba ste/
251b2(rgyud): de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba ni/ ting 'dzin chos sbyin la sogs dang // rgya chen tshul rnams klog pa dang // ngang la gnas te de bzhin mchod// dngos grub myur sbyin chen po yin//
251b3(rgyud): de la phyag na rdo rje'i myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba ni/ 'dod la chags dang bral min dang / 'dod la chags pa'i dam pas mchod// 'dod la ci nus chags bya ba// myur du dngos grub sbyin pa yin// de la
251b4(rgyud): 'di ni sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi myur du 'grub pa ni/ sbyin dang tshul khrims de bzhin bzod// brtson 'grus bsam gtan de bzhin blo// ci nus kyis kyang bya ba ni// nyin gcig bzhin du ci 'dod
251b5(rgyud): par/ dpyi'i rdo rje'i rigs kyi grub pa myur ba ni/ sangs rgyas mchod cing de bzhin dang // phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan// rdo rje rtag tu lag na gzung // mi bgrungs thams cad tshar gcod mchog
251b6(rgyud): de nas rdo rje ma rnams kyi grub pa myur du bsgrub pa'i rab tu bya ba ste/ sems can dge la ngad pa dang // mchod cing dam tshig srung ba ste// phyag rgya'i gar gyis mchod pa dang // sems can ma rung drag shul bya/
251b7(rgyud): grub pa myung ba'i rab tu bya ba'o// de la slob dpon gyi rab tu bya ba 'byung ste/ de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon du grub pa ste/ dkyil 'khor du de bzhin
252a1(rgyud): gshegs pa'i spyan sbyar brda bad ces bya ba'i snying po stong rtsa brgya thang dag slob dpon rang bris dam tshig gi phyag rgya stong bzlas te slobs dbang bsrung ba'i snying ban 'da'o//
252a2(rgyud): satwa badz+ra rat+na/ badz+rad+ha mA/ badza kam/ oM a nu Sham d+hi tiSh+Tha sarba ta thA ga a d+ya te swA hA/ 'di brgya bzlas pa ni snying kha la sogs par phyag rgyab na gnas spyi bor thams cad pazlas so// de nas de ban
252a3(rgyud): gshegs pa'i rigs kyi slob dpon sbyin no// phyag na rdo rje'i cha lugs spyi bor bzung nas snying po 'di brtsa'ab brgya rtsa brgyang du ba zas shig bzlas pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rje rje'i slob dben du 'gyur /
252a4(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rdo rje slob dpon du 'gyur ro// de la snying po ni 'di'o// oM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa dzaHhUM baM hoHsu ra ta s+t+waM/ de nas de'i lag tu rdo rje sbyin no// de nas rdo rje rigs kyi ste
252a5(rgyud): lag pa gnyis su rdo rje byin nas rdo rje rigs kyi rdo rje'i dri chus bsres pa'i bum pas dbang bskur to// snying po 'di'o// oM badz+ra a d+hi ba d+hi trAM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi dra D+ho b+ha ba dzaHhUM ba~M ho hUM phaT/ de nas pad+mo rigs
252a6(rgyud): kyi slob dpon du sgrub pa ni pad+mo lag tu byin nas stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te pad+mo'i 'phreng bas mag bcing ngo // snying po 'di brjod do// mo padz+ra mA la a b+hi Shiny+tsa lo ka shwa ra te swa ma hriH/ rdo rje rin po che'i slob
252a7(rgyud): dpon du sgrub pa ni rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya slob ma dbang bskur ba'i gnas su gzhag nas snying po 'di stong bzlas so// oM badz+ra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa rat+na d+hi pa ti tre b+ha ba Ta Ta/ slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor thams
252b1(rgyud): cad du btsud de dbang bskur ro// phyag na rdo rje slob dpon du bya ste/ yang bdag nyid kyis dkyil 'khor bris la/ bdag nyid la bdag gis slob dpon du dbang bskur ro// de la slob dpon gyis btu la zhugs/
252b2(rgyud): ni/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i slob dpon ni zla ba gcig gi bar du rab tu byung la bslab pa thams cad bzung ste/ rang gi lhag pa'i lha dus gsum du sgrub bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi
252b3(rgyud): slob dpon gyi brtul zhugs ni tha ba phyed kyi bar du nyin re zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas phyag na rdo rje'i sku'am/ rang gi lha nyal mchod nas kyo ba tang gis bkug ste mi sgo
252b4(rgyud): bar bzlas te/ lam dang lam ma yin pa'i skabs mi dbye'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs 'byung ste/ nyin re ning nang par langs nas bdag nyid byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas te/ bkrus
252b5(rgyud): la dri zhim po dang / gos 'tsher ba dang / rgyan gyis chas te/ glu dang / sil snyan dang / bkod pa dang / sgeg pa rnams dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das la me tog la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa
252b6(rgyud): rnams kyis yang dag par mchod nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang bdag nyid la 'dod pa'i dngos pos mchod pa bya ste/ dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid ci 'dod pa bzlas te/ byed yol gyi bar du 'dod pa'i
252b7(rgyud): yon tan lnga spyad nas de bzhin du mchod pa byas te/ ci 'dod par bzlas so// de nas yang mtshan rangs par 'dod pa lnga rnams la brten cing bzlas par bya ste/ de ltar zhag bzhi'i bar du bya'o//
253a1(rgyud): nas rdo rje rigs kyi brtul zhugs ni zla ba phyed kyi bar spyon par bsgyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal ning phyag na rdo rje mchod de/ mgo sa la gtugs nas/
253a2(rgyud): sgren mor byung ngam gos gyon yang rung ste/ mgo bo dzab cing mi'o cog la gshe ni nga rgyal phyag rgya rnams kyis gar byas te/ yid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa bsams nas mtshams bcing ba la sogs pa bya
253a3(rgyud): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la ji lta ba bzhin du mchod pa byas te brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// de nas pad+mo'i rigs kyi brtul zhugs ni bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ ba'i gcin rngubs gang 'thungs la/
253a4(rgyud): ba'i lci bcung bang pos na dag pa'i brtul zhugs thams cad 'grub bo// de nas zhag bdun du ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag nas stong rtsa brgyad bzlas so// de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi brtul zhugs ni
253a5(rgyud): nyin re zhing rang la dbang bskur nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang / sems dpa' chen po rnams mchod de rgyal po lta bur sgom ning rgyal po'i pho brang du song nas rgyal po'i mdun du brgya brgya nag brgyad kyi bar du badz+ran
253a6(rgyud): sodade ltar na slob dpon gyis grub pa thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / shes pa thams cad dang / kun gyis mchod pa la sogs pa dang / las thams cad thob par 'gyur ro//
253a7(rgyud): slob dpon gyi rab tu bya ba'o// / de nas las grub pa ni snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te las thams cad byas na thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen po bcings nas rdo rje'i
253b1(rgyud): bzlas pa brgyad stong pa thas na/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las thams cad la phyag rgya thams cad bcings pa tsam gyis bdag dang pha rol gnyis ka 'grub par 'gyur ro// sngags ni rdo rje tshig
253b2(rgyud): gis stong phrag brgyar bzlas na sngags thams cad thang cig bzlas pas las kun byed do// rig pa stong phrag brgyar bzlas na/ de nas rig pa thams cad thang cig bzlas pas las thams cad byed do// de nas
253b3(rgyud): snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / rig pa rnams 'byung ste/ badz+ra sata ni snying po'o// satwa badz+ra ni phyag rgya'o// oM ni sngags so// khi ti ni rig pa'o// de nas snying po dang / phyag rgya dang /
253b4(rgyud): sngags dang / rig pa thams cad sgrub pa'i snying po 'byung ste/ oM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa dzaHhUM baM ho/ su ra ta s+t+waM/ 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rdo rje sems dpas bzlas pas gru dang rdo rje'i tshig gis
253b5(rgyud): stong rtsa brgyad bzlas na snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / rig pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// 'jig rten gsum
253b6(rgyud): las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ phyi ma'i rgyud bshad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to//
253b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad lags na/ de bas na bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams grub pa de sems
254a1(rgyud): can 'dul ba'i slad du yul gzhan du 'chi 'am/ dbul por 'gyur ba 'am/ 'khrug pa 'am/ phrag dog gam/ sma dbab pa 'am/ sdug bsngal la'am/ 'dod pa chung ba 'a/
254a2(rgyud): 'dod pa la chags pa'am/ rab tu byung ba sems pa'am/ gnod pa mang ba 'am/ nyes pa mang ba 'am/ mya ngan nam/ nad dam/ 'jigs pa mang po la sogs pa gzhan yang dad pa med par 'gyu/
254a3(rgyud): ba de lta bur mi 'gyur bar lhag pa'i bsam pa'i chos skye ba dang / sgrib pa yongs su byang bar 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyis brlab par gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces
254a4(rgyud): gsungs so// dam tshig chen po de kho na nyid sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje thams cad pa ma thul ba 'dul ba 'di khyod kyis de bzhin du bshad pa de dag gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
254a5(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs so// de nas sgrub pa po de dag gis dang por re zhig de brgyad stong ji lta bar bzlas nas de nyid dam gzhan dag girang rung bsgrub par bya'o// gang dag 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos
254a6(rgyud): kyis 'dul ba de lta bu dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag la'ang snying po 'di sbyin no// oM b+h+ya sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra satwa ho/ sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ 'di'ang brgya stong du bzlas nas de nyid ngam gzhan yang bsgrub
254a7(rgyud): par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la phyag na rdo rjes phyag 'tshal te tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// rtog pa'i dam pa rab bshad pa// 'jig rten
254b1(rgyud): gsum rgyal zhes bya ba// grub pa thams cad rab snol mchog/ gang gis brjod pa tsam gyis na// sdig pa kun las rnam par grol// 'di rten kun na mchod pa ste// grub pa thams cad thob par
254b2(rgyud): 'gyur// gang dag 'dri zhing klog pa dang // 'dzin cing dad pa de bzhin te// de yang tshe 'di nyid la ni// grub pa thams cad thob 'gyur na// dad pa brtul zhugs brtan pa yis// grub par byed pa ci smos te/
254b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas phyag na rdo rje nyid// tshe 'di nyid la de yis thob// rtog pa kun kyang sbyar yang rung // rang gis byas pa'ang de bzhin te// rtog pa'i rgyal po nyid bsgrubs na// dad pa med kyang myur du 'khrug
254b4(rgyud): bdag gi khyim du gnas pa yang // de la bdag kyang kun 'grub phyir// de la bdag ni srung bar gnas// dngos grub dang ni 'dod kun dang // 'phel ba dang ni 'tshe med dang // shes pa rnams dang tshe dang
254b5(rgyud): stobs// gzugs mchog nges par stsol bar bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan las bzhengs te/ khams gsum mtha' dag lus dang / ngag dang / sems rdo rje'i rdul phra ma rnams kyis khyab
254b6(rgyud): nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ legs so legs so sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa la mngon par dgyes
254b7(rgyud): par gyur to// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po kun rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+han te/
255a1(rgyud): dzo rA dza ta thA ga ta ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+ha s+ya ka lA nA ma/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong
255a2(rgyud): ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa zhes bya ba// / bam po dang po// / dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
255a3(rgyud): ldan 'das lha'i tshogs thams cad kyi dga' ba'i tshal mchog tu yid du 'ong ba na/ nor bu dang / gser dang / gser gyi shing yal ga dang lcug mar bcas pa dang / shing gal ba dang / sman dang / me tog
255a4(rgyud): ka ma la dang / ut+pa la dang / ka ra ni ka dang / pa ku la dang / ti la ka dang / a sho ka dang / man+da ra ba dang / man+da ra ba chen po la sogs pa sna tshogs pa dang / dpag bsam gyi shing rnams kyis mdzes par
255a5(rgyud): byas pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ bya sna tshogs mang po skad 'byin pa/ rnga dang / cang te'u dang / ker ko dang / gling bu dang / rnga bo che la sogs pa'i sgra grags pa/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs
255a6(rgyud): pa'i lha dang lha'i bu mo sna tshogs rnam par rtsen pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa na/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha dang / rig 'dzin dang / lha'i bu
255a7(rgyud): mo 'khor bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang / gnod byin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / klu la sogs pa 'khor du ma dang / byang chub sems
255b1(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros tshad med pa dang / blo gros mi g.yo ba dang / blo gros yangs pa dang / kun tu/
255b2(rgyud): blo gros dang / blo gros mtha' yas dang / blo gros ka mal dang / blo gros chen po dang / blo gros lA rdzas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros sna tshogs la sogs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i byang /
255b3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge 'dun mtha' thug pa med pa rnams kyis bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ mchod cing rjed la rab tu mchod cing sel te/ 'khor mang po'i dbus na tshangs pa chen po
255b4(rgyud): pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs te/ ngan song gi rgyud thams cad yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ ngan song gsum gyi rgyud las rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
255b5(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi 'od zer 'phro ba dang / sdud pa mang po'i 'breng ba nyid kyi dbu'i mdzod spu nas byung nas/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad kun tu snang /
255b6(rgyud): bar byas so// kun tu snang bar byas nas sems can thams cad kyi sems nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba las rnam par grol te/ bde ba sa sor thob nas dga' ba'i tshal thams cad kun tu snang bar byas pas mdzod/
255b7(rgyud): pa'i sprin sa tshogs kyis mngon par mchod de/ lan brgya phrag stong du bskor ba byas nas/ mgo bos lan brgya phrag stong du phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar nor bu dri ma med pa'i steng du 'khod
256a1(rgyud): de 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma'o sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas// kye ma'o sangs rgyas mdzad pa legs// gang phyir ngan song bdag cag sbyang // byang chub spyod pa nyid la bkod// de nas/
256a2(rgyud): lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya phrag stong du bskor ba byas te phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du sangs rgyas
256a3(rgyud): kyi 'od bar kun tu sdang bas ngan song gi rgyud las rnam par grol zhing // rnam par grol ba'i lam la bkod pa ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lags so// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan
256a4(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po 'di ni ngo mtshar mi che'o// lha'i dbang po 'di ni ngo mtshar mi che ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni tshad med pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs rnams yang dag par bsags
256a5(rgyud): pa'o// lha'i dbang po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni tshad med pa'i yon tan rin po che'i 'byung khungs su gyur pa'o// lha'i dbang po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni tshad med pa'i thabs yang dag
256a6(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'o// lha'i dbang po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shes rab tshad med pa bsags pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyod pa ni tshad med pa'o// sang+yas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
256a7(rgyud): gdul ba'i skye bo tshad med pa rnams snod du gyur par mdzad pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa
256b1(rgyud): dang mnyam pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i smon lam gyi stobs dang ldan pa ste/ lha'i dbang po de lta bas na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
256b2(rgyud): snod ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi don mdzad pa dang / ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi don mdzad pa yin par rig par bya ste/ 'di la
256b3(rgyud): tshem dang / som nyi dang / yid gnyis ma byed cig/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'dul bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnas ni med do// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin rang gi stan las langs nas bcom
256b4(rgyud): ldan 'das la mchod pa che ba rgya che ba byas te phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems can thams cad la phan pa nyid du bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba nyid du bgyi
256b5(rgyud): ba dang / snying brtse ba can nyid du bgyi ba dang / snying brtse ba can chen po can du bgyi ba dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar bcom ldan 'das bdag spobs pa skyed par gsol
256b6(rgyud): bar gshegs pa bdag spobs bskyed par gsol/ bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i ris 'di nyid nas lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bgyi ba zhig shi 'phos te/ dus las 'das nas
256b7(rgyud): dgung bdun lon lags na/ bcom ldan 'das de gang du skyes/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni ci zhig myong bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das lung bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa lung bstan du gsol
257a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / lha'i dbang po de'i dus la bab par shes na nyon cig/ lha'i dbang pos gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das dus ni 'di lags so// bde bar gshes/
257a2(rgyud): pa dus dang tshod ni 'di lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de 'di nas shi 'phos nas mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por
257a3(rgyud): skyes nas/ des der lo stong phrag bcu gnyis kyi bar du sdug bsngal ma rungs shing mi bzad pa myong nas sems can dmyal ba chung ngu rnams su'ang lo brgya phrag brgyar sdug bsngal myong ngo // byol song dang yi
257a4(rgyud): dgas kyi skye gnas su'ang lo brgya phrag brgyar sdug bsngal myong ngo // de nas yul mtha' 'khob kyi mir skyes nas kyang 'on pa dang / rig pa dang / lkugs pa'i rang bzhin can dang / smra ba mi gsal bar
257a5(rgyud): lo stong phrag drug cu'i bar du myong nas/ lo stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir nad rnag khrag 'dzag pa dang / mdze dang / phol mig rnams kyis gzir ba dang / skye bo mang pos smad pa dang / yongs kyis
257a6(rgyud): spangs pa dang / rigs dman pa'i rigs can rjes su myong zhing sdug bsngal ba dang / sdug bsngal brgyud pa dang / gzhan la gnod pa byed pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa bar chad med pa rnam pa sna tshogs
257a7(rgyud): byed pa dang / gzhan yang sdug bsngal gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa myong bar 'gyur ro// de nas brgya byin la sogs pa lha'i bu thams cad kyis thos nas shin tu spangs shing skrag ste skyo nas pa sbub tu
257b1(rgyud): 'gyel to// de nas yang langs nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal brgyud pa 'di las ji ltar ma 'di bar 'gyur/ bde bar gshegs pa ji ltar thar par 'gyur/ bcom ldan/
257b2(rgyud): 'das ci nas kyang sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'di las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba 'di skyab tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa 'di sgrub tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po
257b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis kyang bshad pa 'di ngas kyang bshad kyis nyon cig/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis yang bcom ldan 'das la me tog mardar ba dang / man+da ra ba chen po dang / me
257b4(rgyud): tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang / phyag gdub dang / dpung rgyan dang / snyan cha dang / do shal dang / se mo do la sogs pa'i rgyan gyi khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mngon par mchod
257b5(rgyud): dede lan brgya stong phrag du mar bskor ba byas shing phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das legs so// bde bar gshegs pa legs so zhes bya bas mnyes par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das lha dang bcas pa'i
257b6(rgyud): 'jig rten la phan pa dang bde bar bgyi ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams ngan song gi rgyud gsum las rnam par thar par bgyi ba'i slad du legs par bshad du gsol/ de nas yang tshangs pa la sogs pa
257b7(rgyud): lha mang po rnams kyis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das legs so// bde bar gshegs pa legs so// ci nas kyang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyis mtshan tsam thos pas kyang ngan
258a1(rgyud): song gsum gyi lam las rnam par grol te/ bde 'gro lha'i 'jig rten las mi'i 'jig rten du skyes nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bgyi ba'i slad du bshad du
258a2(rgyud): gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i bu de dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'das byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir/ don yod gdon mi za ba'i rdo rje'i
258a3(rgyud): byin gyis rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas yang thugs ka nas sngags 'di phyung nas lha de dag dam tshig can du byin gyis brlabs so// oM sarbabid+yA badz+ra a d+hiSh+ThA na dz+nyA na
258a4(rgyud): sa ma ye hUM/ de ltar ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas kyang gdon mi za bar mi choms pa'i rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin
258a5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ni shud+d+he bi shud+d+he sar+b+ba kar+m+ma A ba ra Na bi shud d+he swA hA/ rig pa chen mo 'di bshad ma thag tu sems can
258a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi ngan song gi rgyud kyi bcing ba thams cad rnam par chad do// ngan 'gro thams cad rnam par sbyangs so// sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rnams rab tu zhi ste/ skye bo mang po rnams bde ba dang ldan par
258a7(rgyud): gyur to// de nas gzhan yang gsang ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ya sar+b+ba a pA ya~M sarba sa tre b+h+yo hUM/ lha'i dbang po gzhan yang 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'o//
258b1(rgyud): oM sarba a pA ya bi go d+ha ne hUM phaT/ lha'i dbang po gzhan yang 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o// oM traT/ lha'i dbang po gzhan yang 'di ni ngan song thams cad rnam par
258b2(rgyud): sbyong ba'i snying po'o// haM/ lha'i dbang po gzhan yang mdor na dran pa tsam gyis kyang bsod nams chung ba'i sems can rnams ngan song gi rgyud thams cad las bde blag tu rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba ni 'di/
258b3(rgyud): yin no// yon ma byug pa tesar+b+ba dran ti pa na tan na / thA ga d+hA ya/ ar+g+ha ces byugs rbad+d+ha5/ 66/ a ga d+ha ni d+da ni zin tan cigaHnI/ sar+b+ba hU~M ba r+b+he hrIhrI
258b4(rgyud): kar+m+ma A ba ra Na bi shud+d+he swA hA/ oM sar+b+ba bid+yA sar+b+ba A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ya ha na hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba bid hUM/ oM sar+b+ba bid phaT/ oM sar+b+ba bi da a/ oM sar+b+ba bid tra Ta/ oM sar+b+ba bid oM/ oM sar+b+ba bid oM/ oM sar+b+ba/
258b5(rgyud): bid swa/ oM sar+b+ba bid a/ oM sar+b+ba bid+yA hUM/ oM sar+b+ba bi da trAH/ oM sha/ oM b+ha/ lha'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i gsang ba'i snying po
258b6(rgyud): 'di rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang yang rung bas ming tsam yang nyan tam/ bcangs sam/ bklags sam/ bris nas kyang mgo bo 'am/ gtsug pud dam/ dpung pa 'am/ mgul du btags te
258b7(rgyud): 'chang na tshe 'di nyid la dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad dam/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang 'brel ba rmi lam gyi rnam pa 'am/ ngan song dang 'brel ba'i mtshan ma de dag thams cad rmi lam tsam du'ang mi 'byung na/
259a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs la/ zhugs nas kyang dbang bskur la snying po'ang bzlas/ sngags kyi don yang sgom pa gang yin pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de dag la ni/
259a2(rgyud): sdig pa gang yang nye bar mi 'gyur/ ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am/ byol song ngam/ yi dgas sam/ sems
259a3(rgyud): can dmyal ba la sogs te/ gang yang rung ba shi ba'i lus dkyil 'khor du bcug ste dbang bskur na/ de sems can dmyal bar skyes na 'du ma thag tu rnam par thar nas/ lha'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro//
259a4(rgyud): lha'i rigs der skyes nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid mngon sum du byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsnyen bkur la sogs pa'ang byed/ phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur//
259a5(rgyud): rgyud nges pa can du'ang 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su'ang skye/ sgrib pa rnams rab tu spangs nas de bzhin gshegs thams cad kyi rigs sam/ lha'i rigs sam/ gzhan gang yang rung
259a6(rgyud): bar bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro// lha'i dbang po mdor na 'jig rten nam 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phan pa dang bde ba thams cad myong bar 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan
259a7(rgyud): 'das la de bzhin du bskor ba byas te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ngan song thams cad kyi dbang du gyur pa rnams la phan pa dang bde bar bgyi ba dang / ci nas kyang
259b1(rgyud): sems can de dag ngan song thams cad la rgyab kyis phyogs par bgyi ba dang / bla ra ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub blag tu rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du bshad du gsol/ ji cig bsha
259b2(rgyud): du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa zhugs nas/ dban/
259b3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyor ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so// sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub sems// bla na med pa rtogs
259b4(rgyud): gyur pa// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i ye shes gang // de ni dkyil 'khor snying por gsungs// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du phyi'i dkyil 'khor
259b5(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// gtsug lag khang dang skyed mos tshal// mchod rten lha khang kun dga' sogs// ji bzhin pa yi cho ga yis// gnas ni byin gyis brlab pa brtsam// byin gyis brlabs pa'i
259b6(rgyud): gnas der ni// byi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi dang ldan pa dang // them skas bzhi yi 'phreng ba dang // seng ge bgrang rnams kyis brgyad// dar dang lnga
259b7(rgyud): ldi do shal 'phreng // dril bu dang ni rnga mas brgyan// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang // rgya gram pa yi phyag rgyas brgyan// srad bu brgyad dang ldan pa dang // phyi yi sgo khyud rnams kyis brgyan// dgu yi char ni
260a1(rgyud): bgos pa las// sgo dang sgo khyud sum char bya// rdo rje srad bus thig gdab bo// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra ba la// lte bar bcas shing /
260a2(rgyud): rtsibs bcu drug/ rim pa gsum dang ldan pa la// rtsi bas ni nyis 'gyur nyid du bya// dbus kyi phyogs su kun rig ni// dung dang kun+da zla 'dral// zhal bzhi pa la rdo rje yis// seng ge'i gdan la ba
260a3(rgyud): pa dang // ting 'dzin phyag rgyar ldan pa dang // rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan par bri// de yi spyan sngar ngan song kun// sbyong ba'i rgyal po bri bya ste// phyag gnyis ting 'dzin tshul du bsnol// zla ba rgyas dang
260a4(rgyud): pad+ma'i mdog/ rgyan rnams kun gyis legs rdzogs la// rgyal mchog skyes bus gang bar bri// rgyab tu shAkya'i rigs dbang po// gtso bo thub pa bri bar bya// g.yon dang g.yas kyi phyogs char ni// rgyal/
260a5(rgyud): mchog rin chen me tog gnyis// lo tsa nA dang mA ya kI/ de bzhin dkar mo sgrol ma rnams// rang gi rigs kyi mtshan ma bzhin// grwa yi phyogs ni kun tu bri// rtsibs kyi nang ni thams cad du// rdo rje sems
260a6(rgyud): sogs sems dpa' mchog/ rdzu 'phrul chen po'i sems dpa' rnams// go rims bzhin du bri bar bya// mkhas pas lA s+ye la sogs pa// mchod pa grwa yi phyogs su bri// sgo yi phyogs ni thams cad/
260a7(rgyud): du/ sgo ba bzhi ni bri bar bya// rta bapas khyams ni thams cad du// byams pa la sogs bri bar bya// nyan thos rgyal ba thams cad dang // de bzhin rang rgyal gtso bo rnams// rmo ba ma dag pa pa sogs/
260b1(rgyud): bri bya yang na ming yang rung // phyi yi dkyil 'khor phyi rol du// gling bzhi po ni bri bar bya// 'dzam bu'i gling du tshangs pa bri// byang phyogs su ni dbang phyug che// shar du nub kyi gling du ni// brgya byin gtogs
260b2(rgyud): 'dod thams cad ni// 'khor dang bcas pa bri bar bya// gzhan dag rnams kyang de bzhin te// lha min dri ba nam mkha' lding // gnod sbyin srin po lto 'phye che// 'byung po yi dgas 'dre rnams dang /
260b3(rgyud): klu dang grul bum ri rnams dang // rgyal po bzhi rnams bri bar bya// gza' dang skar ma rgyu skar dang // khro bo ma rung 'tshe ba yin// bgegs dang bi nA ya ka rnams// sems can kun la phan byed pa'i// drang /
260b4(rgyud): srong skal ba chen po rnams// 'phra men ma dang bud med bri// de bzhin sring mo rnal 'byor ma// 'byung ba bzhi yi lha chen po// khyim dang ril gnas pa dang // shing dang kun dga'i nags la sogs// dur
260b5(rgyud): khrod grong khyer gnas pa'i rnams// ming dang brda 'am yang na ni// thig le rnams kyang bri bar bya// de nas mkhas pas dkyil 'khor la// bla re rgyal mtshan lhab lhub dang // gdugs dang rnga ma lnga ldi dang /
260b6(rgyud): 'phan dang sna tshogs na bzas mchod// gser las byas pa'i bya rnams ni// brgyad dam bcu drug lhag kyang rung // dbang bskur rin chen chus bkang ba'i// bum pa lnga ni gzhag par bya// mar me gtong
260b7(rgyud): ma bum pa dang // mdzes pa'i bshos rnams gzhag bya ste// bza' ba btung ba sbyar legs dang // bca' ba sna tshogs gzhag par bya// gnod sbyin srin po'i kha zas su// gtor ma rnam pa sna
261a1(rgyud): tshogs gnag/ 'byung po dag dang klu dag dang // mi dang mi min de bzhin te// me tog dri rnams sna tshogs dang // 'o ma mar dang kha rang bcas// nam rgyal bum pa dri yi chus/
261a2(rgyud): rab tu bkang ba gzhag par bya// de nas khrus la sogs byas la// dri dang 'phreng mchog 'phreng ba can// dri 'im kha bkang mchog mdzes pa// rdo rje 'dzin mas zhugs nas kyang // me tog thogs te sgra
261a3(rgyud): phyogs 'dug/ gtso bo rgyal bams kyi 'khor// mang po rnams ni spyan drangs te// brag rgya sngags dang bdag ldan zhing // lcags kyu la sogs nal 'byor gyis// ma rdzub tsha thugs rje bdag/ chung ga
261a4(rgyud): zhes ni brjod nas kyang // gsang ba'i bcing ba bcangs nas ni// mdzub gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul du bya// nags pa bzhin du sbyar nas kyang // de nyid lcags sgrog tshul du bya// mtheb gnyis nang du bkug
261a5(rgyud): nas ni// bskyed par gyur nas dbang du 'gyur// de nas mtshan ma skyes nas ni// thog ma med pa mngon sum mthong // arga mchog brtags bsad la sogs pa yi// dbyangs snyan pa yis bstod dang lha
261a6(rgyud): rdzas kyi// mchog gi dam pa rnams kyis legs par mchod// de nas 'byung po kun gyi gtor ma bya// sems can bkres shing skom pas gdungs pa dang // phyogs na gnas pa rnams la rnam par brtags
261a7(rgyud): demi gtor ma'i ltang mthun par bya// de nas sngags pas tha med byang chub kyi// gnas su mob ma yongs su mi bya ba// 'grol ban gyi myung du byang chub par // de dag byang chub sems mchog bskyed du
261b1(rgyud): gzhug dade rnams byin brlabs byang chub smon la gdab// zab cing rgya che ba yi chos bsgrags la// bsrung bar byas nas btul zhugs sdom gnas pa// rang gi kha nas sngags brjod gzhug par bya/
261b2(rgyud): dar la sogs pas mi gnyis g.yogs nas ni// rdo rje 'dzin ma dpal gyi lag gnyis bya// me tog rin chen la sogs de brgyan la// yon gyis lag pa bkang ste gzhug par bya// sngags ni 'di rnams
261b3(rgyud): yin no// oM badz+ra a d+hi tiSh+Tha sa hUM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ oM badz+ra pra be sha d+d+ha/ a sa me tri sa me ma hA sa ma ye hUM/ de nas sngags 'dis me tog la sogs pa dong bar bya'o// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob bya'i
261b4(rgyud): phyir/ bdag la thugs brtser dgongs nas ni// 'gro la phan phyir gtso chen gyis// dman par dgongs nas bzhes su gsol// oM badz+ra pra ti gr-ih+Na hA/ oM pra tIts+tsha/ badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ me tog rin chen/
261b5(rgyud): la sogs gang // bab par gyur pa rigs kyi lha// gtso bo'i rigs de bsgrubs na ni// dngos grub 'gyur te the tshom med// de nas sngags pa mkhas pa yis// sngags 'dis dam tshig sbyin par bya//
261b6(rgyud): oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya hr-i da ya ma pra be sha dr-i D+ha tiSh+Tha hUM/ de nas 'dis dam tshig bsgrag par bya'o// 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed// dam tshig bsrungs na
261b7(rgyud): dngos grub ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'grub// ci ste dam tshig 'das na ni// de ma thag tu bkas nas gshegs// rdo rje 'dzin rgyal khros nas kyang // bdun brgyud rigs ni rlag par mdzad// de
262a1(rgyud): pas rtag tu bu khyod kyis// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i dam tshig dang // sdom pa dang ni bla ma'i bka'// shin tu mos pas bsrung bar bya// khyod kyis srog chags gas mi//
262a2(rgyud): ma byin par yang brang mi bya// brdzun dang 'dod la spyod pa rnams// dngos grub 'dod pas bla ma yin// chang 'di btung bar mi bya zhing // sha la sogs pa bza' mi bya// sems can gnod pa sbyor bdi//
262a3(rgyud): nams kyang bya ba ma yin te// dkon mchog gsum ni yong mi spang // dus kun tu ni byang chub sems// snying po sngags dang phyag rgya dang // lha dang bla ma de bzhin no// sdig la sogs pa gang yin dang /
262a4(rgyud): bla ma'i bka' las 'da' mi bya// lha la phul ba'i rnying pa dang // de yi grib ma 'gom mi bya// phyag rgya'i gzugs la'ang de bzhin te// sngags dang lha la'ang smad mi bya// gdon gyi las sogs bya ma
262a5(rgyud): yin/ dbu stegs can la'ang spang mi bya// mdor na yid gnyis som ni the tshom mi bya ste/ bdag gi de nyid dang ni sngags sogs de bzhin no// mos pa brtan dang ldan pas dam bcas nas// sarba bi trA sa ji/
262a6(rgyud): bzhin dbang bskur te// bum pa la sogs ji snyed mang thogs pas// bcu po rnams kyis dbang bcu cing gar bskur// de nas lag tu dril dang rdo rje byin// 'khor lo la sogs rin chen bdun thogs la/
262a7(rgyud): mi dbang dbang phyug 'khor lo thob pa dang // sdig pa gzhob phyir dbang ni bskur bar bya// sngags sgrub phyi ri mos lngaran slob ma la// sngags pas bka' ni rab tu bsgo bar bya// des kyang mos pas spyi mos/
262b1(rgyud): phyag 'tshal te// ci ste nor song mas bul bar bya// nor dang gter dang 'bru dang dbyig dang gser// bzhon dang khyim gdan bu po bu mo rnams// skyes pa dag dang bud med yang na ni// grong dang grong lde /
262b2(rgyud): bzhin ci bzhed rnams// rang gi sems ni rab tu dang pa yis// yon gyi mchog nyid dbul ba nyid du bya// myur du 'grub phyir mos pas bla ma la// mdor na rang gi lus kyang dbul bar bya// tshe 'di'i bde ba
262b3(rgyud): ma lus dang // 'jig rten phyi ma'i bde mchog dang // sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'thob 'gyur na// lha yi bde ba smos ci dgos// sangs rgyas kun dang bla mar mnyam// rdo rje slob dpon brnyas na ni// rtag tu/
262b4(rgyud): sdug bsngal 'thob 'gyur bas// cung zad tsam yang brnyas mi bya// rdo rje spun dang sring mo dang // rdo rje ma rnams nyid la ni// rnal 'byor can gyis brnyas ma yin// rtag tu khon gyis gcugs mi bya/
262b5(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed dang // bla ma spong byed ma rungs pa// dam tshig las ni 'das pa dang // de la sogs pa'i gnod byed pa// bzod pa bsgom par mi bya ste// de ltar gyur na kun rig gis//
262b6(rgyud): gsungs pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// sems can kun la phan pa dang // brtser ldan dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin
262b7(rgyud): dang da dalha'i 'jig rten du bcas pa rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di gsungs so// ras la bcom ldan 'das thams cad rig pa de bzhin du bris la/ g.yas su ni de bzhin/
263a1(rgyud): gshegs pa ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyor ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po// g.yon phyogs su ni shAkya thub pa/ ngan song thams cad skyong ba'i 'og tu ni kun tu sman ras gzigs dbang phyu/
263a2(rgyud): mdog zla ba lta bu phyag na pad+ma bsdams pa'o// shAkya thub pa'i 'og tu ni phyag na rdo rje/ de gnyis kyi bar du sman gyi bla mdog sngon po phyag gcig na 'bras bu a rur bsdams/ phyag gcig ni mchog sbyin du \u0f7f/
263a3(rgyud): rta mgrin dang / 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba ma rungs pa 'joms la brtson pa gnyis ni rang gi lha la brten par bri/ de gnyis kyi dbus su lo tsa nA dang / mA ma kI dang / gos dkar mo dang / sgrol/
263a4(rgyud): ma rnams rang rang gi mtshan ma phyag na bsdams par bri/ de dag gi 'og tu bad+ma'i rdzing bu chu dang / chu srin dang / nya dang / rus sbal dang / sbal pa dkar po dang / nyakhar ba la sogs par bcas pa dang / chu las
263a5(rgyud): skyes pa'i me tog rnam pa du mas yongs su gang bar bri/ bdug pa dang / mar me dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / bshos dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs pa bri/ de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po nyid thal mo/
263a6(rgyud): sbyar te phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug par bri/ de nas ri mo'i sku gzugs de mngon par mchod de/ bdag nyid kyis spyan dbye ba bya zhing bden pa la byin gyis brlabs par dmigs par bya'o// de nas ci ste mtshan ma
263a7(rgyud): zhig mthong na ni myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// 'on te ma mthong na ni ring mo zhig nas dngos grub tu 'gyur te/ band pa dang ni rnga sgra dang // dril bu'i sgra dang 'brug sgra dang // dge slong bram pa po mo dang /
263b1(rgyud): 'bras bu mthong na myur du ni// mchog dang bar ma tha ma 'grub// de nas gzugs de gsang sngags dang // phyag rgya mngon par byin brlabs nas// ci bdog pas ni mchod par bya// rtag tu mngon sum
263b2(rgyud): 'dug nas kyang // 'jig rten gsum ldanas rgyal gyis// bdag srung la sogs byas nas kyang // bdag gi de nyid bsams nas su// dngos grub mtshan ma byung bar du// 'bum phrag gsumam drug
263b3(rgyud): 'bum bzlas// de nas dben pa'i gnas su ni// brgyad brgya nyid du tshang bar bya// sngags ni 'khrul pa med par bzlas// de nas bzlas pa'i mjug tu ni// dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bsams la//
263b4(rgyud): mchod pa rgya chen byas nas kyang // mtshan gcig thog thag bzlas par bya// ci ste gtse'am de yi sras// yang na lha rnams mthong gyur na// bsod nams snod la ci dga' bar// dngos grub mchog ni gsol
263b5(rgyud): bar bya// lha ni dngos grub 'bras bu ni// de la rtag tu dgyes nas stsol// phyag 'tshal dngos grub la sogs blang // dkon mchog gsum dang bla ma la// skal ba re re phul nas ni// de nas rtag tu bdag/
263b6(rgyud): spyod cing // med na mkhas pa bdag nyid kyis// blangs nas bdag nyid spyad par bya// sems can kun la phan brtson par// bskal pa du mar gnas par 'gyur// ci ste dngos grub ma gyur na// las
263b7(rgyud): rnams thams cad nus par 'gyur// gnod sbyin skar mda'i gdong la sogs// chad pas bcad cing bka' tsam gyis// zhi ba la sogs las kun ni// bran bzhin thams cad byed par 'gyur// de nas
264a1(rgyud): lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sdig pa bgyis pas sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur
264a2(rgyud): pa rnams ji ltar sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i sdug bsngal spang ba'i slad du bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po nyon cig/ sems can dmyal ba//
264a3(rgyud): la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i sems can sdig pa'i byed pa/ sdig pa chen po byed pa de dag ci nas kyang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal las thabs sla bas grol bar 'gyur ba nyon cig/ de bzhin dkyil
264a4(rgyud): 'khor bris nas ni// snga ma bzhin du bum pa la// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas ni// dbang bskur ba ni rab tu brtag/ de nas sdig pa kun sbyangs te// dmyal ba la sogs sdug bsngal las/
264a5(rgyud): ni myur du rnam par thar// sdig las rnam grol bdag nyid de// dag par gyur pa'i lha rnams kyi// rigs su skyes par gyur nas kyang // de ni rtag tu sangs rgyas dang // chos bgro ba ni thos par 'gyur//
264a6(rgyud): de yi gzugs brnyan bri ba 'am// gur kum gyis ni ming yang rung // ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal las// sems can rnams ni grol ba'i phyir// sngags mkhan gzhan la phan brtson zhing // snying rje
264a7(rgyud): can gyis dbang bskur ro// de nas rnal 'byor can gyis ni// sngags dang phyag rgyas de dbang bskur// lha yi gzugs su brtags nas kyang // mchod rten dbus su gzhag par bya// rang gi lha'amaH/
264b1(rgyud): gzhan gyi// snying po snying khar bris nas kyang // lha 'dra bar ni sems bsgred de// khyim gyi nang du gzhag par bya// de yi ming yang smos nas ni// gur kum bzang pos sngags bris la// rim gyis
264b2(rgyud): 'bum ni tshad tsam du// mchod rten las ni rab tu bya// sdig can sdig ni zad bya'i phyir// bye ba snyed ni tshang bar bya// de ltar byas ni nges par ni// dmyal ba las ni grol bar 'gyur// yi dgas byol/
264b3(rgyud): song sdug bsngal las// grol te lha yi gnas su skye// de nas ming yang brjod nas ni// ji skad gsungs pa'i sngags bkra'i// 'bum phrag stong ngam yang na ni// brgya phrag stong du tshang ba dang // bye ba stong du
264b4(rgyud): rab bzlas na// lha yi gnas su nges par skye// de yi ming nas brjod nas kyang // mkhas pas 'bum phrag brgya 'am ni// yang na brgya phrag stong snyed du// sbyin sreg byas par gyur na ni// dmyal ba
264b5(rgyud): chen por gyur pa yi// sdig pa de las thar par 'gyur// ji srid mtshan ma shin tu ni// 'bar ba'i gnas na skyes gyur par// til dang yungs kar 'bras rnams dang // ra yi 'o mar ldan pa dang /
264b6(rgyud): yis bskus pa'i yam shing gis// cho ga bzhin du sbyin sreg bya// de nas de ni nges par yang // lha yi gnas su skyes gyur nas// de yi mtshan ma ston par byed// yang na lha yis mchog tu 'gyur// yang
264b7(rgyud): na ho khung nang du ni// me yi ltas ni ston byed cing // lha yi gnas su skyes pa dang // sdig pa bcom pa'i mtshan mar ni// dkar po nyid dang g.yas su 'bar// gyen du 'bar zhing dri ma med// zlum ning rnam
265a1(rgyud): par mi 'phro la// brtan la grol bzhin dri ma med// yang na me lha nyid kyis ni// bdag nyid de bzhin ston byed de// zla ba dri med dkar 'dral// bzhin mdog dkar zhing lam mer
265a2(rgyud): 'bar/ da de ni mtshan ma 'di dag gis// dmyal ba la sogs rnam grol zhing // sdig pa bcom nas bde 'gror ni// skyes pa yin par shes par bya// khru bzhi pa yi tshad du ni// cho ga bzhin du khung brkos la/
265a3(rgyud): rdo rje mtha' ma bskor ba yi// 'khor lo dbus su bri bar bya// rigs lnga yi ni phyag rgya rnams// ji bzhin pa yi phyogs su bri// de bzhin sems dpa' rnams dang ni// 'jig rten gcol sogs pa bri// bya da /
265a4(rgyud): bum pa gang ba dang // gtor mas snod rnams bkang ba dang // brgyad snyed tsam du gzhag pa 'am// yang na bcu drug snyeng du gzhag/ bza' ba dang ni bca' ba'i bshos// me tog 'phreng sogs de bzhin te//
265a5(rgyud): bla re rgyal mtshan dang la sogs// gdugs mchog rnams kyis legs par brgyan// sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor dam par ni// sbyin sreg rab tu bya ba ni// cho ga shes pas bris nas kyang // lha rnams mang po stan
265a6(rgyud): drangs la// sngags shes pas ni sngags phyag rgyas// an phul bas shes nas kyang // mdor na mchod pa byas nas ni// lha yi sbyor bas rab gnas la// ga pur gur kum la sogs pas// mar dang
265a7(rgyud): 'om til bgos la// til dang yungs kar 'bras rnams dang // dri yi chus ni legs bkang ste// 'bras chan yos dang la du dang // sbrang rtsi gag dang ldan pa// brgya phrag du mar yongs bzlas la// @
265b1(rgyud): shing la ni de bzhin te// rang gi sngags kyis btab pa'i shing // khong bu dang du gnag par bya// rol sngags kyis btab nas kyang // chu mchog gis ni bkrus nas su// bzlas pa'i dri yis byugs pa dag
265b2(rgyud): gos dang rgyan gyis klubs nas kyang // sngags kyis btab pa'i bdug pas bdugs// me tog 'phreng la sogs pas mchod// gtsug bud dpung bar de bzhin du// sngags bris nas ni gdags par bya//
265b3(rgyud): snying khalkog ma kha phyogs su// sarba bid+yAs byin gyis brlab// dpral ba mdzod spu rna ba gnyis// mgo bo gtsug pud dpung pa gnyis// sna dang rked pa pus mo bol// long bu sna yi rtse mo dang // mig
265b4(rgyud): gnyis dang ni gsang ba yi// dbang po rnams kyi gnas la ni// de ltar gzhan du yi ge sngags// mchog tu dge ba rnams gzhag go// de nas ngan song sbyang ba'i phyir// stan dang bcas te thab dbus su//
265b5(rgyud): gzhag pa nyid du bya ba yin// de nas sngags 'chang sngags kyis ni// btab pa'i gos kyis g.yog par bya// de nas byin za dge ba rab spar la// me lce stong gis 'khrigs shing 'bar ba'i lus// zla dkar
265b6(rgyud): kun da'i zhi la ni ba'i lus// mtha' yas pa yi gzugs kyis me bkug la// arga dbul bar brtags nas de bzhin du// blo mchog ldan pa'i mdun gzugs sogs gzhag/ de bzhin gshegs chogs
265b7(rgyud): de bzhin spyan drangs la// argal sogs btags te de bzhin du// bde gshegs gsungs pa'i mchod pa la sogs bya// de nas byin pa la ni btag byal// sreg byas bkang ste de yang spang ba'i phyir//
266a1(rgyud): nas sreg byas bkang ste rim gyis ni// rgyal la sogs la brgya rtsa brgyad du brtag/ de nas skyong ba'i sngags kyi rgyal po la// bsreg par bya ba nyi shu rtsa gcig brtag/ de nas spyan drangs
266a2(rgyud): yo byad lan gsum dang // arga la sogs pad+ma'i dkar nal mchod// phyag na rdo rje pad+ma zhags bsnams pa'i// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs// zhabs kyi pad+mas sdig mnan cing //
266a3(rgyud): rgyun rnams kun ni rab rdzogs la// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi dbu rgyan mamo// bsams sam yang na bris kyang rung // de yi snying pos de bzhin du// brgya phrag stong ngam yang na ni// bye ba'i tshad du sbyin sreg bya//
266a4(rgyud): ci ste mtshan ma la sogs 'byung // de bzhin sdig can rgyud ces bya// de nas thal bar gyur pa dang // rdo rje bsdu ba'i sngags kyis ni// cho ga bzhin du bsdu bar bya// thal ba de dang rus pa'i rdul// sngags
266a5(rgyud): kyis btab pa'i dri chu dang // ba skyes 'o ma la sogs lngas// sbyong ba'i sngags kyi blo ldan gyis// 'bum du bzlas pas brdzis nas ni// ga pur dri dang bsgos pa yis// 'jim pa dang ni bsres nas kyang /
266a6(rgyud): gzugs su bya ba'am yang na ni// mchod rten gyi ni star byas la// gcig gam gnyis sam gsum mam lnga// yang na brgya rtsa brgyad par du// sngags dang phyag rgyas btab nas su// 'bum phrag gnyis
266a7(rgyud): kyi bar du bzlas// de nas mchod rten 'bar gyur tam// yang na gzugs kyis nal 'dzum mam// dri dang bdug pa 'ong kyang rung // snang ngam yang na dang ldang ngam// lha la sogs pa'i rnam pa ni// mchogs/
266b1(rgyud): par ni snang gyur tam/ rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa dang // me rtog la sogs 'dor ba dang // dung dang rnga la sogs pa'i sgras// gling bu pi wang la sogs rnams// ci ste mtshan ma 'di dag ni// sdig
266b2(rgyud): can blos ni ma mthong na// 'bum gyi phrag ni brgyad stong ngam// ji srid mtshan ma byung bar du// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod nas ni// mnyam par gzhag pas bzlas par bya// de yi mthar ni mkhas pas kyang
266b3(rgyud): mtshan gcig thog thag mi nyal bzlas// de nas de yi sdig pa ni// dag pa nyid du nges par mthong // lha yi lus kyi gzugs gyur la// rang gi rgyud du ngo shes 'gyur// mtshan ma 'di dag shes nas ni// nam
266b4(rgyud): par mi rtog sems kyis kyang // byams dang snying rjer ldan pa yis// las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur// yang na med par gyur na yang // bzlas shing sgom pa'i tshul gyis ni// ming tsam legs par bris
266b5(rgyud): nas kyang // mchod rten 'phreng ba bya ba dang // yang na gzugs su bris kyang rung // sbyin sreg mngon par dbang bskur na// gdon mi za bar bde 'gror skye// thal ba yungs kar bye ma sogs// rang gi
266b6(rgyud): ming smos sngags btab nas// bzlas pa byas te song nas kyang // rgya mtshor 'bab po'i klung du dor// de lta na ni sdig can yang // ngan song las ni thar 'gyur na// dge ba'i mchog ni bskyed pa dang /
266b7(rgyud): byang chub sa bon bskyed pa'i bdag/ sangs rgyas 'bras bu'i rgyu ldan pa// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin par ldan// tshul khrims rgyud dang rab ldan pa// bzod pa brtson 'grus mnyam gzhag dang // shes
267a1(rgyud): rnams kyis rgyu sgom pa'i// 'jig rten bsod nams ldan na smos// slang du de mi ngan song ni// bcom par gyur te the tshom med// dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed la// med par
267a2(rgyud): ba gang yin dang // byang chub lam las rnam log pas// bstan pa zhe sdang gnod byed cing // sdig pa'i rang bzhin ma mthong la// ma dang pa la snying ring zhing // byang chub sems la brten pa dang /
267a3(rgyud): 'dod chags bral ba bsad pa rnams// ci ste lha rnams med gyur tam// sangs rgyas dge 'dun chos de bzhin// sngags dang phyag rgya'i tshogs la sogs// shes rab thabs rnams med na ni// sdig can//
267a4(rgyud): de dag mi thar nes// bde gshegs rgyal ba nyid kyis gsungs// de nas brgya byin la sogs lha// pad+ma lta bu'i mig phye nas// legs shes bya bas mnyes byas te// rab tu mgu nas mchod byas nas/
267a5(rgyud): brgya byin gzhan la phan brtson pas// ji skad gsungs pa'i bka' bzhin du// shAkya'i gtso bos bka' stsal pa// bden pa nyid du byas gyur nas// de nas de ni dmyal ba yi// sdug bsngal las ni thar
267a6(rgyud): nas kyang // dga' ldan gnas su sems can kun// phan phyir bde gshegs 'dra bar skyes// de nas dbang por bcas pa yi// grags chen lha rnams gar byed cing // mchod pa'i sprin ni mtha' yas
267a7(rgyud): pas/ da de bzhin gshegs la mchod bya'i phyir// lha yi tshogs kyis mdun byas te// tshe 'di nyid la mchod pa'i phyir// byang chub tu yang sems bskyed nas// lha rdzas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi// me tog
267b1(rgyud): bdug pa byug pa dang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan 'phan la sogs// rgyan la sogs pa rab mdzes dang // na bza' rin chen char la sogs// dga' ba'i tshal ni gang bar byas// de nas la mtshan cher/
267b2(rgyud): gyur te// lha rnams kyis kyang phyag 'tshal nas// dga' ba'i tshal ni yid 'ong ba// kun nas gang bar gyur pa yin// sna tshogs 'byung ba 'di ci lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
267b3(rgyud): grogs po dag shes par gyis shig/ rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa 'di ni lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de yin no// mtshams med pa'i dbang du gyur pa'ang myong zhing mthong ba chos 'di nyid la bde 'gro
267b4(rgyud): dbang du gyur pa gang lags pa de ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lags so// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar lags so// de nas brgya byin la sogs pa lha'i bu thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu tshig 'di skad ces
267b5(rgyud): smras so// sangs rgyas 'dra ba'i ston pa med// chos dang 'dra ba'i dge ba med// dge 'dun 'dra ba'i snod med de// sngags dang 'dra ba'i 'dren pa med// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la
267b6(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyi rlabs kyi sa dga' ldan gyi lha'i rigs su skyes pa'i lha'i bu de ci 'dra ba zhig/ de'i rdzu 'phrul dang mthu ni ji lta bu lags pa/
267b7(rgyud): lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bgyi ba de bdag cag lta bar 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha thams cad kyi snying skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi 'phreng ba nyid kyi zhabs kyi mthe bong
268a1(rgyud): gnyis las byung ngo // byung nas kyang nor bu thi ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i lus thams cad snang bar byas nas snying khar zhugs te bskul nas yang de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//
268a2(rgyud): nas lha'i bu de nyid rab tu dga' bar gyur nas las kyi 'od zer gyis dpag tshad brgya phrag stong tshun chad kyi nam mkha'i ngos thams cad gsal bar byas te/ lha'i bu stong phrag du ma'i 'khor gyis bskor cing mdun du
268a3(rgyud): byas nas/ lha'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos mi snang bar byas te 'ongs nas dga' ba'i tshal thams cad gsal zhing snang bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das dang brgya byin gnyis ma gtogs pa lha rnams kyi 'od zil gyis
268a4(rgyud): mnan to// de nas lha'i bu des/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// kye ma shAkya mgon pa yi// sangs rgyas mdzad pa la mtshan che// gang bying
268a5(rgyud): lhung ba yi// sems can myur du glog bzhin grol// de nas skad cig ma de nyid kyi tshe shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam gyi pad+mo thams cad rin po che las byas pa/ dpag tshad brgya phrag stong du dri'i ngang ldang ba/ lha'i glu
268a6(rgyud): snyan pa'i sgra grags pa ka ya mtshan du ma yang dag par ston pa/ lha rdzas kyi klu dang / gar dang / brdung ba dang // gling bu dang / dza dang / ker ko rnams kyi sgra snyan pa 'byin pa zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
268a7(rgyud): byung ste/ de mthong nas kyang shin tu yi mtshan skyes 'di skad ces smras so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ni bsam mi khyab// sngags kyi yon tan sna tshogs bsam mi khyab/ byang chub rten pa rnams kyang /
268b1(rgyud): bas pa mi khyab// tshangs spyod tshul khrims dri med skye bas ma las// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis blta bar 'dod nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// lha'i bu de dang de'i 'khor gyi
268b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rnams blta bar 'tshal lo// bde bar gshegs pa blta bar 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang mthe bong gnyis nas 'ong bar phyung ste/ 'od zer dri ma med pa des lha'i 'khor
268b3(rgyud): dag kun snang bar byas te bskul nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das dang brgya byin gnyis
268b4(rgyud): kyi gdan ma gtogs par dga' ba'i tshal thams cad g.yos par byas te/ lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas shing / bskor ba byas nas yang 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma'o sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni/
268b5(rgyud): sngags kyi byin rlabs ya mtshan che// gang phyir mtshams med lhung ba yi// sems can lha gnas myur du skyes// de nas lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba la sogs pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom lnga
268b6(rgyud): 'das la nor bu dang / gser dang / dngul dang / do shal dang / sa mo do dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / snyan cha la sogs brgyan gyi khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs dum dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang
268b7(rgyud): 'phan dang / lnga ldi dang / rnga ma la sogs pa yo byad kyi khyad par sna tshogs pa dang / seng ge'i gdan dang / gzims cha dang / pho brang dang / gzhal med khang dang / khang bu brtsegs pa la sogs pa gnas kyi/
269a1(rgyud): khyad par sna tshogs pa dang / me tog dang spos la sogs pa mchod pa'i khyad par sna tshogs pa dang / rang gi lus dang / ngag dang / sems rnams kyang phul te/ ba lang dang / rka pa/ sem/
269a2(rgyud): ge dang / stag dang / spre'u dang / rko ba dang / thug re dang / ma he dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / chu srin dang / phag dang / ra dang / glang dang / ba dang / 'dod pa'i ba bzhon la sogs pa bzhon pa'i khyad par du ma'ang phul
269a3(rgyud): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams kyang mngon par mchod// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams kyang mngon par mchod de legs so zhes bya ba gsol nas/
269a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dang brgya byin gnyis la bla ma dang bsti stang du byas te phyag 'tshal nas de bzhin du song ngo // de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams mchog tu la mtshan du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das
269a5(rgyud): la yang dang yang du legs so zhes bya bas bstod cing mchod de/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du ma 'ongs pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams 'chang ba dang klog pa la spro
269a6(rgyud): bar bgyi ba'i rmang du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brjod pa'i yon tan bshang du gsol/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams ngas bshad kyis legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig/ lha'i
269a7(rgyud): bu rnams dge ba bcu dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi na lam du thos par 'gyur gyi/ sems can ma rabs rnams kyis ni ma yin no// pha rol tu phyin pa bcu la mos pa'i sems can rnams kyi rnga lam duH
269b1(rgyud): bar 'gro bar 'gyur gyi/ sems can phal pa ma rabs kyis ni ma yin no// sems can bsam pa nges pa rnams dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i yon tan mang po la mngon par 'dong ba'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du 'gro
269b2(rgyud): bar 'gyur te// mdor na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la brten pa'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha'i bu de dag yang dag par dga' ba skyes
269b3(rgyud): nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni snod du gyur pa'o// bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag ni snod du gyur pa ste/ gang gi slad du bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
269b4(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bgyi ba'i mtshan brjod pa 'di bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i zhal nyid nas thos pas/ bdag cag ni ngan song
269b5(rgyud): gis 'jigs par mi 'gyur/ dus ma lags par 'chi bas 'jigs par mi 'gyur/ 'chi ba dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jigs pa la sogs pas 'jigs par mi 'gyur te/
269b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das pa dag cag ni gdon mi 'tshal bar sangs rgyas nyid 'grub pa'i snod du gyur pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das brtag pa'i rgyal po 'dis sems can rnams kyi don bgyid pa gang lags pa'i
269b7(rgyud): skyes bu dam pa de dag gi 'bras bu ni cir 'gyur/ rnam par smin pa ni cir 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po de dag ni skyes bu dam pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/ yang dag par
270a1(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du blta bar bya ste/ lha'i dbang po gang gi phyir 'jig rten pha rol tu song nas mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes pa'i sems can/
270a2(rgyud): rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu spong bar byed pa dang / byang chub la gdon mi za bar rten par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa phyir mi ldog pa la rab tu 'jog pa'i phyir te/ lha'i dbang po/
270a3(rgyud): dper na khyod kyis lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes pa'i don byas pa bzhin no// lha'i dbang po de ltar gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can/
270a4(rgyud): rnams kyi don byed pa'i sems can de dag ci so so'i skye bo yin snyams sems sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bde bar gshegs pa lags so// lha'i dbang po sems
270a5(rgyud): can de dag ni skyes bu dam pa chen po gzhan la phan 'dogs pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang phyag bya ba/ mchod pa/ rjed pa/ bsti stang du bya ba/ brag la bsrung bar bya ba yin na/ wA
270a6(rgyud): bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / phyogs skyong ba bcu dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu
270a7(rgyud): rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin chen po nor bu bzang po dang / nor bu bzang po chen po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i sa la rab tu gnas pa rnams dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo gnyis
270b1(rgyud): dang 'phrog ma bu lnga brgyas bskor ba rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po pAny+tsi ka dang / pAny+tsi ka chen po la sogs pa dang / gang gzhan dag kyang rgya che zhing rgya che ba'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod
270b2(rgyud): sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / 'dre dang / rims dang / gdon dang / dug dang / skar ma//
270b3(rgyud): la sogs pa thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'dus shing tshogs pa thams cad kyis skyes bu dam pa chen po de'i rkang pa gnyis mgo bos blang ba
270b4(rgyud): bgyi'o// mdor na rtag par rgyun du dus thams cad du bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gang du brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pas
270b5(rgyud): 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par 'chad par 'gyur ram/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas mchod par 'gyur ram/ rgyal rigs sam/ bram ze'i rigs
270b6(rgyud): sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan yang rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i bu mo 'am/ rgyal po'i btsun mo 'am// rgyal po'i 'khor po 'am/ rgyal po'i 'khor mo 'am/ gang su'ang rung bas 'a
270b7(rgyud): zhing klog pa dang / gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par 'chad cing ston pa'i bar du bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das padag cag 'dus shing tshogs pa thams cad de'i bran du gyur pa lags so// rang gi skye bo dang /
271a1(rgyud): gnyen gyi skye bo dang / grong dang // grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ dus dus su char dbab par bgyi// 'dra
271a2(rgyud): la sogs pa bskyed par bgyi/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du bsgrub par bgyi/ pha rol gyi phru ma mang po gzhom par bgyi/ sems can ma rungs pa gnod cing 'tshe ba pos de la mi phan pa'i
271a3(rgyud): sems bskyed pa gang yin pa de dag brlag par bgyi ba'i slad du bsgrub par bgyi/ ma rungs par bgyi/ de la bdud kyi las kyang bgyi/ gnod par bgyi ba la'ang nye bar gnas par bgyi ste/ bcom ldan
271a4(rgyud): 'das mdor na ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams la brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lta bur gnas pa lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis bu bzhin du bskyang bar bgyi'o//
271a5(rgyud): lha'i dbang po khyod kyis ji ltar smras pa de de bzhin te/ brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di ni de bzhin du blta bar bya'o// lha'i dbang po legs kyis/ 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i sems can sdig pa'i chos la/
271a6(rgyud): kun tu spyod pa/ sems can dmyal ba'i dbang du gyur pa/ 'khor ba mi gtsang ba'i dong du byed pa'i sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i phyir yun ring por bag yod par byos la sbubs shig
271a7(rgyud): bam po gnyis pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus brtag pa'i rgyal
271b1(rgyud): po brtag pa phyi ma 'di bshad do// dpa' bo gangan las bzhengs nas ni// dgyes shing rdo rje gsor nas kyang // shAkya'i dbang po dgyes mdzad pa// thub pa'i gcol phyag 'tshal nas// sgrib pa
271b2(rgyud): thams cad rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ngan song thams cad las rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba rang gi snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs ka nas byung ngo // oM sar+b+ba pA
271b3(rgyud): da ha na badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba pA pa bi sho d+ha na badz+ra hU~M phaT/ oM sar+b+ba kar+m+ma A ba ra NA ni basmiM ku ru hU~M phaT/ oM b+h+rUM bi nA sha ya A ba ra NA ni hU~M phaT/ oM d+hU bi sho d+ha ya A ba ra NA ni hU~M phaT/ oM dz+wa la dza la ka d+ha ka d+haka/
271b4(rgyud): ha na ha na/ sarba A ba ra NA ni hU~M phaT/ oM su sa ra sa ra pra sa ra A ba ra NA ni hU~M phaT/ oM hU~M ha ra ha ra sar+b+ba A ba raNA ni hUM phaT/ oM hUM phaT sar+b+ba A ba ra NA ni s+pho Ta ya hU~M phaT/ oM b+hU ta b+hU ta sar+b+ba A ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/
271b5(rgyud): oM tASh+Ta tA Ta sar+b+ba A ba ra ni dz+yo d+d+haH/ a gyi rjes pa' bar rdza ni hU~M bar/ oM bi dra ba bidra bsar+b+ba A pA ya tat+ta d+hA ni hUM baT/ oM dab ga sarban dag ga ti hit+na dz+nyA phaT/ oM btsa pa tsa satwA pre tag te he hUM hUM ba
271b6(rgyud): oM ma tha ma tha sar+b+ba tir+ya ga gi ti he hUM hUM phaT/ de nas de dag rnams kyi yo byad bshad do// oM sar+b+ba pA paM bi sho d+ha na d+ha ma d+ha ma d+hU pa ya hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba durga ti bi sho d+ha na puSh+pa bi lo ki hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba A ba ra Na biH
271b7(rgyud): d+ha ni dz+nyA na A lo ka ka ri hU~M phaT/ oM sar+b+ba a pA ya ga ti gan+d+ha sha na gan d+ha ba ti hU~M phaT/ sgo ba rnams kyi sngags la/ oM sar+b+ba na ra ka ga ti u Ta ni hU~M phaT/ oM sar+b+ba a pA ya ban+d+ha na bi mo tsa ni hUM baM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba a pA
272a1(rgyud): ya b+han+d+han mo tsan hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba a pa ya gtig han bi nA sha ni hU~M ho phaT/ de nas dkyil 'khor bshad de/ 'khor lo 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la// shin tu mdzes pa'i rtsibs brgyad can//
272a2(rgyud): lte bar bcas shing rtsibs rten ldan// nang gi rim pa bris nas ni// lte ba'i nang du shAkya yi// bdag po thub pa gzhag par bya// lag na rdo rje stobs chen ni// dpa' bo de yi spyan sngar bri// rgyab tu 'khor
272a3(rgyud): sgyur ba bri// g.yas phyogs rgyal ba'i gtsug tor la// g.yon par rnam par rgyal ba bri// gzi brjid phung po me yi phyogs// dbang po'i phyogs su gdugs dkar po// rnam par 'thor ba rlung gi phyogs//
272a4(rgyud): rnam par 'joms pa nai r-i t+ya ra/ bris nas phyi rol bri bya ste// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// seng ge rta babs brgyan par bya// dpa' bos lcags kyu zhags pa dang // lcags sgrog dril bu snyan rnams gzhag
272a5(rgyud): grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad du// bdug pa la sogs bri bar bya// de nas dri nim dri la sogs// rang gi lus ni bskus nas kyang // rdo rje 'dzin ma zhugs nas ni// oM dzaHhU~M baM hoHb+ha ga ban// s+ye hi ma hA
272a6(rgyud): kA ru NI ka praT ho/ sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ zhes pas lha rnams thams cad spyan drang ngo // de nas gshegs par mos pa bskyed de mchod pa byas nas/ de bzhin du bcug ste dbang bskur na ngan song thams cad las rnam par
272a7(rgyud): grol te/ bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten dang / gong nas gong du sa rnams su'ang skye bar 'gyur ro// dngos grub thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas su'ang gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur ro//
272b1(rgyud): snga ma bzhin du las thams cad kyang byed cing thams cad la thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// byab pa byas pas ni rims nad thams cad dang / gdon dang / dug la sogs pa las zas 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje'i hUM
272b2(rgyud): zhes bya bas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// brtag pa gzhan gyi cho ga thams cad kyang sgrub par 'gyur ro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po la sogs pa ngan song gi rgyud kyi dbang du gyur pa
272b3(rgyud): rnams kyi shi ba'i ro 'am/ gzugs brnyan nam/ ming la sogs pa bris te bzlas pa dang / sbyin sreg dang / dbang rnams kyis snga ma bzhin du ngan song thams cad las yongs su grol bar byed do// de
272b4(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes seng ge'i lta stangs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya dam pa'i mtshan nyid bshad
272b5(rgyud): par bgyi'o// thugs rjes bskul ba'i thugs gsang ba'i// rgyal ba kun gyis byin gyis rlobs// mnyam par gzhag pas dpral bar ni// phyag 'tshal ba yi thal mo sbyar// sangs rgyas bde gshegs/
272b6(rgyud): skyes rnams kyi// phyag 'tshal ba yi phyag rgyar bshad// rnal 'byor rig pas mgrin phyogs su// thal mo snyim par sbyar ba ni// rtag tu pad+ma'i rigs nyid kyi// pad+ma'i phyag rgya yin par bshad// rdo rje thal
272b7(rgyud): mo sbyar nas kyang // snying khar gung mo'i mtha' sbyar ba// rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya 'di// dam tshig thams cad 'dzin byed pa'i// lag pa g.yon pa'i thal mo gan rkyal du pang du bzhag la/ de'i steng du
273a1(rgyud): g.yas pa bzhag ste/ mthe bo'i ngos gnyis spang la zhi ba'i lta bas lta ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ste/ dam tshig yin par bshad do// de nyid
273a2(rgyud): las bzlog ste lha 'og bsnol la mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis gcig la gcig lu gu rgyud kyi tshul du bsnol te snying khar bzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// thal mo rdzogs par sbyar
273a3(rgyud): ba las mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis pa skams la lhag ma rnams brkyang ba 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdam pa bsdams pa las gung mo gnyis rdo rje 'dra bar bsnyams la mtha
273a4(rgyud): bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang ba 'di ni phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis de bzhin du byas la mdzub mo gnyis dang srin lag pad+mo 'dra bar bkug pa ni ngan song thams
273a5(rgyud): cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po'i thams cad sbyong ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mdzub mo dang srin lag gnyis rin po che 'dra bar byas pa ni dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o// mthe'u chung dang mthe bong so sor
273a6(rgyud): bsdams la lhag ma rnams brkyang ba ni sdig pa thams cad sreg pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pas de bzhin du bsgyur zhing bya ba ni lha thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// snyim pa bzed la gyen du 'thor ba ni bdug
273a7(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya'o// de las 'og nas gyen du mthor ba ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mthe bong gnyis gyen du bsnyams la mdun du 'dzin pa ni mar me'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las dung 'dra bar byas pa ni dri'i phyeg
273b1(rgyud): rgya'o// dade nyid las rab tu brkyang ste 'dzin pa ni gtor ma'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las gung mo gnyis nang du bcug pa ni arga'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bcings pa las gung mo gnyis bstan te tshigs dang po bcag sa
273b2(rgyud): sor mo thams cad brkyang ba ni rnam par 'thor ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis bkug pa ni rnam par 'joms pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las 'od zer 'bar ba 'dra ba ni gzi brjid
273b3(rgyud): phung po'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las spyi bor bskor ba ni gdugs dkar po'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis las mdzub mo gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis bsnol te mdung la gyen du bskor ba ni 'khor lo ra/
273b4(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa las gung mo gnyis rdo rjer byas la mdzub mo gnyis rin po che lta bur byas te lhag ma rnams 'od zer 'dra bar byas pa ni rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgyu'o// de bzhin du mdzub
273b5(rgyud): mo gnyis rdo rjer byas la sor mo lhag ma rnams bsdams nas rdo rje 'dra bar byas pa ni rnam par rgyal ba'i 'o// g.yas pa mchog sbyin du byas la g.yon pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
273b6(rgyud): yin no// rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste rdo rje 'dra bar byas pa ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mdzub mo g.yas pa bkug pa ni lcags kyu'i'o// de nyid las me tog 'dra bar byas pa
273b7(rgyud): ni mnga'i'o// de nyid las slar bkug ste mthe bong gnyis rtse mo spang ba ni blo gros legs pa'i'o// de nyid las tshigs par ma bcag pa ni rin po che'i'o// de nyid la sor mo las 'od zer 'dra bar 'gyed
274a1(rgyud): pa ni gzi brjid kyi'o// de nyid las spyi bor bzhag pa ni dpal gyi'o// de nyid las mdun du bzhag pa ni bsad pa'i'o// de nyid las pad+ma 'dra bar byas pa ni badz+rar lo// de nyid la/
274a2(rgyud): rtse mo gnyis bkug pa ni ral gri'i 'o// de nyid las gdu bu 'dra bar byas pa ni 'khor lo'i'o// de nyid las pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra bar byas pa ni lce'i 'o// de nyid las rtse mo yid tsam bkyed pa ni rgya gram mo//
274a3(rgyud): de nyid las shin tu bkyed pa ni srung ba'i'o// de nyid las rtse mo gnyis slar bkug pa ni gnod sbyin gyi'o// dam du bkug pa ni bsdams pa'i'o// bsdams pa nyid mdun du bkug pa ni bdug pa'i'o//
274a4(rgyud): de nyid gyen du bstod pa ni 'phreng ba'i'o// mdun du mthe bong gnyis bsdams te bskor ba ni mar me'i'o// de nyid byug pa ltar byas pa ni dri'i'o// de nyid las badzub mo gnyis bkug pa ni lcags kyulalo//
274a5(rgyud): de nyid las rtse mo gnyis spyad pa ni nags pa'i'o// de nyid las gcig la gcig mdung pa ni lcags sgrog gi'o// de nyid las bskyod pa ni mnyes pa'i'o// sku gzugs kyi cho ga'ang 'dir de bzhin du
274a6(rgyud): byas te cung zad dun/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs bri'o// yang na sku gzugs ni dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bris la me tog la sogs pas mchod de/ de'i spyan/
274a7(rgyud): sngar 'bum tsam nig sngar bsnyen pa byas nas las thams cad bya'o// de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i tshogs rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
274b1(rgyud): 'das las kyi rnam par smin pa gang gis lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bgyi ba de dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi dbang du gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das
274b2(rgyud): shAkya thub pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i dbang po nyon cig/ 'di ni sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa yin te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi ris 'di nyid na mtha' 'khob pa'i rigs ngan du
