274b3(rgyud): gtogs pa'i rgyal po lus mi bde ba zhes bya ba zhig tu gyur te/ des mi shes pa'i dbang gis mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pas rgyal po 'dod pa'i phyir rang gi pha 'tsho ba dang phral bar gyur pa dang /
274b4(rgyud): ma de'i mya ngan gyis gzir bas ma'ang dus las 'das so// lan cig ci zhig gi rkyen gyis nags tshal stug po gzhan zhig tu rtse zhing dga' ba'i phyir nye bar song ngo // de na drang srong dgos pa med pa
274b5(rgyud): byams pa zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de mthong ba dang rgyal po shin tu ya mtshan skyes nas/ kye ma 'di lta bu seng ge dang / stag dang / ri dgas dang / phag rgod dang / ba lang dang / ma he la sogs
274b6(rgyud): pa dang / sbrul dang / srin mo dang / sbrang bu dang / sbrang bu mchu rings dang / sbrul gdug pa can rnams kyis gtse ba/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bgo ba dang / longs spyod rnams dang rnam par/
274b7(rgyud): bral ba/ rlung dang grang bas yongs su gdung zhing 'tshe ba de na bdag nyid chen po 'di gnas so snyam par sems kyis brtags nas de'i drung du nye bar song ste phyin pa dang / de la 'di skad ces smras so//
275a1(rgyud): drang srong chen po khyod ci'i phyir na rlung dang tsha ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis bdag la gnod par byed/ drang srong gis smras pa/ skyes bu chen po bskal pa brgya stong phrag du mar
275a2(rgyud): sgrib pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba las/ sdug bsngal gyi khur bu cung zad tsam zhig blangs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bas/
275a3(rgyud): 'di ni sdug bsngal ma yin gyi/ skad cig tsam mam yud tsam zhig yul gyi bde ba rjes su myong bas bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma mtha' thug pa med par dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rjes su myong ba
275a4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// yul gyi bde ba 'dod pa'i phyir pha ma la sogs pa'ang gsod par 'gyur na srog chags gzhan lta ci smos te/ sangs rgyas dang ga chos dang / dge 'dun yongs su mi shes pa'i phyir sdig pa thams
275a5(rgyud): cad byed par 'gyur ro// drang srong gis smras pa'i tshig de skad ces zos pa dang shin tu 'jigs skrag skyo ste/ sdug bsngal thams cad kyis gzir nas 'di skad ces smras so// sangs rgyas dang / chos dang
275a6(rgyud): dge 'dun zhes bya ba de ci zhig/ de'i rang bzhin ji lta bu yin pa dka' thub chen po smros shig dang / de la kho bo'ang skyabs su mchi'o// pha ma la gtses pa dang / srog chags rnams kyi srog bcad na sdig pa
275a7(rgyud): ji lta bu zhig 'thob par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun zhes bya ba ci zhig/ de'i rang bzhin ji lta bu yin pa yongs su shes na bsod nams ci 'dra ba zhig yongs su 'thob/ pa ma ma
275b1(rgyud): bsang ba dang / srog chags rnams kyang ma bas na bsod nams ci 'dra ba zhig 'thob/ 'bras bu 'i lta bu zhig 'thob/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod spangs na bsod nams dang 'bras bu ci 'dra ba zhig 'thob//
275b2(rgyud): nas drang srong des de la 'di skad ces smras so// ci ste sems can chen po khyod// nga yi tshig 'di nyan 'dod na// thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal la// gus par nyon dang bshad par bya'o// de bzhin bgyi zhes
275b3(rgyud): bsgrubs nas ni// ci bdog pas ni mchod byas te// sangs rgyas spyod yul sangs rgyas kyi// zab mo'i chos ni nyan par gyur// sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs dag la// thos nas kyang ni skyabs su song /
275b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyi sgrib med chos// rgyal pos thos nas dga' bar gyur// yi dgas byol song dmyal ba rnams// sdig pa kun gyi 'bras bu ste// yul spyod pa dang srog chags rnams// gsod
275b5(rgyud): cing shin tu mi bzang dang // pa ma gtses pa'i rgyu las byung // bskal pa du mngar ba sdug bsngal// dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal mi babangadag/ mgon med skyabs kyang med pa ste// zos nas mya ngan chub tu
275b6(rgyud): yis/ da rang gi yid la gdungs pa na// ji ltar rlung gis mar me bzhin// de nyid du ni dus las 'das// las kyi rnam smin de yis ni// dga' dang ldan pa'i lhar skyes na// brgya byin lha yi dbang po yis// klon/
275b7(rgyud): po gzugs dang ldan pa la// lha rnams kun dang yid mthun zhing // rab dga' ba de dang ldan par skyes// bde ba'i mchog ni myong gyur nas// ngan song du yang ltung bar 'gyur// de nas da ltar lha dbang po// khyod
276a1(rgyud): kyi mthus kyang de nyid ni// dga' ldan gnas ni dga' ba'i mchog/ bde mang kun gyi gnas su skyes// lha yi dbang po nyon cig dang // gang gi tshe byung ba de'i dus na byung ba'i drang srog
276a2(rgyud): du gyur pa de ni gzhan yin par khyod kyis shes par mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid do// de'i bar gyur pa gang yin pa
276a3(rgyud): de ni gzhan yin par khyod kyis shes par mi bya ste/ lha'i dbang po de'i tshe de'i dus na khyod de'i phar gyur to// ma gang yin pa de gzhan yin par mi blta ste/ de'i tshe de'i dus na sha tsi ka nyid yin no// 'khor gyi
276a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gang yin pa de ni gzhan yin par mi blta'o// lha'i 'khor 'di dag nyid yin no// / de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams yid rab tu mgu zhing rangs te/
276a5(rgyud): spu'i bu gnas spu rnams langs shing rgyal ba rgyal ba zhes skad chen por bos nas/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la ming bcu pa 'dis mngon par bstod de gsol ba btab bo// ko Ta ko Tak+Sha/ koTaHkoH
276a6(rgyud): TA ba shu ka TI ra ka/ ko la k+Sha ko la baHko la ko lA ba sh+tsa/ ko la sta tha i ti/ zhes byas nas/ brgya byin la sogs lha mchog rnams// sems can kun la phan pa dang // tshe dang nad med spel ba'i
276a7(rgyud): phyir// mgon po khyod la gsol ba 'debs// bcom ldan 'das tshe thung ba dang skal ba chung ba rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / tshe ba sring ba'i slad du bshad du gsol/ gsang ba'i bdag po
276b1(rgyud): bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha'i 'khor mang po de dag la gzigs nas legs so zhes bya bas mgu bar byas te/ tshangs pa la
276b2(rgyud): sogs pa lha'i bu rnams gang khyed kyis 'di lta bu'i spobs pa yang dag pa yang dag par bskyed pa de ni legs so legs so// legs par bsgrubs shing bshad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo
276b3(rgyud): rjes sems can thams cad kyi tshe dpag tu med pas khyab par 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ tshe dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med par
276b4(rgyud): 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // oM pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye/ a pa ra mi ta A yur pu N+ye dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te ka ri Ni swA hA/ de bzhin
276b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu ngan song thams cad rab tu zhi ste/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song dang / yi dgas rnams su skyes pa'i sems can thams cad
276b6(rgyud): grol bar bdag nyid kyis yang dag par shes so// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu snang bar byas te/ snang bar byas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul du byas nas
276b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi chos kyi yi ge de nyid du zhugs par gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
277a1(rgyud): zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshe dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bshad do// oM a ma~M te/ a mi ta yud b+ha be/ a mi ta sa~M b+ha be/ a mi ta bikrAH/
277a2(rgyud): a mi ta bi kAn+d+ha/ gA mi ni/ sar+b+ba kam kle sha k+Sha yaM ka re swA hA/ de nas 'di bshad ma thag tu de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu ni'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdon mi za bar sgrib/
277a3(rgyud): pa rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgrib pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs ka nas byung ngo // ma ka kan /
277a4(rgyud): ka ni da ro tsa na ra \u0f7f ni/ troT ni tror ni/ tA sa ni NA sa ni/ pra ti ha na pra ti ha na/ sar+b+ba kar+m+ma pa raM pa rA Ni me sar+b+ba sa twA nAny+dza swA hA/ 'di bshad ma thag tu yang thams cad de bzhin du gyur to// de nas yang
277a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis sgrib pa thams cad dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgrib pa rnams ma lus par
277a6(rgyud): 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // oM rat+ne rat+ne ma hA rat+ne/ rat+na saM b+ha be/ rat+na ki ra Ni/ rat+na mA lA bi shud+d+he sho d+ha ya/ sar+b+ba pA pa ni hUM tA Ta/ de nas 'di bshad
277a7(rgyud): ma thag tu bdud kyi gnas thams cad bcom rnam par bcom par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdon mi za bar mi choms pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
277b1(rgyud): par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // oM a mo g+ha a pra ti ha ta/ sar+b+ba a pa ra Na bi sho d+ha ri/ ha ra har hUM phaT/ gsang sngags
277b2(rgyud): 'di bshad ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ yang dag par rab tu g.yos so// bskyod/ rab tu bskyod/ yang dag par rab tu bskyod do// bskul/ rab tu
277b3(rgyud): bskul na yang dag par rab tu bskul nas rmad kyi ya mtshan du ma 'jig rten du snang bar gyur to// de nas dkyil 'khor ni 'di yin te/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// sgo ba rnams dang ldan pa ste// rta babs
277b4(rgyud): bzhi dang ldan par bya// lte ba dang ni sgo khyud ldan// de yi dbus su 'khor lo yi// dkyil 'khor dam pa bri bya ste// rtsibs bzhi dag dang ldan pa la// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor ldan par bya// de yi dbus su
277b5(rgyud): gtso bo ni// phyag na rdo rje stobs chen po// phyag na rdo rje dril bsnams shing // zla ba rgyas pa'i zhal 'dzum bri// shar gyi rtsibs kyi steng du ni// mgon po mi bskyod bri bar bya// lho yi phyogs su rin
277b6(rgyud): chen bri// nub phyogs chu skyes pad+ma la// byang phyogs su ni gdon mi za// dpa' bo stobs chen bri bar bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni// 'khor los sgyur ba chas pa dang // zla ba'i dkyil
277b7(rgyud): 'khor mdog 'dra zhing // rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa dang // phyag ni mchog sbyin mi 'jigs pa// rdo rje'i skyil mo krung bzhugs bri// grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad du// de bzhin bdug sogs
278a1(rgyud): thams cad bri// sgo ba dag kyang khros pa la// khro ba'i dbang du gyur pa bri// de nas rnal 'byor can nyid zhugs// sngags kyis lha rnams spyan drangs te// dzaHd+hu baM hoH/
278a2(rgyud): ga baM badz+ra e byi sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas gtso bo byon pa dang // mdor na mchod pa byas nas kyang // 'chi bdag sbrul gyis 'jigs ldan rnams// 'chi bdag gzhom phyir gzhug par bya// oM badz+ra sa
278a3(rgyud): ma ya hUM/ rdo rje ti rin ti ri bcings la// lag na rin chen thogs te gzhug/ yang na me tog 'phreng ba ste// de ni dkyil 'khor nyid du dong // oM pra tIts+tsha badz+ra d+hu/ de nas mna'i dam tshig sbyin par bya
278a4(rgyud): smyed oM badz+ra sa ma ya hU~M/ de nas 'dis gdong g.yogs dgrol bar bya ste/ oM badz+ra thAs ud g+ha Ta ya d+hu/ de nas 'dis bstan par bya ste/ oM 'dza dri \u0f7f hoH/ de nas 'dis dbang bskur bar bya'o//
278a5(rgyud): oM badz+ra a b+hi Shany+tsa ng+ku/ oM bud+d+ha a b+hi Shany+tsa oM/ oM rat+na a b+hi Shany+tsa trAM/ oM pad+ma a b+hi Shany+tsa hrIH/ oM karma a b+hi Shany+tsa aH/ de nas bum pa'i dbang bskur bar bya'o// oM badz+ra ka la sha a b+hi Shany+tsa dz+dzaH
278a6(rgyud): oM bud+d+ha ka la sha a b+hi Shany+tsa oM/ oM rat+na ka la sha a b+hi Shany+tsa trAMH/ oM pad+ma ka la sha a b+hi Shany+tsa hrIH/ oM kar+b+ba ka la sha a b+hi Shany+tsa a/ de nas 'phreng ba'i dbang bskur bar bya'o// oM rat+na mA la a b+hi ShaH
278b1(rgyud): 5/ oM brdan mas b+hi ts+tshad+ha/ mad+h+yaHrmAH9\u0f7f/ oM kAr+m+mas b+hi Shany+tsa sa/ oM sa kyi 6n+tu/ oM ba la maHba tan+ta// rnas
278b2(rgyud): tAM tAM da hrIHhrIHhrIH/ aHaHaH/ oM badz+ra d+ha ra Ni a b+hi Shany+tsa hUM/ au ta thA ga ta d+hA ra Ni a b+hi Shash+tsa au/ oM rat+na d+hA ra Ni a b+hi Shany+dza tAM/ oM pad+ma d+hA ra Ni a b+hi Shany+tsa hrIH/ oM kar+m+ma d+hA ra Ni a b+hi Shany+tsa
278b3(rgyud): aH/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta gu h+ya a b+hi Shany+tsa au/ oM badza gu h+ya a b+hi Shany+tsu hUM/ oM rat+na gu h+ya a b+hi Shany+tsa tAM/ oM pad+ma gu h+ya a b+hi Shany+tsa hrIHoM karma gu h+ya a b+hi Shany+tsa aHoM pradzI pa ya sa ma yo ga
278b4(rgyud): a b+hi Shany+tsa hUM a/ de ltar dbang bskur nas tshe bsring ba'i rig pa 'di sbyin par bya'o// oM b+h+rUM badz+ra A yu She hUM aH/ de'i sgrub pa ni 'di yin te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i tshe tha ba'i 'od can zla ba'i
278b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la bzhugs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag gnyis mi 'jigs pa dang mchog sbyin du mdzad pa las bdud rtsi 'dzag pa bri'o// de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po'i lag pa thal mo
278b6(rgyud): brkyang la gdong gyen du bcom ldan 'das la lta bar bris la mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod de/ de'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas par bya'o// de nas zla ba nya ba dang mchod pa chen po byas te ba dmar ser gyi
278b7(rgyud): mar sdod gsar par bcug la rdo rje g.yon pas mnan te/ bcom ldan 'das rab tu sems shing mtshan tho ga thag tu bzlas par bya'o// de nas dri ma mnam zhing sngon ma byung ba'i dri'i ngad lda nga la rlangs
279a1(rgyud): pa'am/ du ba 'am/ me byung ngam/ 'od zer ram/ me sgron nam/ 'od byung ngam/ de la sogs pa'i mtshan ma byung na mar de 'am/ mar gsar ram til
279a2(rgyud): mar ram/ chu 'am/ 'o ma 'am/ zho 'am/ chang ngam/ khrag gam/ zhag gam/ klad pa'am/ sha'am/ gang yang rung ba la rab tu sbrus te/ nang par sngar srung ba la sogs pa byas nas
279a3(rgyud): bdag nyid sbyangs te 'thungs sam pos na/ mtshan ma ji lta ba bzhin du byung na ni nam zla ba dang nyi ma yod kyi bar du tshe ring zhing rdo rje dang mtshungs par 'gyur te/ tha mas ni tha ma 'grub pas 'di la the
279a4(rgyud): tshom ni med do mtshan ma byung na'ang 'jig rten na nad med/ ldob skye na/ lus la skra dkar dang gnyer ma med par 'gyur ro// lus brtan ning tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang bzlas
279a5(rgyud): pa byas pa tsam gyis zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang la sogs pa'i las rnams brtag mi dgos par 'gyur te the tshom med do// / de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis/ bcom ldan 'das
279a6(rgyud): byug na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i slad du rang rang gi snying po bshad par 'tshal
279a7(rgyud): gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal du gsol/ rdo rje 'dzin pa bka' stsal du gsol/ rgyal po chen po rnams legs kyis shod cig dang / ngas kyang rjes su yi rang zhing byin gyis
279b1(rgyud): brlab par bya'o// de nas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bus bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ning rjes su yi rang ste byin gyis brlabs pas rang gi snying po 'di bshad do// oM baM/ de nas dri bar
279b2(rgyud): rgyal po yul 'khor srung gis kyang rang gi snying po 'di bshad do// oM rni/ de nas grul bum gyi rgyal po 'phags skyes pos kyang rang gi snying po 'di bshad do// oM bi de nas klu'i rgyal po
279b3(rgyud): mig mi bzang gis kyang rang gi snying po 'di bshad do// oM k+Sha de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// dkyil 'khor lngas ni brgyan pa ste// de yi dbus
279b4(rgyud): su gtso bo ni// phyag na rdo rje 'gying bcas bri// de yi g.yon gyi phyogs su ni// rnam thos bu dge'i lag pa na// be con ne'u le thogs pa dang // rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang // sbom zhing
279b5(rgyud): seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs// gser mdog gzi can ldan par bri// mkhas pas bum pa bzang la sogs// rin chen chu bo 'bar bar bri// mdun du yul 'khor srung nyid ni// pi wa ba
279b6(rgyud): len pa brtson pa dang // mdzes shing kha dog lnga bu ste// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan par bri// g.yas phyogs dpa' bo lus 'phags po// ral gri lag na thogs pa bri// nub
279b7(rgyud): phyogs su ni mig mi bzang // rdo rje zhags pa 'dzin pa'i mchog/ sbrul mgo bdun gyis bskor ba la// mig kyang dmar zhing shin tu 'bar// sgo yi phyogs ni thams cad du// sgo ba
280a1(rgyud): rnams kyang de bzhin no// de nas da rdo rje'i phyag rgya zhes bya bas// sngags mkhan bdag nyid zhugs nas kyang // bcom ldan 'das ni spyan drangs te// de nas
280a2(rgyud): rgyal po spyan drang ngo // spyan drangs nas ni mkhas pas mchod// cho ga bzhin du arga dbul// de nas sngags mkhas sngags 'di dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya 'dis// slob ma rgyal
280a3(rgyud): rigs rje'u rigs dang // bram ze la sogs de bzhin te// me tog rin chen thogs te zhugs// oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ de nas me tog gam rin po che 'dis 'dor bar bya'o// oM badz+ra pra tIts+tsha tA/
280a4(rgyud): ma ho ta ta ma/ gang la bab pa'i rgyal po ni// de nyid du 'grub gzhan du med// de nas gra la bzhag pa yi// bum pa bzhi sa ni dbang bskur te// dang po phyag na rdo rje yi// phyag rgyas dbang ni
280a5(rgyud): bskur bar bya// de la sogs pa go rims kyis// dkyil 'khor nyid du dbang bskur na// rgyal po ma yin rgyal por 'gyur// rgyal po yin na che bar 'gyur// 'dzam bu gling dbang dpal
280a6(rgyud): dang ldan// gling bzhi pa la dbang ba'i mchog/ lan bzhir dbang ni bskur ba dang // lan bzhir gzhug par byas na ni// de la rdo rje 'dzin rgyal bdag/ bu sdug bzhin du brkyang bar bya//
280a7(rgyud): bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi// bran dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang // pho brang dang ni 'khor bcas pas// rgyal po rtag tu bskyang bar bgyi// de gnod gzhan gyi phru ma dang // de yi nad dang
280b1(rgyud): 'chi bdag gi/ 'jigs dang mu ge la sogs pa'i// gnod pa rnams ni gnom par bgyi// rnam thos bus ni rgyas par bgyi// yul 'khor srung gis ni bar bgyi// phyugs dang gnyen bcas dus
280b2(rgyud): min pa'i// 'chi bdag lus 'phags po yis 'joms// mig mi bzang gis bkra shis shing // mu ge la sogs rnam par 'joms// mdor na bdag gi de yi ni// re dang bsam pa kun bgyi/
280b3(rgyud): ci ste nges pa ma lags na// phyag na rdo rje la 'khus 'gyur/ de nas phyogs skyong ba rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
280b4(rgyud): 'das bdag cag rnams kyis kyang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du/ rang rang gi snying po rnams dbul bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten skyong ba
280b5(rgyud): rnams legs so legs so// legs kyis phul cig/ de nas 'byung po rnams kyi bdag po dbang ldan la sogs pas rang rang gi snying po rnams phul ba/ oM I/ oM I/ oM a
280b6(rgyud): ya oM ri/ oM ba/ oM ya/ oM ku oM a/ oM pra de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la// mgon po dbus su de bzhin gzhag
280b7(rgyud): phyogs skyong rang gi phyogs gnas su// gzhag bya spyan sngar nyi ma dang // bag gi gzugs dang gnyis gzhag ste// sgo ba rnams kyang de bzhin no// de nas spyan drangs de kun la// mchod pa
281a1(rgyud): kun gyis mchod par bya// de nas bdag nyid zhugs nas kyang // slob ma rnams ni gtsug bya zhing // phyogs skyong rang gi sngags btab pa'i// bum pa rnams kyis dbang bskur/
281a2(rgyud): ro// de nas phan par 'dod pa yis// bsgrub phyir snying po sbyin par bya// phyogs skyong rang gi phyogs gnas rnams// brtag mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur// de nas de dag mgu nas 'di skad ces
281a3(rgyud): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang rgyal rigs kyi spyi bo nas dbang bskur zhing / rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs te dbang bskur ba thob pa 'am/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am// rigs kyi bu mo
281a4(rgyud): dad pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis rtag par dus thams cad du bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// pha rol gyi phrum kun gzhom par bgyi dus dus su char pa bab par
281a5(rgyud): bgyi'abru dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams bskyed par bgyi'o// de nas chos kyi rgyal po chen po gshin rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//
281a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rgyal po chen po de'i tshe bsring bar bgyi'o// dus ma lags par 'chi ba brgyad po so sor dgag par bgyi'o// srin po rnams kyi bdag po chen po ni ri tis
281a7(rgyud): kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i bu dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / mi 'am/ gzhan gang yang rung ba dag la nad dang / yi dgas
281b1(rgyud): dang 'dres mi 'jigs par bgyi srin po la sogs pas 'jigs par mi bgyi/ dus ma lags pa'i 'chi bdag gis 'jigs par mi bgyi ste/ dus thams cad du bsrung ba dang / bslab pa dang //
281b2(rgyud): sba bar bgyi'o// / de nas klu'i rgyal po chen po ba ru Nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang rtag par dus thams cad du rgyal po de dang yul thams cad
281b3(rgyud): sor bskyab par bgyi/ kun tu bsrung bar bgyi/ 'bru rnams bskyed par bgyi/ klu'i nyes pa rnams mi 'byung bar bgyi// thog dang ser ba rnams mi dbab par bgyi/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba rnams
281b4(rgyud): so sor dgag par bgyi'o// de nas rlung gi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can chen po de la dus thams cad du rlung gi 'jigs pa mi
281b5(rgyud): 'byung bar bgyi/ dus ma lags pa'i rlung mi 'byung bar bgyi/ 'bru dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad bskyed par bgyi/ 'jigs pa thams cad so sor dgag par bgyi'o//

281b7(rgyud): shu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig tu mchis te/ stobs dang ldan pas sems cad chen po de la dus thams cad du 'jigs pa thams cad so sor dgag par bgyi/ nor dang 'bru thams cad legs par 'byor/

282a5(rgyud): pa dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gzhom pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa'i 'og gi mtshams gcad pa dang / phyogs kyi mtshams
282a6(rgyud): gcad pa dang / rdo rje rabs bskor ba dang / rdo rje phur bus gdab pa dang / rdo rje dra ba rnams ze bar bgyi/ dgos pa thams cad la nye bar gnas par bgyi/ dgos pa dang dgos pa ma lags pa/
282a7(rgyud): nams kyi mtshan mnye bar bstan par bgyi/ dge ba dang mi dge ba thams cad mi lam du'ang bsgo bar bgyi/ sgrub pa'ang bgegs ma mchis par bgyi/ dngos grub thams cad stsal bar bgyi'o//
282b1(rgyud): de nas yang nam mkha' lding gi bdag po nam mkha' la spyod pa rnams kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang dus thams
282b2(rgyud): cad du rgyal po de dang / rgyal po'i bu dang / rgyal po'i blon po dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs rnams 'jigs pa thams cad las bdag nyid 'khor thams cad dang bcas par mchis la bsrung ba
282b3(rgyud): dang bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi/ mchog thams cad rab tu bstabs par bgyi/ nad thams cad rab tu ni bar bgyi/ dus thams cad du phyi bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o//

282b5(rgyud): lan gnyis su byung ba 'am/ lan gnyis su byung ba'i bu dang / rgyal rigs dang / rnge'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dad pa rnams kyi
282b6(rgyud): dus thams cad du don thams cad grub par bgyi'o// 'jigs pa thams cad las dus thams cad du'ang bsrung bar bgyi'o// bdag nyid kyang yongs su bskyab par bgyi'o//
282b7(rgyud): de nas gza' chen po brgyad dang 'khor rgyu skar du bcas pa rnams kyis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi sngags kyi snying po

283a2(rgyud): shod cig de nas nyi ma la sogs pa gza' chen po rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// oM a/ oM so// oM a/ oM Tu/

283b2(rgyud): cag gza' chen po brgyad kyis kyang rgyal po chen po de dang / rgyal po'i bu la gtogs par dus thams cad du de bzhin du thams cad bgyi'o// de nas rgyu skar dang / skad cig

284b6(rgyud): blangs phud ces ni// bya ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams nas kyang // lha rdzas 'od zer 'phreng bas gang // de la phud ces bya ba bsam// lag pa sbrul mgo zhags 'dra dang // phud ces bya ba'i
284b7(rgyud): rlung gis gtor// pags pa sha dang rus gnas pa'i// dug rnams thams cad ma lus par// phud ces bya ba'i lag pas drang // de nas las rnams kun byed cing // dug rims dug sbyang /
285a1(rgyud): la sogs pa// khu tshur gyis kyang kun phyin na// sbrul mgo'i phyag rgyas smos ci dgos/ de nas lha chen po rnams kyi bdag po 'jigs par byed pa chen po
285a2(rgyud): bud med chen mo brgyad kyis bskor bas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis skrag pa dang / bud med rnams kyis skrag pas lha dang klu
285a3(rgyud): la sogs pa thams cad skrag/ rnam par skrag/ rab tu skrag ste/ kha sbub tu 'gyel nas gos dang bral te/ sems kyang stor nas kun tu 'phyan pa de dag la phar gdags pa'i slad du bdag cag snying po

285a6(rgyud): swA hA/ oM b+he swA hA/ oM b+hai swA hA/ oM b+ho swA hA/ oM b+haM swA hA/ oM b+ha swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'jigs byed chen po ni brgyad po de dag bdag gi ngag nyan/ de nas de dag dkyil 'khor bshad/
285a7(rgyud): 'khor la chan brtsibs brgyang pa// bris nas dbus su ngon 'dzin// tshwa tshan 'jig rten gsum las ni// rnam rgyal zhes bya gnas par bya// de yin pas drung 'jigs byed pa'i// bdag pa can pa
285b1(rgyud): khros pa ni// 'jigs byed ma dang bcas par bri// rtsibs kyi nang ni thams cad du// gzhan yang 'jigs byed brgyad po ni// bud med nams dang ldan pa la// khros pa'i bzhin dang yid khros pas/
285b2(rgyud): ci bde bar ni bri bar bya// 'dir ni sgo sgor de bzhin du// sgo ba shin tu khros ldan bri// de nas lcags kyu la sogs pas// bkug ste mgo yi thod pa ni// khrag gis bkang ste mchod nas kyang //
285b3(rgyud): chang gtor ma bzang po dang // snod rnams khrag gis bkang ba dang // mgo thong mag yi dum bu dang // khrag gam chang bkang bum pa brgyad// dkyil 'khor der ni gzhag par bya// de nas 'jig rten
285b4(rgyud): gsum rgyal ba'i// mchog gi slob ma gzhug par bya// bum pa'am mgo mthod pa ni// de ltar brgyad kyis dbang bskur ro// de nas las rnams sbyin bya ste// bud med khyim mam mtshan gcig par//
285b5(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum ni 'dul ba'i mchog/ tshul bzhin du ni mchod nas kyang // 'bum phrag bzhir ni bzlas par bya// de nas 'jigs par byed pa yi// bdag nyid chen po'i sgra thos nas// mi 'jigs
285b6(rgyud): par ni mgo thod par// khrag mchog bkang ste arga dbul// de nas khro bo 'jigs byed pa// ma rungs yid can bud med kyi// tshogs kyis bskor cing 'jigs byed pa// brgyad kyis bskor ba mthong
285b7(rgyud): bar 'gyur// de mthong 'jigs pa med gyur la// hUM zhes bya ba dran byed cing // sha'am yang na chang mchog gis// thod pa bkang ste dbul bar bya// de nas 'jigs byed ma rungs 'joms/
286a1(rgyud): mgunas rab tu grub byung nas// ci 'dod ces ni sbas nas kyang // mthu mams dkyis desbyir byed// sa rnams sbyin pa ma gtogs par// bde cher drug tshul gyis gsol/
286a2(rgyud): khru bzo ba'i btung ba dang // rdzas dang ral gri 'khor mo dang // rtse gsum pa dang mtho ras dang // me dang sa 'og rgyal po dang // gling dang gling bzhi brgya byin dang // gnod sbyin dbang po gnod sbyin cing /
286a3(rgyud): rig 'dzin dang ni rig 'dir gyi// 'khar los sgyur dang 'jig rte do// gsum gyi bdag dang bka' gtan dang // rang gi 'khor dang brang mar kyi// dngos grub gang mang rung ba ni// ci dga' bar ya'i phyin
286a4(rgyud): par byed// byin nas rgod cing 'gro bar byed// skrag na de ma thag tug so/ de nas tshangs pal sogs pa lha chen po rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces
286a5(rgyud): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang bcom 'das kyis bka' stsal na rang gi brtag pa bshad par 'tshal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse bar dgod te byin gyis brlab par gsol/
286a6(rgyud): de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyis rang gi snying po rnams bshad do// oM a/ oM b+hai/ oM ru/ oM i/ oM ka/ oM ga/ oM bri/ oM ka/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/
286a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la// dbus su 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba// de yi mdun du dpa' bo ni// dbang phyug rtse gsum lag thogs bri// rgyab tu tshangs pa zi bya ste// g.yon par lag na
286b1(rgyud): 'khor lo thogs// g.yas par dbang po rang gi ni// phyag rgya'i mtshan ma lag thogs bri// rang gi dkyil 'khor chung ma rnams// 'dir yang sgo ba de bzhin te// bya dang bum pa gang ba gzhag
286b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi ni phyi rol du// stobs bzang la sogs mthu chen thogs// de nas zhugs nas lha rnams ni// mkhas pas kun nas dgug par bya// dzaHhUM baM hoHlha thams cad// dkyil 'khor/
286b3(rgyud): dam par gzhug par mdzod// de nas 'ongs par mthong ba dang // dgra' ba chen pos mchod par bya// de nas rdo 'dzin pa yi// phyag rgyas slob ma rnams gtsug ste// oM pra hrIts+tshi tA ma hA saH
286b4(rgyud): badz+ra d+ha ra ya dzA ya hU ha ha ha ha/ me tog cho ga bzhin du ngor// mig dbyenas ni bstan par bya// de nas sngags kyis btab pa yi// bum pa'i chus ni dbang bskur ro// de nas lha rnams gang
286b5(rgyud): dga' ba'i// dngos grub rab tu sbyin par bya// 'bum gcig gam ni 'bum gnyis sam// dang po bsnyen pa byas nas kyang // dbang phyug la sogs lha mchog rnams// de dag grub pas bsgrub
286b6(rgyud): bya ste/ mtshan gcig la sogs gnas sam ni// phyag na rdo rje'i pho brang ngam// yang na de bzhin gshegs pa'am// ring bsrel ldan pa'i mchod rten du// lha rnams thams cad cho ga bzhin//
286b7(rgyud): sgrub pas rtag tu bsgrub byas na// nam phyed na ni lha ba zhengs nas// khyod kyi 'dod pa gang yin pa// de ni ci bder sbyin bya yis// babang pos myur du soms te spos// gang phyir mchog ni khyod la phyin/
287a1(rgyud): de nas sngags shes dngos grub phyir// lha la mchog ni gsol ba gdab// lha rdzas khu ba bro btung dang // mi snang ba dang mkha' 'gro dang // ril bu rdzas dang rgyal sogs//
287a2(rgyud): yid 'dod tshad med gsol ba gdab/ de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dang
287a3(rgyud): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa gang lags pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag lha thams cad kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ngo // mtho ris kyi lam bstan par bgyi'o//
287a4(rgyud): bde 'gro'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// ngan song ma lags pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// dben pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// rnam par dben pa'i
287a5(rgyud): lam bstan par bgyi'o// 'byung ba'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// dam pa'i chos kyi lam bstan par bgyi'o// bde 'gro'i lam bstan par bgyi'o//
287a6(rgyud): spong ba'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// nyon mongs med pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o// byang chub sems dpa' nyid du 'grub pa'i lam bstan
287a7(rgyud): bar bgro'o// de rje 'dzin pa nyid du grub pa'i lam bstan par bzla'o// dus thams cad du 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / lba bar bgyi'o// bdag cid kyi
287b1(rgyud): bzhin du yongs su bsrung bar brgya'o// de'i ba rom gyi dam kun gnom par bgyi'o// grong dang / grong 'dab dang / ljongs dang / rnam par bzang dang / chul srid rnams bsrung bar bgyur
287b2(rgyud): yul dang / phyogs dang / grong khyer dang / grong 'khor rnams bsrung bar bgyi'o// rgyal srid kyang stsal bar bgyi'o// rgyal srid thob pa rnams ni rgyal srid rgyas par bgyi'o// gling gcig
287b3(rgyud): pa dang gling gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / bde 'gro dang / mi'i gnas dang / sa'i 'og dang / 'khor los sgyur ba rnams stsal bar bgyi'o// mdor na brgya byin
287b4(rgyud): nyid dang / tshangs pa nyid dang / gtogs 'dod nyid dang / dbang phyug chen po nyid kyang stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje nyid kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la
287b5(rgyud): kun tu gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag g.yos/ yang dag par g.yos/ 'gul/ yang dag par 'gul/ 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ yang dag par rab
287b6(rgyud): tu 'bar/ dgod/ rab tu dgodayang dag par rab tu dgod/ rtsed rab tu rtse/ yang dag par rab tu rtse zhing rmad kyi ya mtshan du ma 'jig rten du yang dag par rab tu snang bar gyur to//
287b7(rgyud): de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i tshogs rnams shin tu rngam par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang
288a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags
288a2(rgyud): lung bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes lha rnams kyis gsol ba'i tshig gsan nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams sngon gyi sangs rgyas
288a3(rgyud): thams cad kyis bshad pa'i 'chi bdag zhi bar byed pa'i rig pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bdag 'joms par byed pa'i rig sngags gzi brjid chen po gang yin pa thos sam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
288a4(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha chen po de dag yang dag par rab tu mgu ste ba spu langs nas legs so zhes bya ba 'di dag gsol to// bcom ldan 'das legs so legs
288a5(rgyud): so// rdo rje 'dzin pa legs so legs so// gang gi slad du tshe thung ba'i sems can rnams tshe bsring par bgyi ba dang / dus ma lags pa'i 'chi bdag gis nyes pa rnams gang gis dus ma
288a6(rgyud): lags pa 'chi ba las rnam par grol bar bgyi ba dang / ngan song du skyes pa rnams ngan song gi rgyud thams cad las ci nas kyang rnam par gror bar bgyi ba dang / 'khor ba'i 'jigs pas skrag pa'i sems
288a7(rgyud): can rnams bde blag tu 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par bgyis nas/ myur du bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ gzi brjid
288b1(rgyud): chen po'i stobs dang mthu chen po'i rig pa bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo mas tshangs pa la sogs pa sgra rnams kyis gsol ba'i tshig gsan nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
288b2(rgyud): cad kyi snying po 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM pu N+ye pu N+ye/ sAhA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yuHpu N+ye dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te swA hA/ snying po'i rig pa'o// oM
288b3(rgyud): hrI swAt+ma/ nye ba'i snying po'i rig pa'o// oM b+hUM swAhA/ nye ba'i snying po'i rig pa'o// ma kru swAhA/ snying po yang dag par bskul ba'i rig pa'o// ma hA s+'ut+ma/ snying po dam pa'o// oM hr-id+haH

288b5(rgyud): dang gzi brjid tshad med pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba gzhag ste/ b+h+rUM/ zhes bya ba'i snying po'o// de'i spyan sngar ni phyag na rdo rje ste/ hrIH/ zhes bya ba'i snying po'o// g.yon par ni khro bo ste/ kru zhes bya
288b6(rgyud): pa'i snying po'o// g.yas par ni nam mkha'i snying po ste/ traM/ zhes bya ba'i snying po'o// rgyab tu ni 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ste/ hrI zhes bya
288b7(rgyud): pa'i snying po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la rig pa rnams bri'o// bum pa lnga dang brgyad 'khor los sgyur ba'i sngags kyis btab la gzhag go// bdug pa la sogs pa las thams cad pa'i/
289a1(rgyud): khro za'i sngags kyis btab pa dang / mchod pa la sogs pa gzhag ste/ sgo ba thams cad kyang de bzhin no// de nas sngags mkhan bdag nyid zhugs la/ bde bar gshegs
289a2(rgyud): pa dam pa sras dang 'bangs su bcas shing 'khor gyis bskor te rig pa dang lhan cig spyan drang ngo // de nas bdag nyid dbang te skyil mo krung bcas nas 'dug la stong phrag brgya bzlas la de bzhin gshegs
289a3(rgyud): pa'am/ rdo rje 'dzin pa 'am/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug kyang rung ste/ mngon sum du mthong nas de 'dod pa'i mchog so sor thob par 'gyur ro// ci ste mnyam par ma bzhag na de'i
289a4(rgyud): tshe yid kyis las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro// de nas rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings la/ oM badz+ra d+ha ra/ rat+na d+ha ra/ pad+ma d+ha ra/ b+hi shwa d+ha ra/ ta thA ga ta sa ma ya/ mA ti kra ma/ ta thA ga ta sa ma ya
289a5(rgyud): d+ha ra ko \u0f85haM/ zhes nga rgyal bskyed la slob ma rnams gzhug par bya'o// de nas 'dis me tog sa dor bar bya'o// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta pra tIts+tsha ho sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas 'phreng ba de nyid kyis mgo la bcings la
289a6(rgyud): dbang bskur bar bya'o// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Shany+tsA d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya hUM buM/ oM badz+ra a b+hi Shany+tsa hUM b+h+yAM/ oM rat+na a b+hi Shany+tsa dzA/ oM pad+ma a b+hi Shany+tsa hUM hrIH/ oM kar+m+ma a b+hi Shany+tsa hUM a/ de nas dam
289a7(rgyud): tshig dang bka'i dbang bskur bar bya'o// de nas dam tshig ni/ dkon mchog gsum dang byang chub sems// khri ma dam pa rnams mi spang // srog chags rnams ni gsad mi bya// ma byin par yang
289b1(rgyud): mi zung zhing / brdzun du lta bar bya ma yin// pha rol bud med spyang mi bya// tha ma smad par mi bya ste// de yi grib ma mi bgos zhing // slob dpon ma yin mi gzungal// rdo rje slob dpon mtshan
289b2(rgyud): mi brjod// sngags dang phyag rgya mi smad de// lha rnams la lta smos ci dgos// ci ste glen pas spang na ni// nad kyis nges par 'chi bar 'gyur// rnying dang lha yi grib ma dang // 'jig rten 'jig
289b3(rgyud): rten 'das pa pa// phyag rgya yi ge'i mtshan ma rnams// gom pas bgom par mi bya'o// glen pas dkon mchog gsum sogs dang // sangs rgyas bstan la gnod byed dang // bla ma smong par/

289b5(rgyud): gyis ni sngags kyis gsang // 'jungs pa rnams kyis nor blangs la// sems can 'phongs la sbyin par bya// bla ma la ni mchod pa dang // de ltar dam tshig sgrub pa dang // dkyil 'khor phyir dang
289b6(rgyud): dam tshig can// phan phyir rgyal ba'i sras rnams la// mchod phyir mi yi dbang po dang // phyug po rnams kyi nor dbrog go// sems can rnams la phan spyod pas// rtag tu dam tshig bla ma'i nor//
289b7(rgyud): srog chags srog ni srung ba'i phyir// brdzun du yang ni smra bar bya// sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes bya dang // dam tshig rnams ni srung ba dang // sngags rigs pas ni sgrub pa'i phyir// gzhan gyi
290a1(rgyud): bud med bsten par bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas 'dug nas// thams cad byas shing kun pos kyang // 'grub 'gyur nyes par mi 'gyur na// snying rjer ldan pas smosaH/
290a2(rgyud): dgos de nas 'dis bka'i dbang bskur bar bya'o// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta A dzA ya de dA s+yA mi gra hA badz+ra su srid d+ha ye/ oM badz+ra tiSh+Tha hUM 'dis rdo rje lag tu byin la las kyi dbang bskur bar bya'o//
290a3(rgyud): oM sar+b+ba kar+m+ma Ni ku ru bud d+hA nAM hUM/ de nas bla ma bla ma'i phyir// khyod kyi lus mchog sbyin par bya// nor dang dbyig dang 'bru rnams dang // stan dang bzhon pa de bzhin te/ bran gyi mchog dang khang
290a4(rgyud): pa dang // rgyal po rgyal srid de bzhin te// bu dang bu mo chung ma dang // ma dang sring mo tsha mo dang // gzhan yang ci bzhid thams cad ni/ phan par bsams phyir bla mar dbul// de nas byang

290b1(rgyud): bsgyur bar bya// lha yirnal 'byor tshul du bsgrub/ de nas rang gi sa bon dang // phyag rgyas phyag rgya de byin chag/ lha/ 'og go rims ri bzhin du/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskun

290b7(rgyud): rnams kyi 'bras bu dang rnam par smin pa nyon cig/ lha'i bu rnams mdor na nga la'ang de'i yon tan bshad par spobs pa med de/ nga'i bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa de brgya phrag stong du mar bsgyur/
291a1(rgyud): kyang grangs su'ang mi chog/ bgrang bar yang mi chog/ dper yang mi bzod de/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung pos kyang mi bzod do//
291a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'bras bu dang rnam par smin pa gang lags pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar che'o// rdo rje 'dzin pa ngo mtshar che'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag
291a3(rgyud): cag gis dkyil 'khor la sogs par 'jug par spro'o// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa spro'o// / de nas lha de dag gis de bzhin du phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//
291a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can bsod nams chung zhing tshe thung ba dang / ngan song gi rgyud dang ldan pa dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / byol song rnams su skyes pa

291a7(rgyud): song du skyes zin pa gang yin pa de dag gi ming la'ang dbang bskur cig/ gzugs brnyan la'ang dbang bskur bar byas shig/ mchod rten la'ang dbang bskur bar byos shig/ rang gi lha'i sku
291b1(rgyud): la'ang dbang bskur bar byos shig/ chung ngu na de dang rigs mthun pa dang / de'i bu dang / de dang rus mthun pa dang / de'i ming 'dzin pa'am/ bran la'ang dbang bskur cig dang / zhag bdun/
291b2(rgyud): du dkyil 'khor du bcug ste dbang bskur na/ gdon mi za bar zhag bdun gyis ngan song gis sgrib pa las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// lha'i bu rnams de ni ming nas smos te 'bum phrag gnyis sam/

291b5(rgyud): ba sreg byas na// ngan song kun las rnam par thar// de yi sha dang rus pa dang // skra dang thal ba la sogs pas// cho ga de dang 'dra bar ni// sbyin sreg byas na ngan song yang // kun las
291b6(rgyud): rnam par thar par 'gyur// de yi dbus su 'khor lo ni// rtsibs brgyad 'od zer dkar 'bar bri// khor yug rdo rje rtse lnga pa// 'od zer dkar dang ldan par bri// de nas rdo rje rgya gram dang /
291b7(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen chu skyes mchog/ de nas sdig pa gzhom pa'i phyir// phyag rgya sna tshogs gzhag par bya// phyi yi rdo rje rigs rnams kyi// phyag rgya rnams ni phyi rol bri// gza' dang skar ma'i
292a1(rgyud): mtshan ma dang // de ltar 'jig rten skyong ba rnams// gtso bo ri mo lugs ma'ang rung // rdo rje can dang lhan cig gzhag/ bya dang bum pa bkang ba dang // gtor
292a2(rgyud): ma lha ba shos rab dkar gzhag/ mdor na thig ni btab nas kyang // cho ga bzhin du bri bar bya// dkar po'i gos ni bgos nas kyang // sangs rgyas gzugs can mi 'jigs pas// dran
292a3(rgyud): song rgyud na gnas pa yi// sems can rjes su dran byed cing // sdig pa'i sgrib pa zhi ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas kun gyi sbyin sreg ni// mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsi can// 'bras yos yungs kar bsres
292a4(rgyud): pa dang // de yi rus pa sha la sogs// yang na ming nas smos te bya// de nas bde 'gror skyes nas kyang // mkhas pas rgyas pa bya dgos te// khru do ba 'am khru bzhi pa// de ltar mchog ni
292a5(rgyud): brgyad par// byas nas hom khung gru bzhi pa// kun tu mu ran ldan par bya// de dbus pad+ma rin chen can// 'od zer ser po ldan par bri// khor yug tu ni rin chen dang // mu ran rnams la chu
292a6(rgyud): skyes bri// phyi rol du ni rigs lnga yi// so so'i phyag rgya bri bar bya// de ltar phyi yi lha rnams dang // lcags kyu la sogs bri bar bya// gos rnams ser por bsgyur nas kyang // mtho ras
292a7(rgyud): gnas pa rjes dran zhing // de la phan phyir rgyas pa'i phyir// rgyas pa yi ni las byas na// lus can de yi tshe dang dpal// gzi brjid bde ba'i longs spyod 'phel// de nas phan phyir nges
292b1(rgyud): par yang // dbang du bya ba'i las byan// hom khung gzhu yi dbyibs 'dral// khru gang ba 'am khru do ba// khru bzhir dbyes la de'i dbus su// pad+ma dmar po bris nas kyang // de yi dbus su/
292b2(rgyud): mda' bcas pa'i// gnu yang de bzhin bri bar bya// khor yug tu yang mda' bcas pa'i// gzhu ni kha dog dmar por bri// sngags rdzogs pas ni rtag par yang // phyi rol de dang 'dra bar bya//
292b3(rgyud): sems can de yang dran byas te// dmar por gyur pa'i gos gyon la// me tog dmar ram pad+ma 'am// 'bras bu dmar ram tshon bskus pa'i// mar dang gur kum bsreg pa dang // tsan dan
292b4(rgyud): dmar po'i phyi ma yis// sbyin sreg byas na lha la sogs// thams cad de yi dbang du 'gyur// de la gdon rnams gzhom pa'i phyir// mngon spyod kyang ni brtsam bya ste// phyed dang gsum mam khru
292b5(rgyud): gsum mam// de ltar dam pa khru dgur bya// gru gsum pa dang ldan par ni// dbus su rdo rje rtse dgu pa// rtse gsum pa dang rgya gram pa'i// rdo rje rnams dang dbyig pa dang // mgo na rdo rje
292b6(rgyud): gsum dang // dgra sta rtse gcig mu khyud bskor// phyi rol tu yang rim gsum du// snga ma bzhin du brgyan par bya// bya dang gtor ma bum pa dang // bshos cha rnam pa mang du gzhag/
292b7(rgyud): dang khrag gis bkang ba yi// mgo yi thod pa kun tu gzhag/ de yis lus can sdig sogs dang // bgegs rnams gzhom par bya ba'i phyir// gos nag bgos shing khros nas kyang //
293a1(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum rgyal bdag nyid bsam// de nas de yi sdig bcom lus// bgegs dang bral te ci bde bar// mtho ras 'jig rten mi yinang // khams gsumaH/
293a2(rgyud): ni ci bder spyod// go rims 'di dag nyid kyis ni// tshe 'di'i gnas la'ang bya ba ste// de nas gang gi phyir byas pa// de yi phyir yang de bzhin 'gyur// gzhan dag kyang ni las rnams kun/
293a3(rgyud): snga ma ji bzhin de ltar bya// des ni sems can thams cad la'ang // myur du bde srid myong bar 'gyur/ de nas tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams yid mgunas/ bcom ldan 'das la
293a4(rgyud): phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ngan song du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i slad du brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di 'dri ba dang / 'dring
293a5(rgyud): 'jug pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams bdag cag tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis bu bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ gang rgyal po dang / blon po dang / rgyal po'i blon
293a6(rgyud): po rnams ji ltar gsungs pa'i rjes su slob na de'i rgyal srid 'phel bar bgyi/ yul dang / phyogs dang / rang gi skye bo dang / yongs kyi skye bo dang / bran la sogs pa bsrung bar bgyi
293a7(rgyud): nor dang 'bru rnams mang du 'byor par bgyi bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams dang ldan par bgyi/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / lo legs pa dang / zhi ba rnam
293b1(rgyud): su bgyi na/ ji ltar bshad pa la mi rtog par bgyi ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ gang gis brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di dad pas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te grong dang grong khyer du btsugs la/ bdag
293b2(rgyud): nyid kyis bsu ba dang / glang po che'i steng du bzhag la grong dang grong khyer la sogs pa thams cad bskor na/ nad dang gnod pa thams cad ma mchis par 'gyur la/ sems can chen po de'i drung na bdag
293b3(rgyud): cag bran gyi tshul lam bu'i tshul du gnas par bgyi'o// gang du 'di rab tu spong ba de na bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje nyid rdzogs longs spyod pa'i skus rdo rje sems dpa'i skur zhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi
293b4(rgyud): stebacom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' kun tu bzang po re ba thams cad yongs su skong ba de nyid brtag pa'i rgyal po'i gzugs su bzhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
293b5(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas te bzhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// sa phyogs de mchod rten du gyur par 'tshal bar bgyi ste/ mchod par bgyi/ phyag 'tshal bar bgyi/ kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o// bdag cag
293b6(rgyud): tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di kun la rgyas par 'chad pa'i rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub chen po de'i g.yog bgyi'o// bran gyi tshul du gnas par bgyi'o// bka' nyan pa'i
293b7(rgyud): tshul du gnas par bgyi'o// bsgo ba thams cad mnyan par bgyi'o// phan pa dang bde ba tham sad bgyi'o// dngos grub thams cad kyang stsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das mdor na de'i rkang pa'i
294a1(rgyud): rjes mgo pos blang bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das phyag 'tshal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das mchod par bgyig/ bdag cag de'i phyi bzhin du rjes su 'brang ngo //
294a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor du zhugs te dbang bskur ba gang lags pa de dag kyang bdag cag gi dpon po lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// phyag na rdo rje lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// rdo rje sems
294a3(rgyud): dpa' lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// bde ba chen po kun tu bzang po lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo
294a4(rgyud): rjes tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa la sogs pa lha nam chos la rim gro bya bar de ltar dam tshig bcas par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni legs so legs/
294a5(rgyud): so/ dalegs par sgrubs shig/ bam po gsum pa ste tha ma'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes sngags dang / rig pa dang / snying
294a6(rgyud): po thams cad brtan par bya ba'i phyir nyid kyi snying po 'di bshad do// oM b+hU dz+ra badz+ra pA Ni dzi D+ha tiSh+ThahUM/ oM d+hU a/ oM badz+ra hUM phadz+ra/ oM hri d+ha badz+ra hUM/ oM badz+ra hUM sa/ oM badz+ra d+hu aH/ de nas de dag gi
294a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bshad de/ dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la/ dbus su rdo rje bri bar bya// yang nardo rje sems dpa' 'bo// kun tu babang ngam bde ba che// spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje la/ g.yas su/
294b1(rgyud): phyag rdo rje chen bsdams// rnam par gsal ba nub phyogs bri// brang phyogs phyag na rgya gram bsnams// phyi rol du ni kun bskor cing // sangs rgyas thams cad gzhag par bya// de mi phyi rol
294b2(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams// go rims bzhin du bri bar bya// de yi phyi rol sems dpa' rnams// byams pa la sogs mchog chen bri// de ltar dge slong kun dga' sogs// thugs rnams de yi
294b3(rgyud): phyi rol bri// rang gi chung ma bus bskor ba'i/ tshangs pa la sogs phyi rol bri// gza' dang skar ma'i lha rnams dang // rgyal po bzhi po rnams dang ni// phyogs skyong 'jig rten skyong ba rnams/
294b4(rgyud): de yi phyi rol dmyal kun dang // 'dod chags la sogs byol song bri// sgo sgor gsungs pa de bzhin du// sgo ba stobs kyi dam pa rnams// dri rnams lha yi chus bkang ba/ gser gyi bum pa
294b5(rgyud): 'od can dang // gtor ma dang ni lha bshos dang/ me tog bdug pa rab mdzes dang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan 'phan rnams dang // bla re dang ni rnga mchog dang // dril bu rdo rje nor bu dang /
294b6(rgyud): sha la nyi ma la sogs rgyan// 'dod can rnams kyis 'bras bu ni// 'dod pa'i yon tan rdzas dgang ngo // de nas sngags mkhan nyid kyis ni// spyan drangs bdag nyid 'jug par bya// bdag nyid
294b7(rgyud): kyis ni dbang yang bskur// sdom gnas dam tshig ldan pa dang // bla ma mos shing mi 'jigs la// rig skyes skyon dang bral ba dang // ser sna ma lus spang gyur cing // yon tan mang por ldan gyung/
295a1(rgyud): ga dgatong dang tshul khrims yang du thos// byams pa dang ni sring rje'i sems// dga' ba btang snyoms gnas pa dang // stong pa ma med pa'i sems// smon pa med pas/
295a2(rgyud): yid ldan pa'i// slob ma dam pa sngags 'di yis// byang chub tu ni sems bsgreng la// sngags mkhan gyis ni gzung bar bya// oM badz+ra dz+ra dza/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya pra be sha ts+tsha/ oM badz+ra pA Ni pra tIts+tshi badz+ra sa
295a3(rgyud): ma hA su kha hU~M ka ha ha ho sa ma ya s+t+waM/ me tog gi 'phreng ba dor nas gang la bab pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas mgo bo la bcing bar bya'o// de nas dam tshig sbyin par bya ste/ oM tsaM ste khyod kyis su'ang rung ba la
295a4(rgyud): smras na ni/ phyag na rdo rje nyid kyis rdo rje 'bar ning rab tu 'bar bas khyod kyi mgo bkas par 'gyur ro// oM badza sa ma ya tra ti hU~M a/ de nas 'dis dam tshig gi chu thung la gdong g.yogs dgrol bar bya'o//
295a5(rgyud): oM badz+ra tsak+Shu pa sh+ya ho// oM dzA pa ta yAn te mo kA ya ma ni hU~M phaT/ de nas phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bstan te/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar dbang bskur bar bya'o//
295a6(rgyud): oM badz+ra pA Ni sa yAn+te a nu rak+to a d+hi Shany+tsa rbiH/ oM badz+ra badz+ra a b+hi Shany+tsa sarba badz+ra a b+hi She ka ta dzA a/ oM bud d+ha a b+hi Shany+tsa sarba bud d+ha a b+hi She ka ta yo dzU/ oM rat+na a b+hi Shany+tsa sarba rat+na a b+hi She ka ta o tAM/
295a7(rgyud): oM badz+ra a b+hi r+tha sarba barba a b+hi She ka ta oM dz+dzaH/ oM ka p+pa a b+hi Shash+tsa sa rba kam+ba a b+hi She ka a aH/ de nas bdag gi lus la sogs pa yon du phul la bka' dod par bya'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiH/
295b1(rgyud): ka ta og rted su mi gra bas pra sing d+ha ye d+hu/ de nas las thams cad byed du gtsug cing dngos grub thams cad kyang sbyin no// bde bas bde ba bskyed nas ni/ dkyil 'khor ban pa'i dbus bu ni/ kun/
295b2(rgyud): tu bzang ngam bde ba che// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms nas kyang // snying khar hUM zhes bya ba sems nas// rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam par 'gyur// dpal ldan las rnams kun byed cing // kun tu bcas
295b3(rgyud): bor bdag nyid 'gyur// de ltar 'gyur ba the tshom med// hUM las sangs rgyas gzugs gyur na// phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid 'gyur// snying par 'khor lo rab bsgoms na// phyag na po lung bar 'gyur//
295b4(rgyud): rdo rje khro bor rnam bsgoms te// snying kha'i dbus su phaT ces pa/ hUM zhes bya bas bskor bsams na// khro bo stobs chen nyid du 'gyur// rdo rje bstan par bdag bsgyur la// snying khar oM zhes
295b5(rgyud): bya ba yis// bskor ba'i chu dang tAM ldan pa'i/ bsams na rin chen 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje bsgoms la snying gi ni// dbus su pad+mo zhes bya ba/ oM zhes bya ba'i bskor bsams na// phyagan
295b6(rgyud): pad+mo mnyam par 'gyur// 'khor lo rgya gram hU~M ldan par// a zhes bya bas bskyed nas kyang // oM zhes bya bas bskor bsams na// rdo rje las dang mnyam par 'gyur// de nas las rnams bshad
295b7(rgyud): bya ste/ da zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa'i las// de ltar dbang dang mngon spyod rnams// bzlas dang sbyin sreg cho ga yis// las rnams thams cad bya ba yin// rdo rje sems dpar bdag bsgyur la//
296a1(rgyud): zhi ba'i las ni brtsam bya zhing // cho ga shes pas nang par nyid// bzlas dang sbyin sreg nyid byed cing // 'od zer sprin gyis de lus la// 'phro bar gyur bsam bsgoms te/
296a2(rgyud): rtag tu shar bltas 'od zer gyis// nyes pa thams cad sel bar bsams// 'di ni sems can phan dga' bas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las bya// kun tu bzang po'i sku chen nas/
296a3(rgyud): bde ba chen por bsams nas kyang // nang par re re 'od byed na// sngas bzhin du las byas te// nang par sngar ni sems can rnams// sdig can thams cad ni bar 'gyur// gser 'od mdzes shing /
296a4(rgyud): 'bar ba yi// rin chen 'dzin du bsams nas ni// baba' ba legs byas nyi ma yi// gung la rgyas pa'i las shis te// rin chen 'dra bar khung brkos la// bzlas dang sbyin sreg rab tu bya/
296a5(rgyud): yang na sngags pas snga ma bzhin// 'od kyis lus la rab tu dgang // sbyor dang ldan pas khung bu ni// pad+mo 'dra bar byas nas kyang // pad+ma 'dzin par bdag bsgyur la// bdag dang nye bar
296a6(rgyud): ma'i mthar// 'dren pa kun tu babang po yis// nI ba'i las ni rab tu bya// rdo rje rin chen rgyas pa ste// dbang bskur ba yang de bzhin no// dpal gyi nam rgyal de bzhin du// longs spyod
296a7(rgyud): dbang phyug dpal mnyam med// rdo rje nyi ma gzi brjid dang // mdog sdug shin tu 'bar ba bya// bzhad cing rmang du mdzad pas ni// dga' mgu rangs pa rnams su 'gyur// pad+mo bzhad pas
296b1(rgyud): chos kun ni// rtogs mdzang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang // mnyes 'gyur lha bran smos ci dgos// gzhan gyi rigs sogs tshogs mchog rnams/ non pos gcod pa nyid du mdang/ gang /
296b2(rgyud): dang yi dgas 'dre rnams dang // gnod sbyin srin po bka' nyan dang // gza' mchog brgyad na ma rungs rnams// 'khor los rtsa nas 'byin par mdzad// lkugs dang lkugs pa ma yin dang /
296b3(rgyud): glen rnams mi smra smra bar mdzad// lce la je zhes bya ba yis// ma rungs rnams kyang lkugs par mdzad// rgya gram gyis ni mchod pa dang // sems can don mdzad thams cad ston// hUM zhes bya/
296b4(rgyud): pas 'phro mdzad cing // rdo rje srung bas srung bar mdzad// hUM zhes bya ba'i so yis ni// rdo rje gnod sbyin nyid kyis kyang // ma rungs rab tu ma rungs kun// za byed sdig spyod smos ci dgos/
296b5(rgyud): ma rungs snying khar dam du ni// baM zhes bya ba bsams nas kyang // dug dang rims dang gdon la sogs// rdo rje bsdams pas bcings par mdzad// bzlas dang sbyin sreg las rnams kyi// dgos
296b6(rgyud): pa thams cad sgrub par mdzad// 'od zer bsil bas dngos po la// rgyas par gyur pas sgom byed cing // zhi ba'i lha yi rnal 'byor dang // zhi ba'i sems kyis ni bar bya// rang gi lus ni
296b7(rgyud): gser btses dang // nyi ma gsal shar dge 'dra bar/ ba sams la rgyas par bya ba'i phyir// 'od zer sprin gyis dgang bar bya// pad+mo sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyi// phriH'dra 'od zer btang ba
297a1(rgyud): yis// snying la kun tu skor byed cing // 'dod pa kun gyi dbang du byed// rdo rje dru gi ting 'dzin gyis// khros nas rdo rje mtshan cha'i chag// sdig spyod lus la dbab byas
297a2(rgyud): na/ dade ma thag tu brlag par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir
297a3(rgyud): tshom thams cad gcod pa ngan song thams cad bzlog pa'i brtag pa dam pa 'di bshad pa legs so legs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes phyag rgya'i le'u 'di bshad/
297a4(rgyud): do/ lag pa gnyis mdun du bzhag la a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlab par bsams te hUM zhes bya ba dang / a zhes bya bas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de gnyis kyis byin gyi sa brlabs
297a5(rgyud): te/ lag pa gnyis kyi thal mo gnyis ka la a la sogs pa'i yi ge bcu drug gis bkang zhing 'phro bar byas te/ mthe bong gnyis la oM zhes bya ba bsam/ mdzub mo gnyis la hUM zhes bya ba gzhag/ gung
297a6(rgyud): mo gnyis la tA zhes bya ba gzhag/ srin lag gnyis la hrI zhes bya ba gzhag/ mthe'u chung gnyis la a zhes bya ba gzhag/ de ltar yi ge rnams bzhag par byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yin
297a7(rgyud): par mos pa bskyed de// chos thams cad gcig la gcig 'dres pa dang / bdag dang yang rjes su mthun par dran par bya ste/ lag pa gnyis padz+ralta bur sbyar ba byas nas oM zhes bya ba gnyis brkyang ba dang /
297b1(rgyud): a zhes bya ba gnyis bkug ste/ de bzhin du hUM zhes bya ba dang / hrI zhes bya ba gnyis pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra bar bya// trAM zhes bya ba gnyis gshibs te brkyang ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya las
297b2(rgyud): thams cad dang ldan pa'i dam tshig go// de nyid rnon po dang ldan pa dang / de las rab tu 'khor lo 'dra ba ni 'khor lo'i'o// de nyid las khar banag pa ni sgra'i ste/ 'di ni phyag rgya'i tshogs so// de cing
297b3(rgyud): las gnyis su byas nas las kyi byas na las kyi'o// g.yon pa mgo thod thog sa 'dra dang // g.yas pa mdung thung rtse gsum dang // g.yon pa pad+mo kha 'dzum dang // g.yas pa oM zhes bya bar gas
297b4(rgyud): g.yon pa 'khor lo bde gsum dang // a dang oM gnyis rtse sprad la// lhag ma gsum ni rdo rje can// oM dang hUM gnyis gzhur byas la// lhag ma mnga' byas mda' can gyi'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon
297b5(rgyud): 'khor lor bya// 'od ni nyi ma zla ba'i zhal// thal mo dam sbyar sor mo 'phro// gza' lhag rtag tu se gol gtogs// de nyid tshig dbang gsungs pa ste// mchu la tshig 'byung 'dra bar gzhag
297b6(rgyud): pa wa sangs ni bde ldan pa// spen pa dbyug pa 'dzin par bya// ba lang sna ni chu srin 'dra// shes bya rgyu skar stag 'dra ba// de nyid bskor na glog 'brang gi/ bla 'og bzhag na sprin phyag rgya/
297b7(rgyud): 'di dag ni snying po'i phyag rgya ste/ las kyi phyag rgya'ang 'di dag nyid do// de nyid las srin lag gnyis bcings pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las hUM zhes bya ba tshigs par ma bcag pa ni
298a1(rgyud): dbang bskur ba sbyin par byed pa ste/ nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las hUM zhes bya ba bcings te/ srin lag pad+ma 'dra bar byas pa 'di ni pad+ma las byung ba'i phyag
298a2(rgyud): rgya'od de nyid las hUM zhes bya ba dang / hrI zhes bya ba gnyis gshibs te sgreng ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las pad+mo 'dra bar byas pa ni bde ba chen po'i phyag rgya'o//
298a3(rgyud): de nyid las 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshul du byas pa ni kun tu bzang po'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid nang du bkug pa ni khro bo sna tshogs kyi phyag rgya gzi can no// de nyid las shin tu bsdams pa ni rdo rje bsdams pa'o//
298a4(rgyud): brkyang ba ni gzi can no// hUM zhes bya ba'i so ni gnod sbyin gyi'o// hUM zhes bya ba gnyis lcags kyu byas pa ni 'gugs pa'o// de nyid mdar byas pa ni 'dod pa'o// hUM dang oM zhes bya ba gnyis sbyar ba ni/
298a5(rgyud): dgyes pa'i 'o// de nyid dkyil 'khor lta bur byas pa ni gzi brjid kyi'o// de nyid nor bu 'dra bar byas pa ni rgyal mtshan gyi'o// bskor na bzhad pa'i ste/ de nyid khar bzhag na ni dgyes shing 'dzum
298a6(rgyud): par mdzad pa'i mtshan no// thal mo pad+mo 'dra bar bkug pa ni pad+ma'i'o// A zhes bya ba dang / oM zhes bya ba nang du bkug pa ni ral gri'i phyag rgya'o// gcig la gcig sbyar ba ni 'khor lo'i'o//
298a7(rgyud): ma las oM zhes bya ba gnyis khar bzhag pa ni tshig 'byung ba ste/ mdor na phyag rgya 'di dag ni las thams cad sbyin par byed pa'o// de nyid bsdus mdung sbrul mgor 'gyur// kun tu gnod sbyin mche ba/
298b1(rgyud): 'drang / srin po yo ni khrag 'phrog pa// lag pa bskor ba rlung gi ste// dbyug tor ldan pa gnod sbyin no// bum par bzhag pa nor gyi ste// mthe bong sre mo'i na 'drang bya// mgo ya zod pa nag /
298b2(rgyud): sted b+h+r-ing gi ri ti lag brkyang ba// pi wang g.yon thogs dri ba'i 'o// lag gnyis 'bar ba me 'bar ba// gung mo dbyug 'dra gshin dza'i 'o// rdo la khro dang dbang sgyur ba// mthe'u chung ral gri
298b3(rgyud): mdzub zhags pa// rlung gi phyag rgya rgyal mtshan yin// de la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams// lag las skye ba skyes par 'gyur// lha rnams kun gyi thun mong du// pad+mo'i phyag rgya bkra shis te/
298b4(rgyud): klu rnams shes bya ste ut+pal// de ltar so ni gnod sbyin rnams// srin po rnams kyi mgo tshal pa/ bud med rnams kyi sor bcu bsnol// gza' rnams kyi ni dbyug pa ste// arma dbul ba rgyu skar nam/
298b5(rgyud): de dag kun gyi sems sgrub pa'o// mgo bzod pa khar bzhag pa'i// phyag rgya 'di ni 'phra men ma'i// mgo thod lce yi phyag rgya ni// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma yir bshad// de dag kun kyang thun mong du
298b6(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po bshad par bya// thal mo brkyang bar bshad pa ste// yang na thal mo pad+mor bya// rdo rje khu tshur bcings nas ni// a zhes bya ba lu gu rgyud// d+hu zhes bya ba gnyis bsgreng la// phyag na rdo rje
298b7(rgyud): phyag rgya yin// rdo rje bsdams pa bsdams nas kyang // hUM dang a gnyis gshibs te bsgreng // oM zhes bya ba ngos bcar ba'i// phyag rgya snang ba byed par dgongs// de las a zhes bya ba bcings/
299a1(rgyud): oM zhes bya ba nang du gzhug/ oM zhes bya ba sngon bzhin sbyar// oM dang a dang 'dra bar bya// tAM zhes bya ba gshibs nas ni// A dang oM gnyis lu gu rgyud// lhag ma gshiH/
299a2(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya 'di// bdud rtsi 'khyil par shes par bya// tAM zhes bya ba gshibs na ni// hUM zhes bya ba de bzhin no// de ltar hUM zhes bya ba gshibs// lhag ma 'od zer 'dra bar bya// ta mgrin phyag
299a3(rgyud): rgya gang yin pa// de yang las rnams kun la gsungs// sprin gyi mig dang 'dra bar bshad// mA ma kI yi rdo rje 'dra// dkar mo pad+ma nyid du bshad// ut+pa la ni sgrol mar dgongs// sa sa sa sas/
299a4(rgyud): sasas sa sa sas sasas sa/ bab ba bza ba ba bab pa bababapa bab/ dza dza dzang dzA dza dzA dzadza dza dza dza dzadza/ tratratrat+ta tatatratatratra d+ha tad+hatratratra/ d+hu kA/ d+hu dz+wa pa gli zang rdzing N+Di
299a5(rgyud): kr-i b+haM kaM/ raM k+ShaM saM/ oM bud d+ha lo tsa ne hUM/ oM badz+ra mA ma kI tAM/ oM badz+ra paN+Da re de hi de hi singad d+hi bo d+ha lo ko da ta ra ma pa swA hA/ oM badz+ra tA re tut+tA re hUM hUM ts+tsha sA sA sA swA hA/ zhi ba'i brdung ba/ sham pa ta/ sha ma pa/

299a7(rgyud): g+hung g+hung / g+hung g+hung / g+hung g+hung / g+hung g+hung / g+hung g+hung / g+hung g+hung / g+hung g+hung / g+hung g+hung ka/ dbang gi brdung ba ho d+hu ma ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/
299b1(rgyud): ho d+ha ma/ rbo d+ha ma/ ho d+ha ma/ sho d+ham/ tse d+ham/ tsargya ma/ tse d+ha ma/ mngon spyod kyi brdung ba/ kha tA/ khatra/ kha taM/ kha t+ma/ aN+Da/ Sha traM/ khaH/ khaH/ khaH/ kha tA/ ShaN/ Sha dz+ra/ ShaN+Da/ ShaH/ D+ga/
299b2(rgyud): de nas lha rnams kun dga' nas// phyag na rdo rjer phyag 'tshal te// khro za'i 'khor lo bshad pa'i phyir// gsol ba 'debs pa nyid 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rang gi sru bor te/
299b3(rgyud): sems dpa'i skur zhugs nas gnyis su med par mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i khro bo ma'i rdo rje nyi ma zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs ka nas phyung ngo //
299b4(rgyud): oM badz+ra satwa kro d+ha a na lArka ma hA badz+ra kro d+ha dra ba dra ba/ bi dra ba bi dra ba/ sarba pA ya nA shA ya nA shA ya/ ha ra ha ra pra NA na hUM phaT/ oM trai lok+Sha lo ka kA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM trai lo kya da ma ka hUM phaT/ oM trai lo kya nA sha na d+hu/
299b5(rgyud): phaT/ oM tri b+ha ban d+ha ka hUM phaT/ oM a mr-i te hUM phaT/ oM kA la daN+Da hUM phaT/ oM kA ni d+hu ni hU~M phaT/ oM hrIHhUM phaT/ oM kA la aM ku sha hUM phaT/ oM kA la pA sha hUM phaT/ oM kA la ban d+ha hUM phaT/ oM kA la rAk+Sha sar+b+ba/
299b6(rgyud): badz+rad oM kA la rAk+Sha si hU~M phaT/ oM kA la da Na DI hU~M phaT/ oM kA la rA tri hUM phaT/ de nas dkyil 'khor mi bzad pa// che ba'i mchog ste rtsibs bcu gnyis// lha rdzas 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas dkrigs/
299b7(rgyud): shin tu 'bar zhing che 'bar ba// de nas dkyil 'khor bris nas kyang // rdo rje sems dpa' gzhag par bya// 'jig rten gsum snang la sogs khro bo kun// ma rungs snying khar mnan nas bsdigs
300a1(rgyud): #byed cing // nal ni shin tu 'jigs 'jigs lta// phyag na brgya phrag du mar ldan// sbrul dang mi sdug mgos brgyan la// stag lpags kyi ni slang g.yogs bgos/
300a2(rgyud): rgyu mthogs shing dbu mtha' yas// mgo zod shas gang phyag na thogs// de ltar bris nas phyi rol du// srin mo'i tshogs rnams gzhag par bya// sgo ba rnams ni ji bzhin du// rang gi phyag rgya
300a3(rgyud): lag mtshan can// de nas bdud rtsis gang ba yi// bum pa bcu drug gnag par bya// bdug pa me tog dri ni ma dang // mar me dang ni bro snod dang // kha zas bkang ba'i gtor ma dang // bza'/
300a4(rgyud): dang bca' dang bdud rtsi zhes// mgo zod gang bar gyur pa rnams// dkyil 'khor du ni mang du gzhag/ de na slongab dpon bdag nyid kyang // mgu nas mgo thod phyag rgyas 'jug/ phyag rgya de dang de
300a5(rgyud): yis ni// sha rnams kun gyis dam tshig stsol// de nas 'dod ldan rnyed nas ni// hUM zhes bya bas bsgrub par bya// de nas sngags mkhan sgo sgor yang // de nyid dran byed snyen par byed// de ni

300a7(rgyud): nas mchod de langs nas kyang // tshogs can rdo rje sems dpa' ye// tshul du gnas nas 'byung bar bya// de nas slob ma bsdus nas ni// lag na rin chen thogs te gzhug/ oM badz+ra kroH
300b1(rgyud): sa ma ya dz+ra/ oM badz+ra nAk+Sha sir+b+ba baT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a na lAg sA Ta ra pra tIts+tsha tsu baT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha na ni k+Sha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha pA sha dz+ra phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya ni bI ra hUM paT/ oM brgya /
300b2(rgyud): sa ma ya mA ti kra ma hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ri ti sa ma la a b+hi Shany+tsa hU~M phaT/ 'dis dbang bskur la de bzhin du dbang bskur bar bya'o// de nas de dag gi sgrub pa bshad de/ bdag nyid khro bor snyoms/
300b3(rgyud): zhugs la// de nas snying khar nyi ma bsgom// rang gi chos kyi yi ge las// khros nas yang dang yang 'phro zhing // de gnyis gcig tu bsgom par bya// de nas 'grub 'gyur gzhan du min/
300b4(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal po'i las dngos su// gsod pa yin par bshad mod kyi// zhi dang dbang dang rgyas pa rnams// de dag byed 'gyur gdon mi za// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// khro bo'i
300b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bsgom byas na// gdug pa'i sems can 'dzin byed cing // mdor na dug rims gdon la sogs// de bzhin de dag thams cad ni// thabs la sogs pas 'joms byed pa//
300b6(rgyud): khros nas snying las 'byung 'gyur bar// gsad pa'i las la bsam par bya// khros par gyur pa'i rgod ma'i khas// sha dang khrag rnams 'jib byed cing // de dag 'tsho ba 'phrog byed par/
300b7(rgyud): bsams na nges par rlag par 'gyur// khro bo 'jig rten gsum snang mdzad// zla ba 'dra ba'i dge bsam zhing // 'od zer 'byung ba mang po yis// khyab par gyur par rnam bsams la//
301a1(rgyud): rims dang gdon dang dug la sogs// 'od zer des ni phyung nas kyang // de yi nang rgas gnod pa rnams// zhi bya'i phyir ni ring du dor// de nas hUM gi tshig
301a2(rgyud): bzhag la// rdo rje lta bu'i lus bsam zhing // haM gis 'khor los go char bya// 'od zer chu yis dbang bskur ro// de nas de yis ming smos shing // bzlas pas tshul bzhin
301a3(rgyud): bsam par bya// de nas khung bu gsum la rnam gcig ni// zla ba rgyas shing 'od zer 'phro 'dral// khru lang tsam mam yang na khru do // mi rgyal mog rnams kyis ni gnyis su bsgyur//
301a4(rgyud): de yis rnams rnam par sbyang byas te// 'khor lo'i dkyil na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi// dbus su rdo rje rtsa lngar gyur pa gcig/ 'od zer dkar po 'phreng bskor gzi can gzhag/ phyag rgya'i
301a5(rgyud): tshogs rnams thams cad bri bya ste// rigs brgya la sogs phyag rgya zur phyin cing // rgyal po bzhi yi ji bzhin phyag mtshan rnams// phyogs kyi bdag po rnams kyang phyogs phyogs su//
301a6(rgyud): lha chen la sogs phyag rgya khyab 'jug dang // 'khor lo lta bu nyid du bri bar bya// dri zhim chus bkang mdog 'od dkar gyur la// dkar pos shin tu dkrigs pa'i bum pa brgyad// dkar gsum
301a7(rgyud): gang ba'i gtor ma lha bshos dang // bdug pa mar me me tog rnams kyang gzhag/ mchod pa bya ba'i phyir na bla re dang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan rnga ma la sogs gzhag/ nang re ga pur bcas
301b1(rgyud): pa'i dri zhim pa// tsan dan la sogs pa yis byugs// kha ni shar phyogs bltas te sbyin sreg bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan la 'dug bya 'am// yang na rnal 'byor ldan zhing sems dang /

301b3(rgyud): dang / 'bras chan nas dang gro rnams dang // me tog shin tu dri zhim rnams// ga pur dang ni bsres nas kyang // tsan dan dkar pos bsgos pa dang // 'dab bdun me tog 'bras bu
301b4(rgyud): rnams dad zho dang ldan pa'i yam shing la// de dag khung bu'i khyad par las// rang gi sor gyis gzhal bya zhing // nyi shu rtsa bzhi yan chad mchog/ sor bcu drug ni bar ma ste// tha ma
301b5(rgyud): bcu gnyis nyid du shes// shin tu chung na sor brgyad de// bud shing zho dang ldan pa la// dri chus bskus pa shes par bya// bud shing de las byung ba'i me// sbyar nas dri chus gtor nas/
301b6(rgyud): ni/ pad+ma dkar po zhal 'dra dge/ pad+ma nor bu ril ba thogs// lag na dbyug pa mchog thogs pa// pad+ma dkar po'i stan steng 'dug/ de lta'i me lha bkug nas kyang // arga blangs
301b7(rgyud): te dbul bar bya// de nas zla rgyas dkar po la// bzhugs pa'i 'gro phan spyan drangs te// pad+ma dkar po shar phyogs su// bsams nas steng du gzhag par bya// de nas de ltar bsam
302a1(rgyud): nas kyang // bsgrub bya rtag tu mdun bzhag ste// de yi nyes pa drangs nas ni// shin tu bsrings te sba bar bya// nang bar sngar ni gtsang 'gyur ning // shin tu dri zhim lus
302a2(rgyud): byugs la// bdud rtsi bzhin bsams sbyin srog bya// dam tshig 'di ni 'da' bar dka'// lha rdzas bdud rtsi bro lnga 'di// dang por me lha brtag byas la// khro ba de ni de lus su// spyan drangs nas/
302a3(rgyud): ni bzhugs par bsams// de nas dang po khro bo la// bsreg bya lan gsum dbul bar bya// de nas dkon mchog gsum la gsum// de nas me lha nyid la gsum// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' la/
302a4(rgyud): de nas lha rnams re re la// de nas bgegs la sogs la dbul// de yid 'ong ba'i lha yang rung // de nas dang po khro bo yi// sngags kyis yam shing sbyin par bya// de nas gcig tu bsregs nas kyang //
302a5(rgyud): bdud rtsi sngags kyis btab nas ni// de bzhin sbyin sreg byas 'og tu// brgya stong snyed dam yang na ni// brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du ni// khro bo nyid la dbul bar bya// de yi lus la dbang bskur zhing /
302a6(rgyud): mnyam par bzhag pas bsrungs nas ni// mjug tu mngon par mchod nas ni// lha rnams thams cad gshegs par gsol// 'dis ni ni ba'i las rnams kyang // 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom
302a7(rgyud): med/ ci ste de ni sdig can nam// gal te mnyam par ma bzhag pas// de tshe dngos grub ma gyur na// stong pa nyid du rnam bsgoms la// de nas de bzhin byas nas ni// gdon mi za bar
302b1(rgyud): dngos grub 'gyur// zhi ba'i las so// 'bras bur ldan pa'i nags tshal lam// yang na nags sam rgyal po 'am// rgyal rigs khyim du rgyas pa ni// dga' ba'i sems kyis bya ba ste/
302b2(rgyud): khru do yang na khru bzhi pa'am// de ltar mchog ni khru brgyad de// chu mchog bar ma rnams las gcig/ rgyas pa'i las ni bya ba yin// mdor na hom khung bya ba ni// stegs bu brtsigs te dkyil 'khor/
302b3(rgyud): ni// chung ngu la ni khru brgyad de// bar ma la ni bcu gnyis nyid// mchog la bcu drug yang na ni// nyi shu rtsa bzhir shes par bya// mu khyad sor brgyad bcu drug gam// sum cu gnyis su bya ba

302b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor khor yug tu// gnas pa nyid du bri bar bya// rim gnyis yang na rim bzhi 'am// yang na rim pa brgyad ldan par// der ni sgo ba de dag nyid// phyag rgya'i gzugs su brtag par
303a1(rgyud): byang dbum pa kha dog gser 'dra zhing // dri chus rab tu bkang ba la// rab tu mdzes brgyad bcu gnyis sam// sum cu gnyis sam bcu drug ste// dkri ba'i dang ni
303a2(rgyud): ser po la// kha rgyan yal ga me tog can// dri zhim me tog bdug pa dang // 'phreng ba mar me rgyan rnams dang // rgyal mtshan 'phan la sogs pa dang // bla re gdugs rnams ser pos brgyan//

303a4(rgyud): yid bzhin nor rgyal mtshan// gtso ma gser gyi 'od dang 'dra// de bzhin nyi pra ku be ra// gnod sbyin dang ni dzam+b+ha la// gser gyi char ni rab 'bebs shing // yid kyi 'dod pa skong mdzad la/
303a5(rgyud): mdor na de yi 'od zer gyis// nges par dbang ni bskur bar bsam// de nas rgyal srid 'thob 'gyur na// lus rgyas pa lta smos ci dgos// rgyas par bya phyir de ming nas// smos te brgya phrag brgya/

303a7(rgyud): na/ rdo rje rin chen rin chen mchog/ rin chen dpal dang gzi brjid mchog/ rdo rje bzhang dang rgyal ba yang // rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan nas ni// phyag ni mchog sbyin gnol ba dang // rin chen char
303b1(rgyud): yang 'bebs brtson ning // 'od zer ser 'phro thams cad kyis// de la shin tu khyab byed bsam// dung dang pi wang cang te'u dang // sil snyan gru dang gar mchog gis// mdor na mchod pa byas
303b2(rgyud): nas ni// de yi 'og tu las brtsam mo// khung bu'i khyad par nyid las kyang // yam shing bud shing khyad par dbye// mdzub gang khu tshur bcangs khru gang // chung ngu nyid du bshad pa yin// bar ma
303b3(rgyud): khru dor shes par bya// khru bzhi pa ni mchog yin te// me tog 'bras bur bcas rigs kyi// ya tog ma tog sbrang rtsir gzhug/ 'bru rnams thams cad 'byor pa dang // me tog 'bras bu ser por ldan//
303b4(rgyud): mar dang sbrang rtsi bsres nas ni// phal cher dpal gyi 'bras bur ldan// me lhag ser dang 'dra ba la// phyag bzhi pa ste 'dir de bzhin// pad+ma ga dan bzhugs rnam brgyan pa// spyan drangs bsreg bya sbyin
303b5(rgyud): sreg bya// de yi lus su khro rgyal po// byin can legs par bcug nas ni// sngon bzhin dran byed de zhal du// sbyin sreg yongs su brtag bya ste// 'bum mam nyis 'bum tsam gyis kyang // don ni//
303b6(rgyud): nges par rab tu 'grub// 'bum phrag brgyas ni rgyal srid dam// longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa 'grub// de nas mjug tu 'od zer gyis// de la dbang bskur bsrung bar bya// de nas de ni rgyal 'gyur te/
303b7(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje'i bka' bzhin no// rgyas pa'i las so// dbang ni chags pa'i sems kyis kyang // chags pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bya// chags pa bcom ldan rdo rje can// rdo rje chags
304a1(rgyud): pa de las byung // khams gsum chags par byed pa'i phyir// pad+ma sems dpa' rtag tu chags// de bas 'dis ni de dag ni// las grub par ni bshad pa yin// chags
304a2(rgyud): dang mthun pa'i sa phyogs sam// chags par byed pa'i khyim du shis// btso brag can dam zla mtshan can dag gi/ khyim du chags pa'i las rnams bya ba yin// rdo rje chags pa'i gnas kyang rung // phyag
304a3(rgyud): na pad+ma'i gnas nyid du// rtag tu rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas// bde chen gyi ni gnas chen dang // pad+ma ut+pal rdzing bu dang // ban du ka yi me togs gnas// me tog 'bras bu dmar tshal ni// yid 'ong /
