358a6(rgyud): dmar po/ g.yas pa dang g.yon pa na pad+ma dang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje bdud rtsi ma ni rdo rje 'khyil pa khro bo lta bu nyid do// rdo rje 'od zer khro bo dkar po ngang pa la zhon pa/ g.yas pas rdo rje
358a7(rgyud): 'dzin cing / g.yon pas pad+ma dang zla ba 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje 'od zer ma rdo rje khro bo lta bu'o// rdo rje dbyug pa khro bo rus sbal la zhon pa/ mdog sngon po/ phyag g.yas na rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pas
358b1(rgyud): dbyug pa 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje mchog ma rdo rje dbyug pa khro bo sta bu'o// rdo rje dpar ser khro bo glang po che la zhon pa/ mdog dmar po/ phyag g.yas na rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pas mi bzung nas pa
358b2(rgyud): shing gnas pa'o// rdo rje ska rags ma rdo rje dmar ser khro bo lta bu'o// rdo rje tshogs bdag glang sna glang po che zhon pa can/ phyag g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pas gshol 'dzin cing gnas pa
358b3(rgyud): mdog dkar po'o// rdo rje 'dul ba ma rdo rje glang sna lta bu'o// 'di ni khyad par te/ gang zhe na/ phyag g.yon gyis kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje 'phreng ba tshogs kyi bdag po mdog ljang khu/ bya ku li
358b4(rgyud): ka'i shing rta non pa/ phyag g.yas kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas me tog gi 'phreng ba 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje gdan ma rdo rje 'phreng ba lta bu'o// 'di ni khyad par te/ gang zhe na/ phyag yon gyis shag ti
358b5(rgyud): 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje dbang can ne tso'i shing rta non pa/ mdog dkar ser/ phyag g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o// rdo rje dbang can ma rdo rje dbang can lta bu ste/
358b6(rgyud): 'di ni khyad par ro// gang zhe na/ mdog dmar po'o// rnam rgyal rdo rje tshogs kyi bdag po sbal pa zhon pa/ mdog dkar po'o// phyag g.yas na rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas ral gri 'dzin pa'o//
358b7(rgyud): rdo rje gdengs pa ma nam rgyal rdo rje lta bu'o// rdo rje gtun shing pa nya ma me tog gi shing rta'i khung bu non pa/ mdog dkar ser / phyag g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas gtun shing 'dzin pa'o//
359a1(rgyud): rdo rje gtun shing po nya mo rdo rje gtun shing lta bu ste/ 'di ni khyad par ro// gang zhe na/ g.yon gyis kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje chung gi po nya mdog sngon po ri dgas zhon pa/ phyag gas/
359a2(rgyud): pas rnga rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas ngar 'dzin pa'o// mgyogs pa'i rdo rjemadzo rje chung gi po nya bu'o// rdo rje me'i phonya mo skyes gon pa/ mdog dmar po gyed du 'bar ba'i 'od rtse gsum pa 'bar ba
359a3(rgyud): phyag g.yas pa dgan rdo rje dang go cha 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa dag na dbyug pa dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje 'bar ba ma rdo rje me lta bu'o// rdo rje 'jigs byed po nya sngon po rol ngas son pa/ phyag g.yas pas
359a4(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas rtse gsum 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje gtsigs pa po nya mo rdo rje 'jigs byed lta bu ste/ 'di ni khyad par ro// gang zhe na/ g.yon pas zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje lcags kyu bran kru
359a5(rgyud): lhag pa la zhon pa/ sngon po phag gi gdong pa can/ g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje nag po bran mo ro langs kyi non pa can/ phyag g.yon gyis kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa/
359a6(rgyud): phyag g.yas kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa mdog nag mo/ rdo rje log 'dren bran bra ba byi bzhon bu / mdog dkar po glang po che'i gdong pa can phyag g.yas dag na rdo rje dang dgra sta 'dzin pa/ g.yon dag na rtse gsum
359a7(rgyud): dang dbyug pa 'dzin pa/ sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa'o// rdo rje srul mo bran mo mdog sngon mo/ g.yas na rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa phyags ma 'dzin pa/ za ba byi bzhon pa'o// klu rdo rje'i chu srin la non
359b1(rgyud): pad gdengs ka brgyad pa mdog dkar po/ g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas klu'i nags pa 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje chu srin ma bran mo chu srin la zhon pa// mdog dkar mo/ gdengs ka brgyad ma
359b2(rgyud): g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas rdo rjes mtshan pa'i chu srin 'dzin pa'o// 'jigs mdog ma ljang khu g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pas ral gri pe Ta ka 'dzin pa'o// dpal mo mdog
359b3(rgyud): dkar ser/ g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pas pad+ma 'dzin pa'o// dbyangs can ma mdog dkar mo/ phyag g.yon pa sarba dang / g.yas pas rdo rje ma'o// bgrod dka' mdog ljang khu seng
359b4(rgyud): ge la zhon pa/ phyag g.yas pa dag na rdo rje dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa dag na lde men dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o// ma mo thams cad dang / drag po la sogs pa dang / chu bdag gi mthar thug pa rnam
359b5(rgyud): kyi dang / gang phyag g.yas su rdo rje gsungs pa de ni rdo rje rtse gsum par shes par bya'o// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha thams cad rnam par snang mdzad la mngon du bltas pa'o// de nas thun
359b6(rgyud): mtshams kyi dus su rdo rje ti rin ti ris dag par bcings te/ me tog sngon po'i 'phreng ba bzung la dkyil 'khor du 'jug go// yi ge hUM bzhi pa brjod cing rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad la bskor ba bdun dang / rung
359b7(rgyud): dang dril bu'i sgra bsgrag par bya'o// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi yang lhag pa dang chad pa'i nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i nges par bltas te 'phreng ba bcom ldan 'das la phul nas/ rdo rje'i gar byas la blangs te
360a1(rgyud): yi ge hUM bzhi pa nyid kyis rang gi mgo bor bcing ngo // ji ltar cho ga bzhin du yang // gang zhig chad pa yongs su bskang // mkhas pas lhag pa rnams spang byir// rdo rje dril/
360a2(rgyud): bu kun rtog bya// 'grub 'gyur nyes pa spang mi bya// zhes gsungs so// de nas 'dug par gyur pa yi// rdo rje slob dpon mnyam gzhag pas// rdo rje sgo ni bzhi po rnams// yid kyis dbye bar bya ba nyid/
360a3(rgyud): oM badz+ra u tag+hA Sha yas ma ma rba be shar+dz+dza/ zhes bya'o// phyag rgya'ang 'di yin te/ ngo rje khu tshur gnyis gzhabs te// mdzub mo gan rgyal yang dag bzung // legs par drug tu rnam par bye//
360a4(rgyud): dbye ba mi chog min// zhes pa'o// de nas lcags kyu la sogs pas las rnams byas la/ rin po che bdun las byas pa 'am/ sa las byas pa'i bum pa nag po la sogs pa med pa/ mgrin pa ring ba/
360a5(rgyud): mchu 'brang ba/ lto ba che ba/ lha rdzas kyi dri'i chu dang / rin po che dang / sman thams cad dang / 'bru thams cad kyis yongs su rdzogs pa/ yal 'dab dang bcas pa/ mgrin pa la gos dam pas
360a6(rgyud): sas bsru ba la ba gyu sa bsgyings su byugs pa/ me tog gi 'byung ba btags pa 'dangs snyed du na / na pas byin gyis brdabs pa/ tha za
360a7(rgyud): ris mangs su bzung ba'i dzi rje dang me tog gi yal 'dab kyis/ oM badz+ra u da ka hU~M/ zhes bya ba 'di stong rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa'i yi ge nu bzhi pa brgyartsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas la
360b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rngon tsu mdzad kyi spyan sngar legs par gzhag go// 'dug pa'i sgrol mngon par phyogs par phyi rol du bum pa gnyis pa la yi ge chubazhi pa brtsam brlang bzlas pa gzhag go// de'i dus bdas/
360b2(rgyud): nyid dang slob ma dbang bskur ba bya ste/ gzhug pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas sam bcings pa'ang ngo // byA ru de bzhin sa le sbram// dung dang de bzhin nor bu ni// rin chen kun te sing ba dang // byA g+h+r-i gau ri be be re/
360b3(rgyud): sman kun til dang sran ma sha/ 'bras dang gro ni lnga pa ste// sman lnga 'bru kun sgras mtshon pa'o// de'i rjes la phyag bzhi la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i sdom pa 'dzin du bcug nas/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gos
360b4(rgyud): sngon po la'ang yongs su bzlas te/ sems dpa'i gtsug tor gyis sgo skyong gi gdong bcings pa dang / rdo rje go chas stong g.yogs dang / gtsug tor la sogs pa can gyi slob dpon gyis khro bo ti rin
360b5(rgyud): ti ris me tog sngon po'i 'phreng ba bzung nas/ oM badz+ra sa ma yaM pra be shA mi/ zhes brjod cing zhugs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba gdab ste/ bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs
360b6(rgyud): pas so// de nas rdo rje'i chu 'thungs nas bdag nyid 'jug par byas la/ 'phreng ba de dkyil 'khor chen por dor la rang rang gi mgo la bcings te gdong bcings pa bkrol la/ ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil
360b7(rgyud): 'khor la bltas te/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra/ zhes pa la sogs pas gzhug pa'i phyag rgya dgrol ba'ang byas la/ chu'i dbang bsrung ba dang / sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang / dar dbyangs dang / rdo rje dang /
361a1(rgyud): 'phreng ba dang / bdag po la sogs pas dbang bskur ba dgu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas blangs pa de kho na nyid dang // chos dang /
361a2(rgyud): dam tshig dang / dngos grub dang / rdo rje brtul zhugs kyang bzang la/ me tog la sogs pas kyang bdag nyid legs par mchod de tshigs su bcad pa lnga pas rjes su gnang ba dang / yi ge hUM gis
361a3(rgyud): gzengs pastod pa dang / lung bstan pa'ang spos la/ slar yang byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa byas la/ ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i bzlas pa yang ste/ hUM kA ra badz+ra tsU/ zhes pa'o//
361a4(rgyud): rang gi mtshan brjod par bya yis/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la/ de'i sngags a'i rnam pa'i mtha' can gyi rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i bdag nyid
361a5(rgyud): dbab bo// padzo \u0f85/ zhes bya ba rdo rje'i nga rgyal rnam par bsgoms la de rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad du bsgoms te/ badz+ra d+hA tu a haM ra zhes pa'o// de ltar rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi phyag rgya chen po
361a6(rgyud): bcings la byang gi sgor de'i sngags aH'i rnam pa'i mtha' can gyi rnam par snang mdzad kyi rdo rje rdo rje dril bu'i bdag nyid dbab pa'o// badz+ra g+haN+Do&haM/ zhes pa'i nga rgyal bskyed la/ de badz+ra A be sha
361a7(rgyud): kro d+ho&haM zhes bsgom mo// de lta bus rdo rjes bsgrubs pa yin no// de nas yang rdo rje slob dpon gyis sems dpa' rdo rje lcags kyus bcings la se gol legs par gtog pa byed cing sangs
361b1(rgyud): rgyas thams cad 'dus par bya ste/ oM badz+ra sa mA dza dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rab tu brjod do// de nas myur du phyag rgya chen po dang rdo rje khro bo'i dam tshig brjod do// de ma thag tu mtshan
361b2(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad pa mchog go// de nas rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas rang gi sgo nas spyan drangs la bcug ste bcings nas dbang du byas la/ ji lta ba bzhin du yi ge hUM bzhi pas mchod yon phul te/ dpal
361b3(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams dang / bskal pa bzang po'i mthar thug pa rnams bsgrubs te rang gi sngags brjod pa ji lta bur brjod cing / dzaHhUM baM hoHsa ma ya s+t+waM sa ma
361b4(rgyud): ya s+t+waM a haM/ de nas rang gi sngags brjod do// de lta bus 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams dbyung ste/ rdo rje las gsang dam pa byung // dam tshig mchog rnams nyid du grags
361b5(rgyud): khro bo'i bcing ba bla med pa// de rnams bcing bar rab bshad bya// lag par rdo rje kun tu bsnol// mthe'u chung lcags kyu bcing ba nyid// mdzub mo dag ni rab tu brkyang // 'jig rten gsum po rnam rgyal
361b6(rgyud): zhes da/ de bzhin mdzub mo kha spad cing // nor bu nyid ni bar ma bskum// bsnams la dbu ma pad+ma nyid// gung mo mdzub mo gnyis sdigs mdzub// sdigs mdzub gnyis ni rdo rje yang // g.yas
361b7(rgyud): pa bkug pa lcags kyu'o// de dag nyid sbyar yi ge hUM// legs pa'i rnam pa de bzhin yang // mdzub gnyis logs gnas khro gnyer du// snying khar nyi ma mdzub gnyis zum// lag pa mgo bor rab
362a1(rgyud): tu brkyang // mdzub mo kha ru dgod pa can// mdzub mo sen mo kun tu rig/ g.yas pa mdzod kyi khu tshur yang // gung mo'i mgo bcas 'khor lo nyid// kha las rab
362a2(rgyud): mchog 'thon pa yi// mdzub mo dbu ma rdo rje yang // mdzub mo mgrin pa bskor ba dang // mdzub mo lhag ma mche ba che// rdo rje khu tshur mthe bong bsdams// sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams pa ni rdo rje
362a3(rgyud): dbyings su bshad pa bzhin du bya ba 'di lta ste/ rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas su// snying khar yang na mthe bong bskams// legs par rab brkyang 'phreng ba ma// thal mo sbyar mchog kha nas dbyung /
362a4(rgyud): gar las spyi bor thal mo sbyar// rdo rje bsda mas pa thur du sbyin// thal mo legs sbyar gyen du gtor// mthe bong bsnyams te nges par bsdams// rab tu brkyang ba byugs pa yi// mdzub mo gcig ni
362a5(rgyud): bkug pa dang // mthe bong gnyis ni mdud pa bcings// mthe bong mdzub mo bsnol ba bcing // rdo rje khu tshur mchog bsdams nyid// ces pa'o// snying po'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje rtse lnga pa rnam pa
362a6(rgyud): bsams la hUM gi rnam pa nyid brjod cing phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar bya'o// de nas phyag rgya'i nges par 'byung ba ste/ rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya ni rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje hUM mdzad// rin chen hUM mdzad// cho
362a7(rgyud): hUM mdzad ga las kyi hUM mdzad kyi gnas su'ang ngo // de nas rin chen hUM mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyi sngags rnams 'byung ste/ oM badz+ra b+hi ku Ti kro d+ha A na ya sarba rat+na ni hrIHhUM phaTaH/ oM badz+ra hUHSh+Ti kro d+ha du tra mA ra
362b1(rgyud): ya hUM phaT/ yo ba dza bi shwa kro d+ha ku ru sarba bi shwa ru pa yA pa d+ha ya hUM paT/ phyag rgya gnan rnams ni sems dpa' rdo rje ma nas brtsams par blta'o// de nyid kyi phyir rig pa thams cad kyi mchog rnams kyi rnam par
362b2(rgyud): rgyal ba'i sngags su bshad do// rdo rje hUM mdzad dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya bsdu bas yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM mdzad klog par bya'o// gzhan rnams rdo rje hUM mdzad du 'gyur ba rigs pa'ang ma yin te/
362b3(rgyud): rgyud thams cad du hUM mdzad nges par bstan pa'ang ma yin no// de'i rjes su de kho na bzhin lce la rdo rje bkod de rim pa bzhin du sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa'i chos kyi yi ge rnams dgod do// de rnams
362b4(rgyud): kyang da hUM yig sangs rgyas rdo rje can// tAM yig rdo rje'i snying po yi// hrIHyig rnam pa rdo rje'i de'i// aHyig rdo rje sna tshogs kyi// hUM sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i/ tAM rin chen rdo rje ma'i/ hrIHchos kyi rdo
362b5(rgyud): ma'i aHlas kyi rdo rje ma'i/ hUM hUM/ tAM tI/ hrIHhrIH/ aHaHzhes bya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa dga' ba chen po la hUM/ gzugs mdzes pa la hU~M/ rna ba bde ba la hUM/ mchod pa
362b6(rgyud): thams cad la hUM/ rab tu dga' ba la hUM/ dbus su bgrod pa la hUMleg sa par gzi mchog la hUM/ dri bzang mchog la hUM/ a pi hi dza hUM.a hi hUM hUM hUM/ he s+pho Ta baM hUM/ g+haN+Da a aH
362b7(rgyud): rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thugs pa rnams kyi'o// de ma thag tu I yi ge las snying khar sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed pa las kyi phyag rgya bcing ngo // de la khro bo'i khu tshur rnam pa
363a1(rgyud): gnyis byas la g.yon pa'i rdo rje sen mo g.yas pas gzung zhing bsgreng ba byang chub mchog ces bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rab tu ster ro// gnyis po de dag gis/
363a2(rgyud): bgying ba dang bcas pas gsal bar byed pa ni rdo rje hUM mdzad dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang / sems dpa' rdo rje ma rnams kyi'o// lcags kyu 'dzin par yang dag gnas// mda' gsor ba yi sbyor ba dang //
363a3(rgyud): legs so zhes bya snying khar gnas// rdo rje gnyis nyid dbang bskur ba// rin chen hUM mdzad dang / rdo rje khro gnyer dang / khro bo dang / rin chen rdo rje ma rnams kyi'o// snying khar nyi ma rab tu blta/
363a4(rgyud): g.yon gnas lag ngar dbyug pa dang // de bzhin 'di ni yongs su bzlog/ g.yas dang g.yas min rnam par bsnol/ chos kyi hUM mdzad dang / rdo rje chos dang / chos kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi'o// snying khar
363a5(rgyud): nyi ma la ral gri'o// mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba nyid// rdo rje gnyis ni khar gnas shing // rdo rje'i gar ni bkrol bas ni// 'gram pa spyi gtsug yang dag gnas// las kyi hUM mdzad dang / rdo rje las/
363a6(rgyud): dang las kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi'o// go cha mthe'u chung mche ba mchog/ khu tshur gnyis ni nges par bcing // rdo rje 'gyings pa'i rab sbyor bas/ bsam pa g.yos pas mdud par bya// 'phreng ba bcings te kha
363a7(rgyud): nas dbyung // gar las spyi bor thal mo sbyar// 'og tu 'phyang dang gyen du 'thor// mthe bong bskams te nges par gshibs// dri byug pa yi sbyor ba las// mchod pa'i phyag rgya rab tu grags// mdzub sa//
363b1(rgyud): lcags kyu bcings pa yis// mthe'u chung las ni lcags kyu che// mkhrig ma mdud pa mchog dag bsnol// rgyab dag kyang ni nges par gshibs// nes sgo skyong rnams kyi phyag rgya'o// las kyi phyag rgya thams/
363b2(rgyud): cad kyang gar las 'byung ba yin no// de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyi bcing bar bya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rin chen dang / chos dang / las kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi'ang ste/ rdo rje dang po
363b3(rgyud): dang / mthar gnas pa'i skyes pa dang / bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin pa de rnams kyi bdag nyid chen po gang dang gang gi phyag rgya gang dang gang yin pa rnams bcing ngo // thams cad kyi phyag rgya dam tshig phyag rgya'ang
363b4(rgyud): yin te/ g.yon pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gan brgyal du byas la lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo dang / mthe bong dag dang / mthe'u chung nas brtsams te kha phye ba'i thal mo kha sbyar ba'o// 'di ni bya mas
363b5(rgyud): pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// de rnams kyi rig pa ni sngar bshad pa nyid de/ de rnams kyi rig pa ljags rnams la dgod do// 'di ni de rnams kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'o// yi ge a las rang gi thugs kar
363b6(rgyud): chotsho gas rdo rje bskyed la/ de rnams 'dri bya'i phyir rjes su 'brangs nas phyag rgya chen po bcings pa ni las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro// rang gi thugs kar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la bri bya'i rjes su 'brangs pa nyid
363b7(rgyud): las de rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing ngo // de nyid kyis yang rig pa'i thun mong ba'o// mthe'u chung dang mthe bong bcings nas kyang g.yon pa'i sor mo dbus ma gsum po rtse gsum pa la dbus ma rtse mo'ang /
364a1(rgyud): #rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su bzung zhing rdo rje'i rig pa mchog 'din rdo rje'i dpal zhes grags so// de nas gzhan ni rab bshang bya// sgyu ma rdo rje tshogs ming can// rdo rje bsdams pa/
364a2(rgyud): brtan byas la// g.yon pa rdo rje yang bcings bya// rdo rje khu tshur zhes grags pa// rdo rje'i rigs rnams kun la 'di// rdo rje rnam gnyis dang yang byas// mtshan ma thams cad bkod pa ni// rdo rje'i rigs
364a3(rgyud): ni thams cad kyi// phyag rgya rnams ni'ang dgod par bya// mdun dang rgyab gnas rab tu brkyang // mthe bong rgan po 'dzin pa chos// oM gyi rnam pa spyi bor gnas// rdo rje shugs kyis rab tu gnas/
364a4(rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal po 'am phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs so// lag pa'i mdun nyid rab tu brkyang // lag pa'i mdun yang de bzhin du// lag pa gnyis kyang khu tshur gnas// kha las yongs su bskor ba nyid/
364a5(rgyud): rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so// g.yon pa'i mthe bong legs gnas kyang // 'phreng ba 'dzin pa nges rgyal nyid// g.yas pas nor ni sbyin pa dang // ral gri'i phyag rgya khu tshur son// tshogs kyi bdag po
364a6(rgyud): chen po'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so// g.yas pas gshol ni bzung ba dang // de bzhin lag pa rab tu brkyang // g.yas pa 'bar ba kun tu ston// rdo rje khu tshur rab tu 'dar// pho nya chen po'i phyag rgya'i
364a7(rgyud): tshogs so// bsnyems bcas kha dang mche ba rtse// byugs pas 'joms pa rab tu sbyor// lag ngar bskum pa sbyar ba dang // rdo rje g.yas pa 'phrog ma'o// bran gyi phyag rgya'i tshogs so//
364b1(rgyud): nas u ma la sogs pam mo'i tshigs kyi phyag rgya 'byung ste/ g.yon pa rdo rje bsdams pa yis// rtse gsum mtshan ma bcing bar bya// 'di bcings pa yis yang dag pa'i// dngos grub rig pa/
364b2(rgyud): mchog rab cing // rdo rje'i rigs rnams thams cad kyi// g.yon pa rdo rje mchog bsrungs pa// cho ga ji bzhin dam tshig gi/ phyag rgya bcing bar rab bshad bya// 'khor lo thams cad mchog kun
364b3(rgyud): bsdamad de bzhin bu yi phyag rgya dang // oM yig phyag rgya'ang de bzhin nyid// yi ge na can yongs su gzung // phyag rgya mdzes pa can dang ni// 'bar ba yongs su gzung ba nyid// 'od zer bsdus
364b4(rgyud): pa kho na yang // dbyug pa khu tshur bzung ba nyid// kha las yongs su bskor ba dang // khro bo'i dam tshig gdengs ka yis// phyag rgya 'phreng ba rdo rje bcings// ming med spyi bor gnas pa nyid// rtsi tra/
364b5(rgyud): can dkyil 'khor bzhin du bza'// 'od can rtsibs can dam tshig rnams// lag ngar bskum zhing kha phyogs dang / rgyab nas yongs su bskor ba nyid// 'od bar 'bar ba grol ba dang // mdun du dul
364b6(rgyud): bar gnas pa nyid// pho nya'i dam tshig rnams so// gnyis mthar zhugs pa rtse mo sbyar// bcings pa nyid dang rab ltung byed// lag ngar bsnol dang ma bsnol dang // de bzhin stobs ni 'brog pa'o// /
364b7(rgyud): bran mo rnams kyi dam tshig yin no// de nas lha chen po la sogs pa'i sngags rnams la sngags bkod la/ yi ge a las rang gi snying khar de bzhin du rdo rje bskyed pa de rnams kyi phyag rgya bcings te las kyi
365a1(rgyud): phyag rgyar 'gyur ro// rang gi snying bar rdo rje rtse lnga ba bsgoms la phyag rgya chen po bri bya'i rjes su 'brangs te bcing bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang /
365a2(rgyud): bskal pa bzang po pa dang / phyi rol rdo rje'i rigs rnams la rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ma/ dpal rdo rje hU~M mdzad la sogs sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang / 'phreng ba dang / dar dbyangs kyis dbang
365a3(rgyud): bskur bas dbang bskur ro// de nas mchod yon phul la mchod pa bya'o// de nas rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi bum pa sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can rdo rje la sogs pa rang gi mtshan mas mtshan pa// rnam
365a4(rgyud): par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa rnams phyir dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du dgod par bya'o// bum pa gang rnams dang gos zung 'bum dang / stong phrag bcu dang / stong
365a5(rgyud): dang brgya 'am/ re re la re re 'am gathun mong ba'am/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bra re dang / zur bzhir rnam par bkra ba'i ba dan bcings pa'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kya
365a6(rgyud): yi ge oM dang / dpal rdo rje hUM mdzad yongs su bzlas la badza s+pha ra Na khaM Ta zhes pa 'dis lha thams cad la nges par dbul lo// me tog gi shing brgya dang bzhi 'am/ ljon shing rnams dang /
365a7(rgyud): me tog thams cad la rdo rje me'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa dang / oM badz+ra puSh+pe hUM/ zhes pas me tog gi phyag rgya mngon par bsngag go// dri thams cad dang / ngang zhim pa rnams dang / dri ma med pa'i dri bzang/
365b1(rgyud): po rnams la de kho na bzhin du rdo rje me dang / oM badza gan d+he d+hu ka zhes pa 'di dri'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas so// ga pur dang / a ka ru dang du ru ka dang / tsan dan la sogs pa legs par bsreg la//
365b2(rgyud): de kho na bzhin du rdo rje me dang / oM badz+ra d+hU be dz+ra ka zhes pa 'dis bdug pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas pog por 'bum dang / stong phrag bcu dang / stong dang / brgya'am/ ji ltang rnyed pa la'o// rlon
365b3(rgyud): ma 'bum dang / stong phrag bcu dang / stong dang / brgya 'am// sgron ma thams cad sgron ma'i sdong bu 'bar ba dang ldan pa'i slong bu stong dang / bcu 'am/ bcu gcig la de kho na bzhin du me dang /
365b4(rgyud): me dang / oM badz+ra A lo ki hU~M/ zhes pa 'di mar me'i phyag rgya dang ldan pas yongs su bzlas la/ oM s+pha ra Na ba~M/ shes pa brjod cing dbul bar bya'o// gtor ma'i che bar spyod pa 'bum dang / stong
365b5(rgyud): phrag bcu dang / stong dang / brgya 'am/ bcu'i grangs sam/ bkri shis can dang por bya ste/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bza' ba rnams la de bzhin du rdo rje me yongs su bzlas te/ a kA ro mu khaM sarba
365b6(rgyud): d+harmA NAM Ad+ya nuta pan+na tAd/ ces pa brjod cing dbul bar bya'o// rol mo bcu dang / stong dang / stong phrag bcu dang / rol mo 'bum yang rung ba la yi ge hUM dang / rol mo'i phyag rgya rdo rje khu tshur dag/
365b7(rgyud): gi lag pa'i sor mo rnams kyis rol mo'i stang stabs rnam pa bcu bzhi 'di lta ste/ pi wa nga dang / gling bu dang / dza mu ra dza dang / dza mu kun da dang / 'khar dza dang / rnga b+hi ri dang / rnga pa Ta ha dang /
366a1(rgyud): dza kun dza dang / dza ti mi la'i stang stabs so// rol mo dang / zos gang dang / gar dang / na rgyan dang / cod pan la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyang yi ge oM gyis
366a2(rgyud): mngon par bsngags te'o// de bzhin du dar dbyangs 'byang bar bya zhing me tog gi 'phreng ba dang / rnga yab kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang / dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas spras pa dang / zla ba phyed pas nye bar
366a3(rgyud): mdzes pa dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / ba lang dang / shing rta rnams 'bul te/ brtags pa dang bcas pa yang ngo // rta babs nyams dga' ba'i dril bu dang bcas pa rnams kyang / badz+ra s+pha ra/
366a4(rgyud): Na khaM zhes pa 'dis so// oM badz+ra satwa su saM gra ha ta/ badz+ra ratra ma nut+ta raM/ badz+ra d+ham gA ya bai/ badz+ra karma ka ro d+b+ha be zhes brjod cing gar byas la/ rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa rnam
366a5(rgyud): pa brgyad po rnams kyis khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis dang ldan pa'i las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod par bya'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas mdzub mo gnyis rab tu brkyang ba khro
366a6(rgyud): bo'i khu tshur gnyis yin no// slar rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du bshad pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcu drug pa rnams kyis kyang legs par mchod la/ khro bo'i rigs thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya ste/
366a7(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi don du dngos grub thams cad 'grub par mdzad du gsol zhes pa'o// de nas phyi rol gyi mchod pa dbul te/ sgrub pa'i grogs mchog dkyil 'khor du bzhag la/ 'bras
366b1(rgyud): mo sa bcas shing til dang bcas// chu bcas zas bcas me tog bcas// sran chan bcas shing snum 'khur la// sogs pa'i bza' ba rnams la ni// yang a kA ro mu khaM/ zhes pa la
366b2(rgyud): sogs bzlas nas shar phyogs kyi cha nas brtsams te gsum gsum gtor bar byas te/ dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / mchod yon rnams kyang thog ma dang tha mar dbul
366b3(rgyud): bar bya'o// de la dang po re zhig mjal rnams byed du gzhug par bya'o// de nas spyan drang ngo // de nas dam tshig bstan no// de nas mchod yon yang phul te dri la sogs pas legs par mchod la
366b4(rgyud): gtor ma dbul lo// de nas gshegs su gsol lo// de la sngags dang phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/ shar phyogs su kha bltas te g.yas brkyang gi gom pas 'dug cing lag pa g.yon pas rdo
366b5(rgyud): bstan la g.yas pa dku'i phyogs su bzhag ste g.yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus spyan drang ngo // de'i mdzub mo lcags kyu dang bral ba ni brgya byin gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// g.yon brkyang gi gom
366b6(rgyud): pas 'dug la spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nas de'i sngags ni/ na mo badz+ra s+ya di shi di shi badz+ra pA Ni rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ me'i phyogs su
366b7(rgyud): bltas te lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo zlum po'i rnam par bkug ste gung mo bsgreng ba'i tshigs gsum par btsugs la mthe bong lag mthil du bzhag pa ni me lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// spyan drang
367a1(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya las mthe bong ma dzub mo'i gzhogs la bstan pa ni meSh+Tha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// brag d+ha de nyid lag pa'i dbus su mngon du phyogs te gcig tu sbyar ba ni gsheH/
367a2(rgyud): su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// de'i sngags ni/ a g+na ye hi/ oM hi ka bI la dz+wa la dz+wa la ha ha shi khi ti la bi rU pAk+Sha swA hA/ gshin rjer bltas te lag pa mdun du phyogs par byas la nang du rdo rje bsdams
367a3(rgyud): pa'i dbus su mthe bong gnyis dang phyi ru ming med gnyis sbyar zhing bsgreng ste slar nang du bzung ba ni gshin rje spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// srin lag gnyis kyang phyi rol tu gzhi bas te bsgrengs pa
367a4(rgyud): snying khar bzung ba ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las srin lag sbyar ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// de'i sngags ni sa mA ya swA hA/ bden bral du bltas te mnyam pa'i gom pas
367a5(rgyud): 'dug la lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa mdzub mo dang gung mo bkug ste gzung zhing gri'i rnam par bzhag la/ lag pa g.yon pa sta zur phyogs su g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bkug nas bzhag pa ni bden
367a6(rgyud): bral spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid lag pa g.yon pa sta zur phyogs su gnas par ral gri'i phyag rgya ni bden bral gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni
367a7(rgyud): gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// de'i sngags ni/ sarba b+hU ta b+ha yaM ka ra ku ru ku ru swAhA/ chu lha'i phyogs su mnyam pa'i gom pas 'dug la lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur bcangs nas mthe bong dang
367b1(rgyud): mdzub mo gcig tu sbyar te g.yon pa'i khu tshur snying khang ba zhag la g.yon pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus spyan drang ba ni chu bdag spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de cing g.yon pa'i mdzub mo khu chur la m+b+har te
367b2(rgyud): bzung ba zhags pa'i phyag rgya chu bdag gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// de'i sngags ni/ tr-i tri su Da tri tri shaM khe to l-i bi rU
367b3(rgyud): pAk+Sha swAhA/ rlung lha'i phyogs su bltas te 'dug pa g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs te gung mo bsgreng ba tshigs gsum par mdzub mo bkug pa'i rtse mo btsugs la mngon du phyogs te brkyang ngo // lag pa g.yas
367b4(rgyud): pa'ang de bzhin du byas te sta bur logs su bzhag cing mthe bos bskul ba ni rlung lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid mthe bong snga ma bzhin du bzhag pa ni chung lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i
367b5(rgyud): phyag rgya las mthe bong brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// sngags ni/ oM sA sa khA kha khu kha swAhA/ ku be ra la mngon du bltas te 'dug nas lag pa gnyis kha sbyar la rdo rje bcing ba nang du byas
367b6(rgyud): la mthe'u chung gnyis gshibs te bkyang / de'i rgyab tu srin lag gnyis sa sor bzhag nas gung mo dag bsgreng ba rdo rje'i mdud pa bya ba ni ku be ra s+phar drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid kyis gung mo gnyis nang du/
367b7(rgyud): rdo rje gung mo bcing ba'i sbyor bas bzhag pa ni ku be ra 'idam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las gung mo gnyis brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// de'i sngags ni/ oM ku be rma sa sA
368a1(rgyud): dbang ldan gyi phyogs su bltas te 'dug la lag pa dag gcig tu sbyar te thal mo sbyar ba bya ste/ srin lag dang mthe'u chung lag mthil du rdo rje bcing ba byas te mthe bong zung dag gzhan la/
368a2(rgyud): brten cing nang du bkug ste bsnol la/ gung mo gshibs te bsgreng ba'i rgyab tu mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje'i rnam par bzhag la de nyid bkug ste steng du phan tshun sen mo spang bar bya ba ni dbang ldan spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o//
368a3(rgyud): de nyid kyi mdzub mo sngar bzhin rdo rje'i rnam par bzung ba ni dbang ldan gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// sngags ni/ dzu du
368a4(rgyud): shi ba swA hA/ g.yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas 'dug la lag pa thal mo khong stong du sbyar te bzhag la steng du bltas te mdzub mo gnyis kyi lcags kyu ni tshangs pa la sogs pa spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid kyi mdzu
368a5(rgyud): mo gnyis snga ma ltar bzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// de rnams kyi sngags ni/ U ra d+hi buh+ma Ne swA hA/ sUr+ya graH/
368a6(rgyud): a d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ oM tsan+da nak+Sha tra a d+hi pa ta ye sA \u0f7f/ mnyam pa'i gom pa'i gnas pas 'dug la lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar ba te sor mo'i rtse mo rnams par mtshams med par phan tshur sbyar te mthe bong drum
368a7(rgyud): bor byas la/ 'og tu bltas te sa'i lha mo la sogs pa mdzub mo lcags kyus spyan drang ba ni 'og gi lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las sngar bzhin du mdzub mo dag bzhag pa ni dam tshig
368b1(rgyud): gi phyag rgya'o// mdzub mo dag brkyang ba ni gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya'o// sngags rnams ni/ a rdo bri thi b+hi swA hA/ a su re b+hA swA hA nA ge b+h+yaHswAhA/ de nas rang gi sngags kyis thams cad la
368b2(rgyud): 'thor 'thung bul la/ bdag dang slob ma'i tshogs su bcas pa la bgegs med par mdzod cig/ las kyi dngos grub kyang bdag la stsol cig ces brjod la thams cad gshegs su gsol lo//
368b3(rgyud): yang na dpung babang gi chen du gsungs pa'i tshogs bcad rnams kyis gtor ma dbul te/ lha dang lha min gnod sbyir lto 'phye grul// nam mkha' lding dang 'dab bapang lus srul po// dri ba srin po
368b4(rgyud): gdon gyi tshogs rnams dang // gang dus la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can// bu smang bcas shing g.yog 'khor bcas pa la// bdag gi pus mo sa stengs 'dir btsugs nas// thal mo sbyar nas khyed lagam
368b5(rgyud): 'debs kyis// gsan nas phan gdags srang du 'dir spyod cig/ 'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang // dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yi gnas rnams dang // shar nub ri dang ni tha'i khyim gnas dang /
368b6(rgyud): ri bo kun la gang dag gnas pa dang // chu bo kun dang chu bo'i mdo rnams dang // rin chen gnas na lhag par gnas pa dang // mtsho dang rdzing bu lteng ka chu ngogs dang // g.ya' chu sil ma can dang khron par
368b7(rgyud): gnas// grong dang phyugs lhas grong khyer stong pa dang // khang stong dang ni lha'i khang par yang // gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten gnas dag dang // dka' thub gnas dang grang chen bres dang ni// rgyal
369a1(rgyud): dkor khang dag na gang gnas dang // lam srang bzhi mdo dag dang sum mdo dang // gang dag lam po che dang shing gcig drung // dur khrod chen po nags tshal chen po dang /
369a2(rgyud): seng ge dred dang gcan gzan gnas dag dang // 'brog chen 'jigs su rung bar gang gnas dang // gang dag gling mchog dag na gnas pa dang // lhun po dur khrod dag na gang gnas rnams// dgyes shing
369a3(rgyud): mgu bas 'phreng ba byug pa dri// bdug pa gtor ma mar me bstod pa 'dis// gus 'bul snoms mdzod gsol mdzod 'thung mdzod cig/ las 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// de ltar gdon
369a4(rgyud): la mchod byas nas// rtse gcig yid kyis phyogs skyong mchod par bya// dbang po rdo rje can gyi lha tshogs 'khor dang bcas// gtor ma khyad 'phags 'di dag bzhes su gsol// me dang gshin rje bden/
369a5(rgyud): bral srin po'i bdag/ chu bdag rlung bdag nor gyi bdag po dang / dbang ldan lha ste 'byung po'i bdag po dang // steng gi nyi zla tshangs pa chen po dang // lha rnams kun dang sa yi klu rnams gang /
369a6(rgyud): ri yi lha dang gsang ba'i tshogs 'dus rnams// dpung bcas sde bcas bu dang bshes gnyen bcas// rang gi skye ba'i tshogs shing mnyes pa rnams// so sor sa so'i thugs dgongs gcig mdzad
369a7(rgyud): nas dan rang rang phyogs su legs par byed nas ni// rang gi bu spang mdza' bshes gnyen 'dun dang / nang mi dmag dang dpung bcas thabs cig tu// me tog dri dang byug pa mar me dang /
369b1(rgyud): zhal bas gtor ma 'di dag pazhes nas kyang // gsol mdzod snyoms mdzod legs par 'thung mdzod cig/ las 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// de la 'di ni byi dang nang thams cad du
369b2(rgyud): gtor ma rab tu dbul ba'i sngags te/ a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harma NAM A d+ya nu ta ba na na tA ta ces pa'o// de nas nye reg bya ste shar sgor mngon par phyogs te gnas pa la/ las thams cad pa'i thab khung
369b3(rgyud): gi dbus su dpal 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyi sngags brjod cing / me tog dmar po nges par bkod la sbyin sreg gi cho gas dpal rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi
369b4(rgyud): sngags kyis ba'i mar gyis sreg blugs brgya rtsa brgyang dbul lo// dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sngags rdo rje 'bebs pa khro bo'i mthar thug par yang sreg blugs bdun bdun slar yang
369b5(rgyud): ngongo// de nas ji lta ba bzhin du thab khung gi rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams me tog kho nas spyan drangs la/ rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sngags kyis bris pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang gi
369b6(rgyud): gnas su dgod do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas la bdag ming che ge zhes bgyi ba'i// rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// slob ma
369b7(rgyud): rnams ni gzhug par bgyi// 'dir yang dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa la snod dang snod ma yin pa brtag par mi bya ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sems can kha cig ni rdzig
370a1(rgyud): pa chen po bgyid pa de rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di mthong steng zhugs nas ngan song thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das nor dang / bza' ba
370a2(rgyud): dang / btung ba dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la chags pa dang / dam tshig las mi 'da' ba dang / sngar spyod pa la sogs pa 'dod cing mi nus pa'i sems can dag mchis te/ de dag kyang
370a3(rgyud): 'dir ji ltar bya bar 'dod pa bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das sems can kha cig ni gar dang / glu dang / gad mo dang / rtsed mo dang /
370a4(rgyud): kha zas la spyod pa la dga' ba nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po chos nyid khong du ma chud pas lha'i rigs dang dkyil 'khor gzhan du 'jug par 'gyur gyi de bzhin du rigs
370a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor re ba thams cad yang dag par rdzogs par 'gyur ba bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs pa rnams 'byung bar mdzad pa der ni bslab pa'i gnas la 'jigs shing
370a6(rgyud): skrag nas mi 'jug pa dag kyang mchis te/ ngan song gi dkyil 'khor gyi lam du ji ltar gnas pa'i bde ba'i bdag nyid kyi gnas skabs can de dag kyang dga' ba dang / mgu ba dam pa dang / bde ba dang /
370a7(rgyud): yid bde ba myong bar bgyi ba dang / ngan song gi rgyud thams cad du 'jug par kha bltas pa'i lam las bzlog par bgyi ba'i slad du rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug tu rung ngo // bcom ldan 'das chos
370b1(rgyud): ldan gyi sems can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dam pa 'grub pa'i thabs kyis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tshol ba na/ bsam gtan dang rnam
370b2(rgyud): bar thar pa la sogs pa dang / sa rnams la 'bad pas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba dag kyang mchis te/ de dag kyang rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du zhugs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa nyid
370b3(rgyud): thams cad kyang rnyed par dka' ba'ang ma lags na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci 'tshal zhes gsol bar bya'o// de nas slob ma gzhug par bya'o// de la bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yongs su bzung ba'i dge
370b4(rgyud): bsnyen nam/ dge sbyong ngam/ dge slong gi sdom pa yongs su bzung zhing slob dpon du dbang bskur bar 'os pa/ slob dpon gyi zhabs dag la phyag byas te 'di skad ces brjod de/ bdag gi ston pa dag
370b5(rgyud): chen khyod// byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa// mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo// dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol// byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol// skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag
370b6(rgyud): la sgo la// zhes pa'o// de nas slob ma la rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i gos dmar po'i stod g.yogs spang g.yogs dang / rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sgo skyong bzhi bzlas pa'i gdong
370b7(rgyud): g.yogs bcing bar byas la phyag bzhi byed du gzhug go// yang lag na me tog thogs pa'i slob mas slob dpon la phyag byas la/ lag na me tog thogs pa nyid kyis bshags pa dang / rdzas su yi rang /
371a1(rgyud): ba dang / bskul ba dang / gsol ba gdab pa byas la 'di skad ces brjod do// gtso bo bdag la sdom pa stsol// thub pa'i nyi ma ma lus pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams ni
371a2(rgyud): bdag la dgongs// bdag ming che ge zhes bgyi ba// slob dpon dbang du gnas pa la// sangs rgyas rol mo 'byung ba yi// phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun can// thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog/
371a3(rgyud): gsang ba chen por 'jug par bgyi'o// gsang ba thams cad rigs bsdus pa// slob dpon bdag ni 'jug par mdzod// phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur ba// skal ba chen po bdag la stsol/
371a4(rgyud): mtshan rnams rjes su gsol btab pa// dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan// sangs rgyas sku ni yid 'ong ba// slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol// dbang bskur ba ni rmad byung che// sems can
371a5(rgyud): kun gyi don bgyid phyir// bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon gyur// slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol// de nas slob dpon gyi rigs thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ che ge zhes bya 'di nyid ni//
371a6(rgyud): byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin pa// gsang ba yi ni 'khor lo 'di // 'jug cing byang chub sdom pa 'tshal// de nas slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod do// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun
371a7(rgyud): te// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song // 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i// dam tshig sdom pa brtan por gyur// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang / blo gros chen po khyod kyis zung // byang chub
371b1(rgyud): sems gang de rngo ma/ shes rab dril bu zhes bshad do// slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar gyis// bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// 'di ni rdo rje rigs dag pa'i// sdom pa dam tshig yin pa /
371b2(rgyud): gsungs// rin chen rigs ni bsdus pa ni// nyin mo gsum dang mtshan mo gsum// zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams// sbyin pa rnam pa ni rab sbyin bya// phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum
371b3(rgyud): dam chos khyod kyis gzung bar bya// 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs dag pa'i// dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs// las chen rigs ni bsdus pa la// sdom pa gsum po yang dag ldan// mchod
371b4(rgyud): ba'i las kyang ci nus bzhin// yang dag nyid du nges gapung gyis// de las gzhan pa bzhi po yang // 'di dag pas bam par ni bshad// mi spang dor bar yang mi bya// rtsa ba'i ltung bar 'di bshad
371b5(rgyud): do// nyin mo gsum dang mtshan gsum du// nyin re zhing ni brjod par bya// gang tshe nyams na rnal 'byor pa// ltung ba sbom po dag tu 'gyur// khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya// ma byin par
371b6(rgyud): yang mi brang ngo // 'dod pa log par mi spyad cing // brdzun yang smra bar mi bya'o// phung krol kun gyi rtsa ba yi// chang ni btung ba rnam par spang // sems can gdul phyir ma gtogs pa/ bya ba sa
371b7(rgyud): yin thams cad spang // dam pa'i drung du gnas bya zhing // rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen bkur bya// lus kyi las ni rnam pa gsum// ngag gi rnam pa bzhi rnams dang // yid kyi rnam pa gsun dag ni/
372a1(rgyud): ci nus pas ni rjes su bskyang // theg pa dman la dga' mi bya// sems can don la rgyab phyogs min// 'khor ba dag kyang yong mi spang // rtag tu mya ngan 'das mi chags//
372a2(rgyud): lha dang lha min gsang ba pa// khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya zhing // phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang // mtshan ma 'gom par yang mi bya// 'di dag dam tshig ces bshad do// de dag ni/ blo gros khye
372a3(rgyud): kyis bsrung bar bya// des kyang 'di skad brjod par bya// slob dpon khyod ni bdag la gson// gtso bo ji ltar bka' bsgo ba// de ltar bdag ni bgyid par 'tshal// ji ltar dus gsum mgon
372a4(rgyud): po rnams// byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i// zhes pa nas/ sems can mya ngan 'das la 'god// ces bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o// gang zhig sdom pa mi 'dzin pa de la ni gzhug pa tsam
372a5(rgyud): sbyin par bya zhing / deng khyod bya ba la sogs pa brjod par mi bya ste/ slob dpon du dbang bskur ba'ang mi bya'o// de na sa/ oM sarba yog tsit+taM u da pA da yA mi zhes pa 'dis/ byang chub
372a6(rgyud): sems ni bla na med// dam pa bdag gis bsgred par bgyi// de yi snying khar snying pos ni// rdo rje rab tu gzhag par bya// sur ta sa ma ya s+t+waM hoH/ badz+ra sid+ha ya thA su khaM / zhes pa 'dis so//
372a7(rgyud): de nas rdo rje hUM mdzad du byin gyis brlabs la dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod de me tog gi 'phreng ba gdags shing / gdong dri zhim pos byugs la yon gyi mchog bzung ste/ phyi rol na gnas pa la bum pa
372b1(rgyud): chus dbang bskur la/ oM gr-ihA badz+ra sa ma ya dzA rba/ zhes pa 'dis khro ba ta rin ti ri rang nyid bcings la slob ma 'ching du gtsug go// rdo rje bsdams pa nang byas la// mthe bong rdo rje dam po yis// yang /
372b2(rgyud): kyis khro bas dga' bya bas// khro bo ti rin ti ri dran// de nas de nyid kyi mthe bong dag gis me tog gi 'phreng ba 'dzin du bcug la snying po 'dis gzhug par bya ste/ badza sa ma yaM pra ti shA mi/ zhes pa'o/
372b3(rgyud): shar gyi sgor yang rdo rje lcags kyus de dgug cing lhor zhags pas gzhug go// nub tu lcags sgrog gis bcing zhing / byang du rdo rje 'bebs pas dbab bo// yang shar gyi sgo nas de bzhin du bcug la
372b4(rgyud): 'di skad ces brjod do// deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rigs kyis deng nas ngas khyod la rdo rje'i ye shes bskyed par bya/ ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos
372b5(rgyud): grub kyang thob par 'gyur na/ dngos grub gzhan rnams lta ci smos/ khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi mdun du smra bar mi bya'o// khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re// de nas rdo rje slob dpon rang
372b6(rgyud): nyid khro bo ti rin ti ri kha gyen du blta ba dang bcas pas bcings la/ rdo rje slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag ste 'di skad ces smras te/ 'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje yin te/ gal te khyed 'ga' zhig la smras na spyi bo
372b7(rgyud): 'gems par 'gyur ro// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang / mna'i snying po lan cig bzlas pa'i chu rdo rje slob ma de 'thung du gzhug go// de la mna'i snying po 'di yin te/ rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi/
373a1(rgyud): snying la yang dag zhugs par mdzod// gal te tshul 'di smras na ni// de ma thag tu dral te gshegs// badz+ra ud ka ThaH zhes bya'o// de nas slob ma la 'di skad ces smra'o//
373a2(rgyud): deng nas brtsams nas khyod kyi phyag na rdo rjeng yin gyis/ ngas 'di gyis shig ces gang bsgo ba de bya dgos so// khyod yang bam spangs par dus kyi bya ba byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes pa'o//
373a3(rgyud): de'i rjes la rang gi snying khar yi ge a rdo rje'i 'od zer gyi 'phreng ba dang ldan par bsam mo// de nas slob ma'i snying kha dang mdzod spu dang / mgrin pa dang / spyi bo rnams su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas
373a4(rgyud): pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / sna tshogs rdo rje bsams te/ oM trAM hrIHaHzhes pa 'di dag gis go rims bzhin du'o// sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgyas rang dang slob ma'i snying la
373a5(rgyud): phye la da rang gi snying kha'i yi ge yaM las yi ge byung la/ slob ma'i snying khar gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su thos bcug la lus thams cad gang bar bsam mo// 'di skad ces brjod do// de bzhin gshegs pa
373a6(rgyud): thams cad kyis kyang byin gyis rlobs la rdo rje sems dpa' ba dag la dbab tu gsol zhes smos shig/ de nas myur du rdo rje slob dpon gyis khro bo ti rin ti ri bcings la 'di skad brjod par bya ste/ 'di ste/
373a7(rgyud): dam tshig rdo rje yin// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar grags// rdo rje ye shes bla na med// khyod la de nyid 'bab gyur cig badz+ra A be sha a zhes pa bcu dang nyi gu dang / sum cu dang bzhi bcu dang /
373b1(rgyud): lnga bcu dang / drug cu dang / bdun cu dang / brgyad cu dang / dgu bcu dang / lan brgyar brjod de nges par 'bab par 'gyur ro// de nas rdo rje'i khu tshur bcings la sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya dral bar bya zhing /
373b2(rgyud): 'di dag brjod de/ oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hU~M/ gr-ih+Na grad+hA hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hU~M/ A na ya ho b+ha ga bA na badz+ra na dza hUM phaT aHaHaHaHaHbcu dang / nyi shu dang sum cu dang bzhi bcu dang /
373b3(rgyud): lnga bcu dang / drug cu dang / bdun cu dang / brgyad cu dang dgu bcu dang / lan brgyar brjod par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdo rje rlung gi dkyil 'khor la rdo rje hUM gi rnam pa'i 'od zer gyi mdog
373b4(rgyud): dmar po 'bar ba gang bzhin par bsam mo// slar yang gal te 'bab par ma gyur na/ de'i tshe dril bu dang bcas pas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la rkang pa g.yon pas de'i rkang pa mnan/
373b5(rgyud): la steng gi nam mkha'i phyogs su rnam par snang mdzad dpal rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi steng du de nyid la dbab pa'i phyir khro bo hUM gi rnam pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis mnar bzhin pa dang / 'og nas kyang rdo rje rlung gi/
373b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang / hUM gi rnam pas gdeg bzhin pa dang / de bzhin du shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su bzhugs pa'i mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rnams kyis/ hUM trAM hrIHaH/ zhes bya ba rang gi sa bon gyi 'od
373b7(rgyud): zer gyi tshogs kyis yang dag par 'bebs par mdzad par bsam zhing de la dbab ste/ hUM badz+ra A be sha ya aH/ zhes rnam pa brgyar brjod par bya'o// gal te sdig pa mang ba nyid kyis 'bab par ma gyur na/
374a1(rgyud): de'i tshe sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgyas de'i sdig pa rnams yang dang yang du dral bar bya'o// yam shing 'dzag ma rnams kyi me// rab 'bar rdo rje khro bo yi// mnyam par bzhags
374a2(rgyud): pas dbul ba yis// de yi sdig pa thams cad ni// til gyi sbyin sreg des nges sreg/ oM sarba pA paM da ha na badz+ra ya swAhA/ zhes bya ba dang / lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil du til nag po las sdig pa'i gsu
374a3(rgyud): brnyan byas la/ yi ge hUM dbus su bsams te/ mdzub mo dang mthe bong dag gis sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas sbyin sreg gi thab khung las 'byung ba'i 'bar ba'i 'breng ba kun tu 'khrugs pa'i rdo rje rnams kyis
374a4(rgyud): de'i lus la sdig pa sreg bzhin par bsams la/ de nas yang rdo rje babs pa de kho na bzhin du bcings la dbab par bya ste/ nges par 'bebs par 'gyur ro// de lta bus kyang gang la bab par mgyur pa
374a5(rgyud): de la dbang bskur bar mi bya'o// babs na skad cig ma de nyid de'i mngon par shes pa lnga la sogs par rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de nas yang dag par babs par shes nas yang / oM badz+ra satwa su saM gra ha ta
374a6(rgyud): zhes pa la sogs pa'i glu brjod la khro bo'i khu tshur dang de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje me'i phyag rgya dral bar bya'o// de babs na rdo rje sems dpa' khro ba'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o// de'i tshe slob dpon gyis rdo
374a7(rgyud): rje khu tshur khro bo'i phyag rgyas bcing bar bya'o// de bzhin du ji srid du gyur na de'i tshe rdo rje banang pa'i phyag rgya bcing ngo // de'i tshe rdo rje chos khro bo'i phyag rgya bcing ngo // de lta bus nye bar byon cing dgongs par 'gyur ro//
374b1(rgyud): de nas de'i lce la rdo rje bsams te/ bru hi badz+ra/ zhes pa brjod do// de nas thams cad smra bar 'gyur// de nas 'phreng ba de dkyil 'khor chen por dor te/ pra ti ts+tsha ho / zhes bya'o// de nas gang du
374b2(rgyud): babs pa de 'dis 'grub bo// de nas/ oM pra ti gr-ih+Na tAM i maM satwa ma hA ba la zhes bya bas 'phreng ba de nyid kyi mgo bor bcing ngo // de nas da oMHde ring rdo rje sems dpa' rang // khyod kyi mig ni ba byed
374b3(rgyud): bar brtson// rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med// thams cad mig ni bye bar 'gyur// he badz+ra pa gya/ rgas pa 'dis gdong g.yogs dgrol lo// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams kyi
374b4(rgyud): srid rnam par snang mdzad kyi mthar thug par bstan no// de nas/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra/ zhes pa la sogs pas slob ma'i snying khar gzhug pa'i phyag rgya dgrol lo// de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor du'am/ phyi rol
374b5(rgyud): du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shar sgrol mngon par phyogs pa legs par bris la/ slob ma dpal rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya sems ma rdo rje ma la sogs pas kyang byin gyis brlabs la/ phyag rgya chen po de la bzhag ste/
374b6(rgyud): dbang bskur ro// dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod yon dbul/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pa dang / dung dang / rol mo la sogs pa'i sgra bsgrags pa dang / de nas bkra/
374b7(rgyud): shis kyi tshogs bcad rnams kyis mngon par dga' bas dang po zhig chu'i dbang bskur ba dang / cod pan dang / dang dbyangs dang / rdo rje dang / bdag po dang / ming gis dbang bsrung ba dag gis rab
375a1(rgyud): bskur la/ yang me tog la sogs pa dang / sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa brgyad kyis mchod do// slob ma rnams kyis rdo rje thal mo sbyar bas slob dpon la rab tu
375a2(rgyud): btud la/ man gyi mchog phul la me tog la sogs pa'i dbang bsrur ba'ang gzung bar bya'o// slob dpon gyis dbang bskur ba ni dpal dze rje dzu mdzad kyi phyag rgyas de khon bzhin du ji ltar nges par bstan
375a3(rgyud): pa'i gnas su bzhag la/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis de'i lus la dpal rdo rje hUM mdzad la sogs pa bkod de slar yang / oM badz+ra a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi dri D+ho me b+ha ba dzaHhUM ba~M hoHhUM phaTag ces
375a4(rgyud): pa 'di rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la brgya rtsa brgyad dam stong yongs su bzlas pa byas la/ de nas/ oM badz+ra a b+hi Shany+tsa zhes pa 'di brjod cing rdo rje khu tshur gyis rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa nas chu blangs
375a5(rgyud): nas chu'i dbang bskur ba sbyin no// 'di yang brjod de/ 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed// dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni// rdo rje bdud ci'i chus 'grub bo//
375a6(rgyud): rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang // dkyil 'khor can min na mi sba// skye bo 'dus pa gnas pa ni/ rgod dang ma dad pal med// de nas cho ga thams cad nyams su blangs la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas legs par
375a7(rgyud): bstod de/ tshigs bcad lngas rjes su gnang ba byin nas/ gzengs bstod pa dang lung bstan pas slob ma thams cad lung bstan no// de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba 'byung ste/ slob dpon du dbang bsu
375b1(rgyud): bar 'os pa dkyil 'khor thams cad du bcug pa de ltar mdzod cig ces bya'o// 'di yi las kyi dngos grub ni// ji ltar 'dong ba'i dngos grub kyang / pha ma 'bring dang mchog rnams ni/ ma lus
375b2(rgyud): nges par 'thob par 'gyur// mchog gi sa rnams bgegs med 'grub// dngos grub phran tshegs slar ci shig/ sangs rgyas nyid kyang sems can nyid// rdo rje sems nyid rnyed mi dka'// gang la
375b3(rgyud): dngos grub nges 'byung dang // gang la sdig pa gdon chen dang // bgegs dang log 'dren rnams dang yang // 'chi bdag dang ni bdud sde rnams// 'jigs pa sna tshogs bstan bcos no// dngos grub
375b4(rgyud): las 'joms de dag ni// bdag nyid chen po de la ni// mi 'byung skye bar mi 'gyur ro// sbyin sreg las kyi cho ga yis// nges par dngos grub myur rab 'byung // lha rnams kyang ni cher mnyes shing //
375b5(rgyud): skad cig gis kyang rab rnyed 'gyur// yams dang nyer 'tshe skyon la sogs// ches kyi nges par ring du 'gyur// de yi yul du nang dang gdon// rims la sogs pa mi 'byung zhing // mu ge ca co cha
375b6(rgyud): rnams dang / pha rol dmag tshogs nyams par 'gyur// lha dang klu rnams spro chen gyis// bde bar yang ni skyong bar 'gyur// rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams dang // 'jig rten skyong ba rgyu skar ba#
375b7(rgyud): gnod sbyin rnams dang gza' la sogs// rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams kyis skyong // de nas brgya byin la sogs lhas// yang dang yang du phyag btsal nas// rin chen gdugs sogs mchog rnams ni//
376a1(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs mchod byas te// phyag na rdo rje rgyal dbang la// dag pa'i bsam pas yang dag bstod// sangs rgyas kun pas sngar sangs rgyas// mi shes dri ma kun
376a2(rgyud): bcom pa// rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// rdo rje rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje'i sku ste sku che ba// phyag na rdo rje phyag 'tshal 'dud// rdo rje yan lag rdo rje mchog/ rdo rje 'bar ba che 'bar ba// rdo rje shugs
376a3(rgyud): te shugs che ba// rdo rje mtshon cha rdo rje che// phyag na rdo rje phyag chen po// rdo rje mnga' ste rab 'bigs pa// rdo rje rnon po rnon po che// che ba'i che ba rgya mtsho che// rdo rje pad+ma byang chub che// byang chub
376a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas rang byung ba// rdo rje rgya chen rgya chen che// rdo rje sgyu ma rnam sbyong ba// rdo rje rgyu ste gnod sbyin che// rdo rje pad+ma rnam sbyong ba// rdo rje khro bo gtum po che// rdo rje dgra sdang 'joms pa'i gtso//
376a5(rgyud): rdo rje 'jigs byed srung ba che// rdo rje lcags kyu don yod byed// rdo rje ro langs ro langs che// rdo rje srin po za ba po// rdo rje gnod sbyin gnod sbyin che// rdo rje gdon te gdon gyi mchog/ 'jigs/
376a6(rgyud): rung skrag byed ma rungs pa// drag po 'jigs byed rngam byed pa// sgrub dka' sgrub pa legs pa ste// rdo rje legs pa dgyes mdzad pa// rdo rje dga' ba dga' ba che// dga' ba'i rdo rje dbang
376a7(rgyud): byed pa// rdo rje gzi brjid gzi brjid che// 'bar 'od gshin rje mthar byed pa// rdo rje drag po drag po che// 'od 'thug pa ni 'thug pa ste// nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa yi// re ba thams cad/
376b1(rgyud): rdzogs mdzad pa// rdo rje dbang bskur rin chen mchog/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan yon tan mtsho// rdo rje ye shes ye shes che// rig pa bye ba'i tshogs kyis mchod// ha la ha la nag po che// sgra che
376b2(rgyud): rnam par sgeg pa po// rdo rje 'dod pa 'dod pa che// snyigs ma'i rnyog ma 'joms pa po// dus kyi g.yo ba gcod pa'i mchog/ zhal ni ljags kyi glog 'phro ma// rdo rje me ste rab tu gtum// gtum
376b3(rgyud): pa'i rab snang 'joms pa bo// nyi ma stong gi 'od zer zhal// spyan dmar 'jigs par mdzad pa po// khro bo du ma'i 'od 'phro ba// phyag ni du ma'i mtshon cha brgya// du ma'i zhal te sku yang stong /
376b4(rgyud): 'khyil cing sku yang 'khyil ba lags// thugs chos bdag nyid sku mi mnga'// rnam par rtog pa ma lus spangs// ma rig 'joms pa tshangs pa ste// 'dod chags zhe sdang dri mthar mdzad// sku
376b5(rgyud): ma khyab 'jug rdo rje can// mdung can rtse gsum 'chang 'phrog byed// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che// srid dang srid min rnam sbyong ba// zhi zhing dul la dag pa che// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas
376b6(rgyud): rab rtogs mdzad// sangs rgyas bdag nyid sangs rgyas sku// rdo rje lags skyes rdo rje sems// kun tu bzang po cher bzang ba// mtshan rnams kun gyis mtshan pa po// khams kun bdag nyid
376b7(rgyud): khyab pa po// thams cad rdo rje'i bdag nyid gtsang // gang gis 'di bris klog pa dang // rtag tu don ni 'chang byed dam// dran namanyan par byed kyang rung // phyag na rdo rje mnyam par 'gyur//
377a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i 'khor dang bcas pa'i lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri ba dang /
377a2(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / srin po la sogs pa phan pa dang bde ba thob pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' 'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
377a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa phyogs gcig pa rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma je btsun chen po re ben dra de ba
377a4(rgyud): zhabs dang / bla ma paN chen skyes bu chen po mA Ni ka shrI dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas gus par mnyan te/ chag lo tsa ba shAkya'i dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ spre'u la
377a5(rgyud): dbyug gu zla ba'i mar ngo'i tshes bcu gsum la/ gtsug lag khang chen po dpal zang po cher dbu btsugs nas/ smin drug zla ba'i yar ngo'i tshes bcu gnyis kyi snga dro'i bar zhag bco lngar 'gro ba'i tshe dpal
377a6(rgyud): 'dren gyi lha'i sdings su tshar bar bgyis so// dpal ldan rgyung rgyal ngan song sbyong ba yi// brtag pa phyogs gcig sngar grags kha che nas// chos rgyal sku drin pa Na chen sgra bsgyur mchog/ skyes chen
377a7(rgyud): nams kyis legs par dang bar mdzad// 'di ni dpal ldan kun dga'i snying po dang // je btsun 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pa si// man ngag la brten rgya gar bal po ni// yongs grags tham 'i
377b1(rgyud): drin las kho bos bsgyur// sgra gzhung bla ma'i gsungs bzhin du// gus bsgyur nongs pa mkhas chen rnams/ bzod mdzod de dges 'gro ba kun// 'gro mgon thub chen nyid gyur cig/ bkra shis
377b2(rgyud): bar gyur cig @rgya gar skad du / se k+She ba pra tiSh+Tha bi d+hi tan+da/ bod skad du/ rab tu gnas pa mdor bsdus pa'i cho ga'i rgyud/ dpal rdo rje sems
377b3(rgyud): dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
377b4(rgyud): brdungs pa dang / bris pa dang / 'bur du byas pa la sogs pa'i rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga gsungs pa/ slob dpon de nyid bcu shes shing // mtshan nyid kun dang yang dag ldan// phyag rgya sngags dang cho ga shes/
377b5(rgyud): las rnams kun la mkhas pas so// sku gzugs mtshan nyid ldan pa ste// ni ba la sogs ro yis ldan// tshad kyis tshad la phab cing bzang // de 'dra rab tu gnas par 'gyur// yang thog mchod rten sogs
377b6(rgyud): gnas dang // khyim dang lha'i gnas rnams su// sangs rgyas la sogs rab gnas ni// cho ga dag dang ldan pas bya// cho ga dman pas mi bya ste// rab gnas rtag par bkra mi shis// 'jig rten
377b7(rgyud): 'dir yang sdug bsngal la// 'jig rten pha rol 'jigs pa che// de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis// dngos grub 'dod pas nan tan bya// cho ga bdag nyid nus pa yis// brtag pa las gsungs tshul
378a1(rgyud): legs pas// de byas bsod nams che ba ni// mthong dang mi mthong rnams su skye// sku gzugs sngags kyi mtshan nyid kyis// de la byin rlabs 'jug par 'gyur// gang du/
378a2(rgyud): sku gzugs rdzogs pa la/ byin ma brlabs par ring gnas na// de la bkra mi shis 'gyur zhing // de srid mchod par de mi 'os/ dper na skyes bu la la zhig/ rig pa'i mtshan nyid spangs pa na/
378a3(rgyud): 'jig rten kun gyis mchod mi byed// de de bzhin du gzugs brnyan de// rab gnas ma byas gzugs brnyan la// gang gis mchod cing phyag byed pa// dam tshig bral zhing sngags dman pas// sbyin
378a4(rgyud): sreg thal ba 'bras med mtshungs// de bzhin du yang sngags gnas pas// chos ldan mchod pa byed pa gang // de yi las kyi rnam smin gyis// skye ba ru ni mchod par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' rnams
378a5(rgyud): kyi sa gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rab tu mi gnas pa lags na/ ji ltar na rgyal ba rnams kyis rab tu gnas pa lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kun ni rab

378a7(rgyud): pa'i don du dpyang ba na// gang zhig gang gis gang du brlag/ gzong ma nas ni skye med pa// ci 'dras ji ltar rab tu gnas// dang po'i las can sems can rnams// rtogs pa'i rgyu ru bshad par zad /
378b1(rgyud): dang por re zhig yongs su brtag pa'i gnas yongs su sbyangs pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bla re dang / ba dan bsgreng ba rnams su mchog tu gsol ba 'debs pas/ gsol ba btab
378b2(rgyud): pa'i bla ma spos dang me tog la sogs pa dang ldan pas tshes dang rgyu skar shis pa la slob dpon legs par mnyam par bzhag pas rab tu gnas pa'i sar 'khod de/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems

378b6(rgyud): la legs gnas pas// zhabs bsil me tog spos sogs ldan// rnam par mi rtog sems kyis ni// mchod yon rnams ni phul byas la// mnyam par bzhag pas sngags 'di yis// lan
378b7(rgyud): gsum bar du brjod par bya'o// oM sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma pa haM/ ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad ni// dga' ldan du ni gnas pa ni// lha mo sgyu 'phrul lhums zhugs ltar// de bzhi/
379a1(rgyud): gzugs brnyan 'dir zhugs shig/ 'di ru mgon po rtag bzhugs nas// byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang // 'di zhes bya ba'i don skad du// bdag gi 'byor pa nyid kyis/
379a2(rgyud): ni/ ci 'byor pa yi mchod pa rnams// me tog la sogs 'di bzhes shig/ bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la// rjes su brtse bas dgongs su gsol// kun gyis 'di la byin brlabs shing /
379a3(rgyud): de nyid du ni bzhugs par rigs// sku gzugs sta gon legs byas la// de nas brtag pa mnyam par brtsam// slob ma sbyang bar gnas pa yis// de ltar thams cad dpyad byas la// sngags
379a4(rgyud): pas mchod pa'i cho ga sogs// bla ma yis ni gang bsgo ga/ ma 'tshogs pa kun bsgrub par bya// mchod yon 'bras bu chen por 'gyur// de nas sngags pas snyan gsan dpab// ga dan la ba
379a5(rgyud): byas mchod yon dang // mchod pa spos dang me tog dang // de bzhin du ni mar me dang // sngags dang ldan pas dbul bar bya// sku gzugs mdun du phyogs byas la// na bza' ser pos g.yogs
379a6(rgyud): bya zhing // de nas sngags pas 'du bya ba// khyad par du ni bdug par bya// de nas grub phyir de la ni// de la lan cig gtor bya ba// de nas de la sngags 'di ni// me dang de nas chu la ni// oM sarba pa
379a7(rgyud): pa da ha na badz+rA ya swA hA ka zhes bya bas so// de nas rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i// don bzhin du ni bsgom bya ste// de nas gsum gnas rnams su bstim// oM hUM aHyi ge gsum/ oM yig spyi
379b1(rgyud): bor bstim bya zhing // snying khar cu gi yi ger 'gyur// ngag gi phyogs su AHyig go// sku gsung thugs ni bsgrub par bya// yang na/ gang gis bon gang yin pa/ de 'i thugs kar de dgod do/
379b2(rgyud): phyag rgya sngags kyis rab bskul zhing // ci rigs par ni snyan gsan dpag// gser ram dngul lam bzangs ma'am// rdo nga de bzhin shing dang ni// yang na shing lo'o 'dab ma rnams// mchod yon/
379b3(rgyud): ni sbyar bar bya// de bzhin bum pa gser la sogs// bangs ma'i snod kyi mchod yon ni// mchod yon snod la rab tu shis// gal te nus pas ma rnyed na// ji ltar rnyed pas kun tu bya// de nas de mi
379b4(rgyud): til mar sogs// dur ba'i bon gyi pir gyis spyang // bkra shis rnga la sogs pa'i sgras// na chung rnams kyis de bzhin brjod// til mar la sogs pa'i sngags ni// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bi sho
379b5(rgyud): na ni swA hA/ bum pa lnga'am yang na brgyad/ can dan la sogs rnams kyis byugs// sna tshogs dri chus dgang ba dang // 'khar lo byas la mngon par bsngags// bu mos bkal ba'i srang bu'am/
379b6(rgyud): yang na gso ma'i skud pa'ang rung // tshon chen po yis bsgyur byas la// de la sngags kyis dkri bar bya// sman lnga rin chen lnga dang ni// me tog 'bras bur ldan pa ste// sku gsum pa dang yungs kar ldan/
379b7(rgyud): bum pa mngon par bsngags par bya// gtsug tor nam rgyal zhes bya ba// gzi brjid gzhan gyis mi badzi dang // bkra shis ni rnams sngags kyis ni// khrus kyi ched du mngon par bsngags// 'jam
380a1(rgyud): pa'i til mar ngag dang ni// u dum pa ra'i lcug ma bzang // mkhar ba'i snod kyi nang dag tu// bkod la rab tu dbul bar bya// dri lha yis ni de nas byugs// sa bon lnga ni
380a2(rgyud): gtor bar bya// slob ma tshogs dang bcas pa yi// sngags kyi gtsang sbras bkru bar bya// bkra shis zhes bya yid 'ong ba'i// blo dang ldan pas tshigs bcad brjod// rig ma spyan pa ji bzhin du// cho ga
380a3(rgyud): bzhin du mngon dbang bskur// sngags ni/ ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni// lha yi chu ni dag pa yis// de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ltar// de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsol lo// zhes bya
380a4(rgyud): pa la sogs pas so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka ta sa ma ya shrI hUM/ lugs ma la ni dngos su bkru// ri mo rnams ni me long la'o// dag byed lngas ni sngon du bsgo// dur ba yis ni med par bya// ras
380a5(rgyud): sam lag pa dag gis ni// blo dang ldan pas sku lus phyi// gur ku ma mar dang bcas pa bsku// gos bzang dag kyang sku la gsol// blo dang ldan pas sngags 'di yis// dkyil 'khor dbus su
380a6(rgyud): bzhugs su gsol// oM d+hi badz+ra bA sa se swAhA/ oM badz+ra gar+b+he swA hA/ oM badz+ra A ba ra Na ba su Sha Ne swA hA/ blo ldan gyis rang dam tshig bskul// phyag rgya sngags kyis dbang bskur la// ji ltar 'os par mngon/
380a7(rgyud): dbang bskur// oM hUM aM dz+riM khaM/ de ltar cod pan bcing ba byas la bzhugs su gsol te/ brtag pa las gsungs pa'i tshul gyis so// mdun gyi phyogs ni ma nub cing // yo ba min ning drang ba yis/
380b1(rgyud): de ltar sku gzugs mdzes par dgod// de ltar min na skyon 'byung 'gyur// me tog sogs dang de bzhin dri// mar me na bza' sogs sbyor gang // de kun sngags dang ldan pa yis// lha rnams la ni
380b2(rgyud): dbul bar bya// oM badz+ra puSh+pe AHhUMzhes bya ba 'di dag la sogs pas so// mchog gi me tog 'di dag ni// chu dang thang las de bzhin skyes// mchog tu dad pas khyed la 'bul// ci bde bar ni so sor/
380b3(rgyud): ba zhesadad lhan cig skyes dang sbyar las byung // mchog gi bdug pa 'di dag ni// bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyis// ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol// lhan cig skyes dang sbyar las byung // mchog
380b4(rgyud): tu gyur par dri 'di ni// mchog gi dad pas 'bul lags kyis// ci bde bar ni so sor ba zhes// mun pa 'joms byed snang ba'i mchog/ mar dang til gyi mar me 'di// yang dag ye shes spyan dbye byib/
380b5(rgyud): dad pas bdag gis 'bul bar bgyi// bza' dang bca' ba phun sum tshogs// kha dog dri ro rnams dang ldan// thams cad ldan pa lha yi bshos// bdag gis dbul gyis so sor bzhes// de la
380b6(rgyud): sogs pa gang yang rung // cung zad ci 'byor sku gzugs la// de dag thams cad 'di nyid kyis// rim pa yis ni dbul bar bya// sngags kyi gtsang sbra tsA ru bya// der ni gser gyi rang bzhin gyi// thur mra
380b7(rgyud): sma na ni dbye bar bya// zhal zas der dbul blo ldan pas// oM tsak+ShuHsa man+ta tsak+Shu ra bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ oM d+hi bya a ne sa mA d+ha d+hA na prI Na me sA hA/ de ltar byas te de nas yang // slob ma rab tu bcug byas la/
381a1(rgyud): khyod kyis ngal gang gsol ba'i// sku gzugs dag ni khyad par du// ji ltar gsungs par rab gnas par// de dag don ni ngas byas te// de rnams don ni grub zin gyis// ci ba/
381a2(rgyud): bar ni mchod par byos// de nas dam tshig dbang bskur bas// khyod la byas kyi sa sreg blugs ni// stong ngam yang na de yi phyed// mngar gsum btags la 'bru rnams kyis// 'o ma can gyi bud shing la// sreg/
381a3(rgyud): khung gru bzhir sreg thugs bya// de nyid mar dang 'o ma yis// lhag pa'i tsA ru phul byas pas// bdag dang slob ma thams cad ni// zhi dang rgyas pa 'phel bar bya// oM badz+ra A yu She swA hA/ oM gats+tsha ha ri bing /
381a4(rgyud): ga la dIp+ta k+Sha de hi de hi dA pa ya i dan tsa me kAr+yaM ku ru sAhA/ oM badz+ra puSh+Ta ye swA hA/ de ltar byas la 'bad pa yis// khri yi steng du bzhugs par bya// sku gzugs kyi ni sum 'gyur cha'i// tshad tsam du ni rab tu bslag/
381a5(rgyud): oM su pra tiSh+Tha badz+re swA hA/ me tog spos sogs sngon 'gro bas// phyogs skyong rnams kyang mchod par bya// oM in+d+ra ya swA hA/ zhes bya ba dbang ldan la thug gi bar du rol mo'i sgra la sogs pas yang dag par
381a6(rgyud): mchod de/ gshegs su gsol bar bya ba ni// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de yi sras// tshangs sogs lha yi tshogs rnams dang // gang dag cho ga ma tshang bas// de dag bzod pa mdzad par rigs// kun tu
381a7(rgyud): gi dang rgyas pa ru// man bdag che la rab mdzad nas// sangs rgyas yul dugashegs nas ni// thar yang 'artson par mdzad du gsas// sa dang cu dang 'i chung gi/ lha rnams kun gyi sku gzugs pa// bskalapa/
381b1(rgyud): brgya ru srung gnas mdzod// dgyes shing yid bzang 'gyur ba yis// slob dpon bla mar bcas pa yi// bu dang tsha bo bsrung mdzad nas// rang gnas dge bar gshegs su gsol// dpyid zla ra ba 'am/
381b2(rgyud): dpyid zla 'bring // dgun dang dpyid kyi tha chung ngam// dbyar zla de bzhin dbyar 'bring po// nyi ma byang du gnas pa yi// dkar po phyogs kyi gnyis pa'am// rim bzhin de ltar gsum pa'am// gang tshe
381b3(rgyud): gza' dang rjes mthun na// nag po'i phyogs la'ang brtsams par bya// gang tshe thams cad mthun gyur na// mi rnams yun du 'phel bar byed// bco lnga de bzhin brgyad pa dang // bcu gsum pa yang de
381b4(rgyud): bzhin no// gnam stong dang ni de bzhin du// bcu bzhi pa la'ang bya ba min// thams cad du ni chu smad dang // snar ma gro bzhin de bzhin te// lag pa sbubs dang snron dang ni// rgyal dang chu smad de bzhin no//
381b5(rgyud): khrums smad dag kyang de bzhin du// rgyu skar 'di rnams thams cad du// skye dgu 'phel zhing de yi ni// rab tu gnas pa mchog tu byed// yid la 'dod pa ci yang rung // dngos grub me bzhis ster bar 'gyur/
381b6(rgyud): lung las shes pa'i yang dag pa// khrums sam yang na gro bzhin gyis// lag gis skal bzang snar mas ni// gzhan dag las ni rgyal bar byed// mgo yis zhi ba nye bar ston// chu stod kyis ni bu dag/
381b7(rgyud): gson dag rtag par dngos grub khrums slad kyis// rgyal gyis rtag par tsher rang 'gyur// sngon gyis mchog tu bde bar byed// lha mtshams kyis ni mchog ster 'gyur/ pung bu lag dang ba wa sangs/ thab/
382a1(rgyud): gza' sogs shes bya ste// 'di rnams bzang ldan la byas na// rab tu gnas pa mchog tu dge / gsum pa drug pa bdun pa la// bcu dang bcu gcig la bla ge/ gnyis pa
382a2(rgyud): bzhi pa de bzhin brgyad// bcu dang bcu gcig rnams la lag/ gnyis dang bdun dang de bzhin dgu// de bzhin phur bu bcu gcig pa// dus sbyor bzhi pa la brten nas// de la lhag par gnas par bya//
382a3(rgyud): drug bdun bcu pa dor ba yi// ba wa sangs nyid dge ba yin// de ltar gza' rnams thams cad kyis// stobs ldan mi ldan der shes bya// gang tshe zhi ba'i gza' rnams dang // ning rnams zhi ba dge ba yin//
382a4(rgyud): dang po lnga pa gsum de bzhin// nor rnams 'joms pa spang bar bya// rjes su mthun par byed pa pos// skad cig de la yongs grub cing // ji ltar gsungs bzhin kun byas na// rab tu gnas pa mchog
382a5(rgyud): 'gyur zhing // 'khor los sgyur rgyal dbang phyug ni// tho ba 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// gza' dang rgyu skar 'dir med de// bgegs dang log par 'dren pa'ang med// gza' rnams thams cad rjes
382a6(rgyud): mthun phyir// bgegs dang rgyu skar lha rnams nyid// de ru sgrub par kun gnas shing // gzugs brnyan mchod rten la sogs kyis// dngos grub dag ni ster bar mdzad// yid kyis cung zad gang
382a7(rgyud): bsams pa// skye dang skye ba 'grub par 'gyur// rgyan rnams ma lus pa yis ni// phyi nas bzo bo rnams la mchod// gang dag de la grogs byed pa// gzhan dag kyang ni mchod par bya// de nas de dag
382b1(rgyud): thams cad la/ ka dga' bas 'di gad brjod par bya// ji ltar gsungs pa'i mchod pa rnams// bdag la mthun pa'i nus pa med// de phyir khyod la bdag pa por gsol// sngags kyi gtsang lnga'i b.ra'abya dag/ gzugs/
382b2(rgyud): b.ran dag la bzhin bya ste// bder gshegs lhag ma 'di dag ni// zos shing sdig pa byung bar 'gyur// zhes bya bas so// glang po rta grang shing rta nor// yon gyi dam pa dbul bar bya// de nas de la nan tan gyis/
382b3(rgyud): longs spyod g.yo ba dbul bar bya// gal te lha nyid dgyes 'dod na// bla ma gus pas dgyes bya zhing // de ltar rnam pa thams cad du// bram yang dag mnyes par bya// de nas gang dag brtul zhugs can// dge slo/
382b4(rgyud): dge bsnyen dge slong ma// mchog tu grub pas mchod byas la// ji ltar 'os pa'i yon yang dbul// dung ngam rol mo sgra la sogs// bzang ba'i glu dang gar rnams kyis// gnyen dang rigs brgyud 'khor rnams
382b5(rgyud): kyis da rol mo chen po mtshan mo dbul// de ltar thams cad phul zin nas// gang rung mchod sbyin dkyil 'khor la// phul lam dbul bar byed pa rnams// slob dpon la ni dbul bya yi// bzo bo la ni mi sbyin zhing //
382b6(rgyud): dge slong rnams la'ang sbyin mi bya// slob dpon mchog gi lha yin te// nor rnams thams cad de la dbul// de nas dkyil 'khor byugs byas te// ba yi lci bas byugs byas shing // rdul tshon chu bor rab
382b7(rgyud): dor ro// de yis yang dag legs par 'gyur// rab tu gnas pa mdor bsdus pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// / dur khrod dag dang draldan pa yi// khyim dang srin po'i gnas rnams su//
383a1(rgyud): mngon spyod kyi ni las bya ba// thab khung tha ma par ma mchog/ phyed dang gsum mam/ khru dgu pa ni byas pa las// stegs bu de yi tshad brtsigs te// gru gsum pa
383a2(rgyud): 'am mdung rtse 'dra// lugs phye sol phye dug gis ni// bskus pas thab khung nag por bya// dbus su rdo rje rtse dgu pa// nag po shin tu 'bar ba bri// mu ran steng du rtse gsum dang // rgya gram pa yi/
383a3(rgyud): rdo rjes mtshan// de yi phyi rol mu khyud la// dbyug pa dang ni dgra sta dang // ral gri shin tu 'bar ba bri// de yi phyi rol keng rus te// bde gshegs la sogs phyag rgyas mtshan// dud sprin mdog 'dra
383a4(rgyud): drang srong mchog/ ri yi steng bzhugs rtse gsum dang // gzar bu 'phreng ba ril bar ldan// de lta'i me lha spyan drangs nas// lhor bltas khros pa'i sems kyis bsregs// shin tu gdug cing
383a5(rgyud): tshir mar bcas// sreg shing yam shing byas nas kyang // sha dang khrag dang lcags phye dang // rus phye dug dang ske tshe dang // dri chen dri chu la sogs pa'i// rdzas rnams kun la dug gis ni// bsgos/
383a6(rgyud): pas lan grangs 'bum bsregs nas// de yi longs spyod 'byor pa dang // gnyen dang 'khor dang bran rnams dang // bu dang chung mar bcas pa rnams// spangs te srog dang bral nas ni// sdug bsngal
383a7(rgyud): mi bzang myong bar 'gyur// mngon spyod kyi las rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAn+tiM gar+b+ha dang / lo tsa ba ban+d+he dza ya rak+Shi tas bsgyur ba'o//
